[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum tsa bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/de nas hUM zhes bya ba dran pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/las 'grub pa ston pa dang mthong ba sbyin pa dang 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 
[\[1b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/'on te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/_shing su ra bis me sbar la/_'bras yos dang /_pad+ma dang ut+pa la dang /_yungs 
[\[1b.3\]]kar dang /_tsan+dan dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar bya'o/_/
[\[1b.4\]]de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun na bzhugs shing rig sngags 'chang ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/_/mchog gang 'dod cing gsol ba'i 
[\[1b.5\]]mchog de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/_/phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad do/_/gal te skal ba chung ba zhig ste mngon du zhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/_gsang sngags grub pa chen po dang /_cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang /_rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no/_/dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston 
[\[2a.2\]]to/_/dbang phyug thob par bya na/_'bras so ba stu ra sa dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug so sor thob par 'gyur ro/_/grong thob par bya na/_tan tu li ya kha dang zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya 
[\[2a.3\]]rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na grong thob par 'gyur ro/_/yul gyi bdag por bya na 'bras sA lu dang ras bal sa bon rnams mar dang bsres te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi snang bar bya na/_ske tshe dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[2a.4\]]nam mkha' la 'gro bar bya na/_sha ta pad tri ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na/_shi li dang tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /_tu ruSh+ka rnams til dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po 
[\[2a.5\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so zhes gsung zhing dbugs 'byin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mgo bo'i spyi bor phyag 'jog cing mchog grub pa chen po stsol bar mdzad do/_/
[\[2a.6\]]thams cad du mchod pa 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na 'bras ma 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]grugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gter bsgul na de nas don yod pa chen po'i spyan sngar brjod par bya ste/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/_bklags pas grub pa so sor bstan pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa/_grub pa rigs sngags 'chang gi rnam 
[\[2b.2\]]par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa bde ba skyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/_ngogs su zhugs pa 
[\[2b.3\]]rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams rnam par sel ba/_don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/_mal cha dang stan med pa rnams kyi gos sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po/_thams cad du las thams cad legs par grub pa/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa 
[\[2b.4\]]thams cad 'phrog pa/_gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa/_rgyal po mnyes par byed pa/_rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de/_dge bsnyen rnams kyi mchog tu skyid pa/_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa/_rig pa'i rgyal po'i yon tan rmad du byung 
[\[2b.5\]]ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyod pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos te/_bza' ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang /_bag yod cing bden par smra ba/_dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/_bla ma la gus pa/_rtag par rgyun du byams pa'i sems la 
[\[2b.6\]]mnyam par gzhag pa/_sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/_sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/_'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla na med pa'i sgrub pa 'di bya'o/_/bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/_don yod pa chen po'i sgyu 
[\[2b.7\]]ma bla na med pa ni 'di'o/_/gi wang dang /_spr-i ka dang /_pu shel tse dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ldong ros dang /_shing kun dang /_spang spos dang /_na la da dang /_ru rta dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du 'bras dgang ste 'di rnams thams cad cha mnyam ste/_phye mar byas nas/_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]thams cad zhib mor btags la/_ga bur dang /_gla rtsis bsgos te/_snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis bcos pa/_nye'u shing dang /_bil ba dang /_me tog brgya pa dang /_puSh+ka ra dang /_gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang /_rgya spos dang /_sa mu sta dang /_pra 
[\[3a.2\]]puN+Da rI ka dang /_shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun gang bar sbyin par bya ste drug cha lhag mar lus pa dang /_snyigs ma bre gang dang 'o ma'i snyigs ma bor te/_til mar srang gnyis la rtag tu btso bar bya'o/_/legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang /_
[\[3a.3\]]dkyil 'khor du me tog dang /_dri bzang po'i bdug pa dang /_til mar btso ba'i cho ga bzhin du rab tu sbyar la gang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa srung ba'i cho ga bya ste/_snod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas 
[\[3a.4\]]brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug ste/_rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par byas pa/_dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la byugs pa 'dis/_lus de mi snang zhing dngos po med par ston par byed do/_/ngag thos 
[\[3a.5\]]la reg par mi byed do/_/gang gis lus khrus ma byas kyi bar de srid du bdag nyid mi snang ste lus mi mthong ngo /_/dpral bar thig le byas nas/_yan lag dang /_nying lag rnams la reg ste/_gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te/_
[\[3a.6\]]skad cig la dga' bar byed pa dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog sngo ba dang /_skra cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/til mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor 
[\[3a.7\]]los sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/_/reg pa tsam gyis tshe bskal pa khri thub par 'gyur ro/_/lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro/_/lus rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang /_gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye ste 'dug go/_/gang du 'dod par 'jug par byed do/_/dkyil 'khor sgrub 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa'i dus su rig sngags 'chang la thig le byas nas lag tu rdo rje dang nor bu byas na/_nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/_mod la dkyil 'khor grub pa ston par byed do/_/til mar gyis rkang pa la byugs na/_nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed do/_/lus la byugs na mi snang bar 
[\[3b.2\]]ston par byed do/_/mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/_yan lag dang /_nying lag la thig le byas na/_lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do/_/'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o/_/yungs kar la bzlas te/_lan cig bskus sam/_
[\[3b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor na/_dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/_'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar byed do/_/gtor ma'i snod gang ba rnams dang /_bum pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go/_/rang nyid se gol gyi sgras yongs su 'don 
[\[3b.4\]]par byed na/_slar yang snod nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa rang rang gi gnas su gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di rnams dkyil 'khor dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub bo/_/de nas seng ge'i khrag dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/_bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na/_
[\[3b.5\]]mi yi seng ge chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/_ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng ger kun tu gnas so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/_nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa dang /_mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_me 'bar ba ston par byed 
[\[3b.6\]]do/_/phag gi khrag dang sbyar na/_phag gi gzugs su ston par byed de/_shugs dang stobs chen por ston par byed do/_/glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/_/rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan cig sbyar ba lus la byugs pa 
[\[3b.7\]]tsam gyis rta mgrin gyi gzugs su ston par byed de ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do/_/ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/_/khyu mchog chen po la zhon par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/nya'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/_klu'i rgyal po chu bdag chen po'i gzugs 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul dmar po'i khrag dang bsres nas sbyar na/_sbrul chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ra'i khrag dang bsres pas/_ra chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i lo ma dang /_phye ma dang /_rtsa ba dang bcas pa 
[\[4a.2\]]dang /_'dab ma dang me tog dang sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyis lhan cig sbyar bas yungs kar la bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyis thig le bya'o/_/mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag la byug pa byas na rgyal po chen po'i cha lugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/_ma mo'i tshogs dang 
[\[4a.3\]]bcas pas yongs su bskor bas dgos pa sna tshogs pa dang /_rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/ldong ros kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsres nas mig la byugs na/_'khor chen po'i dbus su/_
[\[4a.4\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yungs kar de nam mkha' la gtor na/_'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i snying pos sbyar na/_pad+ma chen po'i char 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ut+pa 
[\[4a.5\]]la sngon po'i khu bas sbyor na/_ut+pa la sngon po chen po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar me tog gi khu bas sbyar ba de lta de ltar me tog gi char chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'i gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs su mthong bar 
[\[4a.6\]]'dod pa de lta de ltar lha'i til mar rnying pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/_de lta de ltar de dang de nyid kyi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhal yas khang yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lag pas nor bu gcig blangs te/_yid la rjes su dran par byas na/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid 
[\[4a.7\]]du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs pa rnams ston par byed do/_/lag pas snod la gzung na/_snod sna tshogs pa bton par byed do/_/lag pas bum pa la gzung na/_bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par byed do/_/rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na/_gang du rdo ba la rkang pa 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'jog par byed de/_mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/gtun shing la byugs na/_rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs na/_
[\[4b.2\]]ma mo'i lha rnams kyi so so tha dad pa'i rdul bzung ste til mar dang lhan cig sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na/_lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugs su ston par byed do/_/gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o/_/de nas blo 'phel bar byed pa 
[\[4b.3\]]ni/_til mar dang /_'o ma lhan cig zos na/_blo dang dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigs su bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byed do/_/zhag bdun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed do/_/
[\[4b.4\]]zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tshe lha'i lo stong du 'gyur ro/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas/_bcud len sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gnyer ma dang /_skra dkar spangs pa dang /_skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /_pad+ma'i 
[\[4b.5\]]kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs su 'gyur ro/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po ches srung gi stobs su 'gyur ro/_/zhag sum cu so lnga'i sbyor bas 
[\[4b.6\]]nam mkha' lding chen po'i stobs su 'gyur ro/_/zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sbyor bas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyur ro/_/zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ri rab lhun po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/_klu'i 
[\[4b.7\]]rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bos yongs su bskor ba/_mi g.yo zhing mi bsgul ba/_reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/_mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu spyod pa/_lha rnams thams cad kyis phyag byas shing /_phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/_drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]'os su gyur pa/_gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa'i 'os su gyur pa/_rig sngags 
[\[5a.2\]]'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig grub pa/_lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os su gyur pa/_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mngon du smra ba'i 'os su gyur pa/_klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi nye bar bgrod par bya ba 
[\[5a.3\]]ste/_de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang ba'o/_/til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang 'dis/_til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na/_byugs 
[\[5a.4\]]pa tsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje la byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nam mkha' la 'gro 
[\[5a.5\]]zhing /_rdo rje'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/blta na sdug pa'i 'khor lo'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar mod la 'gyur ro/_/
[\[5a.6\]]dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms so/_/mdung rtse gsum pa la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/_/stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[5a.7\]]'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_me dbal dang /_shu ba dang /_mdze dang /_rkang shu dang /_rtsa'i rma dang /_mgul pa 'gags pa dang /_rna ba'i rtsa nad dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_dmu chu dang /_skran dang /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]nyid la yang /_mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang /_byugs pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sel lo/_/til mar gyis nad thams cad sel ba de bzhin du/_rtsib logs na ba dang /_tshad pa dang /_snying na ba dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_bshang ba 'khyim pa dang /_pho 
[\[5b.2\]]ba'i nad kyi nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do/_/nyams pa dang /_zad pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang /_gso dpyad ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lus 
[\[5b.3\]]rnams rgyas pa dang /_mgu ba dang /_spro ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/gdon rnam pa sna tshogs par bsrung ba dang /_brjed byed mi bzad pa la yang /_reg pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tshom med do/_/byad mi bzad pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_dug dang /_
[\[5b.4\]]sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/brtan pa dang /_g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang /_mche ba'am/_sbrul go Na sa dang /_sdig pa yang rung /_srin bu dang /_phye ma leb gdug pa'am/_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po'am/_sbrul gyis mthong ba'i 
[\[5b.5\]]dug gam/_dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang /_reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang /_hA la hA la'i gdug pa gang yin pa dang /_gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang /_rtsa ba'i dug gang yin pa dang /_sdong bu'i dug dang /_'dab ma'i dug dang /_me tog gi dug dang /_mdangs 
[\[5b.6\]]kyi dug gang yin pa dang /_gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/til mar reg pa tsam gyis/_lam mchog dang /_lam gol bar song ba rnams dang /_rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba yang rung /_bsad par 'os par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[5b.7\]]bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa gang yin pa dang /_gzhan yang dgra'i gzeb dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa nyid dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_phyir rgol ba gang yin pa yang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]cad 'joms so/_/rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsol to/_/g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du'am/_phan tshun 'thab bzhin pa thams cad la til mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba ster ro/_/mkhas pas mig la byugs na/_mi thub cing thams cad 
[\[6a.2\]]du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/_dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa/_sdig pa thams cad sel ba/_mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/_nad thams cad 
[\[6a.3\]]rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_mod la thams cad du grub pa bla na med pa/_nad thams cad zhi ba/_de kho na nyid khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa'i ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/_ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang /_
[\[6a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang /_
[\[6a.5\]]mchod pa dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_zhe sar bya ba dang /_bla mar byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ras ris kyi sku gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/_mthas klas 
[\[6a.6\]]pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/_'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/ras gru bzhi pa gru bzhir cha 
[\[6a.7\]]mnyam pa/_shin tu thags bzang ba/_shin tu gsar ba/_shin tu 'jam pa mchog tu mdzes pa/_khru gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma bcad pa/_skra dang bral ba'am/_yang na dar gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par 'byes pa la/_ri mo mkhan gtsang ma smyung bar gnas pas/_lhag 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ma ma yin pa'i tshon snod gsar par bzhag la/_tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pas/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa/_zhal dang po ni zhi ba/_spyan gsum pa/_ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan 
[\[6b.2\]]pa/_'od dpag med cod pan du 'chang ba/_zla bas nye bar mdzes pa/_phyag bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed pa/_tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/_dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs 
[\[6b.3\]]kyis brgyan pa/_g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/_zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/_dbu skra 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/_'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/_drag tu bzhad pa'o/_/zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i steng du/_
[\[6b.4\]]sku phyed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa bya ste/_sku ut+pa la sngon po'i kha dog can/_dbu skra dmar po cung zad 'khyil ba/_'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_phyag gnyis kyi gcig gis ral gri dang /_gnyis pas 
[\[6b.5\]]tho ba 'bar ba can bya'o/_/phyag gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/_pad+ma'i ge sar 'bar ba'i snyen pa can no/_/gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum ste/_g.yas pa na'o/_/g.yon pas khro bo chen po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/_don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yas 
[\[6b.6\]]pa dbugs 'byin pa'i rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs pa/_phyag thams cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya ste/_pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o/_/rgya mtsho'i snying por ri rab la gnas pa/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bos 
[\[6b.7\]]dkris pa bya'o/_/nya dang chu srin dang /_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis dkris pa/_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_ku mu dang /_pad+ma dkar pos gcal du bkram pa/_dang pa dang /_bzhad dang /_ngur pa dang /_shang shang te'us khyab pa bya'o/_/g.yas logs su 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]lha mo sgrol ma/_dbu cung zad dud pa/_thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/_/dkar sham chen mo thal mo sbyar te cung zad 'dud pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'dzem bag dang bcas 
[\[7a.2\]]pa bya'o/_/srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang /_drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/_'bar pa'i snying por khro bo lcags kyu la blta bzhin pa/_lag pa bzhi pa/_lag na ral gri dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa dang /_rdo rje thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan 
[\[7a.3\]]par bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/_zhal khro gnyer can drag po/_dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/_'jigs par byed pa/_'bar ba'i snying por pus mo g.yas pa btsugs pa/_ral gri dang /_dgra sta thogs pa/_phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/_rgyan 
[\[7a.4\]]thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta bzhin pa/_kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang ba/_'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba bya'o/_/lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i kho ra khor yug gi steng du/_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po 
[\[7a.5\]]dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lta dang /_lus ngan po bya ste/_me tog sna tshogs kyi phur ma thogs te/_mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po don yod lcags kyu'i rgyab tu/_rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa bya ste/_yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma rnam 
[\[7a.6\]]par bkra bar bya'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs kyi drung du/_rig sngags 'chang bya ste/_pus mo btsugs pa me tog sna tshogs thogs shing /_lag na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/_khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o/_/zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gnas su pho nya mo bya ste/_
[\[7a.7\]]zur mig can drag mo/_lag na ral gri thogs pa/_rnam par 'gyur ba phyag thal mo sbyar ba rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bya'o/_/ras ris kyi sku gzugs kyi bya ba yongs su mthar phyin nas/_byin gyis brlabs te/_de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]bya'o/_/de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar/_de'i spyan sngar khro bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i cho ga 
[\[7b.2\]]rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du/_gtsang mas zas mi za bar/_de'i spyan sngar me tog dang /_bdug spos phul nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad 
[\[7b.3\]]bya'o/_/'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bklags pas grub pa ste/_rig sngags 'chang gis/_gsang ba mchog gi las bsgrub pa bya'o/_/de nas sku gzugs mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams 
[\[7b.4\]]'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang /_sgrib pa thams cad dang /_sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa dang /_bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/nad dang 'jigs pa thams 
[\[7b.5\]]cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_mi mdza' ba rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de yang phan pa byed par 'gyur te/_me tog gam/_bdug 
[\[7b.6\]]pa dang /_dri'am/_byug pa'am/_dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byed pa'am/_khrus kyi bum pa gang bkod pa'am/_rdul sel bar byed pa tsam yang rung ste/_rig sngags 'chang de'i/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_
[\[7b.7\]]dge bsnyen mas/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyangs shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba brjes nas kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[8a.2\]]bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po/_don yod pa'i khro bo lcags kyu'i gzungs 'di yang mtha' 
[\[8a.3\]]dag yongs su rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo 
[\[8a.4\]]thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[8a.5\]]cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du mchod par 'os par 
[\[8a.6\]]yang 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du thogs pa med pa mkhas pa'i blo ru 'gyur ro/_/de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 
[\[8a.7\]]'khor/_cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad par bgyi'o/_/khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/_sa dang ba byung bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/_gzings kyi rgya dang tshad mnyam pa/_shin tu tshad la bab cing 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]legs par rnam par 'byes pa/_legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/_'jam shing mnyen pa dang ldan pa'o/_/tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig btab la/_/sna tshogs tshon rtsis rnam par dbye/_/sgo bzhi shin tu rnam 'byes pa/_/khor yug 
[\[8b.2\]]them skas bzhi dang ldan/_/rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por yang /_/shin tu rnam 'byes tshad la bab/_/khru yi tshad du bya ba'o/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang /_/mkhas pas shin tu rnam 'byes pa'i/_/
[\[8b.3\]]pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis bya/_/lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang /_/ge sar pad+ma'i khor yug tu/_/snying por gyur pa'i dbu mchog la/_/khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o/_/drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/_/ral gri dang ni dgra sta'i phyag_/ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan 
[\[8b.4\]]cing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/lus phyed pa dang /_zhags pas kun nas dkris pa/_mdung rtse gsum pa/_nam mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/_pad+ma dang bcas pa byas pa la/_grwa grwar 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o/_/mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/_
[\[8b.5\]]drag po'i zhal 'jigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/_zhal 'jigs su rung ba 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa'o/_/nang gi ri mo la/_lcags sgrog dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya ste/_'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/_kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 
[\[8b.6\]]tshon rtsis bya'o/_/ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du/_pad+ma kha phyed bye ba ge sar 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o/_/ri mo gsum pa'i nang du/_'khor lo'i rnam pa'o/_/mu khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag pa'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya ste/_mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o/_/ral gri dang /_zhags 
[\[8b.7\]]pa dang /_mdung rtse gsum dang /_tsa ba la dang /_mdung rtse gnyis/_dung dang /_tir+ya dang /_'khor lo dang /_rtse gsum kha gdengs dang /_tho ba dang /_mdung dang /_ral gri dang /_nor bu dang /_mdung rtse gsum dang /_mda' bo che dang /_las kyi rdo rje dang /_rtse lnga dang /_par+sha sU 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]la dang /_rdo rje zur gsum dang /_pad+ma dang /_rtse gsum dag kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/kha khyer gyi rnam pas brgyan pa la kha khyer gyi phyi rol dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/_rigs chen po bzhi thun 
[\[9a.2\]]mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/shar gyi gnas su/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya'o/_/lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/_nor bu'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag 
[\[9a.3\]]rgya rnams kyang bri bar bya'o/_/byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag par bri'o/_/shar gyi sgo ru/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rgyal po sgo ru bri bar bya'o/_/lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo rnams so/_/nub tu nor bu rigs kyi khro bo'o/_/byang 
[\[9a.4\]]du rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo bri bar bya'o/_/khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs 'bar ba'i snying po/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_lag pa bzhi pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o/_/ri rab la gnas pa/_skyil mo krung phyed pa lus cung zad bskum pa bya'o/_/phyi'i ri 
[\[9a.5\]]mo'i dkyil 'khor du/_nor bu dang /_rdo rje dang /_me tog dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dag go/_/khor yug tu kha khyer 'bar bas/_dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu brgyan pa'o/_/lhab lhub dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas kun 
[\[9a.6\]]nas dkyil 'khor la yang dag par brgyan pa'o/_/ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snod ci 'byor pa dang /_gtor ma'i las kyi cho gas 'byor pa dang /_rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o/_/bum pa gang ba dang /_pog phor dang /_bum bu dang /_bum pa dang /_
[\[9a.7\]]gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba dang /_'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog kun nas gcal du dgram mo/_/'bras yos dang /_yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar/_mchod yon dang /_
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]zhabs bsil gyi snod dang /_rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo/_/dri'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa dang /_legs par brgyan pa'i bum pa byas nas/_mkhas pas dar bzang po bcings te/_dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/_/sgo bzhir dri chab kyis gang ba'i bum pa 
[\[9b.2\]]dar gyis bcings pa gzhag par bya'o/_/mkhas pas sgo dang /_sgo ru ni/_bu ram dang /_sha kha ra dang /_sbrang rtsi'i ro dang /_gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/_/mdung rtse gsum la/_zho dang /_'o ma dang /_zan dang /_mchog gi bza' ba ma nyams pas/_shin tu mdzes pa'i 
[\[9b.3\]]gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du/_'khur ba dang /_'khur ba zlum po nyid dang /_snum 'khur dang /_be Ti ma ka dang /_sa rA'i la du dang /_mud ga'i la du dang /_hwags dang /_kha y+YA ni bzang po rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/gtor ma'i las la/_khor yug tu me tog 
[\[9b.4\]]bzang po dgram zhing /_phreng bas brgyan par bya'o/_/'bru'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/'bras bu'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_ne'u gsing sngo bsangs dang /_lo ma mdzes pa bkram ste gzhag par bya'o/_/khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /_de bzhin du/_a ga 
[\[9b.5\]]ru dang /_tsan+dan spr-i ka dang /_tu ruSh+ka dang /_dpal gyis dkris pa dang /_gu gul dang /_kun tu ru dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_hwags sbyar ba'i bdug pa ste/_bdug pa 'di dag dbul bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu bdug pa 'thul ba'i pog phor gzhag par 
[\[9b.6\]]bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/phyogs bcings pa dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba bya ste/_gtsug tor bcing zhing /_bdag srung ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o/_/rig sngags dkyil 'khor mchog mthong ba dang /_
[\[9b.7\]]phyag bya zhing /_bskor ba nyid dang /_dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o/_/rtag tu bsang ba'i las byas te/_de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa yang bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga tshad ma las/_da gos pa 'di dag thams cad byas nas/_de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o/_/rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/_'gro ba bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bde ba can du/_'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te 
[\[10a.2\]]skye bar the tsom med do/_/lha'i gzugs shin tu mdzes pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/_'di la the tsom mi bya'o/_/'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i dngos 
[\[10a.3\]]grub dang /_phyag rgya'i dngos grub dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po dngos grub bla na med pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang /_mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig pa dang /_dgra thams cad bzlog pa dang /_mod la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /_dgos pa 
[\[10a.4\]]thams cad dang /_thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rgyal po dang /_blon por bcas pa rnams kyis dus rgyun du bla 
[\[10a.5\]]na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ljongs thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid du yang dge sbyong rnams dang /_bram ze rnams dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med 
[\[10a.6\]]dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu tshig btsan pa dang /_rtag tu lha rnams kyis mngon par bsrungs pa dang /_skabs gsum gyi dbang po dang /_rdo rje 'chang ba nyid dang /_rdo rje snying po bdag nyid chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug 
[\[10a.7\]]dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha nyid dang /_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing mthong ba la yang dus rtag tu srung ba dang /_rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]the tsom mi bya'o/_/yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang /_thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /_'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas 
[\[10b.2\]]pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no/_/'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnas su skye ba'i tha 
[\[10b.3\]]ma yin no/_/rtag tu skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/_'di la the tsom mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro ba dang /_rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan par the tsom med do/_/'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin 
[\[10b.4\]]te/_ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_khro bo lcags kyu'i las brgya phrag stong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos bya'o/_/thams cad du lan cig bzlas brjod byas la/_thams cad du las 
[\[10b.5\]]thams cad bya'o/_/bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/_bzhin 'dzum pas khro bo chen po lcags kyu'i gzungs kyi kun tu 
[\[10b.6\]]snang bzhin pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po lus las phyung ngo /_/gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so/_/'od zer gyi snang ba gang gis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab 
[\[10b.7\]]pa'i snying po rab tu 'bebs par 'dod pa'i don dang /_lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa'i don dang /_lha'i dri dang mthun par gsal ba'i dri dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri rnam par bkra ba'i char rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]dbang phyug la phab bo/_/rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i chu gsal zhing rgya che ba/_dri 'phro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i chu mu tig dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/_dza ti'i 'bras bu dang 'dra bar rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i lha'i chus yongs su dbang bskur te/_
[\[11a.2\]]thigs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bzhu ba'i mig 'bras las lhung ba'i chu skar ma las rab tu lhung ba'i gos/_de lta bu'i dpral bar thig le 'bar ba nyi ma dang /_smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zer sa la lhung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo /_/
[\[11a.3\]]pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgya stong phrag kha bye ba ltar rab tu 'dzum pas rnam par mdzes pa/_pad+ma'i ze 'bru ltar mnyen pa byung bar gyur to/_/bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu nyi ma brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer snang bas 'bar bzhin pa/_bcom ldan 'das la mi gang gi 
[\[11a.4\]]tshad lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis/_chu'i thigs pa 'dab ma mnyam pa/_bai DUr+ya mchog tu mdzes shing 'bar ba pad+ma kha bye ba de mthong nas/_thugs ngo mtshar dang /_ya mtshan skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub 
[\[11a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems dpa' chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba mthong lags so/_/rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong lags so/_/sems dpa' chen 
[\[11a.6\]]po bdag gis/_ltad mo'i mchog mthong lags so/_/sems dpa' dag pa chen po/_khyod kyis bdag gi ltad mo'i the tsom med par mdzod cig ces so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen 
[\[11a.7\]]po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje/_bdag la don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhabs kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_lha rnams yod de/_de bdag gis 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/de'i mthu dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mthong ngo /_/de'i mthus pad+ma 'di byung ngo /_/rig 
[\[11b.2\]]sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bdag gi dpral ba nas phyung bas cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya che zhing che ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[11b.3\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_mchod pa byas nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_byis pa'i cha byad bzung nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yob par 
[\[11b.4\]]byed bzhin du 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags 
[\[11b.5\]]pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_lha rnams smros shig_/gang gis smras pa tsam gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[11b.6\]]rim par phye ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags 'di rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa med par dkyil 'khor mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed do/_/cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya rnams rjes su mthun par phyogs 
[\[11b.7\]]te gnas par byed do/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lha thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas par byed do/_/sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang phyis kyang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]las thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rnams la legs par sgrub pa'i cho gar yang 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang zhing /_phyi bzhin phyi bzhin lhan cig rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro zhes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[12a.2\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/_sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i don du/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog gi sgrub pa bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su/_bzhin 'dzum 
[\[12a.3\]]zhing mig mi 'dzums pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras so/_/dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab 'byam thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rab 'byam rgya 
[\[12a.4\]]mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang /_rang 
[\[12a.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba thams cad dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i sgrub pa grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[12a.6\]]gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can/_rig sngags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa grub pa rnams dang phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M bi ma le/_bi ma la gar+b+he/_bi ma la am+bu dza pad+me sUr+ya brtsa se/_sa ha 
[\[12a.7\]]sra rasmi ki ra Ne ma hA ra smi dz+wA la a ba b+hA Shi te/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sany+tsa ra pad+mo da ri pad+ma gar+b+he/_pad+ma b+hu dze/_su bi ma la am+bu dza bi ma le ma Ni ka Na ka badzra bai DUr+ya in+d+ra nI la ma ra ka ta/_pad+ma rA ga bi bi d+ha ma hA ma Ni rat+nA la~M kr-i ta sha rI re/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra/_pa ra pa ra pa 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ra shu pA she d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra sa man+ta bai ro tsa na/_sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya ad+hiSh+Thi te/_ku la sa ma ya pa ri pU ra Ni/_ba ra ba ra/_badzra dz+wA la mA lA gar+b+he/_badzre badzre badzra a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me hU~M hU~M/_ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni tsin+tA ma Ni pA sha d+ha ra/_hu ru hu ru pad+ma pad+ma gau re pad+ma pA Ni bar de/_a mo g+ha pad+me/_o~M pad+mi ni 
[\[12b.2\]]pad+ma ma Ni badzra d+ha rA/_sarba ta thA ga ta ku la sA nA mya sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ma hA bi pu la b+hu dze/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sam+b+ha ra/_b+hu ru b+hu ru b+hu ri Ni/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta bIr+ya rA dze pra sa ra pra sa ra san+ta bi ma le/_sarba bid+yA maN+Da la de ba tA na ma skr-i te/_ta ra ta ra/_tA ra ya tA ra ya/_sa man+ta 
[\[12b.3\]]pa ri pU ra Ni sarba bo d+hi satwa a b+hi She tsa ni sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha a b+hi Shik+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya sa maM sarba bid+yA maN+Da la ku la/_sa ma ya a b+hi She kaiHsarba ta thA ga ta pA Ni bar de/_pad+ma gau re pad+ma pra b+he/_pad+ma bi ka tsam+bu dza gar+b+he/_hU~M hU~M/_badzre badzre/_badzre pad+me ta thA ga ta ku la a d+hiSh+Thi te/_a mo g+ha ba ra de/_
[\[12b.4\]]sarbA sA pa ri pU ra Ni sarba pA pa duHkha pra sha ma ni/_a mo g+ha hr-i da ya sid+d+hi sA d+ha ya bi ma le hU~M phaT/_o~Mb ra de pad+ma b+hu dze na ma stu te pad+ma su te swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi 
[\[12b.5\]]pad+ma'i lcags kyu don yod zhags pa'i snying po rigs kyi rgyal po gzungs chen po kun nas rnam par snang bar byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa'i de ma thag gi 'og tu pad+ma ze 'bru dang bcas pa'i ge sar gsal 
[\[12b.6\]]bar rnam par bye ste/_dper na grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig gi sgo bya nas rgyal mo byung ba bzhin du/_lha'i gzugs blta na sdug pa 'od mtha' yas pa phyag bzhi pa rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/_phyag na pad+ma/_don yod zhags pa'i ngo bo'i zhags pa'i phyag dang /_yid bzhin gyi 
[\[12b.7\]]nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i phyag dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag_/spyan gsum pa/_zhal gsum pa zla ba'i cod pan 'chang ba zhi ba/_zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i zhal/_sku la 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po/_pad+ma dang /_seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]pa/_pad+ma kha bye ba'i snying por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[13a.2\]]spyan sngar 'dug ste/_mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/_don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[13a.3\]]sems can dag pa chen po khyod ci'i phyir mig mi 'dzums par blta/_mchog ci don du gnyer bzhin du 'khod ces so/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya dang /_sngags 
[\[13a.4\]]dang /_dam tshig gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nyon cig_/khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thams cad du/_dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya'i gsang bar lung bstan cing /_
[\[13a.5\]]khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no/_/ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan no/_/tuN+DA dang /_kar sham 
[\[13a.6\]]dang /_sgrol ma dang /_khro gnyer can dang /_pad+ma rigs mdzes ma dang /_lha mo chen mo ki lI ki lI dang /_rdo rje pho nya mo dang /_dri med byed ma dang /_pad+ma'i spyan ma dang /_rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang /_rdo rje khro gnyer can dang /_lha mo pad+ma rab snang ma dang /_pad+ma spyod byed ma dang /_rig sngags 
[\[13a.7\]]kyi rgyal mo chen mo don yod pa'i phyag dang /_longs spyod ldan ma dang /_dpal mo dang /_'jigs ma dang /_dpe med ma dang /_dbyangs can ma dang /_ral gcig ma spyan stong pa/_phyag stong pa/_dbu stong pa/_don yod pa'i pad+ma dang /_rin chen lha mo dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]dang /_'jig rten dbang phyug nyid dang /_rig pa'i dbang phyug nyid dang /_lha mo chen mo phyag rgya'i dbang phyug dang /_rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang /_hu hwa bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg dang /_zhi ba'i las dang /_lha mo rigs mdzes ma dang /_rig sngags 'chang chen mo rdo rje mdzes ma nyid dang /_
[\[13b.2\]]phyag na 'khor lo grub pa dang /_de bzhin du ral gri bzang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_khro bo nyid dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po dang /_dus kyi mtshan mo dang /_zhal rnam par 'gyur ma dang /_mche ba gtsigs ma dang /_ser skya ma nyid dang /_rang gsal ma dang /_phyag na rin chen ma nyid dang /_sa'i 
[\[13b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang /_de bzhin du rdzas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lha mo dang /_mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil dang /_gtor ma nyid kyi lha dang /_a gri Ni dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa'i lha dang /_thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lha mo khyod dang /_gsang 
[\[13b.4\]]sngags thams cad la dbang sgyur ma dang /_bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog sgrol bar byed pa dang /_bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i mchog ma dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi dbang mo dang /_rigs kyi gsang 
[\[13b.5\]]sngags dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po nges par sbyin pa 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes pa nyid du dpral ba'i smin ma'i bar du lha'i chu'i dngul las nges par skyes shing byung ba/_skar ma'i rnam pa dang mtshungs pa/_sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur 
[\[13b.6\]]pa'o/_/zhes las sna tshogs dang /_dbyangs can gang yin pa 'di 'chang bar byed do/_/zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa dang du blangs nas gsungs so/_/rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub mnyam par skyob pa thob pa dang /_de bzhin du cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa dang /_
[\[13b.7\]]phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_don yod pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par byed do/_/don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang /_bklags pas grub pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan dang /_thams cad du rigs spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]rgya'i dngos grub kyi phyir dang /_spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig nyid kyang 'di dran pa tsam gyis thams cad thob par byed do/_/dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_lha de dag thams cad kyang dran pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur bar the tsom 
[\[14a.2\]]med do/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams dam tshig la kun tu gnas par byed do/_/de lta bas na/_'bad pa thams cad kyis zung cig_/de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_shAkya'i rgyal pos rig sngags kyi rgyal por lung bstan pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14a.3\]]pa thams cad kyis ming kun tu gzigs shing thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba ste/_de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs pad+ma zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa/_rdo rje'i dngos grub dngos grub chen po/_pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos 
[\[14a.4\]]grub sgrub pa grub pa/_dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs dang nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/_don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub/_mchog gi dang po rdo rje'i rigs su bstan pa/_rdo rje rtse mo chen po'i lha 
[\[14a.5\]]dang /_de bzhin du rdo rje sa 'og dngos grub kyi phyir rdo rje phreng ba rim par phye ba'i grangs dang rdo rje mchu'i mchog gi dngos grub rnams la spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dang /_pad+ma mdzes pa dang /_de bzhin du'am/_ming smos pa tsam gyi mod la rjes su 'brang zhing 'ong bar byed do/_/de 
[\[14a.6\]]bzhin du rdo rje dbang po dang /_rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na/_rtag tu shes pas rig sngags smra ba dang /_ming gang gi mchog 'dzin pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu rnam par 
[\[14a.7\]]gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtag tu lung ston par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lung bstan ma thag tu sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]so/_/g.yos rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem rab tu chem chem mo/_/lha'i me tog gi char bab ste/_'di lta ste/_zla ba mdog mdzes dang /_dri med mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes chen po dang /_man+dA 
[\[14b.2\]]ra ba dang /_man+dA ra ba chen po dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_ut+pa la dmar po dang /_mya ngan 'tshang dang /_skya nar dang /_pun+nA ga dang /_gan+d+ha ga pAr+Shi ka dang /_kon+ta dang /_a d+hi muk+ta ka dang /_pa lA sha dang /_mthon ka dang /_
[\[14b.3\]]mthon ka chen po dang /_tsam+pa ka dang /_sau gan+d+hi ka dang /_san+d+ha bA ra Na dang /_nA ga puSh+pa dang /_sna ma dang /_yU thi ka dang /_na ba mA li ka dang /_ta ra Na dang /_ma ru ba ka dang /_ku bya ka'i me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang /_tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas btsos pa'i lha'i gos kyi char 
[\[14b.4\]]'bab pa'i don dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_rgyan cha'i char 'bab pa'i don dang /_lha'i gser gyi me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang /_lha'i dri tsan+dan dang /_ta mA la dang /_ga pur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum dang /_lha'i gos dang /_dri bzang 
[\[14b.5\]]pos bsgos pa'i phye ma'i char 'bab pa'i don dang /_lha'i dri chab kyi char 'bab pa'i don dang /_ma dkrol bar nam mkha'i mthil du rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba dang /_sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa dang /_gos dang /_rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[14b.6\]]'tsher bar byed pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i mu tig gi do shal dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rgyan zla gam can dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_ka shi ka'i gos sna tshogs pa 'thor bar byed par gyur to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 
[\[14b.7\]]'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_gzhon nu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus lha'i gzhal yas khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_lha'i gos dang me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]dang /_byug pa rnams dang /_rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gdugs sna tshogs pa rnams nam mkha'i mthil du kun tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i 
[\[15a.2\]]'khor la mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur te mchod pa chen po byed par gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong bar gyur to/_/dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa rnams yang dag par mthong ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/_de 
[\[15a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mthong bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kun tu yang dag par bye'o/_/lha'i gzhal yas khang sna tshogs pa byung bar gyur pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang 
[\[15a.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rdo rje gsor bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 
[\[15a.5\]]bzhin 'dzum pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba yang dag par snang ba dang /_mchod pa'i sprin gyi char che zhing che ba rab tu 'bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dngos grub kyi mtshan ma che 
[\[15a.6\]]zhing che ba snang ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po skyes par mthong bar snang ba dang /_cho 
[\[15a.7\]]'phrul che zhing che ba snang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig sngags chen po 'byung bar snang ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci lags/_rkyen ci lags/_'di ci'i 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]mthus sngon gyi mtshan ma yang dag par snang ba lags/_'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhig yang dag par snang ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems la the tsom de skyes par gyur pas/_de nges par bstan du gsol/_zhu ba lung ston par 'gyur ba gang gis/_bdag gi 
[\[15b.2\]]dogs pa rnam par sel ba dang /_som nyi rnam par sel bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye ru gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje nges 
[\[15b.3\]]par bstan par bya'i nyon cig_/lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'o/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpa' bar 'gro 
[\[15b.4\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul snang bar byed do/_/don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/_kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 
[\[15b.5\]]'khor chen po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang sngags dang /_gzungs dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rig sngags kun tu snang ba dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par snang bar byed do/_/de'i mthus snang ba 'di dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam 
[\[15b.6\]]par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul 'di snang ngo /_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mthong ba dang /_ming bzung ba tsam gyis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rdul phra 
[\[15b.7\]]rab dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba dang /_mtshan gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rim par phye ba dang /_snying po'i mthu rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas 
[\[16a.2\]]pa de rnams kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang /_gsang sngags 
[\[16a.3\]]chen po rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni/_rdzu 'phrul che ba'i phyir te/_'di lta ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[16a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du/_snying po dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gsang ba la rab tu zhugs shing dbang bsgyur ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying por gyur pa gcig pu'o/_/'di lta ste/_'o ma dang chu yang dag par 'byung ba bzhin 
[\[16a.5\]]no/_/snying po gcig po 'di/_rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/_/des na lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/_kun nas rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje rgyu des na/_rigs 
[\[16a.6\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/_ming lan cig gzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi drung du/_gsang ba thams 
[\[16a.7\]]cad kyi snying po dang /_gzungs dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo rab tu ston pa dang /_mtshan gzung bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' legs so zhes bya ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub 
[\[16b.2\]]rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rig sngags kyi snying po dang /_ting 
[\[16b.3\]]nge 'dzin dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyan dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su song bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rjes su sbyor zhing dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje 
[\[16b.4\]]de bzhin du/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje/_de bas na/_de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu 
[\[16b.5\]]chen po'o/_/lag na rdo rje/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/_me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_dri dang byug pa dang /_rol mo gcig gis mchod pa dang /_lan cig tsam gyis kyang /_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi snying po gsang ba 
[\[16b.6\]]dang /_mchod pa rnams byas pa dang /_mnyes par byas pa dang /_klog par byas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_gzungs dang /_rim 
[\[16b.7\]]par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bgegs dang /_log par 'dren pa dang /_bdud kyi rigs kyi lha de rnams thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]rnams su 'bros par byed do/_/yams thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa rnams thams cad dang /_gtam ngan gyi 'jigs 
[\[17a.2\]]pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/gdug pa thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed do/_/mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa/_sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par 
[\[17a.3\]]grol bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /_
[\[17a.4\]]srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed do/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pas kun nas phyogs bzhir srung bar byed do/_/thams cad du cho ga zhib mo dang /_gsang 
[\[17a.5\]]sngags dang phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba don yod 
[\[17a.6\]]pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po thams cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi drung du mchod pa chen po 
[\[17a.7\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/bkra shis dang yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gshed byed dang /_byad stems dang /_gsang sngags dang /_ro langs dang /_sems bsgyur ba dang /_sbod gtong gi sbyor ba dang /_mkha' 'gro ma rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]do/_/dug dang /_sbyar dug dang /_phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed do/_/rims rnams thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_mtshan gcig pa dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_grang ba'i rims 
[\[17b.2\]]dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_mgo gzer dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mig nad dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_ma ro tsa ka dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_pho ba'i nad dang /_bshang ba 
[\[17b.3\]]'khyil ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_mchin pa na ba dang /_tshad pa dang /_gcin nad dang /_gsud pa dang /_lto ba na ba dang /_lag pa na ba dang /_rkang pa na ba dang /_yan lag na ba dang /_nying lag na ba de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do/_/
[\[17b.4\]]sha bkra dang /_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_lhog pa dang /_rkang shu dang /_me dbal dang /_shu ba dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_rma dang /_mgrin pa 'gags pa de dag thams cad byabs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do/_/phyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di de ltar go 
[\[17b.5\]]skabs yangs la rgya che ba yin no/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab/_rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po/_
[\[17b.6\]]dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'i dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis pa gsang ba byin gyis rlob pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa thos nas tshim pa dang /_mgu 
[\[17b.7\]]ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni shin tu dkon no/_/bcom ldan 'das rig 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]sngags kyi rgyal po/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 
[\[18a.2\]]mnyam par blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i bar nas nges par byung ba ni/_rig pa 'dzin 
[\[18a.3\]]pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa ched du 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur ba las gzhan ma yin no/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 
[\[18a.4\]]gzhal du med pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_grangs med pa nye bar bsags par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das nyin mtshan du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran par bgyi skad cig kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ci ste slar yang snga dro'am/_nyin mo'am/_mtshan 
[\[18a.5\]]mo'am/_zla ba'am/_lo re yang rung ste/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjed na/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad brjed par 'gyur/_yongs su dor bar 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su dor bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18a.6\]]pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no/_/ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lag tu son par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu skyed pa ma yin no/_/lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu 
[\[18a.7\]]rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_dam tshig dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des ni/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi thos shing mi mthong la/_ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/_gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba des ni/_lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[18b.2\]]stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de'i lag tu son par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du/_rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang 
[\[18b.3\]]sngags rim par phye ba dang /_snying po dang /_gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad lag tu son par 'gyur ro/_/gnas thams cad du song zhing rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad rjes su song zhing /_dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags thams cad dang /_gsang sngags rim 
[\[18b.4\]]par phye ba dang /_phyag rgya yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog dang /_gtso bo dang thu bor 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi drung na/_sras kyi gtso bor dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston par 
[\[18b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/_gang gi lag tu son cing thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni/_de'i yon tan dang /_phan yon gzhal du med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[18b.6\]]rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/_gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/_sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras nas/_rang 
[\[18b.7\]]gi gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i dbus su rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags par bltas nas/_don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po rig sngags kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to/_/oM a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni bar da pad+me dz+wa la 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]dz+wa la na b+hu dze hU~M/_'di ni don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying po'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i de ma thag pa de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/_
[\[19a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi 'dzums par blta zhing 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od rig sngags kyi rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po de la yang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal pos spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags 
[\[19a.3\]]kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang /_nags dang 'brog dgon par bcas pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/_/phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar gyur to/_/des na dus gsum 
[\[19a.4\]]du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' 
[\[19a.5\]]ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par dbang bskur ba 'di legs so legs so/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ro/_/nged thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig tu mthun pas don 
[\[19a.6\]]yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ro/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/_de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal pos spyi bo'i gtsug nas mngon par dbang bskur ro/_/
[\[19a.7\]]'di ni mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o/_/oM a mo g+ha bai ro tsa na ma hA mu drA ma Ni pad+me dz+wa la pra bar+d+ha ya hU~M/_phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs nas 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas su bskor ba gsum byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste sems par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rig 
[\[19b.2\]]sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems par gzigs nas/_ji ltar da ltar yid la byed pa yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do/_/oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la pad+ma a b+hi She kaM ma Ni badzre sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke hU~M/_rig pa'i rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon 
[\[19b.3\]]par dbang bskur ma thag tu/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_pad+ma'i rigs dang /_rdo rje'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs rnam par thar 
[\[19b.4\]]pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cher 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo /_/rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad mthong ngo /_/rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo /_/don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul 
[\[19b.5\]]pa chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba dag mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong nas don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu rdo rje byin gyis rlobs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[19b.6\]]mngon par dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba dang ldan pa'o/_/oM a mo g+ha pU dza ma Ni pad+ma badzre ta thA ga ta bi lo ki te sa man+ta pra sa ra hU~M/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod pa rgya chen po rnam pa 
[\[19b.7\]]sna tshogs pa du ma rab tu byung ste/_ji ltar rang rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ngo /_/lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba yangs pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyis brlabs 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]kyi bkod pa rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag par mthong ngo /_/de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das las ring por 'phags pa spyan 
[\[20a.2\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug las mngon du phyogs nas stan la 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_phyag na rdo rje 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul ba/_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad 
[\[20a.3\]]par/_phyag rgya chen po dang /_gsang sngags dang /_gzungs dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i mthu stobs pad+ma yangs pa chen po'i gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po grub pa dam tshig dang rjes su mthun pa mthu stobs dang yon tan 'byung ba la phan 
[\[20a.4\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad kyi mchog rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes su sbyin te rig pa'i rgyal po 'di/_phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tsha sangs 
[\[20a.5\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_'khras dang /_yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/dgra thams 
[\[20a.6\]]cad rab tu 'dul bar byed do/_/bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do/_/char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/char med na char 'bebs so/_/rlung dang /_sad dang /_ser ba ldog par byed do/_/mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/nad thams 
[\[20a.7\]]cad ldog par byed do/_/gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed do/_/bsod nams sbyin pa dang /_dbang phyug sbyin pa dang /_nor sbyin pa dang /_'bru 'phel bar byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang /_cho ga bklags pas 'grub pa'i dngos grub gsungs so/_/de nas snying po 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/_rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par 
[\[20b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/stong phrag brgya bzlas pas pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gzhal med khang gi rgyan mtha' dag dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang dang dkyil 
[\[20b.3\]]'khor dang gzhal med khang mtha' dag mthong ngo /_/de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/dam tshig shes par yang 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang rjes su mthun par yang 'gyur ro/_/dang po rmi lam 
[\[20b.4\]]mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro'o/_/gnyis par rmi lam mthong ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang /_rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor brtags pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[20b.5\]]gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa yang mthong ngo /_/der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de/_dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do/_/phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_gsang sngags dang /_mngon par dbang bskur ba yang so sor thob bo/_/rig sngags dang bcas pa'i dngos grub rab 
[\[20b.6\]]tu thob bo/_/gsum par rmi lam mthong ba na/_rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang bcas pa rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang /_gzhal med khang rgya chen po 
[\[20b.7\]]dang bcas pa mthong ngo /_/de la yang rdo rje 'chang rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/dam tshig gi phyag rgya sbyin par byed do/_/mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/_/rig sngags thams cad dang /_don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i dngos grub chen po dang /_mngon par 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub chen po dang /_dam tshig thams cad so sor thob bo/_/bzhi par rmi lam mthong ba na/_nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba dang cho ga zhib mo dang /_rang gi rgyan dang 
[\[21a.2\]]dkyil 'khor mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad lha'i tshogs dang dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i lha dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po yang mthong ste/_de la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/phyag rgya dang /_dam tshig dang /_cho ga dang bcas pa rjes su thob ste/_
[\[21a.3\]]mngon par dbang bskur ba yang rab tu thob bo/_/dngos grub chen po dang mchog sbyin yang so sor thob cing thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/_/lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang /_don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang /_
[\[21a.4\]]po Ta la ka'i ri'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang /_lha dang bcas pa dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor kyi lha rnams mthong ste/_de la yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid sems 
[\[21a.5\]]can de la rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang gzungs kyi dngos grub so sor thob po/_/rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur te/_mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/_/cho ga zhib mo thams cad 
[\[21a.6\]]dang /_dngos grub kyang rjes su stsol bar byed do/_/mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin pa so sor thob bo/_/drug par rmi lam mthong ba na/_dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong ba mthong ngo /_/gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[21a.7\]]dpa'i tshogs dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mthong ste de la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang dam tshig dang mngon par dbang bskur ba so sor thob ste/_rig sngags 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa so sor thob bo/_/bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo /_/de la yang de bzhin 
[\[21b.2\]]gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/_rang nyid kyi phyag gis bzung nas/_rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/rang nyid mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis dam tshig dang /_
[\[21b.3\]]phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes su stsol bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston par byed do/_/nad sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gcig por 'gyur ro/_/skye ba brje ba
