[\[40b.7\]]dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sprin mthong ba'o/_/'di ni mgrin pa sngon po dang /_sred med kyi bu'i gzugs mthong ba'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten gsum mthong ba'o/_/rta mgrin mthong ba'o/_/'di ni pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/'di ni rdo rje'i snying pa chen po mthong ba'o/_/'di ni mgo'i snying po chen po'o/_/'di ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin mthong ba'o/_/'di ni don yod pa'i gzugs dang don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/'di ni des 
[\[41a.2\]]thams cad du 'gugs pas na zhags par brjod par bya'o/_/don yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs su brjod par bya ste/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gzhan du gyur pa mthong ba mtshungs 
[\[41a.3\]]pa ste/_don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di dag mthong ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/bklags pa dang brjod pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[41a.4\]]yongs su dag pa'i sku shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa dang mnyam par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i skur yang 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog par lung ston cing /_bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston 
[\[41a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyis yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/bdud la sogs pa dang /_gdug pa'i rmi lam dang /_log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar bcad par byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41a.6\]]bcing ba lngas bcings shing gzir ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_grul bum dang /_brjed byed dang /_tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/rims thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_'bras dang /_phol 
[\[41a.7\]]mig dang /_rtsog shu dang /_lhog pa dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdze dang /_rkang shu thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/lus kyi gzer thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/ji ltar shel yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag par 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags dang /_cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag gis cher mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[41b.2\]]can thams cad kyi mchod par 'os pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/nor dang 'bru 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa dang yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun dang /_g.yo can dang /_rkun pos rnam par skrag pa dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /_g.yang sa dang /_khyim 
[\[41b.3\]]rdib pa dang /_gsod pa dang /_'chi ba dang /_gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/me dang chus dus byed pa dang /_rlung dang /_tshang pa dang /_sad dang /_ser ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/dgra thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/thams cad 
[\[41b.4\]]byams pa'i yid du 'gyur ro/_/bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur par byed do/_/'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yon tan chen po bskyed pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur ro/_/de 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba 
[\[41b.5\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu tshur shog_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song dang /_khyod kyis lam yongs su dag par byas pa'o/_/'chi ba'i dus su gyur pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 
[\[41b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong ba tsam gyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[41b.7\]]dkyil 'khor dang pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo mngon du 'gyur zhing kha ton du kun tu gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rjes su dran par byed do/_/thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu de bzhin 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon sum du mtshungs par lhan cig lung ston pa so sor thob ste/_nam du yang phyir zhing rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu bstan pa'i bar dang /_ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus su gyur gyi bar du 'jig 
[\[42a.2\]]rten las 'das pa'i phan yon dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa bklags pas grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzlas pa tsam gyis dngos grub bshad par bya ste/_snga dro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa dang /_mnar med pa'i mthar gtugs pa'i sdig pa dang /_ri rab lhun po 
[\[42a.3\]]chen po bdun gyi tshad tsam ba spu'i khung bu re rer sgrib pa bsags pa dang /_bskal pa stong phrag tu bsags pa'i sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa de rnams thams cad snga dro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa rnam par nyams par byed de/_zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[42a.4\]]dmyal ba'i 'gro ba chen po bcu drug tu gzhol ba de rnams thams cad skad cig gcig gis yongs su grol lo/_/smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis bzlas pas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu bzang po chen po nyid thob bo/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[42a.5\]]rigs dang /_pad+mo yangs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_don yod zhags pa'i snying po thams cad du dngos su rjes su 'jug par byed do/_/thams cad du dam tshig chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dngos 
[\[42a.6\]]su mthong ba sbyin par byed do/_/dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi gzugs kyis dngos su mthong bar nye bar gnas par byed do/_/dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad dngos su rjes su 'brang zhing gnas te/_rtag tu rnam par lta bar 'gyur zhing cher bcings par 'gyur ro/_/rig 
[\[42a.7\]]pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing dngos su mthong bar gnas par byed do/_/brgya stong phrag bzlas pa tsam gyis lce rdo rje ltar brtan par 'gyur zhing /_rdo rje'i snying po dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa dang /_pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/_phyir zhing de'i lus la reg pa 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyir zhing lus 'pho bar yang mi nus shing /_yongs su dag cing dri ma med pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad dang /_
[\[42b.2\]]'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log par 'dren pa rnams dang /_klu ma rungs pa mi bzad pa dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis lus dang phung po la bza' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs 
[\[42b.3\]]par 'gyur te/_lha rnams lhan cig tu rjes su rgyu bar byed do/_/kha nas lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la sngon po'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus la lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa dang lag pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro/_/mig gis legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[42b.4\]]bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/snyan pa thos par yang 'gyur zhing lha rdzas kyi dri tshor bar yang 'gyur ro/_/bzang po la reg pa'i lus su yang 'gyur ro/_/skra bung ba dang mtshungs pa la zhing 'khyil ba'i skra ru 'gyur ro/_/nam yang phyir zhing lus kyi nang gi rlung 
[\[42b.5\]]gi las dang /_dri ngan pas bsgos par mi 'gyur ro/_/dri ma thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_mnyen pa'i ngag tu yang 'gyur ro/_/lha'i nga ro dang /_nga ro bzang ba dang /_nga ro zab snyan cing mnyen pa dang /_mi'am ci'i sgra lta bu dang /_ka la ping ka'i 
[\[42b.6\]]sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro/_/mdzes par 'gro ba dang /_zab par 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/_/lag mthil gtan du 'jam pa dang /_sor mo ring ba dang /_lag pa'i ri mo shin tu rnam par bkra bar yang 'gyur ro/_/seng ge'i 'gros dang rtsal gyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du thogs 
[\[42b.7\]]pa med pa'i 'gros su 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/_/dpal rnam thos sras rjes su mthun par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshig mi mthun pa yang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du ngag rnam par dag par yang 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub bo/_/'jig rten las 'das pa ni skye ba brjes nas/_pags pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang /_bsams pa nyid kyi mod la skye bar 'gyur te/_'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar mdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po las brdzus te skye bar 
[\[43a.2\]]'gyur zhing /_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang /_mngon par dbang bskur ba'i mchog byang chub tu lung ston pa dang mngon par dbang 
[\[43a.3\]]bskur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pas kyang byin gyis brlabs so zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub bo/_/de nas bsod nams kyi phung po brjod par bya ste/_'di bzlas pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i 
[\[43a.4\]]rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/_nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang bar byas 
[\[43a.5\]]pa dang /_gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog gis yongs su bkang nas/_dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba la/_nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang /_
[\[43a.6\]]gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog gis bkang nas phul ba de bas kyang /_dge ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar bskyed do/_/gang zhig dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing /_nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa de kho na bzhin du 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis 
[\[43a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams gang gis nor bu rin po che chen po byin pas de rnams kyi dge ba bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/de bzhin du bsod nams kyi phung po dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/'jig rten 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]pa'i cho ga sna tshogs pa'i tshogs dang /_'jig rten las 'das la bsod nams kyi phung po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun gyis bkang ba/_rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi me tog gis bkang ba 
[\[43b.2\]]rnams kyis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing la yang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bkang nas phul bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur te/_ji srid byang chub snying po la mthar thug gi bar du mi zad de 
[\[43b.3\]]de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_bsod nams kyi phung po chen por yang 'gyur te/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[43b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phan yon chen po dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba chen po gang yin pa dang /_bzlas pa'i cho ga chen po dang /_mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yon tan bskyed pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 
[\[43b.5\]]ga'i khyad par so sor thob bo/_/dus rtag par rgyun du bzlas pa'i cho ga dang ldan par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/rtag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yang dag par 'grogs par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje gang yang rig pa'i rgyal po'i 
[\[43b.6\]]cho ga zhib mo 'di don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po 'di tha na sgra tsam yang rna ba'i bu gar ltung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bris pa rnams blta ba dang /_po ti'am/_yi ge'am/_rtsig pa'am gyang la bris pa lta bar byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs 
[\[43b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sngon bsags pa'i mnar med par gzhol ba'i sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/_/yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/_pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nam yang phyis mngal 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]du gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur zhing tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[44a.2\]]ci ltar cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bri bar bya/_bcom ldan 'das 'dri bzhin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed pa ci lags/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ci dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje 'di'i 
[\[44a.3\]]yon tan dang phan yon dpag tu med de/_don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye ste/_phan yon dpag tu med pa dang yon tan dpag tu med pa las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa so 
[\[44a.4\]]sor thob bo/_/gang yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di 'dri bar 'gyur ba nyon cig_/lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ba chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa 
[\[44a.5\]]de las chu'i thigs pa'i tshad kyi thigs pa re re'i grangs su byed 'dod pa'am/_de lta bu'i tshad kyi ngos gnyis par mtsho chen po las thigs pa re re nas bcu bar bya ste/_de la thigs pa re re nas bgrangs te gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas rgya mtsho chen po chu'i thigs pa'i grangs kyis zad par 'gyur zhing chu 
[\[44a.6\]]skam par byed do/_/mtsho chen po gnyis pa las chus yongs su gang bar 'gyur gyi/_don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dang /_don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo de 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni gzung bar nus pa ma yin no/_/de 
[\[44a.7\]]ltar rgya che ba/_de ltar zab pa/_de ltar yangs pa'i yon tan bskyed par bya ba ni/_don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga'i rgyal po'o/_/lag na rdo rje 'on kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po ni dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du nub bo/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi steng nyid du gnas so/_/skyes bu stobs chen po dang ldan par gyur pa gang la la ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po gang yin pa yang yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du byed pa dang /_ngos gnyis par rgya mtsho chen po'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po cho ga de lta bus 
[\[44b.2\]]yungs kar gyi 'bras bu tsam du byas pa las slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab du gnas par byed par nus kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po gang yin pa 'di 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mi nus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan dang /_de'i gsung gi tshad gzung 
[\[44b.3\]]bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du yon tan dang /_phan yon rgya che zhing bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_
[\[44b.4\]]phyag rgya 'di ci ltar bri bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u 
[\[44b.5\]]rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gang la la cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di 'dri bar byed pa de/_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi las dang /_yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho gas don yod pa'i nor bu'i pad+ma 
[\[44b.6\]]zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dri bar byed do/_/des yongs su dag pa'i ngag 
[\[44b.7\]]dang yid kyis dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_yid der gyur pa dang /_mchod pa'i mchog dang /_gus pa la sogs pa'i 'dri mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o/_/mchog tu gus pa dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pas kha zas mi mthun pa spangs te/_legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i kha 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]zas ro bro ba'i mchog dang /_legs par 'dus byas shing yid dga' ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i btung ba gus pa dang bcas pas/_gnas su gi wang gi dkyil 'khor dang /_me tog gcal du bkram nas dri yis bdugs te/_dar gyis spras pa'i chos kyi stan la 'dug 
[\[45a.2\]]pas bri bar bya'o/_/legs par khrus byas shing mgo la dris byug_/lus la gos bgos la mchod pa bya'o/_/tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la so so'i cha shas dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye nas gtor ma dang /_nye bar spyod pa dbul bar bya'o/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bya 
[\[45a.3\]]ste/_yon dang bcas pas gser gyi rna rgyan sbyin par bya'o/_/bri bar bya ba yongs su ma spangs par don yod par bya'o/_/lag pa brkyang bas bya'o/_/legs par sbyang ba byas pas bya'o/_/'di yi cho gas 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 
[\[45a.4\]]gsang ba'i dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /_gsang ba bris par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rigs dang /_pad+ma'i rigs dang /_rdo rje'i rigs gang ci yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi 
[\[45a.5\]]snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de thams cad 'dri bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_chu gang yin pa thams cad chu gang chen po dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i rjes su zhugs nas ro gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste nyi ma shar ba na mun pas ldongs pa thams cad kun tu snang bar byed do/_/de kho na bzhin du don 
[\[45a.6\]]yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di dang /_don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po 'di dang /_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i nor bu pad+ma'i snying po'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[45a.7\]]po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor pa'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di thams cad du mtshungs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug go/_/dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya dang /_snying po rnams mtshungs par dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rab 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]tu skyes pa'o/_/thams cad du mtshungs par mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/gang yang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdul phra rab dang lhan cig pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tha snyad kyi de kho na nyid yang dag pa'i snying po'o/_/don yod pa nor bu mchod pa'i snying 
[\[45b.2\]]po'i gzungs dang /_don yod pa nor bu pad+ma'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po dang /_gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor pa dang /_klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba 
[\[45b.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa de thams cad gsang ba'i dam tshig gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so/_/rgyu de'i phyir 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i don yod pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i mthu stobs kyi dngos grub ste/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang /_/don yod 
[\[45b.4\]]zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'dri bzhin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang /_mtshungs pa gcig gis mtshungs pa'o/_/don yod 
[\[45b.5\]]pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mor byin gyis brlabs so/_/'dri bar byed pa dang /_'don par byed pa dang /_klog par byed pa dang /_bzlas pa ni mchod pa'i sprin du byin gyis brlabs so/_/de'i phyir 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gis legs par rab tu dang ba dang las 
[\[45b.6\]]la spro zhing brtson pas bya'o/_/shin tu gsal ba dang /_spro ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dad pas bri bar bya'o/_/shin tu 'bad pas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi snying po dang /_gsung dang /_phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dang /_klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bri bar bya/_
[\[45b.7\]]bklag par bya/_mnyan par bya'o/_/mthu stobs kyis mnyan par bya'o/_/mthu stobs kyis bri bar bya/_/mthu stobs kyis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/mthu stobs kyis dam pa'i chos mchod pa dang /_gus pas 'dri bar byed pa po dang /_'dri bzhin pa la bsnyen bkur dang /_
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bla ma la sri zhu byed par bya'o/_/'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o/_/don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'o/_/nor bu rin po che chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gzungs kyi 
[\[46a.2\]]gsang ba byin gyis brlabs pa ni gnyis te/_gcig ni don yod pa'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs so/_/gnyis pa ni don yod pa'i nor bu'i pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_dkyil 'khor 
[\[46a.3\]]chen po'i snying po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pas rnam par 'phrul pas sprul pa'o/_/'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen por 'gyur ba ste/_don yod pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing gi mchod pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po don yod pa'i 
[\[46a.4\]]zhags pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i snying po don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/_'di ni gnyis par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po ste/_don yod pa'i rnam 
[\[46a.5\]]par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dbang po du ma rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag gis yongs su bskor ba dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya stong phrag
[\[46a.6\]]du ma dang /_dbang po dang /_lha'i dbang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag rnams dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[46a.7\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs stong phrag rnams kyis de lta bu'i gsung gi sgra dbyangs thos nas/_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu mgu ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/de bzhin du gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]nyan pa la de rnams thams cad lhan cig tu mthun par rgyal po chen po bzhi sngon du 'gro bas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo dang /_pheg rdob pa sna tshogs pas mchod pa byed par 
[\[46b.2\]]gyur to/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa byed par gyur cig_/rig pa'i rgyal po de la yang mchod par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mas bskor ba byas nas legs so zhes rjod par byed de/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs 
[\[46b.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gang yin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu bzhag go zhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[46b.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying por gyur pa thun mong bar mtshungs pa'o/_/thams cad du gsang ba phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_de bzhin 
[\[46b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' bar gsungs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag de dag thams cad mthun par gyur pas lhan cig pa kho nar rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing /_rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[46b.6\]]'di yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/'di lta ste/_'dzin pa dang /_'don pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_bri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_bzlas pa'i las su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'chang de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa 
[\[46b.7\]]dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/dngos grub kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]gang yin pa de yang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_de la bdag cag thams cad mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_mdangs dang /_dga' ba 
[\[47a.2\]]bsgrub par bgyi/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/_nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/_'jigs pa dang /_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/_yams dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go 
[\[47a.3\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_mu ge dang /_mi ngas dang /_'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad so sor phyir bzlog par bgyi/_bde ba la yang dag par reg pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba bsgrub par bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/_don med pa yang so 
[\[47a.4\]]sor bzlog par bgyi/_don la yang yang dag par sbyar bar bgyi/_don thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/_rtag tu mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shin tu rgyas pa'i cho ga cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad du dgongs pa'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje sngon du 
[\[47a.5\]]'gro bas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rigs pa'i rgyal po'i lha de rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so drang srong chen po de lta bu byed pa de rnams 
[\[47a.6\]]yongs su bskyang bar bya/_bsrung bar bya/_dngos grub kyang sbyin par bya'o/_/ngas cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i ched dang /_sems can de rnams thams cad yongs su srung ba'i ched 
[\[47a.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad srung ba'i ched dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i ched du grogs po rnams la rjes su gtad do/_/'di yang bsrung bar bya'o zhes so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/phyag rgya dang dkyil 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]'khor gyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga smros shig_/don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi gsang ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub 'di thams cad du thun mong ba'i snying po grub pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags 
[\[47b.2\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa nor bu mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang /_ras ris rnams gsungs pa/_de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o/_/don 
[\[47b.3\]]yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po bla na med pa ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/_kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba sa dang ba byung gis legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa la/_tshon sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i srad bus char gzhal cing bcad la dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 
[\[47b.4\]]'khor gyi snying por bdag gi khru'i tshad kyis kun nas khru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba bya'o/_/thams cad du gsang ba thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying bor yang pad+ma bya ste/_pad+ma stong phrag gis shin tu mdzes pa lnga lnga'o/_/pad+ma dkar po bla na med pa la ze 'bru dang /_
[\[47b.5\]]ge sar gyi tshad la bab pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ge sar dang /_ze 'bru bkra ba'i dra ba'i snying po lus dang lag tu 'chang zhing lag pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa dang g.yas pas bya'o/_/dar dpyangs dang 'khyil pas spa ba/_zur zur du dpag bsam gyi shing shin tu tshad la bab pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[47b.6\]]byed du gzhug go/_/snying po'i 'khor gyi re khA yang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu tshad dang ldan par bya'o/_/me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bya zhing de nas me tog gi bar du re khA bya'o/_/rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_gos sna tshogs pas mdzes pa'o/_/sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyi phyi 
[\[47b.7\]]rol tu pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng ba'i ri mo'o/_/ut+pa la sngon po'i phyi rol tu nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pas rnam par bkra ba'i ri mo 'bar ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o/_/me tog sna ma dang /_tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag la sngags kyi nor bu'i ri mo yang bya'o/_/de'i phyi rol gyi khor yug tu snam 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]bu'i rnam pa bya'o/_/ri bo la sna tshogs pa'i ljon shing dang lcug ma bkram pa dang me tog sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/_/khor yug tu chu 'bab pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di bri zhing phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu'ang bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor bla na med pa phyag rgya sna tshogs 
[\[48a.2\]]dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_bum pa dang mchod pa'i rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang /_gang ba'i bum pa sna tshogs pa bri'o/_/mtshan ma dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rin po che sna tshogs pa'i yal ga dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pal 'chang ba gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa thogs pa bya'o/_/phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor 
[\[48a.3\]]yug tu me tog sna tshogs pa ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_a ti muk+ta ka dang /_wAr+Shi ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_ut+pa la sngon po dang /_sna ma dang /_skya snar dang /_yU thi ka dang /_ka dam pa'i me tog gi phreng bas mdzes par bya'o/_/sgo bzhi'i gnas su rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par 
[\[48a.4\]]bya ste/_rin po che'i lcug ma sna tshogs pa dang /_bum pa gang ba thogs par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi snying por ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o/_/gang ba'i bum pa yongs su bsags pa dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang /_sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang bza' ba'i kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog gzhag par 
[\[48a.5\]]bya/_sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs la/_bdug pa'i bog phor yongs su bsham par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya legs par khrus byas shing dri bzang po'i dris bsgos te/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs la/_'byung lngas nye reg bya ste don yod pa nor bu'i mchod 
[\[48a.6\]]pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa yid la bya/_mchod pa'i sprin chen po yid la bya zhing bzla ste phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[48a.7\]]'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis ji ltar dkyil 'khor du yongs su bsags shing rnam pa sna tshogs su gzhal du med pas ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang dkyil 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]'khor chen po gzhal du med pa brgya stong phrag yongs su bsags pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do/_/sna tshogs pa'i gos dang /_sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi bdug spos sna tshogs pa dang /_
[\[48b.2\]]lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu dang /_me tog sna tshogs pa dang /_ro brgya pa'i kha zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa brgya stong phrag rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do/_/yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i 
[\[48b.3\]]lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin byed do/_/de lta bu'i cho ga rnams phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs rnams mchod par 'gyur te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang 
[\[48b.4\]]bcas pa thams cad du lhun grub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do/_/gang yang dkyil 'khor chen po der rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_bud 
[\[48b.5\]]med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_lhan cig 'gro ba'am/_tha na thos pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 
[\[48b.6\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa chen po yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can re re'i yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa de'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi 
[\[48b.7\]]phung po bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/_rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyi mod la 'phral nyid du mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar yang 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/'chi 'pho zhing 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]skye ba brjes pa'i dus su son te 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du ston zhing snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lam nye bar ston par byed cing dbugs 'byin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su skal ba mnyam 
[\[49a.2\]]pa nyid kyi skye bar byed de/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa tsam gyi mod la/_skye ba thams cad rjes su dran par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang /_cho ga zhib 
[\[49a.3\]]mo dang /_don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par byed do/_/ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bcings te gnas bar byed do zhes so/_/'di ni skye ba'i tha mar 'gyur te/_mchod 
[\[49a.4\]]pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_mir gyur pa rnams kyi lta ci smos so/_/de ltar yon tan dang phan yon chen po'i mchod pa chen po dang /_dkyil 
[\[49a.5\]]'khor gyi cho ga'o/_/don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang phan yon gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so//_//de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/_sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa sdig pa thams cad sel ba 'phral du nad thams cad zlog par byed 
[\[49a.6\]]pa dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas mchog thams cad sbyin pa bshad par bya'o/_/ras sam gos gzhan nam/_rgya dar la kun nas khru bzhi pa la gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gnas su ri mo mkhan gtsang ma nyid kyis khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_dri sna tshogs pas bdugs la mtshon sna tshogs pa rnam par 
[\[49a.7\]]bkra zhing lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag pas ras ris bla na med pa bri bar bya'o/_/dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bya ste/_gzhal yas khang gi khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri la pad+ma'i rdzing bur klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya ste/_don yod zhags pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa ral ba'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/_phyag bzhi pa/_spyan gsum pa/_mdung rtse gsum 'dzin pa pad+ma 'dzin pa 
[\[49b.2\]]dang /_zhags pa 'dzin pa dang /_nor bu rin po che 'dzin pa/_bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed bzhin pa'o/_/g.yas su rig pa'i rgyal po bya ste/_phyag bzhi pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i cha byad 'chang ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa/_
[\[49b.3\]]pad+ma dang zhags pa dang /_ral gri 'chang zhing nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal mtshan thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu lha mo sgrol ma bya ste/_thal mo sbyar ba smad pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o/_/
[\[49b.4\]]lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu gos dkar mo bya ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa rab tu bzhad cing smin ma dpral bar g.yo zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la zur mig gis lta bar byed pa bya'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags pa dpal mdzes pa bya ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_bcom 
[\[49b.5\]]ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phur ma 'chang bar byed pa'o/_/thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan bya ste/_skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/_/gos dkar mo'i rgyab tu khro bo chen po lcags kyu bya'o/_/dkar po'i gzhogs su don yod pa'i lcags kyu bya'o/_/rig pa'i 
[\[49b.6\]]rgyal po'i 'og tu ral pa gcig ma bya ste/_phyag brgyad pa/_zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/_ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa ste/_ral gri dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa dang /_ral gri dang /_mdung rtse gsum dang /_
[\[49b.7\]]rdo rje dang /_pad+ma 'chang ba bya zhing sdigs mdzub byed pa bya'o/_/steng du phyogs pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun bya ste/_'od dpag med kyang dbus su bya'o/_/lhas mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/_/phyag 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]g.yon dang g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zas gsar pa 'dren par byed bzhin pa'o/_/gzhogs g.yas dang g.yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang ba bya'o/_/'og gi gzhogs g.yas su rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/_/gzhogs g.yon 
[\[50a.2\]]du/_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan po dang /_gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi mtshon cha 'dzin pa bya ste/_thams cad glu len bzhin pa bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'og phyogs kyi rdzing bu'i g.yas logs su rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/_bdug pa'i pog phor dang /_
[\[50a.3\]]me tog 'dzin cing bgrang phreng thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o/_/ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri bo bri bar bya ste/_sna tshogs me tog gi mgo lcogs bkram zhing /_rin po che'i shing ljon sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/_chu bo 'bab cing rjes su spyod pa/_ri 
[\[50a.4\]]dgas dang /_byas yang dag par brgyan pa bya'o/_/sna tshogs pa'i ri'i lha dang /_shang shang te 'us kun tu khyab pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i klu'i gdengs ka dang mtshungs pa gnas su gnas pa bya'o/_/de nas yongs su sbyang ba byas te zin pa dang /_ras ris la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra 
[\[50a.5\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o/_/legs par khrus bya ste/_skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/_smra ba bcad la/_don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so/_/de'i 
[\[50a.6\]]tshe ras ris 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed de/_phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed do/_/rig sngags 'chang dga' zhing 'dod par 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang /_don yod zhags pa'i lcags kyu 
[\[50a.7\]]dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di'i dngos grub tu shes par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rgyal po 'am/_blon po 'am/_bram ze 'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_khyim bdag gam/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang ras ris chen po 'di mthong nas/_mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams 
[\[50b.2\]]med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnam par sbyangs shing thun tshags su 'gyur ro/_/mnar med pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams 'phral du yongs su grol lo/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad dang yid kyi shing 
[\[50b.3\]]rta dang /_'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /_rigs thun mong pa la 'jug pa'i thams cad thun mong ba'i dam tshig dang /_de kho na nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang /_thams cad du dngos grub byed pa'i gnas/_rdo rje'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[50b.4\]]mchog byang chub kyi snying po nye bar bgrod par byed pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog par 'jug par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/_gnas thams cad du son pa'i dngos grub/_cho ga zhib mo'i 
[\[50b.5\]]dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/_phyag rgya thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas yongs su brtags te/_sa'i cha mdzes par/_gtsug lag 
[\[50b.6\]]khang ngam/_dgon pa'am/_gnas gnyis sam/_ri phug gam/_tshang tshing ngam/_rgyal po'i gnas sam/_lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/_gzhan yang brang sa'am/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/_skyed mos tshal lam/_nags 'dab nyid dang /_kun dga' ra ba'am/_chu 
[\[50b.7\]]klung ngam/_lteng ka'am/_'bab chu'i dngo'am/_mtsho bran nam/_mtshe'u dag dang /_rdzing bu rnam par bkra ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshon nam/_ne'u gsing sngon po'am/_me tog skyes pa'i gnas sam/_thams cad du rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o/_/gnas 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]gtsang mar ma nyams pa'i mod la/_dkyil 'khor der dgod par bya ste/_sa dang /_ba byung dang /_yang dag par ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya'o/_/khor yug tu khru bzhi pa/_legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/_bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu bya'o/_/dkyil 
[\[51a.2\]]'khor la tshon sna tshogs pa mdzes pas phye ba'i thig gdab ste/_cha mnyam par phye nas zur bzhi pa logs bzhi pa/_sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig gdab bo/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang /_dkyil 'khor khru'i tshad la re khA lnga byas pa sna tshogs 
[\[51a.3\]]pa'i gzugs mdzes pas thig gdab bo/_/pad+ma'i ri mo dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_rdo rje'i ri mo gsum pa dag go/_/ut+pa la bzhi pa'am/_nor bu rin po che chen po ni lnga par bshad do/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor yug tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba byed du gzhug go/_/dbus 
[\[51a.4\]]kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so/_/pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/_ge sar dang /_ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya ste/_de la rig pa'i lha mo gzugs ji ltar mdzes pa dgod par bya'o/_/ji ltar ras ris 'di la/_gzugs pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de lta bu 
[\[51a.5\]]bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdzes pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_khro gnyer can ma/_drag po sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/_mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_gos sna tshogs pa 'chang ba skyes 
[\[51a.6\]]pa lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs dang /_bu mo lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa bsres pa rtag tu bris nas/_pad+ma'i gdan gyis brgyan cing /_thams cad pad+ma 'chang ba byed du gzhug go/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi ru rgyal po chen po bzhi byed du gzhug ste/_go cha dang ya 
[\[51a.7\]]lad bgos pa/_drag po'i gzugs 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/phyi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bya ste/_khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan 'chang ba'o/_/sgo bzhi'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi lha bya'o/_/gang gA dang /_shI tra dang /_'jigs 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]ma dang /_dpe med ma dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_ki lI ki la dang /_gtsigs zhal ma ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'di rnams bri bar bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu ri bo'i phreng ba dag la me tog dang /_ljon shing sna tshogs pa'i lcug mas khyab cing /_tshon sna 
[\[51b.2\]]tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par mthar phyin pa dang /_de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la kho ra khor yug tu tshon sna lngas mdzes pa'i ba dan brgya dang /_sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa dang /_rnam par bkra ba'i bum pa gang 
[\[51b.3\]]ba dang /_gtor ma dang /_dril bu mdzes pa dang /_gang ba'i bum pa dang /_bum bu dang /_dri sna tshogs kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang /_ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag nas/_kham phor dang /_ril ba gang ba dang /_dri sna tshogs kyis byug pa dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs pas 
[\[51b.4\]]mdzes pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba gcal du bkram pa dang /_'bras yos dang /_yungs kar nyid dang /_sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams dang /_bza' ba'i rnam pa gzugs sna tshogs pa bzhag nas/_'bras bu sna tshogs mdzes pa rnams bzhag ste/_khor yug tu mar me'i phreng 
[\[51b.5\]]ba dang /_gser dang /_dngul las byung ba'i snod dris gang ba rnams bzhag go/_/thams cad ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gzhal du med pa las dman pa nyid du mi bya'i lhag pa nyid byed du gzhug go/_/dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang /_
[\[51b.6\]]stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis bya'o/_/rig sngags 'chang gis gtsang bar gyur nas/_legs par khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/_srung ba'i cho gas phyogs bcing ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_mtshams bcing ba dang /_srung ba chen po yang byed du gzhug 
[\[51b.7\]]go/_/de nas gsang sngags kyi las dang /_phyag rgya'i las bla na med par bya'o/_/de nas sems can gzhug par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gang 'dod par bcug nas thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya sbyin du gzhug go/_/phyag bya ba dang /_bskor ba la thams cad bcug 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]nas/_snyan gsan dbab pa dang spyan drang bar bya/_las kyi cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya/_me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya/_bzlas pa'i las rnams dang /_las thams cad mdor bsdus pa byas nas/_gshegs su gsol ba 'dir bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[52a.2\]]na gnas pa'i lha rnams la gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga dang /_de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa phul ba nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa rnams gshegs su gsol lo/_/gang gi tshe/_gsang sngags rnams dang /_cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs rab tu 'jug pa na sa'i mthil du 
[\[52a.3\]]ras ris 'bar ba'i mod la 'od zer 'byin par byed de/_dkyil 'khor mthong zhing gsang sngags 'chang yang bar snang la gnas so/_/de'i skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la/_cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang /_dngos grub 
[\[52a.4\]]thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do/_/ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin no/_/
[\[52a.5\]]'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob ste 'di la the tsom med do/_/sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[52a.6\]]snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do/_/sems can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang /_mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang /_mnar med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing bde blag tu sangs 
[\[52a.7\]]rgyas nyid du 'gro'o//_//de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo chen po dang /_khro bo lcags kyu dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]thams cad byed pa/_'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad 'bros par byed pa/_bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa/_'dod pa'i rig rnams sreg par byed pa/_gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa/_sa'i mthil 
[\[52b.2\]]g.yo bar byed pa/_lha'i me tog dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang /_lha'i gos dang lhab lhub kyi char 'bebs par byed pa/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par skul bar byed pa/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan 
[\[52b.3\]]gsan 'bebs par byed pa/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa/_rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/_bde ba thams 
[\[52b.4\]]cad dang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa/_bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pa/_chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/_phyag rgya dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/_cho ga zhib mo dang /_
[\[52b.5\]]gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa/_'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/_phyag rgya dang /_mchog thams cad sbyin par byed pa/_gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba/_gzungs rnams kyi khyad par grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 
[\[52b.6\]]'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/_gang gis rnam par snang mdzad dang /_thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa/_sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par 
[\[52b.7\]]byed pa/_rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa/_bdud dang ma rungs pa rnams las sgrol ba po/_rtag tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog_/rga ba dang /_skye ba dang /_'chi ba las grol bar byed pa/_srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa/_tshul khrims dang /_gtong ba dang /_brtson 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing srung bar byed pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_sbyin pa'i rin po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa/_rin po che'i phung po rtag 
[\[53a.2\]]tu sbyin pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha thams cad la mchod pa byed pa/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba 
[\[53a.3\]]thams cad ston par byed pa/_gzugs sna tshogs dang /_rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa/_rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par 
[\[53a.4\]]byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba/_ma rungs pa thams cad dang /_gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam par 'jig par byed pa/_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par byed pa/_sgrub 
[\[53a.5\]]par byed pa'o/_/'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang /_'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/dug dang /_byad stems dang /_phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tsom med pa zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o/_/lag pa 
[\[53a.6\]]gnyis bzlog nas/_lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i sor mo dang /_sdigs mdzub gnyis bskums la sor mo gsum brkyang la snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/_'di ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste/_
[\[53a.7\]]phyag rgya brgya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang /_pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang /_nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]rgya gang yin pas te/_phyag rgya so so so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams su 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do/_/phyag rgya 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i 
[\[53b.2\]]snying po'o/_/shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod pa'o/_/dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang /_rigs thun mong ba'i gsang ba dang /_dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o/_/phyag rgya 'di'i da ltar pa'i 'dod 
[\[53b.3\]]pa thams cad dang /_yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/_gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bskums la/_sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya/_ming med 
[\[53b.4\]]dang /_mthe chung dag gcig tu brkyang la/_sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas/_snying ga'i gnas su bzhag ste/_khro bo'i lta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas hUM yig gis btsir bar bya'o/_/'di ni khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi 
[\[53b.5\]]mchog dang gtso bor brjod par bya ste/_rigs bye ba stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su brjod pa dang /_de bzhin du pad+ma'i 
[\[53b.6\]]rigs gang yin pa dang /_rdo rje'i rigs su brjod pa gang yin pa dang /_khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal por brjod par bya ste/_nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams 
[\[53b.7\]]gdug pa rnams 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o/_/thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba/_khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o/_/de bzhin du khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'ching bzhin pa/_ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang /_rgya mtsho yang skems par byed do/_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ri rab lhun po'i ri ni rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do/_/rgya mtsho thams cad kyang skems par byed do/_/ri dang ri bo yang nyams par byed do/_/lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_
[\[54a.2\]]de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_/'byung po dang /_gdon ma rungs pa dang /_/bgegs byed pa'i lha ma rungs pa gang yin pa dang /_bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la/_phyag 
[\[54a.3\]]rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed cing /_skad cig de la 'jig par byed do/_/phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad 
[\[54a.4\]]skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/_/phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad du/_bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do/_/thams cad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gnyis 
[\[54a.5\]]rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la/_gung mo yud tsam bskums te/_ming med dang /_mthe bong gis sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam gzhag ste/_mthe'u chung brkyang nas snying ga'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di ni rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po don yod pa'i phyag rgya rmad du 
[\[54a.6\]]byung ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[54a.7\]]rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa/_de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang /_rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang /_de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]cad du gtso bo ste/_gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching ba de/_gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang /_nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang /_gdug pa thams cad rnam par nyams par 
[\[54b.2\]]byed do/_/bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs par byed de the tsom 
[\[54b.3\]]med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du srung bar byed do/_/phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cing grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrags shing the tsom 
[\[54b.4\]]med do/_/phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang /_bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed do/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyangs la/_dpung pa bskums te/_ming med dang /_mthe bong gi sor mo 'dud la mthe chung bskum par bya'o/_/
[\[54b.5\]]ming med kyi mthar reg la/_gung mo bskums la sdigs mdzub rab tu brkyangs te/_snying ga'i gnas su 'di g.yo ba tsam mo/_/me tog gam/_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gos sam/_rgyan dang /_spud pa rnams kyang lag pa 
[\[54b.6\]]g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha rnams dang /_de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang /_de bzhin du dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[54b.7\]]lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang /_mchog dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de/_ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang /_ro brgya ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do/_/phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'byung ngo /_/gser dang dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar 
[\[55a.2\]]bar byed do/_/phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/_rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang /_gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag bsam 
[\[55a.3\]]gyi shing dang mnyam shing mtshungs par ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i 
[\[55a.4\]]mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do/_/de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bzung bzhin pa ni/_mchod pa bla na med pa dang /_tshegs chung ngus mchod pa chung ngu yang tshad 
[\[55a.5\]]med par rab tu 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do/_/ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste/_de 
[\[55a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du/_phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu'i mchod pa'i cho ga byed do/_/de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni/_'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/phyag 
[\[55a.7\]]rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni/_dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang /_mtshams bcing ba dang /_spyan drang ba dang /_dam tshig la 'jug pa dang /_skor ba byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_de bzhin du dri dang /_mar me dang /_phreng ba 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dang /_byug pa dang /_gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du khrus dang /_nye reg nyid dang /_gos bgo ba dang /_gtsug tor bcing ba dang /_srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang /_bzlas bzhin pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /_skyil 
[\[55b.2\]]mo krung bcing ba dang /_sbyin sreg gi las dang /_gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang /_gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang /_dngos grub sgrub pa nyid dang /_thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de/_gnas thams cad du song ba dang /_gnas grub 
[\[55b.3\]]pa dang /_bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang /_thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang /_yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang /_thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don 
[\[55b.4\]]yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o/_/don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/_don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang /_don yod pa thos pa nyid dang /_don 
[\[55b.5\]]yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang /_don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang /_don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang /_don yod par sangs 
[\[55b.6\]]rgyas rnams mthong ba dang /_don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang /_don yod par tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang /_don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o/_/snying po dang /_phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems 
[\[55b.7\]]can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o/_/rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du/_nyin mtshan du dang /_thun mtshams su yang /_phyag rgya 'di 'ching na/_bkra shis pa'i mchog_/bsod nams dang /_dag pa dang /_sdig pa nyams pa dang /_don 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do/_/'di ni thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu dge ba'o/_/phyag rgya'i gsang sngags rnams su 'gyur te/_oM a mo g+hAM ku sha dz+wA laM hUM/_oM a mo 
[\[56a.2\]]g+ha kro d+ha daM Sh+Te hUM/_oM bid+yA rA dza pad+me dz+wa laM hUM/_oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni pra bar+t+ha ya hUM/_oM a mo g+ha sarba tra sA d+ha ya shi be hUM/_phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i sngags so/_/de nas dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad du sgrub pa'i 
[\[56a.3\]]thabs kyi de kho na nyid kyi gnas thams cad la 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya ste/_oM a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/_dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/_/oM saman+ta shu b+hi pri thi bI sa hA hUM/_sa yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pa ri sho d+ha ni hUM/_dkyil 
[\[56a.4\]]'khor yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pri thi bI sa ra s+tha le hUM/_sa dang ba byung gi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha dza laHshra ba Ne hUM/_chu'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta ba re swA hA/_dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha bi 
[\[56a.5\]]b+hak+ta b+ha ba na ba re hUM/_thig rnam par dbye ba'i sngags so/_/oM nA nA ra t+na ba re dz+wa la hUM/_tshon rtsi'i ri mo'i sngags so/_/oM dz+wa la bi ma le a mo g+ha shud+d+he hUM/_khrus kyi sngags so/_/oM sid+d+hi dza le a mo g+ha bud+d+hi hUM/_nye reg gi sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha bas+t+re 
[\[56a.6\]]ts+tshA+e da hUM/_gos bgo ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha ma Ni hUM/_gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha ra k+Sha Na ba ra da hUM/_bdag srung ba'i sngags so/_/oM satwa rak+Sha Ni a mo g+ha daMSh+Te hUM/_thams cad du gzhan srung zhing bde ba'i ched du srung ba'i 
[\[56a.7\]]sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha pra bi sha b+hu ba ne hUM/_gnas su 'jug pa'i sngags so/_/oM na mo a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/_phyag byed pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha tsakre hUM/_bskor ba'i sngags so/_/oM sa ma ya sid+d+he a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/_dam tshig gi sngags 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]so/_/oM a mo g+ha buSh+pe pra btsa gan+ng+hi ni dza ya swA hA/_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha sa ra saM pU ra Ni ra sa ra sA gra pa ti hUM/_thams cad du gtor ma'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha tu Ti swA hA/_mar 
[\[56b.2\]]me'i sngags so/_/oM a mo g+ha ba ti tsa ra bi tsa ra sany+tsa ra swA hA/_thams cad du gnas pa dang /_gnas thams cad du song ba na rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o/_/thams cad du las thams cad byed pa rig pa'i gsang sngags sbyar bar bya'o/_/gshegs su gsol 
[\[56b.3\]]ba nyid kyang sngags 'dis bya'o/_/las shin tu rgyas pa gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o/_/legs par byas pa'i las dang /_bya ba rnams dang /_bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams ni/_don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang /_khro bo lcags 
[\[56b.4\]]kyu dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen po dang /_dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi las rnams bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'i/_de las phyi rol du gyur pa'i 
[\[56b.5\]]rig pa gzhan ni med do/_/rig pa 'di ni bklags pas grub pa'o/_/de nas de la yangs shing rgya che ba'i brtson pa bya ste/_'byor pa ji lta ba dang /_tshad ji lta ba dang /_ji ltar gsal ba rnams/_'byor pa dang bcas shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_shin tu 
[\[56b.6\]]gsal bar bya ba rnams bya'o/_/gtsang ma gtsang mas khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/_dad pa dang /_gus pa dang /_mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya/_bden par smra bar bya/_bden par phyi rol du 'byung bar bya/_bden par spro ba 
[\[56b.7\]]dang /_brtson pas 'byung bar bya/_lkog tu smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ser sna med par 'gyur bar bya/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang /_bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa 'di sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar bya/_sems 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]can thams cad la brtse ba mchog tu bya/_bri bar bya/_'drir gzhug par bya/_bklag par bya/_kha ton du bya/_mchod par bya/_ri mor bya/_kun chub par bya/_cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs pa dang /_don yod 
[\[57a.2\]]zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig thun mong gi gsang ba dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba thams cad 
[\[57a.3\]]kyi gsang ba/_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so/_/de nas yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[57a.4\]]lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi gang yin pa rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa ga la ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[57a.5\]]pa mngon sum du gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar song ste/_zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di skad ces 
[\[57a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis gzung bar bgyi'o/_/don yod pa'i lcags kyu/_cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yang /_lhag pa'i rgyal po cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i don dang /_mi nub cing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 
[\[57a.7\]]zhib mo'i rgyal po ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so//_//'di ni sngon gyi lots+tsha ba mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/_bar skabs bar skabs su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/_bla ma 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]dus kyi 'khor lo ba chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dpe byung zhing /_chad pa sob pa dang /_mjug bsgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas/_bam po bcu pa'i nang du/_las kyi don kun sgrub par byed ces pa nas/_gsang 
[\[57b.2\]]sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig ces pa'i bar dang /_bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/_bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du zhes pa nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/_zhes pa'i bar dang /_bam po bcu gsum 
[\[57b.3\]]pa'i nang du/_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang zhes pa nas/_mi gang tshad du brko bar bya zhes pa'i bar dang /_bam po bcu bzhi pa'i nang du/_pad+ma dang /_chu dang /_yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te zhes pa nas/_ras dkar pos bkru bar 
[\[57b.4\]]bya zhing /_lan bdun du zhes pa'i bar dang /_bam po bco lnga pa'i mtshams su/_dngul gyi pog phor brgyad dang zhes pa nas/_gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do/_/zhes pa'i bar dang /_bam po bcu 
[\[57b.5\]]drug pa dang /_bcu bdun pa'i mtshams su/_de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste zhes pa nas/_phyag rgya'i cho ga dang /_sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o zhes pa'i bar dang /_bam po bcu bdun pa zhes pa dang /_de ma thag par bam po bco brgyad pa'i mtshams 
[\[57b.6\]]su/_de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste zhes pa nas/_'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo zhes pa'i bar rnams kyi hor kong bsabs shing /_mjug yongs su rdzogs par shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis 
[\[57b.7\]]bsgyur cing zhus pa'i yi ge ba ni yo ga pa grub pa dpal bzang po'o/_/kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o zhes pa nas/_gter bsgul na zhes pa'i bar rgya dpe la mi 'dug go/_/'gro ba sems can thams cad la phan par gyur cig/_//
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]{D687}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA mo g+ha pA sha pA ra mi tA ShaT+pa ri pU ra ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum 
[\[58a.2\]]du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M a mo g+ha pA sha ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA pA ri pA ra ya hU~M/_da ra da ra/_bi 
[\[58a.3\]]bid+ha/_bi tsitraiHsar+b+ba satwA u pa b+ho ga_/sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/_ma hA dA na/_pu dza me g+ha pra brta ya/_ta ra ta ra/_tA ra ya ma hA pad+ma ma Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po chen po ste/_gang gis yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa yang byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod 
[\[58a.4\]]byas na mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[58a.5\]]gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M a mo g+ha shI la/_sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma hA shud+d+ha satwa pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta/_b+hu dza/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa man ta a ba lo ki te hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas smyung bar gnas par byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 
[\[58a.6\]]dran pas brjod par bya'o/_/de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/_/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung 
[\[58a.7\]]zhing /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par byed na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par gyur pas smyung bar gnas par byas te/_gzungs 'di bzlas brjod 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing /_tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[58b.2\]]dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M a mo g+ha k+ShAn ti sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa k+Sha mi Ni/_k+Sha Na k+Sha Na ma hA mai tri kA ru Na sar+b+ba satwa bta sa la/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sar+b+ba satwa k+Sha mi Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa dang /_bzod pa chen po dang /_snying brtse ba dang /_snying 
[\[58b.3\]]rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_ltos 'gro la sogs pa gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang /_gnas pa gang yin pa dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 
[\[58b.4\]]'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na de sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas 
[\[58b.5\]]par gyur gyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M ma hA bIr+ya 
[\[58b.6\]]a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/_ba ra ba ra/_dr-i D+ha bIr+ya ma hA ba la/_ba la ba la/_ma hA bo d+h+yaM ba/_/ba la bo d+ha ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di dus rtag tu dran pa'am/_yongs su dag cing spro ba'i yid kyis dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'di yid la byed 
[\[58b.7\]]pa dang ldan pas dge ba sna 'ga' tsam byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur/_stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_myur bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_brtson 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA a mo g+ha kA ru Na/_d+h+yA na/_
[\[59a.2\]]sa mA d+hi/_sar+b+ba bi mo k+Sha/_a pra kam pya ka_/tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du yid la byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya 
[\[59a.3\]]so sor rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[59a.4\]]dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mo g+ha ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA a ba b+hA sa swa b+hA ba/_sa maM ta s+phar Na/_bud d+hi/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_sa man ta bud d+hi/_a ba lo ki te/_b+ha ga bA na pradz+nyA a ba lo ki te tsak+Shu ShaM ma hA pradz+nyA par 
[\[59a.5\]]ma ni ma hA pradz+nyA/_pad+ma d+hA ri Ni b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/_gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo 
[\[59a.6\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab kyi blo dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lan 'ga' yang pha 
[\[59a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs 
[\[59b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI warma dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis 
[\[59b.3\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_lo ts+tsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D688}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_da sha b+hU mi d+hA rA Ni/_bod skad du/_sa bcu pa'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[59b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba ni/_o~M zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas nas dang po 
[\[59b.5\]]la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/_don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[59b.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad dang /_gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan yang dgyes par 'gyur la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do/_/gsang sngags o~M zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang 
[\[59b.7\]]sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/_/o~M b+huHyi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing /_mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/sdig pa thams cad kyang 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]rnam par dag par mdzad/_sngon gyi las ngan gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/_nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/_tshe 'phos nas kyang ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[60a.2\]]don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yi ge gnyis pa'o/_/o~M pad+me/_gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/_pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags gang yin pa thams 
[\[60a.3\]]cad la zhugs par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[60a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/_thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/_/yi ge gsum pa'o/_/oM pad+ma hrIHgsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs 
[\[60a.5\]]pa mi 'khrugs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/_rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag 
[\[60a.6\]]ste/_rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/_/mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/phyir zhing nams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/_'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub 
[\[60a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sa bzhi pa'o/_/oM pad+ma b+hu dze gsang sngags yi ge lnga ba 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad do/_/sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyin par 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/_rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe 'phos 
[\[60b.2\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur zhing /_nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya chen 
[\[60b.3\]]po'i rim par bye ba 'grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad gyis shig_/yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/_/sa lnga pa'o/_/o~M pad+ma lo ki te/_gzungs 
[\[60b.4\]]sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
