[\[60b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston par mdzad/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan des rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad 
[\[60b.6\]]de/_rig sngags 'chang khyod nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog_/las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing /_khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/_khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/_khyod kyis de bzhin 
[\[60b.7\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon dang rigs spyi ni khong du chud/_khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/_khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig_/oM pad+ma dz+wa la hU~M d+h+r-ika_/yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/_ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur 
[\[61a.2\]]zhing /_'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/_sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/_lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing /_gang dang gang du 'od zer chen po cher 'bar ba rnam pa sna 
[\[61a.3\]]tshogs pa dag bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang 
[\[61a.4\]]ste/_phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/_/'di ni 'phags pa spyan 
[\[61a.5\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /_pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_don yod zhags pa'i snying 
[\[61a.6\]]por sprul pa grub kyis/_rig sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig_/o~M a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/_gzugs kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/_bzlas brjod 
[\[61a.7\]]byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che me shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/_de ltar rig sngags 'chang lus yongs su dag par 'gyur sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]lus yongs su dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing /_rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog pa mdzad/_legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/_rig 
[\[61b.2\]]sngags 'chang legs so legs so/_/rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/_/rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar tshur shog_/der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/khyod 
[\[61b.3\]]kyis don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis/_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig_/oM pad+mo lo tsa ni hu ru hU~M/_gzungs sngags yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la 
[\[61b.4\]]gnas par 'gyur/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston cing /_sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 
[\[61b.5\]]sprul pa sna tshogs ston par byed de/_rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad de/_legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin pa mdzad de/_rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyangs pa'i las legs par sgrub par byas so/_/khyod 
[\[61b.6\]]kyis 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa grub ste/_don yon zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor sgrub pa dang /_mdo sde dang /_lung dang bcas pa sgrub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag grub pa yin/_oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha bi ma le hU~M phaT/_
[\[61b.7\]]gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par gyur nas sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing /_lha dang /_mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/zhes brjod la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_the tshom mi bya'o/_/gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/_bdag 
[\[62a.2\]]gis sngar bstan pa thams cad lhag par zhen pa gtsang ma/_gtsang sbra spyod pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje skyes pa/_bden par smra ba/_bla ma la gus pa/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/_bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 
[\[62a.3\]]'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/_/sa bcu pa'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa rdzogs so//[ {D689}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha kalpa rA dza bi d+hi nA ma/_
[\[62a.4\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[62a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis shing bsngags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo zhes bgyi ba 'di nyid skye bo mang po 
[\[62a.6\]]la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_rjes su brtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du brjod par bgyi yis gson cig_/oM pad+ma ha sta ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha sa hA yaM sa ma ya hr-i da yAM tsa ra tsa ra hU~M/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyan ras gzigs 
[\[62a.7\]]kyi snying po zhes bgyi ste/_las thams cad kyang bgyi ba'o/_/o~M di bya saM pU ra naM ge bi lo ki k+Sha Ni hU~M/_'khar gsil gyi rig pa ste/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na sgra grag pas sems can rnams ngan 'gro las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/oM pat+t+ra pU ra ya a mo g+ha ba to sa man+ta pra b+he swA hA/_
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]lhung bzed kyi rig pa ste/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na bdud rtsi'i rnam par 'gyur zhing gang gis zos pa rnams ngan 'gro las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya thal mo lhan cig tu dam du sbyar ba las slar pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis nas mdzub mo nor bu lta bur bgyis te/_gung mo yid 
[\[62b.2\]]tsam bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/_lag pa spyi bor bkan nas bzhag pa spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i rig pa 'di lan bdun brjod do/_/oM t+yai d+hA a nu ga ta/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba trai ya d+h+wi ke pad+ma ma Ni su pad+me a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga tA ya a 
[\[62b.3\]]d+hiSh+Thi te hU~M/_rig pa 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[62b.4\]]rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su yang 'gyur bar the tshom ma mchis so/_/oM pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ma le hU~M phaT/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[62b.5\]]kyi bu mo gang la las gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di snying rje dang ldan par bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba nas sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing /_lha dang /_mi'i skye dgu dag gis 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur 
[\[62b.6\]]la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di ni yon tan chen 
[\[62b.7\]]po tshad ma mchis pa rnams dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags kyi snying po 'di dag ni yi ge 'bru re re tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]'gyur na/_rigs kyi bu gang gis ched du gnyer te/_ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod dang /_sgrub pa dang /_cho gas tshul bzhin du rgyas par sgrub pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po khro bo'i gzungs 
[\[63a.2\]]sngags rim par phye ba gsang sngags chen po yi ge bcu pa 'di lan cig tsam dran nam/_bklags sam/_ming tsam yang bzung ngam/_dus tshigs 'ga' rer dran pa tsam gyis kyang sems can de'i mtshams med pa'i las byas pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar gzhol ba tshe bskal 
[\[63a.3\]]par gnas par 'gyur ba yang las thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyang rang rab tu zad par 'gyur/_lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/_sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_tshe 'phos 
[\[63a.4\]]nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/_nam yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[63a.5\]]kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rtsa 
[\[63a.6\]]ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dri ma med pa gsang ba 'di rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la las lan cig tsam yang dran pas yid la byed 
[\[63a.7\]]cing /_yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i blo dang /_dmigs pa dang ldan pas sems can gang yang rung ba'i rna khung du brjod na sems can de dag ngan 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]song du skye bar mi 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/sems can de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lan gnyis brjod na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum brjod na rims dang /_'brum bu dang /_'bras dang /_lhog pa dang /_
[\[63b.2\]]me dbal dang /_g.yan pa dang /_rkang shu dang /_mdze nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan bzhi brjod na/_dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_byad dang /_gshed byed/_thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan lnga brjod na 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa 
[\[63b.3\]]dang /_shags su gyur pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan drug brjod na 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_rims thams cad dang /_pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun brjod na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad 
[\[63b.4\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe ba dang /_yams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re bzhin du tshig gzhan mi smra bar snying po 'di lan bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje gang la la dag 'di 
[\[63b.5\]]ltar sdig pa mi dge ba bcu rab tu spyod pa/_mtshams med pa byed pa/_dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa/_'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu brnyas pas de dag sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i tshe'i dus byas par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gang la la dag rang gi bslab pa'i 
[\[63b.6\]]sdom pa dral ba/_tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhigs pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la ma gus shing 'khu ba dang /_dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin pas tshe'i dus byas par gyur nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bye ma gtsang ma la lan grangs bdun 
[\[63b.7\]]bdun bzlas nas/_dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang /_ro bsregs pa'i rus pa'am/_dur mchad du bcug pa'i ro'am/_rus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o/_/gang dang gang na sems can rnams kyi rus pa gang dag yod pa de dang de dag tu bye ma des gtor ma thag tu/_de dang der bye mas phog 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]pa'i sems can de dag rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_sha za'i skye gnas dang /_gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas su skyes par gyur na yang de dag de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi'i gnas su rab tu gzhol 
[\[64a.2\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_phyin chad nam yang sems can thams cad dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di nyid gro ga dang /_ras sam shog bu la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/_gnas der srog chags 
[\[64a.3\]]rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pa dang /_rkang med pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de dag gi sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya 
[\[64a.4\]]dang /_wa dang /_khyi dang /_ne'u le dang /_grog sbur dang /_sbrul dang /_rus sbal dang /_lag 'gro la sogs pa srog chags phra mo gang dag gis mchod rten de'i grib ma la 'grims pa thams cad kyang grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de dag rnams kyi sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[64a.5\]]rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/bud dung la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon po'i rtse mo nas dung de bus na/_sems can gang dag gis dung de'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_
[\[64a.6\]]khye'u'am/_bu mo'am/_lha'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad nas chos thos te rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[64a.7\]]can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /_gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang /_gang dag skyabs gsum nye bar gzung ba dang /_gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas yang dag par bsdams pa de 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dag gis sgra de thos na/_de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe de brjes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dkar po la lan bdun bzlas 
[\[64b.2\]]brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/_dkor sa'am/_skye bo'i dbus sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang du bdug par byas na/_gang dag de'i dri la bsnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te/_sangs 
[\[64b.3\]]rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/chos gos la rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyon na gang zag de'i sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/lus la bab pa tsam gyis bag chags kyi dri ma dang /_ser sna 
[\[64b.4\]]dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/gos la bdugs te bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi gos la rab tu bdugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang /_btsun mor bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[64b.5\]]gyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhugs na dge 'dun thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhugs na nor dang /_longs spyod chen po 'phel 
[\[64b.6\]]bar 'gyur zhing mchod gnas chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan gyi bdug pa'i cho ga'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa las pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas khro bo'i rgyal po che'i/_/rtog pa rab tu bshad bya ste/_/
[\[64b.7\]]don yod rgyal po rmad byung tshe/_/kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing /_/dkyil 'khor kun tu dbang bskur bas/_/sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/_/bdud dang bgegs dpung rnam par 'jig_/gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/_/'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros/_/
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed/_/oM b+h+r-i kuTidaMSh+Te a mo g+ha sa ma ye/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM sarba bid a mo g+ha aMg ab+hi She ka hU~M/_mi li mi li swA hA/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o/_/de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga ni dngul la khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad 
[\[65a.2\]]tsam shin tu mdzes shing tshad dang ldan pa/_gdong gsum pa/_ral pa'i thor tshugs can/_rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor brgyan pa/_zla ba tshes pa mgo la thogs pa/_gdong gsum gyi dang po khro ba/_g.yas cung zad 'dzum pa/_g.yon gad mo dgod pa/_lag pa bzhi pa/_
[\[65a.3\]]g.yas dang po na pad+ma/_'og ma na ral gri 'phyar ba/_g.yon dang po na zhags pa/_'og ma mdung rtse gsum pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rgyal po'i rol stangs kyis 'dug pa/_gcan gzan khro bo'i pags pas smad dkris pa'o/_/g.yas phyogs su 
[\[65a.4\]]ni lha mo sgrol ma ut+pa la thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa lag na 
[\[65a.5\]]spos phor thogs shing bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das la gyen du blta ba'o/_/yang na ni ri mor bri bar bya ste cho ga bzhin no/_/gzugs brnyan de dag gi drung du ba'i lci bas byug pa byas la/_tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod yon bya ste/_me tog la 
[\[65a.6\]]sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhugs su gsol te/_de'i drung du bzlas brjod stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/rkang pas phan tshun du 'chag par 'gyur/_gzugs 
[\[65a.7\]]las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/_tshig 'byin par 'gyur/_legs so zhes sgra 'byin par 'gyur/_lag pa g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/_yid la bsams so cog thams cad dang /_mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/bklags pas las thams cad 
[\[65b.2\]]dang /_dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_grub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i zhags pa nas bzung ste/_bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon chad bsags pa'i bsod nams dang /_las kyi bgo skal thams cad mngon sum du 
[\[65b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po thob pa dang /_che ba nyams su myang bar 'gyur ro/_/gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyon 
[\[65b.4\]]mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/ral gri nas bzung ste/_bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/rtse gsum nas bzung ste/_stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/_'jig rten 
[\[65b.5\]]gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rked pa nas bzung ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/_bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nor 
[\[65b.6\]]rnams nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/bzlas brjod dang /_sgrub pa 'di dag gis ni 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[65b.7\]]gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du byon te/_ci dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga las phyung ba rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI warma dang /_
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D690}]@#/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /_mig stong dang /_
[\[66a.2\]]ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_ri gru 'dzin na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[66a.3\]]gnas na/_rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs shing /_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_khri de ni rin po che'i mchog sna tshogs du mas spras pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongs su brtsegs pa lha'i ba dan 
[\[66a.4\]]dpyangs pa ste/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs nas 'di snyam dgongs te/_ngas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs bshad gor ma chag snyam du dgongs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po du ma dang /_
[\[66a.5\]]thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sde dang /_byang chub 
[\[66a.6\]]sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i spyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[66a.7\]]dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa/_
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi sras sha stag dang thabs cig go/_/'od srung chen po la sogs gang dag gis nyan thos dag gis bcu spyad par gyur pa/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[66b.2\]]dge 'dun dpag tu med pa/_grangs med pa/_tshangs pa dung la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dang /_lha'i bu sa 'tsho la sogs pa lha'i bu du ma dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 'phags skyes po la sogs pa du ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[66b.3\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po nus pa'i dra ba la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po du ma dang /_lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mig la sogs pa/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha du ma dang /_dgon pa'i lha du ma yang thabs cig 
[\[66b.4\]]go/_/'bab chu dang /_mtsho dang /_mtsho bran dang /_khron pa dang /_chu klung dang /_chu klung chen po dang /_sman dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_nags tshal dang /_nags khrod dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_khyim dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rdul gyi ri dang /_
[\[66b.5\]]sa dang /_rgyal po'i khab dang /_mchod rten dang /_dri gtsang khang la sogs pa na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang der 'dus so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor chen po de'i nang na 'dug pas/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i 'od zer 
[\[66b.6\]]rnams kyis ma tshor bar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams khyab par snang bar byas shing /_stong gsum gyi stong po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur byas so/_/lha dang klu thams cad dang /_lha mchog thams cad kyi khang pa dag kyang khrol zhes g.yos so/_/
[\[66b.7\]]chu klung dang /_chu klung chen po dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_ri khor yug dang /_ri bo ri rab dang /_rdul gyi ri dang /_ri nag po thams cad kyang shin tu g.yos so/_/zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_rin po che dang /_me dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar gyi 'od kyang mog mog por byas 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos ltas rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/_ltas sngon ma mthong ba la the tshom skyes te/_de stan las langs te thal mo sbyar te/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i ltas 'di sus bgyis zhes/_sangs 
[\[67a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/_/deng su byang chub yang dag mthar thug gyur/_/thams cad ldan pa'i 'od zer su yis btang /_/'jig rten mgon po ci slad phyogs bcu yi/_/zhing rnams gser mchog 'dra bar gnas par gyur/_/stong gsum 'di ni ci 
[\[67a.3\]]slad tshig pa 'dra/_/deng 'dir su zhig gis ni dbang thob lags/_/sngon chad ma byung rdzu 'phrul stobs sus bstan/_/su yis 'dir ni zhing mang g.yos par bgyis/_/ci slad lha dang klu rnams khyim 'khrugs shing /_/gzhal med khang mchog dag kyang rab 'gul dang /_/
[\[67a.4\]]thams cad skrag nas rnam par blta zhing mchis/_/ci yi slad du stong gsum g.yos pa dang /_/gang gis 'khor 'dir the tshom skyes gyur de'i/_/rgyu dang su yi mthu lags ma 'tshal na/_/ci slad rdzu 'phrul mngon shes bstan bgyis pa/_/rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs can bka' 
[\[67a.5\]]stsal gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_/kye rigs kyi bu khyod la sogs pa 'di ltar shes par gyis shig_/da ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming 'phags 
[\[67a.6\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod de/_'di ni bskal pa du ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin pa/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang thabs la mkhas pa/_bsgoms pas sgrub pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa ste/_sems can 
[\[67a.7\]]gyi khams thams cad la zhi ba dang /_bde bar 'dod pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po 'di phyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_gos 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]legs par bgos nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis gsang sngags snying ltar bzung ba mchis te/_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi phan pa dang /_
[\[67b.2\]]bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang /_sdig pa'i las thams cad dang /_las lci ba rnams 'byang bar bgyi ba dang /_bgegs dang mi khom pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi ba dang /_dge ba'i phyogs bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad yongs su 
[\[67b.3\]]rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba dang /_mchog thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bdag da de brjod par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_thugs rjes bdag la nges par gnang 
[\[67b.4\]]bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye rigs kyi bu shin tu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod/_sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir/_gsang sngags gang brjod par 'dod pa 'di/_da ltar legs par khyod kyis dus la bab kyis myur du 
[\[67b.5\]]smros shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang rjes su thugs rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[67b.6\]]ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa bskal pa du ma 'das par gyur pa na/_'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer stong gi rgyal po dag par gnas pa zhes bgyi ba byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i bla ma des bdag la byams pas dran par bgyi ba dang /_sems can 
[\[67b.7\]]thams cad la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/_/thugs rje chen pos snying lta bu 'di yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_mi zlogs pa dang /_rgyas par bshad de/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzhag na/_'di skad ces kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa can 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]gyi dus kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/_snying lta bu'i gsang sngags 'di zung shig_/ces bka' stsal to/_/bdag ni de'i tshe thog ma nyid du sa dang po la gnas par gyur to/_/'di ltar bdag gis gsang sngags 'di lan cig thos 
[\[68a.2\]]pas de nyid na gnas bzhin du sa brgyad pa nges par rtogs par gyur to/_/bdag gis de'i tshe snying la bab pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba thob nas/_de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste/_'di ltar bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_
[\[68a.3\]]bde ba dang /_zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na/_da nges par bdag gi lus la lag pa stong dang /_mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang /_smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyid na mchis bzhin du/_lag stong dang /_mig stong yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[68a.4\]]gyur to/_/phyogs bcu dag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'od zer stong stong bdag gi steng du bkye nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang bar gyur to/_/de slan chad sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[68a.5\]]ldan 'das du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang dang yang du rnyed cing thos te/_de dag gi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di bzung ngo /_/yang dga' ba dang mgu ba du ma skyes par gyur to/_/bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang /_'chi ba nges par rtogs pa phra mo thob par gyur te/_
[\[68a.6\]]de slan chad rtag tu brjod cing bzung ste/_bskyud par ma gyur to/_/gzungs sngags 'di gzung ba'i don du bdag gang dang gang du skyes par rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skyes nas/_ma'i mngal du skye ba gzung bar ma gyur to/_/dge slong ngam/_
[\[68a.7\]]dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang la la zhig brjod cing 'dzin par 'tshal ba des/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bsam pa dang /_snying rje'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/thog mar bdag brjod pa'i 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'og tu smon lam chen po 'di skad gdab par bgyi ste/_btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i ming thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges 
[\[68b.2\]]par sems can yongs su skyob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges 
[\[68b.3\]]par shes rab kyi grur zhugs par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[68b.4\]]lo/_/bdag tshul khrims kyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[68b.5\]]dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig tu gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag 
[\[68b.6\]]ral gri'i ri de la 'gro ba na ral gri'i ri de bsnyil zhing zhig par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du 'gro ba na/_me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du 'gro ba na/_sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par 
[\[68b.7\]]gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba na/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams rang tshim par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'gro ba na/_de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro ba na/_de dag ye 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]shes chen po'i de kho na rang thob par gyur cig ces de ltar smon lam de skad btab nas/_dad pa ldan zhing sems kyis dran par bgyis la/_bdag gi ming brjod par bgyi'o/_/de nas yang bdag slob dpon 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 
[\[69a.2\]]rtag tu dran par bgyi'o/_/de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par rigs so/_/nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na/_bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang /_'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba stong phrag brgya dang /_bye ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur/_byang bar 'gyur 
[\[69a.3\]]ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi thams cad snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di ji lta ba bzhin du brjod cing 'dzin na/_gal te de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/_phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[69a.4\]]rnams de'i steng du phyag rkyong zhing 'di skad ces khyod gang du skye bar 'dod/_/gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa der song shig ces gsung ngo /_/yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'am mi ma lags pa gang zhig snying rje 
[\[69a.5\]]chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin la/_de gal te ngan song gsum du lhung bar gyur na/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gang zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung 
[\[69a.6\]]la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba ma thob na bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig_/yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/_des ting nge 'dzin dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa du ma ma thob na/_bdag sangs rgyas 
[\[69a.7\]]su ma gyur cig_/yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/_tshe gcig gis yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs na/_'di snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/su sdig pa bgyid pa dang /_ma dad 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bud med su zhig bud med kyi chos la yid byung nas/_bdag skyes par gyur cig ces 'tshal te/_snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di brjod cing bzung la de bud med kyi lus las ma gyur cing /_skyes pa'i lus ma thob na/_bdag byang 
[\[69b.2\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gal te 'dzin par bgyid pas/_de la the tshom cung zad tsam zhig bgyis na/_gdon mi 'tshal bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mi 'grub bo/_/gang gis dge 'dun gyi bza' ba dang /_thug pa dang /_nor dang /_'bru 
[\[69b.3\]]phrogs sam/_chud gsan te/_gang la sangs rgyas stong gi bshags su gnang bas bshags su lags kyang bshags par ma gyur la/_gal te gsang sngags 'di brjod kyang /_sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar ma gyur na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi rdzas ci spyad pa dang /_chud 
[\[69b.4\]]gsan pa dang /_phrogs pa dang /_phyogs bcu dag na/_rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi so so'i mdun du mchis la bshags na/_de'i tshe de'i bshags par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de ltar gsang sngags 'di brjod par gyur na/_phyogs bcu dag tu gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[69b.5\]]'dus pa rnams de la dbang yin no zhes smra zhing las thams cad kyang bshags par chud par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa bcu po thams cad dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la mi snyan pa brjod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spang ba dang /_dus ma lags par zas 
[\[69b.6\]]'tshal ba dang /_bslab pa nyams pa dang /_mchod rten dang /_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi rdzas chud gzon pa dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshul khrims nyams par bgyid pa dang /_de la sogs pa'i sdig 
[\[69b.7\]]pa'i las shin tu lci ba thams cad dang /_sdig pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang the tshom 'tshal ba ni ma gtogs te/_de'i sdig pa chung ngu dang /_las yang ba yang 'byang bar mi 'gyur na/_shin tu lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]rnams byang bar ma gyur du lags kyang /_yun ring mo zhig na/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro/_/yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te mi'am/_mi ma lags pa zhig gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying 
[\[70a.2\]]po 'di brjod par gyur na/_de skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga ni myong bar mi 'gyur te/_bco lnga gang zhe na/_dang po ni gang ltogs pas sdug bsngal te 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/gnyis pa ni gang chad pa ngan pas 
[\[70a.3\]]bcad pa'i tshor bas nyam thag pa'i gnod pa dag gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/gsum pa ni dgra dang /_khon mchis pa dang /_phyir bzlog pa rnams kyi dug dang /_mtshon gyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi pa ni gang dmag gi g.yul 'gyed par zhugs pa'i 
[\[70a.4\]]tshe 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/lnga pa ni gang stag dang /_spyang ki la sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis bsad pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/drug pa ni gang sbrul gdug pa dang /_rtsangs pa dang /_srog chags u tsi ling gas zin nas 'gum par mi 'gyur 
[\[70a.5\]]ba'o/_/bdun pa ni gang me dang /_chus 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/brgyad pa ni gang dug tu 'gyur ro 'tshal bas/_'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/dgu pa ni gang srog chags sna tshogs kyi dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcu pa ni gang rmongs pa dang /_rnam 
[\[70a.6\]]par g.yengs pa dang /_brjed pa dang /_nyal bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gcig pa ni gang ri dang /_shing dang /_g.yang sa dang /_gad pa las ltung bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gnyis pa ni gang byad kyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gsum 
[\[70a.7\]]pa ni gang dag lha g.yon can rnams dang /_'byung po sdig pa can rnams kyis glags bltas pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu bzhi pa ni gang gsor mi rung ba'i nad rnams kyis btab nas 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/_/bco lnga pa ni gang bdag la bdag gsod pas 'gum 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]par mi 'gyur ba ste/_gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin can te/_gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de la/_gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga yang thob par 'gyur te/_dang po ni gang dang gang du 
[\[70b.2\]]skye ba thams cad du chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o/_/gnyis pa ni gang 'phags pa'i yul du skye ba thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/gsum pa ni dus bzang po dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi pa ni gang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[70b.3\]]lnga pa ni gang dbang po mtha' dag tshang ba'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/drug pa ni gang dge ba'i phyogs la sems yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'o/_/bdun pa ni gang tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/brgyad pa ni gang gnyen bshes rnams dang /_bran g.yog rnams kyis bye brag 
[\[70b.4\]]shes shing mthun par 'gyur ba'o/_/dgu pa ni gang yo byad dang /_nor dang /_zas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu pa ni gang gzhan gyis go 'phang bstod pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gcig pa ni gang nor dang /_yo byad mi 'phrogs 
[\[70b.5\]]par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gnyis pa ni gang bsams pa sems dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu gsum pa ni gang lha dang klu dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/bcu bzhi pa ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing chos kyang thob par 'gyur 
[\[70b.6\]]ba'o/_/bco lnga pa ni gang chos thos pa dang /_don zab mo shes rab kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/_gang la la zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa des gong du smos pa skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod 
[\[70b.7\]]cing gzung bar bgyi ste/_de la skyo ba bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad smras nas/_de'i rjes la 'khor mang po'i dbus de nyid du 'dug ste/_lag pa gnyis mnyam par thal mo sbyar nas/_sems can 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/_'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas/_rgyas pa chen po kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[71a.2\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sarba ban d+ha na ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_sarba pA pa sa mu drots+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/_sarba b+ha ye Shu tA ra Na ka rA ya/_ta s+ya na maskr-i twa/_i daM 
[\[71a.3\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/_ta ba nI la kaN+Tha nA ma pa ra ma hr-i da ya mA brta yi Sh+yA mi/_sarba aR+tha sA d+ha naM/_shu b+ha tse ta naM/_sarba b+hU tA nAM pA pa mA rga bi sho d+ha kaM/_tad+ya thA/_A lo ke/_lo ka ma ti/_lo kA ti krAn+ta/_e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he bo d+hi satwa/_he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he pri ya bo d+hi 
[\[71a.4\]]satwa/_he ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sma ra hr-i da yaM/_e h+ye hi/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka_/ku ru ku ru karma/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya bi d+yA na/_de hi de hi/_me a raM ga maM ga maM bi haM ga ma/_sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/_du hu du hu ma hA bIr+ya n+te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hA ren+d+re shwa ra dz+wa la dz+wa 
[\[71a.5\]]la bi ma la mU rte/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/_kr-iSh+NA dzi na dza TA mu ku Ta/_a laM kr-i ta/_sha rI ra lam+ba pra lam+ba bi lam+ba/_ma hA sid d+ha bid+yA d+ha ra/_ba la ba la/_ma hA ba la/_ma la ma la ma hA ma la/_dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/_k-iSh+Na pak+Sha/_kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/_kiSh+Na pA sha/_ni r+g+hA ta na/_
[\[71a.6\]]he pad+ma ha sta/_dza ya ka ra/_ni shA tsa re shwa ra/_k-iSh+Na sarba kri ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/_e h+ye hi ma hA bI ra/_ma hA ba ra ma hA bA rA ha mu kha/_tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ra/_nA rA ya Na rU pa/_ba la be ga d+hA ri/_he nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA ha la ha la/_bi Sha ni rdzi ta lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha nA sha 
[\[71a.7\]]na/_dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA sha na/_mo ha bi Sha bi nA sha na/_ni ra mok+Sha Na hu lu hu lu/_muny+tsa many+tsa/_mu hu mu hu/_ha lA ha ra/_ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/_ra sa ra sa/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/_bod+ha ya bo d+haya/_bod+ha yA mi/_ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi/_bA ma s+thi ta/_ma hA 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]sing ha mu kha/_ha sa ha sa/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_ma hA T+TaT+Ta nir+NA de na/_e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_bA tsa na sA d+ha ya/_sA d+ha ya/_bid+yA na/_sma ra sma ra s+t+waM/_he b+ha ga bAn/_lo ki bi lo ki s+t+waM/_ta thA ga ta/_de hi de hi me dar sha naM/_kA ma s+ya dar sha naM/_pra sA d+ha ya 
[\[71b.2\]]me swA hA/_sid d+hA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/_sid d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/_bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA na ra siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/_badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_sid d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid d+ha bid+yA 
[\[71b.3\]]d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kri ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/_ma hA mA la ma ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/_tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_shad+kha shab+da nirnA da na ka rA ya swA hA/_bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/_bA mas+thi ta skan+d+ha de sha kr-iSh+NA dzi nA ya swA hA/_
[\[71b.4\]]bA ma hasta byA g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/_lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_sarba sid+he shwa rA ya swA hA/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_ku ru rak+Sha mU rtI nAM swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya sid 
[\[71b.5\]]d+h+yan tu me/_man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_o~M hrI trai lokya bi dza ya/_a mo g+ha pA sha_/a pra ti ha te hrIHha hUM phaT swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po 'di brjod nas sa chen po ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul 
[\[71b.6\]]lo/_/'ur 'ur ro/_/bar snang las rin po che dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char mngon par bab bo/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rjes su thugs rang ngo /_/bdud dang gzhan mu stegs thams cad sngangs skrag ste/_spu zing zhes byed par gyur to/_/'khor de thams cad 
[\[71b.7\]]ni so sor 'bras bu thob ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig ni sa dang po thob bo/_/kha cig ni sa gnyis pa/_kha cig ni sa gsum pa/_kha cig ni sa bzhi pa/_kha cig 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ni sa lnga pa nas/_kha cig sa bcu pa'i bar du thob bo/_/gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dpag tu med do/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/_gos legs par bgos nas/_gus pa'i 
[\[72a.2\]]sems kyis thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye kye las mdzad pa legs so legs so/_/bdag kyang 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag gi 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur 
[\[72a.3\]]te/_bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs dang /_gzungs kyi sgo sna tshogs dag kyang thob na/_bdag gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzung sngags gzhi thogs pa med pa rgya chen po 'di ma thos kyis/_da byang chub sems dpa' las mdzad pa chen po de'i lus dang /_rtags dang /_
[\[72a.4\]]tshul dang /_mtshan nyid nges par bshad du gsol/_bdag la sogs pa 'khor chen po 'di thos par 'tshal zhing smos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye khyod kyis thabs mkhas 
[\[72a.5\]]pas/_sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir dri ba 'di byas so/_/da nyon cig dang mdor cung zad cig kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ni snying rje chen po'i sems 
[\[72a.6\]]so/_/'di ni mtshungs shing mnyam pa'i sems so/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi sems so/_/'di ni chags shing zhen pa med pa'i sems so/_/'di ni stong pa nyid du blta ba'i sems so/_/'di ni bsti stang du byas shing gus pa'i sems so/_/'di ni ma 'khrugs shing skyon 
[\[72a.7\]]med pa'i sems so/_/'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/_sems de dag la sogs pa ni snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang /_tshul yin par de ltar zhes bya'o/_/de ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya'o/_/bsgom par bya'o/_/tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bdag la sogs pa 'khor 'dis snying po 'di'i tshul dang /_mtshan nyid de dang slan chad ma 'tshal to/_/da slan chad ni blang ngo /_/mi bskyud par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[72b.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/_des byang chub sems dpa' chen po yangs pa bskyed pa'o/_/de ltar yi dam bcas nas/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzung bar bya'o/_/zas dus dus su bza' ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan 
[\[72b.3\]]par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/gtsang mar gnas pas gnas par bya'o/_/khrus legs par bya'o/_/gos gtsang ma bgos la lha'i ba dan dang /_
[\[72b.4\]]mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/_/sems rtse gcig tu gzung bar bya'o/_/yang dag par ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o zhes de skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar gzung bar bya'o/_/'on tang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[72b.5\]]nyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang /_lha'i drang srong du ma yang der 'gro ste/_dbang byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/kho bos kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o/_/lag pa stong gis sba zhing bzung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi mdo dang /_yi ge 
[\[72b.6\]]rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang /_rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni 'jig rten na 'byung pos phyung ba'i nad kyi rnam 
[\[72b.7\]]pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed do/_/des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nad gang yang med do/_/yang 'byung po'am/_lha rnams la yang rgol ba'i mthu yod par 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyang pham par byed do/_/gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi phyogs kyang 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]lkugs par byed do/_/gal te ri la gnas pa'am/_dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhig kha ton pa la de na gnas pa sdig pa byed pa dang /_bgegs byed pa dang /_gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang /_'byung po sna tshogs gang dag sems 'khrugs par byed na/_snying po 'di lan 
[\[73a.2\]]cig brjod pas de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig tshul 'di bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/_srog chags thams cad la snying rje bskyed par bya'o/_/de'i tshe kho bos kyang lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po 
[\[73a.3\]]lag na rdo rje la rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la bsrung ba bgyis te/_phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/mig gi 'bras bu dang /_rang gi srog ji lta ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/_gang zhig dad pas snying po 'di/_/kha yis rtag tu 
[\[73a.4\]]'dzin pa yi/_/sgrub pa po la dus kun tu/_/soms la srung bgyis shig ces/_/khung bu mig dang de bzhin du/_/stobs po che dang lu gu rgyud/_/lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang /_/lag na rdo rje bsgo bar bya/_/kho bo'i snying po mchog 'di ni/_/dad pas rtag tu 'dzin pa yi/_/
[\[73a.5\]]sgrub pa sdig dang bral ba la/_/khyed cag srungs shig skyongs shig ces/_/dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang /_/nor gyi bu dang drag po dang /_/kum bi ra dang ser skya dang /_/de dag rnams la kho bo bsgo/_/gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis/_/gsang sngags 'di brjod 'dzin byed pa'i/_/
[\[73a.6\]]rig sngags 'chang la mi g.yel bar/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/lngas rtsen dang ni bde mchog dang /_/tsin da la dang su ma la/_/bing ga la dang gshin rje la/_/kho bos lung gis bsgo bar bya/_/gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yi/_/kho bo'i gsang sngags 'di 
[\[73a.7\]]'dzin cing /_/rtag brjod rig sngags 'chang ba la/_/bsam pa gyis shig srung ba gyis/_/sgrub pa po la srungs shig ces/_/bden pa po dang so brtsegs dang /_/mi mjed bdag dang lha mo dpal/_/de dag kun la kho bos bsgo/_/gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi/_/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing /_/rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_/lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang /_/sum cu gsum dbang ro langs dang /_/mang po 'dzin la kho bos bsgo/_/kho bo'i rig sngags 'di 
[\[73b.2\]]'chang la/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/gnas lnga dag na gnas pa yi/_/gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams dang /_/yang dag shes dang nor bu bzang /_/de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo/_/gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi/_/gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing /_/
[\[73b.3\]]rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/rgyal po rnam thos bu dang ni/_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /_/yul 'khor srung dang skyong byed dang /_/mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes dang /_/skem byed gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_/de dag rnams la kho 
[\[73b.4\]]bos bsgo/_/gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis/_/rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_/rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/dga' bo nye dga' klu gnyis dang /_/stobs kyi lha dang rgya mtsho dang /_/drang srong nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_/de dag 
[\[73b.5\]]rnams la kho bos bsgo/_/gang zhig rtag tu dag pa yis/_/rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_/rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/klu yi rgyal po ut+pal dang /_/'phrul chen lto 'phye che rnams dang /_/lha min mi ci dri za dang /_/
[\[73b.6\]]de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo/_/gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis/_/rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_/rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la/_/soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces/_/chu dang me yi lha rnams dang /_/sha za rnams dang glog dang sprin/_/grul bum dag dang 
[\[73b.7\]]mkha' lding dang /_/de dag kun la kho bos bsgo/_/bde bar byed pa'i lha g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa khyed thams cad dang /_de bzhin du lha dang /_/klu'i rgyal po rnams dang /_lha dang /_lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dang /_gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang gang snying rje chen 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byed pa de'i phyi bzhin du 'brongs shig_/gnod pa sol cig_/srung ba gyis shig_/gal te sngags pa mi zhig ri dang /_nags tshal stong pa thibs po dag na/_gcig pur grogs med par nyal na yang /_bde 
[\[74a.2\]]bar byed pa'i lha de dag rang gi 'khor dang bcas te srung bar byed do/_/yams kyi nad rnams dang /_bgegs rnams kyang zhi bar byed do/_/gal te ri khrod du lam stor bar gyur na/_gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas pa dang /_bde bar byed pa'i lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po de dag mi 
[\[74a.3\]]gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byed do/_/gal te ri dang /_nags dang /_dgon par son la chu dang me med par gyur na/_klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de la srung ba'i phyir chu dang me ston par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[74a.4\]]gis yang rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa gzhig cing bsal ba'i phyir/_zhi bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams zhig tu/_/stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan khro rnams dang /_/sbrul dang rtsangs pa dang 
[\[74a.5\]]ni mkha' 'gro ma/_/'ong yang 'di thos sngags mthus ldog par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho chu klung mtsho bran 'gram gnas na/_/dug ldan sbrul dang sbrul 'dzin byed pa dang /_/chu srin gnod sbyin nya dang kum bi ra/_/'ongs na'ang gsang sngags thos na 'jigs par 'gyur/_/dmag 
[\[74a.6\]]dpung chen po'i dgra dang 'thab pa dang /_/nor 'phrog chom rkun rnams dang phrad na yang /_/dad pas rtse gcig sems dang byams pa yis/_/gsang sngags bzlas na sdig byed mi nus ldog_/rgyal po'i khrims can go rar bcug pa dang /_/btson rar lcags dang shing sgrog 
[\[74a.7\]]bcug na yab/_/dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na/_/rgyal po bdag nyid de la dga' bar 'gyur/_/gal te dug can nags sam khyim gang na/_/dug can zas yod der ni son gyur la/_/dad dang ldan pas gsang sngags mchog brjod na/_/dug rnams 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]thams cad gyur nas bdud rtsir 'gyur/_/gal te bud med bus thogs mi phyin cing /_/g.yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang /_/dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na/_/'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/_/'byung po sdang dang gnod sems klu rnams 
[\[74b.2\]]kyis/_/bsad pa'i ched du gnod pa byas na yang /_/dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na/_/tshe yang 'phel zhing nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/_/gal te 'byung pos skrangs nad byas pa dang /_/bas ldags nad dang shu ba rnag khrag can/_/dad pas rtag tu gsang sngags 
[\[74b.3\]]'di bzlas na/_/gsang sngags mthu yis thams cad med par 'gyur/_/sems can rab tu sdang bas bsad pa'i phyir/_/g.yo dang sgyu yi las rnams byed na yang /_/dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na/_/de drung sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur/_/dam pa'i 
[\[74b.4\]]chos nyams sems can rnyog pa can/_/'dod chags bcings shing log pas rmongs rnams dang /_/nyin mtshan mi drang ma zhi rtog ldan zhing /_/khyo dang lhan cig mi dga' bud med rnams/_/gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'byin nus te/_/'dod chags me zhi sems 
[\[74b.5\]]ni drang bar 'gyur/_/gal te snying po 'di yi mthu brjod na/_/bskal pa gcig gi mtha' mir phyin ma 'gyur/_/tshon skud sna lnga pa la snying po 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa mgul du gdags so/_/snying po 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas 
[\[74b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o/_/gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la/_myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so/_/gang dag 
[\[74b.7\]]sangs rgyas nyid du sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang /_byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/_/gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems skyed par byed do/_/gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pa ma rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do/_/snying po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te dgos pa zhig yod na 
[\[75a.2\]]yang kho bo'i snying rje dang /_thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na/_sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang /_gal te snying po 'di thos na/_sdug bsngal 
[\[75a.3\]]rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang /_sa bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs 
[\[75a.4\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan cig thos na/_drang po'i sems kyi bsam pas mos shing sgom par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob bo/_/gal te de ltar bzod na/_stong 
[\[75a.5\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ri dang /_rdo dang rtsig pa dang ri rab dang /_ri khor yug rnams kyang g.yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang khol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de dang de'i gam yo na sems 
[\[75a.6\]]can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis/_nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang ldan par byas la/_snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/_yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[75a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha'i drang srong dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mi'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab chu'am/_rgya mtshor khrus byas na/_de na srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba 
[\[75b.2\]]thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_mngal nas skye ba dang /_drod gsher las skye ba dang /_sgo nga las skye ba'i skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/_gang 'di 'dzin pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_klog pa lta ci 
[\[75b.3\]]smos/_'don cing brjod pa lta yang ci smos/_rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung des sems can gang la la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[75b.4\]]'byung bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang shes par bya ste/_gang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/_bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med do/_/gang la la snying po 'di brjod pa de'i kha nas tshig dge ba'am/_mi dge ba ci byung yang 
[\[75b.5\]]rung ste/_de thams cad bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dang /_srung ba'i lha dang klu dang /_'byung po rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i chos su thos par 'gyur ro/_/su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed cing gus par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[75b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs shing yongs su bzung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang bar 'gyur bas/_lus 
[\[75b.7\]]'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang la ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la blta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang la rtag tu lha dag dang lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i 
[\[76a.2\]]mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du shes bar bya'o/_/gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang /_dus ngan pas chud mi zos pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang bdud dad gzhan 
[\[76a.3\]]mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing bzlog mi nus pa de'i mi'i sha'i mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/gang rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung 
[\[76a.4\]]ba de ni mngon par shes par bya ste/_de'i bsod nams kyi bsngags pa ni mtha' yas so/_/gal te rigs kyi bu mir gyur pa zhig yun ring por 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde ba 'dod na/_des thog mar bas mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste/_der 'dug par bya'o/_/
[\[76a.5\]]gtsang mar mtshams legs par bya'o/_/gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam/_yang na zas sam thug pa'am/_sman nam/_bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/mthu yod par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro/_/rjes 
[\[76a.6\]]su mthun pa'i chos len pa'am/_'dzin nus par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la mtshams bcad pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad par bya'o/_/yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi 
[\[76a.7\]]shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/_phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste/_'di ni mtshams so/_/yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin gyis brlab par 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bya'o/_/yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mtshams bcad do/_/yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa las bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na/_thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par gyur na bdag nyid 'bras 
[\[76b.2\]]bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de'i bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur na/_su 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos/_gang zhig 'di brjod cing smra bar nus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma la mchod cing bsod 
[\[76b.3\]]nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed nus par gyur na/_mi de ni snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[76b.4\]]rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang /_sems can so so la brjod pa dang /_de la gang dag gis thos pa yang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang dge ba'i mtha' ni brjod mi nus par dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[76b.5\]]te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnas la dge zhing drang po'i sems kyis brjod par nus na/_des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du/_sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o/_/gal te de ltar goms 
[\[76b.6\]]shing rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na/_des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/_dbang po rno ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur/_sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na/_'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras 
[\[76b.7\]]bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos/_/ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying rje chen po dang /_smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so/_/
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la/_yul der gal te rgyal pos chos kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang /_gtsang mar bya na sems can 
[\[77a.2\]]rnams stams las mi gcod do/_/nyes par byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o/_/rgyal po des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la/_zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/_yul der yams kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[77a.3\]]ro/_/lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sa ris so sor dag rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang /_mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /_der nad byung ba dang /_
[\[77a.4\]]chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang /_der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang /_gal te sdig pa'i las de snyed byung na/_rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /_mig stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la/_gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te 
[\[77a.5\]]bzhag go/_/shin tu dad pas bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang /_zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i phyir/_nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por gnas par 
[\[77a.6\]]byas na/_sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur/_/rang rang gi yul la dga' bar 'gyur/_sems mthun par 'gyur/_phan tshun grogs su 'gyur/_mi yongs dang rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing /_legs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal 
[\[77a.7\]]po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang klu rnams kyang yul srung bar byed do/_/char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu dang /_lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grub par 'gyur ro/_/yul na gnas pa rnams kyang bde ba dang /_yid 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs byung ngam/_bdud dang 'byung po g.yon can gnas pas 'khrugs shing smra'am/_skur pa 'debs sam/_gnod pa dag byung ngam/_phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po'am/_chung ngu dag byung na de'i tshe 
[\[77b.2\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /_mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la/_shin tu dad pas snying po 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/_gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad 
[\[77b.3\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_ji ltar blang bar bgyi/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i ming ni mang du yod de/_gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes 
[\[77b.4\]]kyang bya'o/_/sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/tshe 'phel bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par 'jig pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/sems 
[\[77b.5\]]kyi rjes su mthun par dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o/_/sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/_kun dga' bo de ltar zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang snying po drang 
[\[77b.6\]]po 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/mdo 'dzin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/'od zer dang mig dang /_lag 
[\[77b.7\]]pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/'di ni 'das pa'i bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]chos snang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/de ni snying rje chen po dang /_smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po 
[\[78a.2\]]tshangs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_klu'i 'khor dang khyed thams cad kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig_/de la brnyas par ma byed cig_/lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig_/ming yang brjod cig dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba skye zhing sdig pa du ma yang 
[\[78a.3\]]'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/su nor bu dang /_
[\[78a.4\]]'bras bu dang /_rin po che dang yo byad 'dod pa des/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su nad sna tshogs kyis btab ste/_nad med par 'dod pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su 
[\[78a.5\]]lto na ba des rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te bsam par bya'o/_/su 'byung po rnams dang bgegs byed pa'i lha la sogs pa gdul bar 'dod pa des/_rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud 'dul 
[\[78a.6\]]bar 'dod pa des/_rdo rje thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su dgra tshar gcod par 'dod pa des/_rdo rje can gyi gtun shing thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su thams cad du 'jigs par gyur te/_bde ba ma thob pa des mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i 
[\[78a.7\]]lag pa la blta bar bya'o/_/su mig na zhing mthong ba nyams pa des nor bu rin po che me shel thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang /_dug 'thungs pa des nor bu rin po che chu shel thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o/_/su bdag 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]po dang /_rnyed pa dang /_go 'phang 'dod pa des/_rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag pa la bsam par bya'o/_/su grogs po sdug pa myur du phrad par 'dod pa des/_rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag pa la dmigs par bya'o/_/su lus la nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa des/_me tog 
[\[78b.2\]]gi snye ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su lus la las kyi sgrib pa'i sdig pa rnams zad par 'dod pa des/_rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o/_/su nye du dang /_gnyen 'dab dang /_bu dang /_chung ma rnams dang /_sems mthun par 'dod 
[\[78b.3\]]pa des/_ril ba b+h+r-ing gar thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o/_/su stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa spong bar 'dod pa des/_phub thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su phyogs thams cad du dbang phyug rnams kyis glags lta ba yongs su spong 
[\[78b.4\]]bar 'dod pa des/_dgra sta thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_bskol bar 'dod pa des/_sor mo la ri thogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su bsod nams dang dge ba'i tshogs byed mi nus pa des/_pad+ma 
[\[78b.5\]]dkar po thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'dod pa des/_pad+ma sngon po thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su ye shes chen po thob par 'dod pa des rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i lag pa la 
[\[78b.6\]]bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa des/_pad+ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su sa'i 'og gi gter rnams thob par 'dod pa des rin po che za ma tog thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/
[\[78b.7\]]su drang srong gi lam tshol bar 'dod pa des/_tshon sna lnga'i sprin thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su tshangs ris kyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des/_ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des/_
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]me'i mdog lta bu'i pad+ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su yul gzhan gyi dgra phyir phyogs par 'dod pa des/_rin po che mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su lha dag dang /_lha dang /_yongs su skyong ba thams cad 
[\[79a.2\]]dgug par 'dod pa des/_dung thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su lha rnams dang /_'byung po rnams la bsgo ba byed par 'dod pa des/_khri'i zur shing lta bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 
[\[79a.3\]]myur du lung bstan par 'dod pa des/_bgrang ba'i nor bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su skad snyan cing tshangs pa'i sgra lta bu 'dod pa des/_rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su dgos pa thams cad dag par 'dod pa dang /_lce bde 
[\[79a.4\]]ba dang /_mkhas par 'dod pa des/_phyag rgya rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_rgyal po rnams kyis yongs su srung bar 'dod pa des/_lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su sems can thams cad 
[\[79a.5\]]la byams pa dang /_snying rjes khyab par 'dod pa des/_'khar gsil thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su sems can thams cad kyis bsti stang bya ba dang /_dran par 'dod pa des/_thal mo sbyar ba'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su tshe rabs tshe rabs su 
[\[79a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa des/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul ba thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su skye zhing skye ba na sangs rgyas rgyal po'i gnas dang /_khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]skye zhing ma'i mngal du mi skye bar 'dod pa des/_sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag pa 
[\[79a.7\]]la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su mang du nyan pa dang /_mang du slob par 'dod pa des/_glegs bam thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su tshe 'di nas bzung ste/_sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du yid mi ldog par 'dod pa des/_'khor lo thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]'dug par bya'o/_/su mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod pas mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams myur du byon te/_phyag gis mgo la nyug cing lung ston par 'dod pa des/_mgo 
[\[79b.2\]]la sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhugs pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/su 'bru dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa btab cing bskyed pa rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar 'dod pa des/_dgun gyi snye ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/_/de la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dngos 
[\[79b.3\]]po rnams rnam pa stong du rig par bya ste/_mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis snying po 'di ci nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur bar dge ba'i sems kyis zung 
[\[79b.4\]]shig long shig rgyas par ston cig_/de ltar na snying po 'di don chen po byed pa yin no/_/khams gsum na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i lus la nad gang dag yod pa de gal te gsang sngags 'dis gso bar byed na/_nad med par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang med do/_/snying po 'dis 
[\[79b.5\]]shing skam po la bzlas brjod byas na/_de la yal ga dang /_me tog gi snye ma dang /_lo ma dang /_'bras bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur na/_sems yod pa'i sems can bde bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_'di la the tshom za bar mi bya'o/_/kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i mthu stobs ni 
[\[79b.6\]]brtag par mi nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de bas na yon tan rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin to/_/sngon gyi dus dag na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pas ni ming yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos/_khyod la sogs pa'i 'khor chen po 'di dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_mi rnams kyi snying po 
[\[79b.7\]]'di la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/gang gis thos la spong ba de ni/_gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig snying po 'di la the tshom bskyed cing yid mi ches pa'i mi de ni/_yun ring po nas 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]rnyed pa las rab tu nyams nas bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du ngan 'gro rnams su 'khyams par 'gyur ba dang /_mngon par 'byung bar mi 'thob pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas mi mthong ba dang /_chos mi mthong ba dang /_chos mi thos pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 
[\[80a.2\]]'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi mthong bar shes par bya'o/_/de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor chen po de dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang klu dang /_'byung po gnas pa rnams bcom 
[\[80a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi snying po 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas/_thams cad rab tu dga' ste/_bka' bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis rig sngags de srung ba'i phyir/_gsang sngags 'di smras so/_/sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyob 
[\[80a.4\]]ba'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/sus tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod na/_de sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bgegs byed pa bdud dang mi phrad par 'gyur ro/_/yams kyi nad 
[\[80a.5\]]rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig la dus gsum du brjod cing /_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshe rabs gzhan na gzugs dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od 
[\[80a.6\]]kyis rig sngags 'chang de srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so/_/sha ma ta te ta tu su te/_Adz+nyA ba te/_u tu te/_shaM khri ste/_barma n+ya te/_a tu Te/_ku la ta te/_khi ma Te swA hA/_gsang sngags 'di ni zhal nas gsungs pa'o/_/gsang sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod 
[\[80a.7\]]byas la/_tshon sna bdun pa'i skud pas bcing ba bya ste/_gsang sngags 'chang gang du na bar gyur pa der bcing bar bya'o/_/gsang sngags 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs te/_bdag gis kyang da rig sngags 'chang rnams srung ba'i phyir 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]smras so/_/bgegs dang yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/sdig pa thams cad dang nad thams cad byang bar byed do/_/'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[80b.2\]]dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di ni de bzhin no/_/ma nor ba de bzhin no/_/don yod pa'o/_/su byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs par 'dod pa des/_gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[80b.3\]]bzlas brjod byas te bsregs na/_byang chub sems dpa' der 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na/_byi la'i mgo rus blangs te bsregs la sa gtsang ma dang /_thal ba zhib mo dang bsres te chus sbrus la byi la'i gzugs byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[80b.4\]]mig stong ldan gyi mdun du ur mo'i ral gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/_ral gri des byi la'i gzugs de brgya rtsa brgyad du gtubs la dum bu re re la yang lan re bzlas brjod byas shing ming nas kyang brjod na/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi ldang ngo /_/su zhig ha la ha la'i dug zos na/_
[\[80b.5\]]des gu gul gyi bdug pa dang /_ga bur cha bsnyams te khron pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa dang /_bskol ba khyor gang tsam lus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na/_dug las sos par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig sbrul 
[\[80b.6\]]dang /_srog chags u tsi ling gas zin par gyur na/_sga phye la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_rma khar btab na sos par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig sdig pa'i 'chi ba dang /_skur ba 'debs pas mi gzhan la 'chi na/_des sa gtsang ma'am/_bag phye'am/_sbra tshil las de'i gzugs 
[\[80b.7\]]byas la/_byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du ur mo'i ral gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad dus gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te/_snying po brjod la dum bur gtubs te/_de'i ming nas brjod cing lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_dga' bar 'gyur te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
[\[81a\]]
