[\[81a.1\]]du mdza' bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig mig nyams te ldongs pa'i bar du gyur pa dang /_su zhig mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du ling thog byung ba dang /_mig tu skyes te mi mthong bar gyur ba des a ru ra gcig dang /_ba ru ra gcig dang /_skyu ru ra gcig zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dkar 
[\[81a.2\]]po dang /_khye'u nu ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya ste/_sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing /_bu gsar du btsas pa'i bud med dang /_khyi dang /_phag gis ma mthong bar byas la ril bur byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[81a.3\]]brjod byas la/_gnas dben pa rlung mi 'ong bar 'dug ste/_nyi ma bdun gyi bar du sman de mi'i 'o ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang brdar ba mig tu blugs na/_mig gi 'bras bu skye'o/_/ling thog med par 'gyur zhing legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/su grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa'i ched du/_
[\[81a.4\]]stag lpags sam/_gzigs lpags sam/_dred lpags sam/_dom lpags sam/_spyang lpags la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa la bskon na rims sos par 'gyur ro/_/seng ge'i pags pa ni thams cad kyi mchog go/_/gal 
[\[81a.5\]]te sbrul gyis zin na mi de nyid kyi skra bcad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_dug gi rma khar bzhag na sos par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig snying na zhing mi dran nam/_'chi 'dod par gyur na/_shing sle ma ta ka'i thang chu star ka tsam chu gtsang ma dang bskol te phyed du ba dang lan bdun bzlas 
[\[81a.6\]]brjod byas la 'thungs na/_thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyis bskol bar mi bya'o/_/su zhig 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin tam/_mi ma yin pas btab pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur na/_gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te snar 
[\[81a.7\]]blugs so/_/yang na ri bong gi rtug pa tsam gyi ril bur byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bza'o/_/sha dang /_chang dang /_sgog pa dang /_'thab mo spang ngo /_/'on dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ldong ros dang /_yungs kar dang /_lan tshwa dkar po 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_nad pa'i mal gyi 'og nas bdugs na/_nad gtong ba'i 'byung po myur du 'bros te/_lus 'jig cing der 'dug mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzhogs phyed na'am/_gzhogs phyed nyams sam/_rna ba 'on nam/_rkang lag 'gul mi 
[\[81b.2\]]nus par gyur na/_til mar gyi nang du ru rta btsos la/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ba mar gcig pu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_bskus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/bud med la la zhig bu 'byung shin tu dka' 
[\[81b.3\]]na/_til mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_lto ba'am/_lte bar bskus na myur du 'byung ngo /_/gang gi mngal du bu 'chi na shing a pa marga srang gcig chu khyor do'i nang du bskol la phyed lus pa dang /_de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na/_
[\[81b.4\]]gnod pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ma mi 'byung na yang sman de la bzlas brjod bya'o/_/la la zhig shi la thug pa tsam du snying na ste/_mnags mi bzod na tu ru ska dang /_dbyi mo cha bsnyams te bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te so la bsku zhing mid la skyugs 
[\[81b.5\]]skyugs kyi bar du byas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/sgog pa rnam dgu dang /_sha dang /_chang spang bar bya'o/_/mes tshig na ba nag mo'i lci ba dron po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_rma khar glan na sos par 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig srog chags ring po snying la za/_rta dkar 
[\[81b.6\]]po'i gcin khyor phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na/_srog chags de 'byung ngo /_/gal te nad tshabs che na khyor gang 'thungs na/_srog chags thag pa srig 'byung ngo /_/gal te 'bras drag po byung na/_rams kyi lo ma brdungs te khu ba btsir la de la lan 
[\[81b.7\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te rma khar gtor na rtsa ba dang bcas te 'byung ngo /_/la la zhig mig la sbrang bus zos par gyur na/_bong bu'i rtug pa gsar du byung ba btsir te/_khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_dgongs su nyal kar mig tu blugs na sos 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig lto na na khron pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i nang du lan tshwa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la btab ste/_khyor phyed 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro/_/su'i mig la mig nag chags sam/_rab rib bam/_
[\[82a.2\]]rtsa dmar par gyur na/_shing sham mya ka'i lo ma btsir te/_de'i khu ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la nang du 'gron bu bcug ste/_zhag gcig bzhag la nang par yang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_mig tu blugs na phan no/_/su zhig mtshan mo 'jigs shing mi bde la skrag na/_skud 
[\[82a.3\]]pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la mgul du btags na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/las rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim zhig tu glo bur du gnod pa dag byung na/_bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sor gnyis kyi tshad du gtubs pa 
[\[82a.4\]]stong rtsa brgyad byas la/_ba mar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi snod cig tu blugs pa drung du bzhag ste/_lcug ma'i dum bu cig blangs la lan cig bsngags te/_rtse mo gnyis mar du smyugs la sreg go/_/de bzhin du lcug ma'i dum bu thams cad bsregs na/_yams kyi nad thams cad 
[\[82a.5\]]med par 'gyur ro/_/las 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya'o/_/shu dag dkar bo la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/_dpung pa g.yas par thogs na thab mo'am/_'gyed pa'i tshe rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/shing sham mya ka'i lo ma dang bcas pa sor gnyis kyi tshad gtubs la cho ga gong 
[\[82a.6\]]ma bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/nyi ma gcig la dus gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gal te nyi ma bdun du de bzhin byas na/_dngos grub 'thob bo/_/'phags pa'i lam yang skye'o/_/gal te 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po las rgyal bar 'dod na/_lung tang gi shing la lan 
[\[82a.7\]]bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas brjod byas la ba mar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyin sreg byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bya'o/_/glang dkar po'i gi'u wang srang gcig mthing bu'i snod du bcug la/_byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/_yan lag 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rnams la bskus la/_dpral bar thig le byas na/_lha klu dang 'byung po dang /_mi thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag nyes byung ste lcags sgrog dang /_shing sgrog tu bcug na/_phug ron gyi rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/_lag pa la yang bsku'o/_/
[\[82b.2\]]lcags sgrog dang /_shing sgrog la yang reg par byas na thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyo shug me dang chu ltar mi mthun par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du ngur pa'i mjug sgro la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/_lus la thogs na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dum 
[\[82b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te srog chags dag lo tog phung bar byed na/_thal ba gtsang ma'am/_bye ma gtsang ma la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/_me tog kun tu gtor na/_srog chags rnams phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gal te srog chags dag shing tog la za na/_
[\[82b.4\]]chu la bzlas brjod byas te/_shing rnams la gtor na 'bras bu la mi za'o/_/de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs snga 
[\[82b.5\]]ma'i bsod nams kyi rgyus/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la khyod sems can gyi khams thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nas/_bcing ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad gcod nus par 'gyur te/_de'i mthus sems can thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar 
[\[82b.6\]]'gyur/_zhi ba dang /_bde ba thob bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan par gyur to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mar gyur pa na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig snying po chos kyi sgo 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'dzin nus na/_de'i las kyi sgrib 
[\[82b.7\]]pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran par bgyi ste/_grong khyer ram grong ngam/_grong rdal lam/_nags tshal gang na rig sngags 'chang gnas pa la/_gal te de na gnas pa'i 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]'byung po rnams 'tshe bar bgyid na/_bdag rtag tu der mchi zhing kun tu bsrung bar bgyi ste/_yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do/_/de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad 
[\[83a.2\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa thams cad sems can phal cher rnyog pa can du 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing rtag par rgyun du dge ba'i phyogs bgyid mi nus pa dang /_gal te 'dzin na yang de'i tshe/_lha dang /_'byung po 'tshe bar 'gyur bas/_bdag 
[\[83a.3\]]gis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_zhi bar bgyid pa'i slad du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis gzungs 'di'i cho ga da bshad par bgyi'o/_/bdag gis kyang 'das pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs 
[\[83a.4\]]'di la mchod pa bgyis so/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa rnams kyis kyang gzungs 'di la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 
[\[83a.5\]]rtag tu gzungs 'di 'dzin cing 'chang na/_de'i tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi rgyun thogs pa med par 'gyur/_dbang po rno zhing mkhas par 'gyur/_spobs pa myur bar 'gyur/_lha dang /_mi thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/gang su'i sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_grags 
[\[83a.6\]]pa yang thos shing bde ba dang /_dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun yang mthong bar 'gyur/_tshig la yang yid ches shing yid rton par 'gyur ro/_/de yang 'di ltar sangs 
[\[83a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu lags par bgyi yi/_bdag nyid kyi ni ma lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod nas/_legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/_khyod ni lha dang mi la sogs pa la 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_zhi bas las kyi lam la sbyor bar nus so/_/gal te yun ring por phyir mi ldog pa lta na/_da ngas ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gdab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[83b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa bdag ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing /_'das pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi sgo 'di brjod do/_/de'i tshe bdud der mchis nas bdud des 'khor bsdus nas/_ci nas kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di'i 'grub par bdag gis chos de 
[\[83b.3\]]la mtho btsam par bsams pa dang /_de'i tshe bdag gis gsang sngags kyi chos de'i cho gas bdud pham par bgyis/_rnam par pham par bgyis so/_/gsang sngags 'di'i mthu ni brtag mi nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[83b.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba dz+nyA ya/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo\u0f85 mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo 
[\[83b.5\]]ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA s+thA ma prAp+NA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo bi pu la/_bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi tA saM g+hA ya/_sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka/_pra b+hA a ba b+hA si ta mUrta ye/_ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta 
[\[83b.6\]]kuN+Da la/_a laM kA ra d+hA ri Ne/_b+ha ga ba te/_pad+ma pA Na ye/_sarba lo ka a pA ya pra sha me nA ya/_bi bi d+ha mu kha sa mA be sha/_a b+haSh+Ta sarba satwA pa ri mo tsa kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/_ma hA A lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mir pa Ta la bi nA sha ka rA ga dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/
[\[83b.7\]]shA sa ka_/sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/_rak+Sha ka_/sarba a pA ya durga ti pra sha ma na ka ra/_sarba sa twAM sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/_sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba ta thA ga ta/_sa ma pa dA na ka ra/_e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra pad+ma A lo ka saM b+hu ta ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/dza TA ma ku Ta/_a lang kr-i ta/_shi 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]ro ma Ni ka na ka_/rA dza ta badzra bai DUr+ya a lang kr-i ta/_sha rI ra a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la/_a lang kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Na ra dza na sha ta sa ha sra a b+hi la ShI ta kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya bar ba ra da/_bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/_bi nA sha ya/_bi nA sha ya/_ma hA ya na traM/_kle sha kab+hA 
[\[84a.2\]]ta/_a ba ba d+ha bi bid+ha satwAM/_sang sA ra tsA ra ka_/pra ma tha na ka ra/_pu ru Sha pad+ma/_pu ru Sha nA ga_/pu ru Sha sA ga ra/_pu ru Sha sing ha/_bI ra bI rA dza su daN+Ta tA pa ri bi ti/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ma sa ma/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_pra shA sa ya pra shA sa ya/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_bi bi ri bi bi ri/_tsi 
[\[84a.3\]]ri tsi ri/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_mu kha mu kha/_mu ya mu ya/_mu ny+tsa muny+tsa/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_gA ya gA ya/_ga d+ha ya ga d+ha ya/_sa ha sa ha/_pra sa ha pra sa ha/_
[\[84a.4\]]nA nA bi bid+ha kle shI bA sa na/_ha ra ha ra/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_d+hu ru tu d+hu ru tu/_ma hA maN+Da la ka ra Na sha ta pra se ka_/a ba b+hA si ta bi bi d+ha bA sa na sha mi ka_/shA sa ka_/rak+Sha ka_/ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra ba ra da swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 
[\[84a.5\]]phyag gi rgyan gyi yu ba zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_klu dang /_mi'am ci du mas yongs su bskor bas/_rdo rje chen po dang ldan zhing dga' ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]thams cad kyis mchog gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du gsungs te/_sgrib 
[\[84a.6\]]pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'joms pa'o/_/gang la la zhig gis mnyan pa dang /_blta ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_brjod pa thob na/_mi de'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ji snyed mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig dad par gus pas snga dro brjod na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[84a.7\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba bgyid do/_/gang ci 'tshal ba dag kyang de bzhin du 'grub bo/_/su zhig gal te bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par thob par 'tshal ba des/_gcig pu phyogs dben par mchis 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing gzhan bsam par mi bgyi bar gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun brjod na/_yid la bsams pa gang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang ma mchis so/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[84b.2\]]ro/_/ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu rjes su mngon du dran na/_bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong du tshang ba'i bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84b.3\]]gar skyes gar skyes kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig snyim pa spos kyis bkang ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gtor la/_gzungs sngags 'di yang lan 
[\[84b.4\]]bdun brjod na/_stong gi bsod nams kyi mchog dang /_snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yang 'thob bo/_/de mi'i 'jig rten 'dir yang stobs chen po yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob bo/_/su zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du blta zhing /_gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa 
[\[84b.5\]]de byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rgyas pa mthong nas/_sa dri ma med pa yang 'thob bo/_/'jig rten na yang snang ba bgyid do/_/tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong ngo /_/ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/gar 
[\[84b.6\]]skyes gar skyes kyang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa des/_tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad bzung ste/_gos gtsang ma bgos la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten 
[\[84b.7\]]gyi mdun du'am/_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/_der me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bgyi/_bdug pas kyang bdugs par bgyi/_mar me yang bud par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor der 'dug ste/_mtshams med pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 
[\[85a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang 'thob bo/_/'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyang 'thob bo/_/sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te char 
[\[85a.3\]]dbab par 'tshal na/_gyen du nam mkha' la bltas la gzungs sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na char 'bab bo/_/gal te sa la bltas te gzungs sngags brjod na/_sa bon thams cad rnam pa brgyar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'bab chu skams pa'i shul 
[\[85a.4\]]lam 'bab chu chen po'am/_'bab chu'i dngo'am mtsho'am mtshe'u'am/_mtsho bran gyi 'gram du mchis te brjod na/_chu thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad kyi don du gzungs sngags brjod de lag pas byabs na sos par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nyams 
[\[85a.5\]]pa'i mi'i mdun du brjod na/_dran pa slar 'thob bar 'gyur ro/_/bru bas nyen pa'am/_skom pas nyen pa'i mi'i gdong du bltas te brjod na/_bkres pa'am skom pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshams bcad par 'tshal na/_des mtshe'u chu'i nang du zhugs te der mchis la/_
[\[85a.6\]]gzungs sngags 'di yi ger bris te/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/_dpag tshad brgyar mtshams bcad par 'gyur te/_der nyes pa rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/mtshams kun tu srung ba rdzogs so//_//da ni lus thams cad bsdu ba'i phyag rgya brjod par bgyi'o/_/
[\[85a.7\]]lus drang por 'greng ste/_rkang pa nye bar mnyam du gzhibs la/_rkang pa g.yas pa yid tsam bskums te/_lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang /_gung mo dang srin lag gnyis lag mthil du dgug_/mdzub mo dang /_mthe bong dang /_mthe'u chung brkyang la lag mthil bkan 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]te bzhag go/_/lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/lag pa gnyis ka'i gung mo bkug pa lag pa phrag pa dang mnyam par bzhag go/_/lag mthil ni mdun du bstan te bzhag go/_/'di ni lus bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o/_/su zhig bdud dang /_gzhan mu 
[\[85b.2\]]stegs can dang /_dgra rnams pham par bgyi ba dang /_lam dang po la gnas par 'tshal na/_phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA 
[\[85b.3\]]ya/_tad+ya thA/_a bat+ta/_a bat+te pa ri bat+te/_e h+ye hi swA hA/_gang gong du phyag rgya ji skad smos pa de bzhin du lus gnas par bgyis la/_snying gar thal mo sbyar te/_sor mo thams cad phan tshun thad kar bsnol la/_g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa rnams la 'khyud 
[\[85b.4\]]bar bgyi/_mdzub mo gnyis gyen du sgreng la/_rtse mo gnyis sprad do/_/mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po la reg par bgyi'o/_/lag mthil ni ma 'byar bar bgyi'o/_/'di ni gzungs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gnyis pa'o/_/bskal pa du mar tshe rabs 
[\[85b.5\]]su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe phyi ma la 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub brnyes par mdzad par brtsams pa'i tshe bdud kyis mtho btsams pa na/_phyag rgya 'dis btul/_de'i tshe zhi ba'i bde 
[\[85b.6\]]ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa yang brnyes par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_sarba d+hA ra Ni/_maN+Da lA ya/_e h+ye hi pa ra ma shud d+ha satwA ya swA hA/_yang thog mar lag pa g.yas pa 'byin pa ltar 
[\[85b.7\]]bgyis la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_mgo bor thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad/_mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis pa la sbyar ro/_/'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste/_rnam par grol bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_bsam 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]gtan dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni phyag rgya gsum pa'o/_/sngon de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mthun par bsgoms te/_de'i tshe bsam gtan rnams dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par grol ba 
[\[86a.2\]]brnyes so/_/yang 'di ni gzhan te 'greng la rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gzhib bo/_/lag pa'i gung mo dang /_srin lag dang /_mthe'u chung rgyab sbyar te/_sen mo phrad par bgyi/_mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rtse mo phrad par bgyi/_mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa 
[\[86a.3\]]la reg par bgyi/_lag mthil nang nas sor bcu tsam gyis bskyed la smin mtshams su gzugs so/_/'di ni mig stong gi phyag rgya ste bzhi pa'o/_/gal te phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs sngags brjod na/_skad cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[86a.4\]]su dag pa/_dkrigs pa bye ba phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag rig sngags 'chang de dang lhan cig spyod cing grogs su gyur pa ni zhing re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs pa bye ba phrag 'bum dang /_bzhi stong nyi shu mchis so/_/gang dkyil 'khor du ma 
[\[86a.5\]]zhugs pa des ni blta bar mi rigs te/_phyag rgya de'i chos nyid do/_/su la rigs zhe na gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid la'o/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ye shes kyis rtogs par 'tshal ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[86a.6\]]ro/_/gzungs sngags ni 'di lags te/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+hu sarba tsak+ShuHkA rA ya d+hA ra NI na drA ya swA hA/_yang 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par gzhibs te/_lag pa g.yas pa bkan la sor mo lnga gzhibs te brkyang la/_lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te bkan 
[\[86a.7\]]la lag pa g.yas pa'i rgyab la sbyar te snying gar bzhag go/_/'di ni lag pa stong thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ste lnga pa'o/_/'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_bdud dang dgra mchis pa rnams thul lo/_/gzungs sngags 'di lags te/_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_tad+ya thA sarba duSh+Ta o~M ha ya me swA hA/_yang 'greng ste rting pa phrad par bgyis la/_lag pa g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyis te/_lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la/_lag mthil bdag logs su bstan par bgyi'o/_/'di 
[\[86b.2\]]ni ting nge 'dzin rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ste drug pa'o/_/'dis ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'dis ni thams cad kyang 'thob bo/_/gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i 
[\[86b.3\]]gsang sngags snga ma/_na maHsarba dz+nyA zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/yang 'greng la rkang pa nye bar gzhibs te/_lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo mnan to/_/g.yas pa yang de bzhin te mthe'u chung dang /_gung mo rnams rtse mo sprad la/_lag rting drang por bsrang ste/_dgug 
[\[86b.4\]]pa ni mdzub mo gnyis dgug go/_/slar btang na ni brkyang ngo /_/de ltar mchis la sngags brjod par bgyi'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni dgug go/_/g.yon pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni slar gtang ngo /_/mgo'i thon 'khor g.yas nas bskor bar bgyi ste bod pa'o/_/
[\[86b.5\]]g.yon pas ni bsal ba ltar bgyis te slar btang ngo /_/phyag rgya 'dis ni lha dang klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad bsdu ba'i slad du dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste bdun pa'o/_/gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/_oM sarba de ba nA ga a na le swA hA/_phyag rgya snga ma la rtse mo bskyed de/_lag rting 
[\[86b.6\]]gnyis sbyar ba las yud tsam bzung mdzub mos g.yab ste snga ma bzhin no/_/'di ni brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa chos mnyan pa'i slad du dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste brgyad pa'o/_/gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/_oM ma hA prah+ma ye/_e h+ye hi swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di dang /_gsang sngags 'di ni 
[\[86b.7\]]gzungs sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_chos kyi sgo du ma gzung ba'i slad du bsdu ba'o/_/nyi ma spyang kis zin pa dang /_zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe/_ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_phyag rgya 'dis phyag rgyas btab la 'thungs na dbang po rno bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bzhin du chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa khri lobs nus par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya 'di dang /_chos kyi sgo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ched du gsungs pa'o/_/yang 'greng ste 
[\[87a.2\]]rkang pa nye bar gzhibs la/_lag pa thal mo sbyar te/_snying gar bzhag la mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bkug ste/_rtsa ba'i sngags chen po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang rang gi nor bu'i yid bzhin lta bu'i phyag 
[\[87a.3\]]rgya ste dgu ba'o/_/'dis nges par lha'i gzhal med khang rnams su 'jug go/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yang mchi'o/_/mchod pa'i don du rin po che brgya stong dag kyang bsams pa bzhin rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di'i las bgyid nus na/_de nang 
[\[87a.4\]]par sngar langs la khrus bgyi zhing kha gdong bkrus te/_phyag rgya de'i dam tshig bgyis na/_des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa du mar tshe rabs su bsags pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba 
[\[87a.5\]]rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya de'i yon tan dang /_bsngags pa ni rab tu mang ngo /_/yang snga ma bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/_mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo'i sen mo la bcar te/_mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo yang phan tshun du rgyab sprad la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 
[\[87a.6\]]brjod par bgyi'o/_/'di nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems la 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu pa'o/_/ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo/_/nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/yang thal mo snga ma las mthe bong dang /_
[\[87a.7\]]mdzub mo so sor brkyang ste lag mthil dbye bar bgyi'o/_/'di ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bdag la stsal ba ste/_'dis bdag byang chub kyi lam rab tu rtogs so/_/'dis rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste/_bcu gcig pa'o/_/yang thal mo snga ma las mdzub mo gnyis bskum zhing brkyang bas bskul bar bgyi'o/_/'di byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i 
[\[87b.2\]]phyag rgya ste/_bcu gnyis pa'o/_/gzungs sngags ni 'di lags te/_o~M sarba bud d+ha sa ma ya e h+ye hi pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa swA hA/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa/_lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug 
[\[87b.3\]]pa'i cho ga brjod par bgyi'o/_/thog mar ri rnams dang nye ba/_sa gzhi bkra shis pa'i phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o/_/der sa brkos te/_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dang /_rus pa dang /_mi gtsang ba rnams bsal la/_dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i ba'i gcib dang /_'jim par bsres 
[\[87b.4\]]te byug par bgyi'o/_/der chu zheng du khru bcu drug pa'i stegs bu bgyi'o/_/'phang du ni mtho gang gi tshad du bgyis la/_sgo bzhi btod de/_shar gyi sgor ni yul 'khor srung /_lho'i sgor ni 'phags skyes po'o/_/nub kyi sgor ni mig mi bzang /_byang gi sgor ni rnam thos 
[\[87b.5\]]kyi sras te/_de dag gi gam yor rang rang gi 'khor thams cad bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa lag pa stong dang ldan pa gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de'i mdun du khri'u bzhag ste/_khri'u'i 
[\[87b.6\]]steng du gzungs sngags kyi cho ga gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug go/_/me tog sna tshogs bkram mo/_/lha bshos sna tshogs dbab bo/_/der mchod pa de rnams bzhag ste/_sgog pa rnam dgu dang /_sha dang chang mi dbab bo/_/gal te rgyun mi 
[\[87b.7\]]'chad par bgyi na nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyang sar pa gzhan gyis brje'o/_/cho ga 'dis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dngos po thams cad kyis mchod par bgyi'o/_/sgrub pa po gang dag sngon mthong ba de dag gis bri bar bgyi'o/_/de sgrub pa po shar phyogs su bltas te/_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'greng la gzungs sngags snga ma dang po nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthar phyin gyi bar du skyo bar mi bgyi'o/_/thog mar phyag rgya dang po lan cig bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bgyi'o/_/bcu gnyis pa'i bar 
[\[88a.2\]]du yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/der de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa brtan po'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/cho ga 'dis de bzhin du dgug pa bgyis na/_thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du nges par drang po'i sems kyis drang por mchis par bgyi'o/_/gsang 
[\[88a.3\]]sngags dang lha thams cad rjes su dran par bgyi ste/_ji ltar na mdun na mig lam na gnas pa lta bu dang phan tshun gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/dmigs pa gzhan la dmigs par mi bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod 
[\[88a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/'on tang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis der mchis te/_sgrub pa po la ci 'dod ci slong zhes 'dri zhing phan tshun smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bgyi bar bsams la/_bdag la ji skad 
[\[88a.5\]]dris pa lan gdab par bgyi ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bgyi'o/_/yang na 'di skad du 'di ni lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa snyam bgyid na/_thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges par 
[\[88a.6\]]thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol/_bdag ni rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa mi 'tshal gyi/_nam zhig na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang /_yongs su skyob par 'gyur snyam du sems so/_/yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas pa thams 
[\[88a.7\]]cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems so zhes brjod par bgyi'o/_/gal te yid la bsams pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan la mi brjod par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/gal te cho ga 'di grub na bzlas par bgyi/_gcig tu 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]gzung bar bgyi'o/_/'di ni bslab pa gcig tu gsang ngo /_/su zhig sna tshogs 'tshal ba des a ga ru nag po'i chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid 
[\[88b.2\]]pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa yang bcing bar bgyi'o/_/'on tang 'tshal ba yongs su rdzogs par rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe glegs bam 'di bzhin du sems shing /_su zhig 'di bzhin du mchod pa bgyid na gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//
[\[88b.3\]]yang cho ga gzhan te su zhig bde ba thams cad thob par 'tshal ba des/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i phyag rgya dgu pa bcings la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/til nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_mer bsregs na ci 'tshal ba 
[\[88b.4\]]bzhin du 'grub bo/_/ci nas rgyal po dga' bar bgyi 'tshal na des rgyal po gnas pa na mchis pa'i shing las lcug ma blangs te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis la/_rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba der bor na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sems can sdig pa can 
[\[88b.5\]]rnams dang /_dgra rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na/_des shing ni ma pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_mer bsregs na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yang cho ga gzhan te lha dang /_'byung po ma dul ba de'i slad du/_gu gul dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod 
[\[88b.6\]]bgyis te mer bsregs na/_'byung po thams cad bdag nyid tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang du nad byung na chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis te/_der ba mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/_mer bsregs na nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mar de nyid 
[\[88b.7\]]las nyung zhig nad pa la blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon yul ko bi nar nad byung ste/_nad pa rnams gdugs gcig gnyis bro 'tshal nas gum mo/_/de'i tshe dbus kyi yul gyi mi bden gyur ces bgyi ba der mchis te/_des gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga bgyis nas bsgrags pa 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]dang /_nad chad do/_/'byung po'i rgyal po yang yul de nas byung ngo /_/thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i stobs 'tshal te/_gang du rang gi 'khor du pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mchi ba der thog ma'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bcings la bcangs la/_gsang sngags lan 
[\[89a.2\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_dgra bo chom rkun rnams bdag nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig tshe zad pa des 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi/_nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa bgyi/_a ga ru nag po'i bdug pas bdugs par bgyi 
[\[89a.3\]]zhing /_gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang zhig bu mi phyin na ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/_de la blud na zhi ba dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gang bskyed pa'i bu dang /_bu mo dag kyang yongs su 
[\[89a.4\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo bzang po sngon gyi bsod nams rnams kyis brgyan cing /_sems can rnams dga' ba dang /_mir skyes pa na rtag tu mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing bde ba mchog rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig mig na ba des mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bcings 
[\[89a.5\]]la gzungs sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgyas mig la phyag rgyas btab na sos par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar steng gi phyogs kyi lha bde ba myong ba rnams mthong ba de lta bu'i mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/da ni ri mo bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/_ri mo bri ba'i ched du ras dkar po 
[\[89a.6\]]bgyis la/_byang chub sems dpa' mdog 'dzam bu'i gser lta bu bri bar bgyi'o/_/lag pa stong dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/lag pa so so'i lag mthil na mig re re mchis par bgyi ste/_spyin ma mchis pa'i tshon gyis bri bar bgyi'o/_/tshon rtsi yang ka pid tha dang 
[\[89a.7\]]bsre bar bgyi'o/_/mgo la rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan bri bar bgyi'o/_/yan lag dang /_nying lag rnams su rgyan gyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o/_/yang na ras la byang chub sems dpa' srid du khru gang pa bris te/_lag pa gnyis bri bar bgyi'o/_/gong du smos pa'i 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya lnga pas/_rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o/_/gal te lag pa dang /_mig stong dang ldan par ma gyur na/_dpral bar mig gcig bgyi'o/_/yang 'di ni cho ga gzhan te/_su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mchod par 'tshal na/_thog 
[\[89b.2\]]mar ras la bri bar bya'o/_/de ni 'di ltar bri bar bgyi ste/_cho ga snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/_/de nas ri mo mkhan bslab pa brgyad bzung ba chab khung sar mchis te/_slar log nas legs par bkrus pa gtsang mas bri bar bgyi'o/_/tshon rtsi rung bas 
[\[89b.3\]]cho ga bzhin bris la/_de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchis te/_der smyung ba bgyis la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod pa'i las rgya cher bgyis na/_de na gnas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste/_de la the tshom mi bgyi'o/_/slad kyis zla ba dang /_nyi ma lta bu'i 
[\[89b.4\]]'od kyang bgyid do/_/gang dge ba dang dad pas mi bgyid pa des ma gtogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byung ba'i tshe yang bdag gis bdud 'dul ba'i lus mig stong dang ldan pa sprul pa'o/_/
[\[89b.5\]]mig re re las kyang sangs rgyas re re sprul te/_de dag ni bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba lags so/_/lag pa stong las lag pa re re la yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re sprul to/_/de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong 'byung ba lags so/_/bdud 
[\[89b.6\]]'dul ba'i tshogs kyi nang na/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni thams cad kyi mchog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas 
[\[89b.7\]]par bshad na/_bskal pa 'das kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das la gsang sngags 'di thos nas rab tu dga' ste/_yi rangs nas bzung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs sngags 'di brjod do/_/na mo rat+na rash+mi tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra mArga te dza puN+ya tsak+Shu ra pi Sha ya rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_rat+na rat+na/_ta ta sha rat+na/_rat+na pra ti ma te/_rat+na pra b+hA rat+na da ka te swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags 
[\[90a.2\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di brjod nas/_de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la thug gi bar du/_rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/'og min gyi lha'i ris na/_dbang 
[\[90a.3\]]phyug chen po yang mi bde bar gyur to/_/lha'i gnas der 'jigs pa chen po yang byung ngo /_/ngan song du gyur pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po rnyed do zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing /_phar 'bros tshur 'bros te/_gar song mi shes so/_/de'i tshe sprul pas ngan song du gyur pa'i 
[\[90a.4\]]'khor chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'da' zhing 'gras par byed na mgo bo rdul phra rab bzhin du 'gyes so/_/gsang sngags 'di'i mthus ni ri 'thor ro/_/rgya mtsho chen po skems so/_/lha ma yin gyi dmag pham par bgyid do/_/'byung 
[\[90a.5\]]po rnams tshar gcod do/_/sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyang tshar gcod do/_/nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid do/_/yul bsrungs par yang 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyang phyag 'tshal lo/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 
[\[90a.6\]]'dzin pa de'i gzi brjid dang /_stobs yun thung dus bshad par mi nus so/_/gzungs sngags 'di 'chang zhing brjod pa ni dpa' bar 'gyur ro/_/phyug pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pa dang /_dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po byams par 'gyur ro/_/ci 
[\[90a.7\]]'tshal ba thams cad 'grub bo/_/su zhig bdud pham par bgyid par 'tshal ba des bdug pa gtsang ma la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/su zhig 'di snyam du bdag la sems can thams cad byams par 'tshal ba des/_so shing la lan nyi 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mchod na byams par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig bdag gi tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur bar 'tshal ba des/_shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la snying gar bskus na 'grub bo/_/las de dag la yang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod 
[\[90b.2\]]do/_/phyag rgya yang bcing bar bgyi'o/_/lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar la mthe bong gnyis brkyang ngo /_/phyag rgya 'di ni ji ltar bdag srung ba de bzhin du gzhan yang srung ngo /_/mtshams bcad pa yang bgyi'o/_/gang zhig tu mchin chab bam/_thal pa lag par blangs te lan 
[\[90b.3\]]bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la/_bdag gi steng du gtor na/_phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par yang 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'byung po rnams sam/_bgegs dang /_log 'dren rnams kyis mtho btsams par gyur na/_bal po se'u 
[\[90b.4\]]shing gi lcug ma la gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/_dal gyis bzhus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa ste/_bcu gsum pa'o/_/gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/_namaHsarba bud d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/_na ma 
[\[90b.5\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya bo d+hi satwa satwa s+ya/_na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/_bo d+hi satwa s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+hu pi d+hu pi/_kA ya d+hu pi/_pra sha ma ni swA hA/_log par lta ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar nus so/_/su zhig dus gsum du gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod pa des/_sangs 
[\[90b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/bud med du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mchi 
[\[90b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis de'i spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/_'di skad du bu ma 'jigs shig_/nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so/_/'dir skyes nas dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir 'byung po rnams kyis glags 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /_/'greng ste lag pa g.yon pa gru mo bkug pa drang por brkyang ste/_mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyi/_lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug la sor mo bzhis mnan te/_khu tshur 'di rna ba g.yas pa'i gong du bzhag la 
[\[91a.2\]]mdzub mo sgul bar bgyi/_brkyang bar bgyi/_bskum par bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i las rnams 'byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du smras pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du bcings la gsang 
[\[91a.3\]]sngags kyang lan bdun bdun brjod na/_mtshams med pa lnga po dag dang /_rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byang bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed na/_las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe tshe 'di 'dor 
[\[91a.4\]]ba na/_sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/dpag tu med cing mi zad pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lus la ltas rnam pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 
[\[91a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lus la gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/mig nad dang /_rna ba'i nad dang /_sna'i nad dang /_lce nad mi 'byung ngo /_/phyi dang nang gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las mi dge ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te char mi 'bab na til nag po 
[\[91a.6\]]la e raN+Da'i mar gyis sbrus te/_ril bur bgyis la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_mtshe 'ur stsal na/_de'i mod la char dbab bo/_/gal te char ches na yungs kar gyi mar gyis sna ma'i me tog sbrus la ril bur bgyis te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 
[\[91a.7\]]bgyis la mtshe'ur stsal na char 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/sor mo lnga phan tshun bsnol te/_g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams dam du 'khyud la mgo bo'i steng du bzhag ste/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'di ni stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]chen po'i 'jig rten du bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste bco lnga pa'o/_/phyag rgya 'dis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du smyung bar bgyi/_gdugs nyi shu rtsa dgu'i bar du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'dag gus dkyil 'khor byug_/me tog gtsang ma dgram mo/_/de'i tshe khrus 
[\[91b.2\]]bgyis la gos gtsang ma bgos te/_a ga ru nag po'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o/_/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'di ni ngar snyems pa bgyi'o/_/de nas yungs kar dang /_til nag po lhan cig btags la/_pho gsum gang tsam la 
[\[91b.3\]]lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhugs su dor ro/_/de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig cing /_yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'greng la rkang pa mnyam par nye bar gzhibs te/_lag pa g.yas pa thur du 
[\[91b.4\]]thams cad brkyang la bkan te/_pus mo'i steng du bzhag_/lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa stsol ba'i phyag rgya ste bcu drug pa'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcings la/_rtsa ba'i gsang 
[\[91b.5\]]sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na shu ti'i sa bon dang /_yungs kar dang /_shu dag dang /_nye'u shing dang /_'di dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga'am/_bla gab med pa'i phyogs su sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/
[\[91b.6\]]gsang sngags lan sum cu gnyis bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pas mchod par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsang sngags kyi cho ga lags te/_ci rtsom pa thams cad de bzhin du 'grub bo/_/gsang sngags gang mi 'grub na/_gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na 
[\[91b.7\]]'grub bo/_/rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal na/_gsang sngags 'di yang brjod cing phyag rgya 'di yang bcings na ci 'tshal ba rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa gang zhig dngos grub mi thob na/_gsang sngags 'di gdugs bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig kyang 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo/_/de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i khang par 'dug ste chos bshad do/_/der klu sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dag mthong nas/_
[\[92a.2\]]snying rje chen po skyes te/_gal te yongs su skyob pa zhig yod na/_sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de'i tshe der klu'i bu mo chos 'dod pa gcig gis rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed gcig rib cig phul ba dang /_des kyang sdug bsngal 
[\[92a.3\]]thams cad yongs su thar bar byed pa'i chos bshad do/_/de'i tshe der gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chu'i snying pos kun tu srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so/_/bi ma le ma hA bi ma le/_o ha re ma hA o ha re/_hu ma re ma hA hu ma re swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[92a.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di 'dzin na/_de gar mchi bar bdud kyi 'khor gyis sdug bsngal bar bgyid pa'i bar du bdag gis rtag tu kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig glo bur du 'jigs par gyur tam/_rang gi yul lam gzhan gyi yul lam/_
[\[92a.5\]]chom rkun dang phyir rgol ba dag byung na/_des tshon skud sna lnga pa bcing bar bgyi ste/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la/_mdud pa re re zhing yang gsang sngags lan re re bzlas brjod bgyis te/_lag pa g.yon pa la bcing bar bgyi'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang /_
[\[92a.6\]]gung mo dang /_mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs la/_mthe bos de dag mnan/_mthe'u chung brkyang ste/_dgra logs su bstan la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun tu srung ba'i phyag rgya ste bcu bdun 
[\[92a.7\]]pa'o/_/gsang sngags lan bcu bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/_dgra thams cad ldog par 'gyur zhing /_gnod par bgyid mi nus so/_/de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' gangs kyi ri la gnas te chos kyang 'chad do/_/der gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi yul na 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]sems can rnams phan tshun za zhing /_de dag la dge ba'i sems med par mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du nam zhig na 'dul bar 'gyur snyam nas de'i tshe der song ste/_yul der de dag gi don gyi phyir lag pa stong dang ldan zhing mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus sprul nas 
[\[92b.2\]]des bdud rnams pham par byas so/_/der gzungs sngags 'di yang smras so/_/de nas srin po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gan du song ste/_las de bshags nas phyag byas so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang phyag rgya bcu bdun gyis phyag rgyas btab pa dang /_de'i mod 
[\[92b.3\]]la byang chub kyi lam thob bo/_/'greng ste rkang pa phan tshun nye bar gzhibs la snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung phan tshun bsnol lo/_/g.yon pas g.yas pa la 'khyud par bgyi/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[92b.4\]]dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya yongs su rdzogs pa ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o/_/yid la bsam pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig ngan 'gro drug po dag gi sems can rnams skyob par 'tshal ba des/_'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/_sor mo bcu rtse 
[\[92b.5\]]sprad la lag rting dbye/_sor mo'i bar yang sor gnyis gnyis tsam gyis ma phrad par bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongs su thar bar bgyid cing /_'gro ba drug po dag tu zhugs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bgyi ste/_phyag rgya de'i cho ga'o/_/yang 
[\[92b.6\]]skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa pus mo'i steng du lag mthil bkan te bzhag par bgyi'o/_/g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la/_lag mthil pus mo'i steng du kha phub ste gzhag par bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[92b.7\]]dbang phyug gi dam tshig yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya ste bcu dgu pa'o/_/'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa dang mtshungs te/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyag rgya 'di gcig pus sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes so/_/phyag rgya 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'dis las mi dge ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sgrub pa po skyil mo krung bcas te mchis pa la chos rnams mngon du gda' bar ma gyur na/_gdugs bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i phyogs kyi gnas su phyag rgya 'dis gzungs 'di brjod la shin tu dad pas 
[\[93a.2\]]sangs rgyas la phyag bgyi zhing /_gdugs mtshan drug tu las rnams so sor bshags na/_de'i tshe chos mdun du gda' bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/yang lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs la g.yas pa'i 
[\[93a.3\]]sor mo bzhis g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs te/_cung zhig mchis la g.yas pa'i mdzub mos g.yab bo/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rnam pa rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste nyi shu pa'o/_/gsang sngags ni 'di 
[\[93a.4\]]lags te/_oM ku Te ku Te/_ku na re tsi le tsi le/_tsi li le swA hA/_gsang sngags 'di dang /_phyag rgya 'di ni lhag par rgya che ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ci rtsom pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal na/_gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 
[\[93a.5\]]bgyis na/_yid la ci bsams pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du goms par bgyid na/_las rnams byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems mi bskyud do/_/rmi lam bzang po dpal du 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs 
[\[93a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du mthong zhing /_byang chub tu lung ston par rmi bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'greng ste rkang pa phan tshun bsnyen la/_lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug ste/_sor mo 
[\[93a.7\]]bzhis khu tshur bcangs la snying gar bzhag_/g.yas pa yang de bzhin bgyis la/_rna ba g.yas pa'i steng du bzhag ste/_mdzub mos g.yab bo/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lha dang /_klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad po dag 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/_nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/_/gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/_na mo ni gan+d+ha/_na mo dar+sha na swA hA/_na mo ni rdza la swA hA/_e h+ye hi swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyag rgya 'di dang /_gsang sngags 'di 'dzin tam/_'don tam/_
[\[93b.2\]]klog pa tshe rabs bdun dran par 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro/_/dug kyang gdug par mi 'gyur ro/_/lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so/_/rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/bskal pa mang por sems can dmyal bar mi mchi'o/_/sdug 
[\[93b.3\]]bsngal nyams su mi myong ngo /_/gang brjod par 'byung po rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhags te/_gsang sngags 'di nyan par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi drung du 'byung po mchi ba der skud pa dkar po gdags par bgyi ste/_mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bor la/_mdud pa re re la yang lan 
[\[93b.4\]]re bzlas brjod bgyis te mgul du btags na bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te yul du yams kyi nad byung ste/_sems can mang du 'gum na/_rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal nas pad+ma dag bslangs la/_pad+ma re re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_bsregs pa 
[\[93b.5\]]bgyis na/_yams kyi nad 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong dang /_gung mo rtse mo sprad de/_lag mthil bkan la pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag_/g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i steng 
[\[93b.6\]]du kha phub ste bzhag go/_/sor mo gzhan bskyed la/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ste/_nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/_/ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo/_/sdug bsngal las 
[\[93b.7\]]thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis mtshams med pa lnga po'i las dag bgyis pa/_sdig pa re re'i phyir yang /_dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i rdul phra rab mtha' dag re re'i bskal bar sems can dmyal bar mchi 'tshal la/_'byung ba ni nges par mchis par gyur na/_des 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]de'i tshe ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la/_zas mi 'tshal bar phyag rgya 'di bcings la/_gsang sngags 'di yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_sngon gyi las kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang bar 
[\[94a.2\]]bgyid nus par 'gyur te/_lhag ma lus pa ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma mchis so/_/yang 'greng ste lag pa g.yon pas rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong chang par bcug la/_lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag mthil nas bzung ste/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 
[\[94a.3\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ste/_nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/_/dpag tshad stong gi phyogs su mchi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis so/_/gsang sngags ni dben par mchis 
[\[94a.4\]]la bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/yang lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan la/_g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/_sor mo lhag ma gsum gsum mchis pa brkyang la/_lag mthil du bkug ste/_spyi bor bzhag la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 
[\[94a.5\]]lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_dbang gi phyag rgya ste/_nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/_/'gro ba la dbang ba 'thob bo/_/yang thal mo reg par sbyar te/_thal mo'i nang khog stong du bgyis la mdzub 
[\[94a.6\]]mo gnyis kyis g.yab bo/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po'i snying po las spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya ste/_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/_/gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/_oM A ro li ka trai lo kya bi dza ya/_sarba sha truM pra ma tha na sa ra ya su waM phaT m+ta swA hA/_byang 
[\[94a.7\]]chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /_mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo rdzogs so//_//
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]{D691}]@##/_/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[94b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i po Ta la'i steng /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang rin po che bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor na nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rin po che'i seng 
[\[94b.3\]]ge'i gdan rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis 'khor bar bkod cing dpyangs pa la bzhugs te/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas/_kun 'dzin zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs 
[\[94b.4\]]med pa dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman mngon par 'phags pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[94b.5\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 
[\[94b.6\]]snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[94b.7\]]dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/_/gzhan yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa'i sa bcu spyad pa tshad med grangs med pa dag dang thabs cig ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]tshangs ris kyi lha tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i bu k+ShaN+Da ma ra ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang lha dang lha'i bu tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i bu kuM b+ha ka ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i 
[\[95a.2\]]rgyal po tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[95a.3\]]la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_klu'i rgyal po chen po ri'i dpal ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu mo tshad med pa snyed dang thabs cig ste/_lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mig ces bya ba ni gtso mor gyur to/_/gzhan yang nam mkha'i lha dang /_
[\[95a.4\]]chu bo dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha dang /_chu mig gi lha dang /_chu klung gi lha dang /_sman gyi lha dang /_ljon shing gi lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_khang khyim gyi lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_me'i lha dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_sa'i lha dang /_ri'i lha dang /_gzhal med khang la 
[\[95a.5\]]sogs pa'i lha tshad med pa snyed kyang so so nas 'dus shing lhags par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du gsang ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyis 'od zer bkye bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang /_stong gsum 
[\[95a.6\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to/_/lha'i gzhal med khang rnams dang /_klu'i khang khyim rnams dang /_lha'i gtso bo rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_chu bo dang /_mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho chen po 
[\[95a.7\]]dang /_ri khor yug dang /_ri rab lhun po dang /_sa'i ri dang /_ri nag po rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_nor bu dang /_me dang /_rgyu skar dang /_gza'i 'od rnams kyang zil gyis mnan te mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal pos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang /_sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di dag sus bkye lags zhes 
[\[95b.2\]]gsol nas/_tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/_deng ni su zhig mngon par sangs rgyas na/_/'di ltar 'od zer chen po rab bkye bas/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gser gyi mdog tu gyur/_/stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang de bzhin lags/_/deng ni su zhig rang dbang 
[\[95b.3\]]thob gyur na/_/ya mtshan rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu bkye nas/_/mtha' med sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab g.yos shing /_/lha klu gzhal med khang rnams mi bder gyur/_/su yi mthu lags rgyu rkyen ma rtogs pas/_/'khor mang 'di dag the tshom 'tshal gyur na/_/bcom ldan 
[\[95b.4\]]'das kyi thugs rje chen po yis/_/rdzu 'phrul 'di yi rgyu rkyen bkas bshad gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed kyis 'di rig par bya ste/_deng 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa 'dir byang chub 
[\[95b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod pa de/_sngon bskal pa tshad med pa nas byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa/_gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa snyed shin tu bsgoms shing mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pas/_sems 
[\[95b.6\]]can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir gsang ste 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas 
[\[95b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje chen po'i sems zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags mchis te/_sems can mang po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba 'thob par bgyi pa dang /_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bro nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi ba dang /_tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyug cing 'byor pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su sbyang zhing bsal ba dang /_sgrib pa'i bgegs rnams dang 'bral ba dang /_chos dkar 
[\[96a.2\]]po'i yon tan thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_dge ba'i sa bon thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi ba dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bgyi ba dang /_re ba thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng bshad par 'tshal na/_
[\[96a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar dgongs te gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod snying rje chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags bshad par 'dod pas deng dus la bab kyis myur 
[\[96a.4\]]du smros shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nga dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su thugs dgyes par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[96a.5\]]mngon par dran lags te/_sngon byung ba'i bskal pa 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od stong gi rgyal po zhi bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des bdag dang sems can thams 
[\[96a.6\]]cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal nas/_phyag gser gyi kha dog can gyis bdag gi spyi bo la byugs te 'di skad ces/_rigs kyi bu khyod thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 
[\[96a.7\]]'di zung shig dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po byed par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/bdag de'i tshe gdod sa dang po la gnas pa las rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa tsam gyis sa brgyad pa las yang dag par 'das par 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gyur lags so/_/bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na sems rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pa'i slad du smon lam 'di skad du btab lags te/_gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la smin cing bde bar bgyid pa'i 'os su 'gyur yang dag pa zhig lags na deng 
[\[96b.2\]]bdag gi lus 'di nyid las lag pa stong dang /_mig stong tshang bar 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu lus las su ga pa stong dang mig stong tshang bar byung bar gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[96b.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'od zer bkye bas bdag gi lus la reg cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ma mchis pa rnams kyang gsal bar bgyis par gyur lags so/_/deng slan chad sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dag tu gzungs 'di yang 
[\[96b.4\]]dang yang du thos shing mngon sum du yang dag par blangs pa dang /_gzhan yang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang rangs pa tshad ma mchis pa bskyed pas bskal pa 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba phra mo las yang dag par 'das par gyur lags so/_/deng slan cad gzungs 'di rtag par 
[\[96b.5\]]'don cing yongs su bzung nas/_nam du yang mi bskyud par bgyis pa'i slad du skye ba thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma la rdzus te skyes pas mngal du skye ba'i lus blangs par ma gyur lags so/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge 
[\[96b.6\]]bsnyen ma'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gang la la zhig 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/_dang po kho nar bdag la smon lam 'di skad gdab par bgyi lags so/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la 
[\[96b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis 
[\[97a.2\]]sgrol bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog_/spyan ras 
[\[97a.3\]]gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 
[\[97a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog_/bdag ni ral gri ri la 'dzeg_/ral gri'i ri ni rang bsnyil shog_/bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na/_/chu tshan me mur rang zhi shog_/sems can dmyal bar bdag song na/_/sems can dmyal ba rang 
[\[97a.5\]]skams shog_/bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas song na/_/bkres skom dag ni 'grangs bar shog_/bdag ni lha min gnas song na/_/ngan sems rang ni dul bar shog_/bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/_/rang nyid shes rab che thob shog_/de skad du smon lam btab nas 
[\[97a.6\]]sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rjes su dran par bgyis nas/_de'i rjes la gzungs sngags 'di mtshan gcig la lan bdun tshang bar 'don par bgyid na/_bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad 
[\[97a.7\]]stong snyed du 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongs su bsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'am/_mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i tshig 'don cing 'dzin par 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bgyid na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag brkyang bar 'gyur bas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'tshal ba ji ltar smon pa bzhin du de dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad 
[\[97b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ngan 'gro gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na/_bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i 
[\[97b.3\]]rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnams su skye bar ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad 
[\[97b.4\]]ma mchis pa snyed thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na snying rje chen po'i sems kyi 
[\[97b.5\]]gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/_mi dge ba rnams dang /_sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus kyis yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi 
[\[97b.6\]]gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung bas gal te bud med kyi dngos po las yongs su gyur te/_skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na gdon mi 
[\[97b.7\]]'tshal bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/_/sems can gang la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang dkor 'phrog cing chud gson pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du byung bdag la 'gyod pas mthol zhing bshags 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]na'ang 'byang zhing tshangs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di bton pa tsam gyis de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ba lags te/_dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal zas dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor nor 'phrog cing chud 
[\[98a.2\]]gson pa de dag ni phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyan sngar bshags na gdod yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags la/_/thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams der gshegs nas dbang mdzad par 'gyur bas kha na ma tho 
[\[98a.3\]]ba'i sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang /_gang zag la skur pa btab pa dang /_chos la skur pa btab pa dang /_gso sbyong bshigs pa dang /_tshul khrims bshigs pa dang /_
[\[98a.4\]]mchod rten bshigs pa dang /_gtsug lag khang bshigs pa thams cad dang /_dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa sun par bgyis pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur 
[\[98a.5\]]lags so/_/rig sngags 'di la the tshom 'tshal ba'i dngos po gcig ni ma gtogs te/_the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na tha na kha na ma tho ba chung ngu'i las yang ba tsam yang yongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_kha na ma tho ba lci 
[\[98a.6\]]ba dag yongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang byang chub kyi ring ba'i rgyu ni bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi rig sngags 'di 
[\[98a.7\]]'don cing 'dzin pa de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 'thob par 'gyur zhing gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga len par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba de yang 'di lta ste/_gang zag de bkres pas nyon mongs te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dang /_mtshon cha dang lcag dbyug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_'khon mchis pa'i dgra'i sug par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_g.yul ngor 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_stag dang spyang ki dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i khar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sbrul 
[\[98b.2\]]gdug pa dang /_rtsangs pa dang /_sdig pa'i khar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_chab dang zhugs kyi nang du 'bying zhing tshig ste/_'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_dug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_byad stems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_smyos nas 
[\[98b.3\]]dran pa nyams te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ri dang /_ljon shing dang /_ngam grog dang /_g.yangs nas ltung ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi ma rungs pa'i byad kyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_log pa'i 'dre gdon ma rungs pas glags rnyed de 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[98b.4\]]bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_nad ngan pas lus la dkris te 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_cha ma lags pas bdag nyid la gnod pa bgyis te 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags te/_thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 
[\[98b.5\]]'dzin par bgyid pa de dag ni gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po thob par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_skye ba thams cad du rgyal po dge ba dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[98b.6\]]rtag par yul dge bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par dus bzang po dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par lus kyi dbang po tshang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lam gyi sems la goms par 'gyur ba 
[\[98b.7\]]dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims nyams par mi bgyid pa dang /_'khor rnams drin gyis 'dris zhing 'dum par 'gyur ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams rtag par 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par gzhan gyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_yo byad 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bdog pa rnams gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid la smon pa rnams bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang klu dge ba rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba dang /_skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thos par 'gyur 
[\[99a.2\]]ba dang /_yang dag pa'i chos thos nas don zab mo rtogs par 'gyur ba dag lags te/_lha'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po 'di dag thob par bgyid 
[\[99a.3\]]par 'gyur bas lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par bton nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste le lo bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras nas 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por 'dug nas sems can 
[\[99a.4\]]rnams la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/_'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di dag smras so/_/na mo ra ta na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA sa 
[\[99a.5\]]twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sarba ban d+hA na ts+tshed na ka rA ya/_sarba pA pa sa mu dro c+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba it+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/_sarba b+ha yeSh+tsa tA ra Na ka ra ya/_ta s+ya/_na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ta ba nI la kaN+Tha nA ma pa ra ma hr-i da ya mA par+t+ta yi 
[\[99a.6\]]Sh+yA mi/_sarbA r+tha sA d+ha naM/_shu b+ha tse ta naM/_sarba b+hU tA nA/_pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha kaM_/tad+ya thA/_A lo ke_/a d+hi pa ti/_lo ka a ti krAn te/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/_he ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/_he pri ya bo d+hi sa twa/_he ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA sma ra hr-i da yan/_e h+ye hi/_Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_pa ra ma 
[\[99a.7\]]mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka ku ru ku ru/_karma sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bi d+yA na de hi de hi/_me a raM ga maM ga ma bi haM ga ma/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra du hu du hu bIr+ya na te ma hA bIr+yan te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha re n+d+re shwa ra/_tsa la tsa la bi ma la mUrte Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/_dzi na kr-iSh+Na dza TA/_mu ku Ta/_a laM kr-i ta sha 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]rI ra/_laM ba pra laM ba bi laM ba/_ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha ra/_ba la ba la ma hA ba la/_ma la ma la ma hA ma la/_tsa la tsa la ma hA tsa la/_kr-iSh+Na bar+Na kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha/_kr-iSh+Na pAsha/_nir+g+hA ta na/_he pad+ma hasta/_tsa ra tsa ra ni sh+tsa re shwa re/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo ba bI ta/_e h+ye hi ma hA bA rA ha mu 
[\[99b.2\]]kha tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ra/_nA rA ya Na ba la rU pa be Sha d+ha ra/_he nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA ha la ha la bi Sha ni rdzi ta/_lo ka s+ya/_rAg bi Sha bi nA sha naM/_dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA sha naM/_mo ha bi Sha bi nA sha naM/_nirmo k+Sha Na hu lu hu lu/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_mu hu mu hu/_rA hu 
[\[99b.3\]]la rA hu la/_ha la ha lA hA re ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_bud+d+h+yu bud+d+h+yu/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_b+ho d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi bA ma s+thi ta ma hA siM ha mu kha/_ha sa ha sa/_muny+tsa muny+tsa ma hAT+TAT+Ta hA s+ya/_e h+ye 
[\[99b.4\]]hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra b+ha Na b+ha Na/_bA tsa sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bid+yAM sma ra sma ra twaM/_he b+ha ga ba na tA lo ka bi lo ka twaM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_da dA hi me dar+sha na kA ma s+ya dar+sha nAM/_pra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/_sid+d+ha ya swA hA/_ma hA sid+d+hA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/_
[\[99b.5\]]nI la kaN+thA ya swA hA/_bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA pA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_na ra siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA na ra siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/_badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma ha stA 
[\[99b.6\]]ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/_ma hA mA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/_tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_shaM kha shab+da ni r+N+NA da na ka rA ya swA hA/_bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/_bA ma skan+d+ha de shas+thi ta kriSh+NA dzi nA ya swA hA/_bA ma hasta byA g+h+ra tsarma 
[\[99b.7\]]ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/_lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_sarba sing d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_ku ru rak+Sha mu drA NAM swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sid+h+yan+hu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab par gyur/_phyogs 
[\[100a.2\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su thugs dgyes par gyur/_lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can rnams ni 'jigs shing dngangs nas spu zing zhes byed par gyur/_'khor 'dus pa mang po thams cad las kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha 
[\[100a.3\]]cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/_kha cig gis ni sa dang po dang sa gnyis pa dang sa gsum pa dang sa bzhi pa dang sa lnga pa thob par 
[\[100a.4\]]gyur nas/_sa bcu pa'i bar du thob par gyur/_sems can tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas gus par thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[100a.5\]]gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu chen po legs so/_/bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa tshad med pa snyed dag tu chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_gzungs rnam pa sna tshogs thos par gyur mod kyi/_sngon chad nam yang 
[\[100a.6\]]thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs chen mo'i rig sngags kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di lta bu thos par ma gyur na/_skyes bu chen po khyod kyis bdag la gzungs 'di'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad du gsol/_bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams 
[\[100a.7\]]shin tu thos par mos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa chen po la smras pa/_lha'i rgyal po khyod thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir de skad du dris pa yin pas/_deng khyod legs par nyon cig dang 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bdag gis khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_de ni snying rje chen po'i sems yin/_mnyam pa'i sems yin/_'dus ma byas kyi sems yin/_mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems yin/_stong 
[\[100b.2\]]pa nyid du lta bu'i sems yin/_gus pa'i sems yin/_dam pa'i sems yin/_'dres pa med pa'i sems yin/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin te/_de lta bu'i sems gang yin pa de dag ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste/_khyod kyis 'di 
[\[100b.3\]]kho na bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos smras pa/_bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams ni deng gdod gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa khong du chud par gyur pas deng phyin cad yongs su bzung nas brjed par bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo/_/
[\[100b.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa des byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyed nas/_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla 
[\[100b.5\]]bar yi dam yang dag par blang bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can rnams la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed de/_rtag par rig sngags 'di rgyun chad pa med par gdon par bya'o/_/gnas khang gtsang ma'i nang du 'dug ste/_
[\[100b.6\]]yongs su dag par khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_ba dan dpyangs mar me sbar te/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_zhal zas kyi mchod pa byas nas sems rtse gcig tu gtad de/_dmigs pa tha dad pa gzhan la mi dmigs par chos bzhin du 'don cing 
[\[100b.7\]]yongs su 'dzin par byed na/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od lha dang /_drang srong tshad med pa snyed dag der lhags nas dbang byed cing mngon rtags kyang ston par gyur la/_bdag kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis de la lta bar byed/_
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]lag pa stong gis ni de la yongs su srung zhing byin gyis rlob par byed pas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag ji snyed pa de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_mu stegs can gyi chos kyi cho ga dang /_smrang ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[101a.2\]]rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des ni 'jig rten na gdon dang nad rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa dag gsos nas 'tsho bar byed do/_/'dre srin thams cad la dbang byed cing lha'i bu'i bdud rnams kyang 'dul bar byed/_mu stegs can 
[\[101a.3\]]rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed do/_/gal te ri'am dgon pa na gnas te mdo sde kha ton du 'don pa dang bsam gtan sgom pa dang ri'i lha dang 'dre srin gnod pa byed pa dag nan gyis kyal ka byas nas sems mnyam par gzhag tu mi rung bar gyur na/_rig sngags 'di lan 
[\[101a.4\]]cig bzlas pa byas na 'dre srin de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te chos bzhin du bzlas brjod byas te/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed par gyur na bdag kyang de'i tshe dge ba'i lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_lag na rdo rje 
[\[101a.5\]]gsang ba pa rnams la rtag par de'i rjes su 'brang zhing yongs su srung ba gyis shig_/de'i nye 'khor na gnas nas mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du yongs su srungs shig_/rang gi srog gi dbang po bzhin du yongs su skyobs shig ces bsgo bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag la bsgo bar
