[\[101a.6\]]byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gis gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang /_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sme brtsegs lcags kyu can/_/stobs ldan shang ka ra dang sde brgyad dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis dbang 
[\[101a.7\]]phyug dang ni mthu chen dang /_/ku be ra dang ser skya'i bdag po dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis nor srung dang ni chu lha dang /_/dge rgyas dang ni pa ri tsi tra dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis sa sar ca dang 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ma hA ra/_/ku lan+tan+ta dang ni lngas rtsen dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis pi pa ka la'i rgyal po dang /_/dpal ldan pyi ta dang ni swar ha rA/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis tshangs pa dang ni sam ba ra/_/
[\[101b.2\]]gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtshe ma dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha/_/spobs chen dpal ldan dang ni sa ta na/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung 
[\[101b.3\]]dang ni/_/ma mo lha la sogs pa mthu chen 'khor/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang ni/_/mig mi bzang dang rnam thos bu dag kyang /_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis gser mdog rma 
[\[101b.4\]]bya'i rgyal po dang /_/sde dpon nyi shu brgyad dang drang srong 'khor/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis nor bu bzang po dag dang ni/_/sde dpon chen po sa 'dzin pu la pa/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis dga' 
[\[101b.5\]]bo dang ni bsnyen dga' bo/_/klu rgyal rgya mtsho dang ni e la'i 'dab/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis lha ma yin dang dri za dang /_/mkha' lding mi'am ci dang lto 'phye rnams/_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/bdag gis 
[\[101b.6\]]chu dang me dang glog gi lha/_/grul bum bdag po dang ni sha za dag_/btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed/_/dge ba'i lha de dag dang klu'i rgyal po dang ma mo la sogs pa de dag kyang so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang /_mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gnod 
[\[101b.7\]]sbyin dag gis kyang rtag par thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de la yongs su bsrung zhing skyob par byed pas/_gang zag de ri dang dgon pa na gcig pu nyal bar gyur na yang dge ba'i lha de dag res kyi mtshan mos de la bsrungs nas bgegs dang bar chad yongs su 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]sel bar byed do/_/gal te gcong rong dag tu gnas te lam stor bar gyur pa las rig sngags 'di bzlas par gyur na de'i dbang gis dge ba'i lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po dag dge ba'i mi'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas lam yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[102a.2\]]ri dang nags tshal dang dgon pa dag tu gnas pa las chu dang me dag gis phongs par gyur na yang klu'i rgyal po dag gis yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang me dag mngon par sprul par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'don 
[\[102a.3\]]cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir shin tu bsil ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las/_/stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang /_/rtsangs pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad 
[\[102a.4\]]gyur kyang /_/gzungs 'di 'don pa thos na gnod mi nus/_/gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/_/gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po nya dang ru sbal dag_/gzungs 'di thos na so sor 'byer bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig g.yul sprod 
[\[102a.5\]]dgra yis bskor ba'am/_/chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'phrog pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/de dag brtse sems bskyed nas ldog par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thogs pa dang /_/lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud 
[\[102a.6\]]ba'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/rgyal pos brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig byad stems dug mda'i khyim zhugs te/_/zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 
[\[102a.7\]]bzlas na/_/dug nyid zil dang ra zas skom nyid du 'gyur/_/bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe/_/bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/_/klu 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas/_/tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nye tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/_/klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang /_/shu 'bras mi bzad 
[\[102b.2\]]rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas nas/_/mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi/_/sems can rtog pas mi dge bskyed pas na/_/byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtses pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i 
[\[102b.3\]]gzungs bzlas na/_/stems gnod de kun gtong ba'i mi la 'du/_/sdig 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa na/_/'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log pas/_/khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas/_/nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/_/
[\[102b.4\]]gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/_/bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/_/bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yong mi 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas te tshon sna lnga'i 
[\[102b.5\]]skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdud nas mgul du gdags par bya'o/_/gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag 
[\[102b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag myur du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /_nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag 'bras bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir 
[\[102b.7\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drang srong gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag myur du sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sems can gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la dad pa'i dbang po ma thob pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyi 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mthus theg pa chen po'i sa bon dang chos kyi myu gu 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang /_byams pa dang snying rje'i mthus de dag gis ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'byor bar byed do/_/gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[103a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi gnas su ngan 'gro gsum po'i sems can ji snyed gnas pa dag bdag gi rig sngags 'di thos par gyur na thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni myur du thob par 'gyur la/_sa 
[\[103a.3\]]bcu pa'i bar du yang ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du'ang phyin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad brgyad cu yang rang gi ngang gis thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs 'di rna bar lan cig 
[\[103a.4\]]thos par gyur tam/_gzungs 'di spyod cing yi ger bris sam/_drang po'i sems kyis chos bzhin du gnas par byed na/_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ma btsal bar rang gi ngang gis thob par 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri dang /_chu 
[\[103a.5\]]klung dang /_brag dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu ji snyed pa dag kyang g.yo zhing khol bar nus so/_/ri rab lhun po nas ri khor yug gi bar dag kyang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par nus so/_/de na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad bla na med pa'i 
[\[103a.6\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed par nus so/_/sems can gang dag tshe 'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par 'dod na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang /_tshul khrims la gnas nas gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas na gdon mi za bar smon pa rnams kyang mngon 
[\[103a.7\]]par 'grub par 'gyur/_'khor ba'i mtha' nas 'khor ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang sdig pa'i las thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyi rol na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang drang srong dang /_klu'i rgyal po ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kyis kyang mkhyen cing shes par 'gyur ro/_/lha'am mi gang yang rung ste/_gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs 
[\[103b.2\]]su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam/_rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na/_sdig pa'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu pad+ma las rdzus 
[\[103b.3\]]te skye bar 'gyur bas mngal dang /_drod gsher dang /_sgo nga las skye ba'i lus len par mi 'gyur na len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i 
[\[103b.4\]]tshe rlung chen po langs te/_gang zag de'i lus dang /_spu dang /_skra dang /_gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de rdzi phyogs su song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/_de dag gi sgrib pa dang sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su/_
[\[103b.5\]]'byang bar 'gyur bas yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gis bsod nams dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/_/gzungs 
[\[103b.6\]]'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i kha nas ji tsam du tshig tu brjod par byung ba dge yang rung mi dge yang rung ste/_lha'i bu'i bdud dang /_mu stegs can dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin thams cad kyis thos par gyur na de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid du 'gyur 
[\[103b.7\]]bas/_de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed nas bkur sti dang /_rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gter nyid du rig par bya ste/_sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]bye ma snyed rnams kyis phangs shing gces par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni 'od can gyi lus kyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni byams pa dang /_snying rje'i 
[\[104a.2\]]gter yin par rig par bya ste/_'di ltar gzungs kyis sems can yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni dam pa'i chos kyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kun sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni bsam gtan dang /_ting 
[\[104a.3\]]nge 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams rtag par mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni nam mkha'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis sems can la blta ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni 'jigs 
[\[104a.4\]]pa med pa'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_lha dang klu dang dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni dam pa'i tshig gi mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'byung ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni rtag 
[\[104a.5\]]par gnas pa'i gter yin par rig par bya ste/_'jigs pa gsum gyi bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni rnam par grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can rnams kyis bshol bar mi nus pa'i phyir 
[\[104a.6\]]ro/_/gang zag de ni sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/_rtag par gzungs kyis sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad gso ba'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i 
[\[104a.7\]]phyir ro/_/de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod na nams kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su skyo nas tshe ring ba'i sman yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gnas su 'dug 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]nas mtshams yongs su dag par bcad de/_gos la sngags kyis btab nas bgo bar bya'o/_/chu dang zas dang spos dang sman rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste spyod par byed na gdon mi za bar tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te chos bzhin du mtshams bcad de chos bzhin 
[\[104b.2\]]du yongs su 'dzin par byed na thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de la mtshams bcad pa'i cho ga ni ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_sa la ri mo bris nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phyogs 
[\[104b.3\]]bzhir gtor nas mtshams bcad par bya'o/_/yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na 'du shes kyis gang du phyin pa tshun chad mtshams su 'gyur ro/_/yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[104b.4\]]gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/yang na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongs su 'dzin par gyur na rang gi ngang gis 'bras bu thob par 'gyur 
[\[104b.5\]]ro/_/gzungs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na/_'don pa dang 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas tshad med 
[\[104b.6\]]pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang dag sems can sdug bsngal gyi bgegs la yongs su 'dren pa'i ched du chos bzhin du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas ring por mi thogs par 
[\[104b.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/ci tsam du sems can snang ngo cog gi ched du bzlas brjod byas te/_de dag gi rna lam du grag par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na/_gang zag de dag yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'thob 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]par 'gyur bas brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sems dang lus gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i 
[\[105a.2\]]sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs mthol bshags te/_kha nas gzungs 'di myur du bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rgyun chad pa med par byas na/_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnon po shes rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas 
[\[105a.3\]]pa zhig yin na ni sa bcu'i 'bras bu yang dka' ba med par 'gyur na/_'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyis rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongs su gnyer ba tsam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang smon 
[\[105a.4\]]lam gyi mthu shin tu zab pa'i phyir dang gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na/_de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal pos yang dag pa'i chos kyis yul 'dzin cing /_
[\[105a.5\]]mi rnams bag yangs su bkod do/_/sems can stangs las mi gcod cing /_nyes pa byung ba rnams yongs su bskyabs nas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/_thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs sngags 'di 'don par byed na/_yul 
[\[105a.6\]]de'i gnod pa dang bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal bar 'gyur/_'bru rnams legs shing mi mang po bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra dag yang nas yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po mi bde bar gyur tam blon po chen pos rku bshams nas log par 
[\[105a.7\]]gyur tam/_rims nad byung bar gyur tam/_than chen byung bar gyur tam/_nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur na/_de'i tshe snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas nas de'i phyogs su kha bstan te/_spos dang /_me tog 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che'i bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus bskyed de/_gzungs 
[\[105b.2\]]kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di 'don par byed na/_phas kyi dgra rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar log ste so so nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing yul yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa'i sems kyis phan tshun gcig la gcig blta bar 'gyur/_rgyal bu dang blon po rnams kyang sri zhu 
[\[105b.3\]]dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur/_btsun mo dang slas rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/_lha dang klu dang 'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung zhing skyong bar 'gyur/_char chu dus bzhin du 'bab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang po rnams kyang rab 
[\[105b.4\]]tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur tam/_ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam/_'dre srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyim dkrugs par gyur tam/_mi ma rungs pa dag gis gleng skur btab nas rku bshams te 
[\[105b.5\]]gnod pa byas par gyur tam/_khyim mi che chung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur na/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byas nas 
[\[105b.6\]]gzungs sngags 'di lan stong tshang bar bzlas na/_gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di'i ming ci lags/_
[\[105b.7\]]ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/_rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]rnams las yongs su skyob pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/tshe bsring ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/ngan 'gro yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/smon pa rnams yongs su 
[\[106a.2\]]rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/sems kyi rjes su rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/_/sa gong ma rnams las myur du 'da' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya ste/_de ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[106a.3\]]bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci lags na/_'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming ni 
[\[106a.4\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces kyang bya'o/_/don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/'od stong pa'i mig can zhes kyang bya ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang gzi byin dang mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_
[\[106a.5\]]'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin yang thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus 
[\[106a.6\]]mngon du bstan pa yin pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyed dang tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_lha dang /_klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o/_/lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/_
[\[106a.7\]]sems rtse gcig tu ming nas rjod par byed na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur/_kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyed yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_tshe 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug por 'gyur bar 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lag la mchod pa bya'o/_/mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses par gyur na/_zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/
[\[106b.2\]]khong par nad rnams yod par gyur na/_rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/'dre gdon thams cad gdul bar 'dod na rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la 
[\[106b.3\]]mchod do/_/phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra gzhom par 'dod na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad las thar bar 'dod na 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa'i lag la mchod do/_/mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me 
[\[106b.4\]]shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/blo thabs mthon por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur 
[\[106b.5\]]du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na lcug ma thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lus kyi bgegs ma rungs pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/
[\[106b.6\]]thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod na bum pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/stag dang 'phar spyang dang dom dred dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod na phub thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal 
[\[106b.7\]]po'i bgegs las thar bar 'dod na dgra sta thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/bu dang bu mo dang g.yog 'khor gyi phyir ni shel gyi gdub 'khor thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+mo dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dod na pad+mo sngon po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du 
[\[107a.2\]]mthong bar 'dod na pad+mo dmar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/drang srong gi lam mngon par 'grub par 'dod na sprin sna lnga thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tshangs par skye bar 'dod 
[\[107a.3\]]na ril ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lha'i gzhal med khang du skye bar 'dod na pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs gzhan gyi dgra phyir rgol ba bsal bar 'dod na ral gri dang mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/dge ba'i lha 'dre thams cad dgug 
[\[107a.4\]]par 'dod na rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/lha 'dre thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na thod pa'i 'khar ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i lag la mchod do/_/
[\[107a.5\]]tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog dam pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/tshig gi spobs pa gya nom pa dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/dge ba'i lha dang klu rnams rtag par 
[\[107a.6\]]'ongs te srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/byams pa dang snying rjes sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'dod na 'khar gsil thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/sems can thams cad kyis rtag par phan tshun gus pas bsnyen 
[\[107a.7\]]bkur byed cing brtse bar sems par 'dod na thal mo sbyar ba'i lag la mchod do/_/skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du rtag par de bzhin 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]gshegs pa'i pho brang du gnas nas mngal gyi snying por skye bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod na sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/mang du thos pa'i shes pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i mdo sde'i glegs bam thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/
[\[107b.2\]]da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar du rtag par byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas 
[\[107b.3\]]spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/shing thog dang 'bru rnams grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/_/de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i cho ga stong yod kyang deng mdor bsdus 
[\[107b.4\]]nas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu yongs su dad pa'i sems kyis gzungs 'di zung la 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya cher yongs su spel nas rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/_/gzungs 'di khams gsum 
[\[107b.5\]]gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pas gzungs 'dis yongs su gsos na mi 'tsho ba gang yang med do/_/rig sngags chen mo 'dis shing skam po la btab na yang yal ga dang lo ma dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu skye bar 
[\[107b.6\]]'gyur na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i sems can la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams gsos na mi 'tsho ba'i gnas nges par med do/_/rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs dang mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pas bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[107b.7\]]pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa ma yin na tha na 'di'i ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur na mngon sum du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lha dang mi dang klu la sogs pa'i 'khor 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]mang po khyed rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di la skur pa btab par gyur na gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag la skur ba 
[\[108a.2\]]btab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzungs 'di la the tshom dang yid mi ches pa skyes par gyur na gang zag de ni phan yon chen po dang gtan du 'bral bar 'gyur pas bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ngan 'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i dus med de/_rtag par sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong /_
[\[108a.3\]]chos kyang mi thos/_dge 'dun yang mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 
[\[108a.4\]]dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad kyis rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas bka' yang dag par blangs nas mngon par sgrub par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi 
[\[108a.5\]]'od kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'dzin pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du rig sngags chen po 'di smras so/_/na mo bud d+ha gu ra be/_na mo d+harma ma ha te/_na maHsang g+ha tra yA Ni tri pu pi sA ta tam namaH/_rig sngags 'di bton na kha na ma tho ba thams cad yongs su 'byang 
[\[108a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_bdud spong bar byed/_bgegs rnams sel bar 'gyur bas lan re bton nas sangs rgyas la phyag lan re bya'o/_/de bzhin du nyin re bzhin dus gsum du rig sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag byas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye ba thams cad 
[\[108a.7\]]du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shin tu mdzes pa re re'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs 'di smras so/_/sin+ti te du soSh+Ta/_adz+nyA mi te atuSh+Ta/_si na khi ta ba li 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]tiSh+TA/_ya mi dz+nyA ta o d+huSh+Ta/_ku la ti maSh+Ta khiSh+Ta swA hA/_rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud byas te gang du na bar gdags par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa 
[\[108b.2\]]yin pas deng bdag gis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang /_bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang /_nad ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_
[\[108b.3\]]'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di ni yang dag par bden te mi bden pa ci yang med do/_/byang 
[\[108b.4\]]chub sems dpa' 'di'i drung du 'ong bar 'dod na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na byi la'i mgo rus bsregs pa'i thal ba sa gtsang ma dang bsres te/_'jim 
[\[108b.5\]]pa la byi la'i gzugs byas nas mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri gtsang ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du bcad nas sngags lan re gdon cing de'i ming nas lan re brjod na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/byad stems kyis phog par 
[\[108b.6\]]gyur na gu gul dang ga bur cha mnyam par byas te/_khron pa'i chu gtsang ma bre gang dang bsres nas bskol te phul gang tsam lus pa blangs nas/_mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sdig pa dang sbrul gyis 
[\[108b.7\]]zin par gyur na bca' lga'i phye ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi ma rungs pa dag gis rku bshams nas gnod pa byas par gyur na sa gtsang ma'am bag zan nam/_spra tshil la pha rol po'i gzugs byas te mig stong 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re brjod de lan re gtubs nas pha rol gyi ming nas brjod de/_bsregs zin nas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du byas na pha rol po dga' zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du gus pas bkur zhing 
[\[109a.2\]]byams par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mig nad kyis btab ste/_mig gi 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/_ldongs par gyur tam/_mi gsal bar gyur tam/_ling tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gis khebs te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/_a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu 
[\[109a.3\]]ru ra 'bru ma re zhib tu btags te/_'thag pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar du bu btsas pa dang /_khyi dang phag rnams bsnyen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de/_sbrang rtsi dkar po dang /_mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas mig la bsku bar bya'o/_/
[\[109a.4\]]'o ma de yang bu khye'u btsas pa'i nu zho rung gi bu mo btsas pa'i nu zho ni mi rung ngo /_/sman de sbyar zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_mig la bskus nas zhag bdun gyi bar du khang pa dben par rlung bsrungs na mig gi 'bras bu 
[\[109a.5\]]skye bar 'gyur bas ling tog sngon po dang dkar po bsal te gsal brgyas par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gdon rnams kyis btab ste myos par gyur na stag dang /_'phar ba dang spyang ki'i pags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bgos na sos par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[109a.6\]]gal te sbrul gyis zin par gyur na gang zin pa'i mi de'i rna spabs blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar glan na sos par 'gyur ro/_/gzer thabs ma rungs pas snying la gzer te 'chi la thug na ka pyi ta lag pa tsam chu gtsang ma phul gang dang sbyar te/_bskol 
[\[109a.7\]]nas phul phyed lus pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste cig car blud na sos par 'gyur ro/_/sman de yang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o/_/ro langs kyi gdon gyis btab nas rgyun ring du na bar gyur na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs te 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]snar bdug par bya'o/_/yang na ri bong gi rtug pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mid du bcug na sos par 'gyur te/_sha dang /_chang dang /_dku ba rnam pa lnga dang /_tshig ngan pa rnams bsrung dgos so/_/yang na ba bla dang /_yungs 
[\[109b.2\]]kar dang lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste nad pa'i khri'i drung du bsregs na gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'dug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzhogs phyed na zhing rna ba dang sna subs par gyur tam/_rka lag sdud mi nus par gyur na 
[\[109b.3\]]ru rta til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na ba'i mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bskus na yang sos par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur na til 
[\[109b.4\]]mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na gi'u si srang gcig chu phul do'i nang du bskol te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[109b.5\]]gcig sngags kyis btab nas blud na/_sdug bsngal zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na yang smran 'di 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/_/glo bur du snying ga gzer te mi bzod par gyur na de ni ro nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin 
[\[109b.6\]]pas kun tu ru dang pog dkar po ma grugs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_ci tsam 'byor ba byin nas glon du bcug na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/sha chang dang /_dku ba rnam pa lnga bsrung dgos so/_/mes tshig par gyur na ba lang gi lci ba dron mo la lan nyi shu 
[\[109b.7\]]rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/srin bu khong par zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po'i gcin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/tshabs che ba la phul gang blud na srin bu thag pa gcus pa bzhin 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]du rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shu chen byung ba la leng se'u hwa brdungs pa'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste shu ba'i steng du blugs na rtsa ba rang 'byung bar 'gyur bas mod la 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mig tu sbrang ma zhugs te na bar gyur na bong bu'i rtug pa 
[\[110a.2\]]btsir ba'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshan mo mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/lto ba na bar gyur na khron pa'i chu gtsang ma'i nang du lan tshwa ma grugs pa 'brum bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phul phyed 'thungs 
[\[110a.3\]]na phan par 'gyur ro/_/mig tshag por gyur tam/_mig tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/_ling tog byung bar gyur na ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/_de'i nang du khar ba'i dong tshe gcig mtshan gcig sbangs nas yang lan 
[\[110a.4\]]bdun sngags kyis btab ste/_mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshan mo 'byung 'jug gi tshe 'jigs dngangs nas mi bde bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du btags na 'jigs 
[\[110a.5\]]shing dngang ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang bral ba kho nar ma zad kyi bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim 'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na bal po se'u'i shing gi yal ga blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs 
[\[110a.6\]]te/_mgo mjug gnyi gar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzla zhing re re bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_de'ang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so/_/shu dag dkar po blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[110a.7\]]sngags kyis btab ste/_dpung pa g.yas pa la btags nas g.yul ngor 'thab pa dang 'bel ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma'am yal ga yang rung snye dum bur gtubs nas mgo mjug gnyis kar ba mar 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]yang dag pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dkar po dang ba zho bskus te sngags lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re sreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bya'o/_/nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing /_dus gcig la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na sngags mkhan de rang gis 
[\[110b.2\]]mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste/_bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bsreg par bya'o/_/gi'u wang srang 
[\[110b.3\]]gcig bai DUr+ya'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/_'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/_lus la bskus sam dpral bar thig le byas na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre srin dang mi dang mi ma yin 
[\[110b.4\]]pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_lag pa la bskus nas btson cha la byugs na btson cha rang grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyo shug 
[\[110b.5\]]chu dang me bzhin du mi 'dum par 'gyur na bya dur pa'i mjug ma blangs te/_'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams 
[\[110b.6\]]pa dang bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/lo tog dang 'bras bu rnams la srin bu zhugs te za bar gyur na sa'am thal ba'am/_bye ma gtsang ma blangs te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par 'gyur ro/_/chu gtsang 
[\[110b.7\]]ma la sngags kyis btab ste/_'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu la za ba'i thugs mi thub bo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_sha ra ma hA sha ra/_tu lu ma hA tu lu/_oM ku me ha ni sha pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la la 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas su phyin te/_mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na khyed kyis mig btsums nas lus drang por bsrang ste/_sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas mig phye shig dang /_lha rnams kyis lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa snod 
[\[111a.2\]]bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dgos par gyur na snod gtsang ma stong pa mdun du bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcug ma dang rnga yab dang lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o/_/chus gtor zin nas mig btsums te 
[\[111a.3\]]gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi ngang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bca' bar bya ste/_de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/_/zas zos zin nas mig 
[\[111a.4\]]btsums te sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyi lhag ma yang spang bar bya'o/_/zas zos te ltor mid nas kyang myur du 'ju bar 'gyur bas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo thos pa 'dzin par 
[\[111a.5\]]'gyur ba'i gzugs ni 'di yin te/_na mo bud+d+ha ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsang g+hA ya/_na mo A da n+ni ye/_u ka tsi du u ka tsi du/_ma ti la li/_la lu te na mi ti na mi swA hA/_gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor 
[\[111a.6\]]byas nas mtshams bcad de lus bsrungs nas khar ba'i lhung bzed chung ngu cig khron pa'i chu gtsang mas bkang ste/_mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags bzlas na gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba cig 'ong bar 'gyur bas 'ong ba'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems 
[\[111a.7\]]bde bar mnyam par bzhag nas sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na/_dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci yang med par 'gyur/_'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci yang med par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa rgyud 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba cig lhung bzed kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du shes pa skyed par bya'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/_bam po gnyis pa/_
[\[111b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis/_deng bcom ldan 
[\[111b.3\]]'das kyis bdag la lung bstan par mdzad pa dang /_bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba dang /_bcing ba mtha' dag gcad pa dang /_'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bar bzhed pa lags pas deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi 
[\[111b.4\]]ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/_dus tha ma'i sems can rnams yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di thos pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral ba nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dus lnga brgya 
[\[111b.5\]]tha ma la yul lam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin du yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags 
[\[111b.6\]]kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog cing 'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin rjes su dran zhing gzo ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin 
[\[111b.7\]]thams cad kyis gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig tu yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni phal cher sdig pa'i dri ma lhun stug cing bsod nams chung bas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na'ang 
[\[112a.2\]]'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/_deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams la rgya cher sman par bgyi ba dang /_sems can rnams la bde bar bgyid pa dang /_lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad par 
[\[112a.3\]]'tshal te/_bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la bsten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 
[\[112a.4\]]kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brnyes pa lags pas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang /_
[\[112a.5\]]yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na de dag tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_shes rab dang spobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas/_lha dang /_mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur/_gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' 
[\[112a.6\]]zhing thams cad kyis spyi bo btud de phyag bgyid par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur gang ci smras kyang rung ste/_thams cad kyis yid ches pas nyan par 'gyur lags te/_de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[112a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags te/_rang nyid kyi mthu ni ma lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang /_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bde bar bya ba dang /_las kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i ched du smras pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_ngas kyang deng ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas/_khyod byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog 
[\[112b.2\]]par mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa nas/_yum 
[\[112b.3\]]zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bas ri po Ta la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing /_sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi grub par bgyi bar bshams pa las/_de'i 
[\[112b.4\]]tshe bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis bdud mang po rnams btul nas thams cad so sor gyes par gyur pas/_gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams 
[\[112b.5\]]pa dang /_snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing lha dang mi rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa'i yum 
[\[112b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po che'i sngags 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo\u0f85 mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_
[\[112b.7\]]na mo ma hAs+thA maHprAp+tA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi ta saM g+hA ya/_sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka pra b+hA a ba b+hA si ta mUr+t+ta ye/_ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la a laM kA ra d+hA ra NI/_b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/_
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]sarba lo ka u pa sha ma nA ya/_bi bi d+ha mu kha sa ma be Sha biSh+Ta sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+hur+b+hu ba/_ma hA lo ka ka ra Na/_nA tha ma sid+he mi ra b+ha drA binA sha na ka rA ya rA ga dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka sha sa ka sa mA shwA sa na ka ra ka sarba pA pa durga te 
[\[113a.2\]]pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta sam+ba da na ka ra he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma lo ki saM b+hu ta ma hA kA ru Ni ka dza Ta mu ku TA laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/_ma Ni ka na ka sha ta/_badzra baiDUr+yA laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_a mi tA b+ha si na ka mA lA laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Na/_la ri tsa na ma hA du na/_na 
[\[113a.3\]]ran ri sha ta sa sha sra/_a b+hi la ShI ta kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/_bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/_bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/_ma hA yan+t+raM kle sha ka ba d+ha/_a ba bad+ha bi bi d+ha satwa saM sA ra tsA ra ka_/pra ma tha na/_pu ru Sha pad+ma pu ru Sha nA ga_/pu ru Sha sA ga ra/_pu ru Sha siM ha/_bI ra bI rA shA 
[\[113a.4\]]ya/_su yan+ta su yan+ta/_ba ra ba ra/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ma sa ma/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_pra shA sa ya/_pra shA sa ya/_gi ri gi ra/_bi ri bi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_mu yu mu yu/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_gA ya 
[\[113a.5\]]gA ya/_gAd+ha ya gA d+ha ya/_ha sa ha sa/_pra ha sa pra ha sa/_bi b+hi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/_bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i/_ha ra ha ra/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_du ru ti du ru ti/_ma hA man+t+ra du ru ti/_kar+N+Na sha ta par si ka b+ha ba bi sa na/_sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi sa twa bar da swA hA/_
[\[113a.6\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes 
[\[113a.7\]]med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/_/'og min gyi lha dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu 'jigs shing 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]dngangs par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen pos phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to/_/de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[113b.2\]]dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang /_'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag gi rig sngags las 'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar mi byed na/_de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad rab tu na zhing 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 
[\[113b.3\]]'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skems par byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do/_/yul 'khor rnams dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar byed do/_/'dre gdon dang /_nad dang /_sman gyi dug dang /_
[\[113b.4\]]srin bu'i dug dang /_log pa dang /_ma rungs pa'i mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do zhes smras pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang /_byang 
[\[113b.5\]]chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[113b.6\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni sgrib pa'i ri bo shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig nyan tam/_klog gam/_'don tam/_yongs su 'dzin 
[\[113b.7\]]par bgyid dam/_mthong bar gyur na/_de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang bar langs nas gus pa'i sems kyis yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gcig klog gam 'don par bgyid na/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su srung ba bgyid cing yongs su skyob par bgyid do/_/gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 
[\[114a.2\]]rgya chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/_gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing /_gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na smon lam 
[\[114a.3\]]rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/_ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/_rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du 
[\[114a.4\]]shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na/_gang zag de skye ba'i gnas bye ba brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur/_gang zag de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag 
[\[114a.5\]]la longs spyod par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/_btsun pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig rtag par spos sam me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[114a.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas/_gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/_gang zag de 'jig rten na 
[\[114a.7\]]mthar gyis mthu chen po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i gdong dang /_mig dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad la rnam par blta ste/_gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na byang chub 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas/_dri ma dang bral nas sa dang po dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid 
[\[114b.2\]]par 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab 'thob par 'gyur/_kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur 
[\[114b.3\]]lags so/_/gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang /_dbyar zla 'bring po dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]tshes gcig nas tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang /_tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te/_zas dkar 
[\[114b.4\]]gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'jim pa las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/_me tog dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[114b.5\]]pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar gtams nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed de/_rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems 
[\[114b.6\]]dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur bas rnal 'byor pas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las thams cad 
[\[114b.7\]]yongs su dag par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang /_dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na/_gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil dngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so/_/dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na 'bru rnam 
[\[115a.2\]]pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags so/_/gtsang po dang /_chab mig skams pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags so/_/bro nad kyis thebs pa thams cad kyi mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis 
[\[115a.3\]]lan bdun bsngags te sug pas bya bas na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la bltas 
[\[115a.4\]]nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu bsal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag mtshams dgum par 'tshal na rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te/_chos bzhin du gzungs 'di yongs su rdzogs 
[\[115a.5\]]par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du gdon bgegs ci yang ma mchis te/_mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig 
[\[115a.6\]]bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/_gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur/_smon 
[\[115a.7\]]lam rnams yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te/_gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan cig bsreg par byas nas lan brgya rtsa 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal na rtag par lcang ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_g.yar khar bcas na thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags 
[\[115b.2\]]so/_/gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te/_chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te/_yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/_drod dang /_dud pa dang /_'od byung gi bar 
[\[115b.3\]]du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/_/mtshan ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying gar yang byug par bgyi ste/_de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/_bdag nyid kyi lus 
[\[115b.4\]]bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o/_/de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sngar langs nas 'greng ste/_lus 
[\[115b.5\]]drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_rkang pa g.yas pa cung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o/_/sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste/_lag mthil du bzhag la/_mthe'u chung dang /_mdzub mo dang /_mthe 
[\[115b.6\]]bong ni yan par brkyang ste/_lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/_phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste/_'di ni lus kun sdud pa'i 
[\[115b.7\]]phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par 'tshal na/_phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin du grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gzungs 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]ni 'di lta ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwarA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a bat+ta/_a bat+ta/_pa ri bat+te/_e hi e hi swA hA/_de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan 
[\[116a.2\]]pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying gar bzhag nas sor mo lnga bsnol mar btang ste/_g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgreng ste rtse mo phrad par bgyis la/_mthe 
[\[116a.3\]]bo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/_'di ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'di'i bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thams 
[\[116a.4\]]cad dus gcig tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang /_kun 
[\[116a.5\]]'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to/_/gzungs ni 'di lta ste/_tad+ya thA/_sarba d+hA ra NI maN+Da la/_e hi e hi/_pra b+hA shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/_de la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig 
[\[116a.6\]]stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_slar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_spyi bo thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bo 
[\[116a.7\]]gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste/_chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrubs 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par grol ba brnyes pa lags te/_rig sngags ni snga ma dang mthun lags so/_/gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di bgyis te mchod pa bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur 
[\[116b.2\]]ro/_/de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_langs nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gung mo dang srin lag dang /_mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i 
[\[116b.3\]]tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du mnan te/_lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtshams su gzhag par bgyi ste/_'di ni mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[116b.4\]]khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa 
[\[116b.5\]]de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rung la cho ga 'di yang bgyir mi rung lags so/_/rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba gcig lags na ni/_ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[116b.6\]]lags so/_/gzungs ni 'di lta ste/_oM sarba tsak+ShuHka rA ya d+hA ra NI in+d+rA ya swA hA/_de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i 
[\[116b.7\]]lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te/_de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying gar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/_'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyid lags so/_/gzungs sngags ni 'di lta ste/_tad+ya thA/_a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_sarba duSh+Ta o hA ya ni swA hA/_de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 
[\[117a.2\]]'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprad nas/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bsgreng ste gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la/_de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste nang logs su phul ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs 
[\[117a.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/_'dis ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang /_chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/rig sngags ni snga 
[\[117a.4\]]ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/_/de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha klu sde brgyad dang /_'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo la reg 
[\[117a.5\]]par bgyis nas/_de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/_mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis drang por bsgreng nas rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyis la/_lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[117a.6\]]oM sarba de ba nA ga a na ri swA hA/_de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de/_
[\[117a.7\]]lag mthil bkan la mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_oM ma hA brah+mA ya e hi e hi swA hA/_phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na/_chab mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/_/yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o/_/chab mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sh+lo ka khri lobs par 
[\[117b.2\]]'gyur lags so/_/phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lags so/_/de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi 
[\[117b.3\]]nor bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas snying gar thal mo sbyar te/_mthe bo gnyis ka lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por bsgreng ste snying gar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na/_gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med 
[\[117b.4\]]khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par bsgrub pa gang lags pa 
[\[117b.5\]]des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/_phyag rgya 'di bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas/_bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su byang bar 
[\[117b.6\]]'gyur bas/_de'i slad du yon tan 'di lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa lags so/_/de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste 
[\[117b.7\]]mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen mo ni rgyab sprad par bgyi ste/_rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de la bcu gcig pa byang 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por bsgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i 
[\[118a.2\]]tshe gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsal bas/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/_rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/_/de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas 
[\[118a.3\]]sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying gar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_o~M sarba bud+d+ha sa ma ya e hi e hi brah+ma shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/_de la byang chub sems dpa' mig 
[\[118a.4\]]stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[118a.5\]]rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar bgyid pas/_rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te/_bre mo'i gtam rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o/_/gzungs las 
[\[118a.6\]]byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par mi bgyi'o/_/yongs su dad pa'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag nas skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g.yeng bar 
[\[118a.7\]]mi bgyi'o/_/gal te khe la gdu bas slad rol du gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/_sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yang dag pa'i yongs su dang ba dang /_chos kyi bsam pa gang lags 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]pa des bsgom par mi bgyid na/_bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/_nams kyang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/_rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par 
[\[118b.2\]]bsrungs nas dku ba rnam pa lnga dang /_sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o/_/gal te dbyen tshig dang /_g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang /_phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag 'byung bar gyur na/_
[\[118b.3\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/_'di skad du ngas khyed spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[118b.4\]]cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum dang yang dag pa'i chos dang /_dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lags pas/_de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang /_'dre gdon 
[\[118b.5\]]thams cad dang /_mu stegs can rnams dang /_bi nA ya ka rnams dang /_khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang /_las gcig la gnas pa dang /_gtan du skyabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags pas/_'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par mi mdzad cing rtag 
[\[118b.6\]]par sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa dang /_lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis smod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/lam sun 'byin cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par 
[\[118b.7\]]gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang zag de dag nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/_de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/_de dag rang nyid kyis nongs skyon lags pas don de'i 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]slad du gzungs 'di yi cho ga dang /_glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi/_'don cing 'dzin du stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/_gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag par bsrung ba dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[119a.2\]]sems can la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/_yum gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so/_/chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[119a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i sems dang /_brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_rus pa dang /_sha dang /_
[\[119a.4\]]rtsa rgyus dang /_rkang dang /_mgo dang /_mig la sogs pa'ang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te/_chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par bsgrub par 'tshal na rin po che dang /_'bru dang /_dar zab dang /_
[\[119a.5\]]gos dang /_mal cha dang /_sman dang /_nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_slob dpon gyi bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[119a.6\]]sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[119a.7\]]brtson 'grus dang /_lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang /_rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing de dag dus 'di nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/_/dkyil 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/_ri'am/_chab mig 'bab pa'am/_nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/_nye 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad ni shing gi rtsa ba dang /_dogs ngan pa dang /_gyo mo dang /_gor ma dang /_rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te 
[\[119b.2\]]bsal nas/_dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang /_spos chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o/_/de la dbus kyi 
[\[119b.3\]]gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/_dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhi lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus su rin po che'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang pa 
[\[119b.4\]]cig bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/_/de'i rjes la gling gi grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[119b.5\]]gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan+dan dkar po las bgyis pa zhig gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gang par bgyis nas sngar grwa bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba 
[\[119b.6\]]re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o/_/shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni lha mthu chen po bri'o/_/lho nub mtshams kyi stan 
[\[119b.7\]]la ni tshangs pa chen po bri'o/_/nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni brgya byin bri bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang /_phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gling gsum pa ni zheng du khru do par bgyis te/_sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis te/_ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad du ma bu re re'i nang du yang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng 
[\[120a.2\]]du yang rdo rje tho ba dang /_rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang /_dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang /_gri'i phyag rgya dang /_ral gri'i phyag rgya dang /_dung gi phyag rgya dang /_chu gri'i phyag rgya dang /_zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang /_dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang /_gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang /_yid 
[\[120a.3\]]bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang /_gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang /_bi nA ya ka'i phyag rgya dang /_mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang /_'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang /_sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas phyag rgya de dag kun la'ang 'od 'bar 
[\[120a.4\]]ba dag bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri ba'o/_/nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lha bri'o/_/byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o/_/shar phyogs kyi 
[\[120a.5\]]chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te/_ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon 
[\[120a.6\]]shing dang /_me tog gi ljon shing dang /_rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o/_/chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang 
[\[120a.7\]]gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngogs zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa'i gcig dbus su kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam cig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas gzugs 
[\[120b.2\]]bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu bcu drug dang /_zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_zas dkar gsum dang /_shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_spos chab bre gang dang /_bum pa dar tshon sna 
[\[120b.3\]]tshogs dang /_me tog dang /_ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_me tog dang phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang /_mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_byug spos dang /_spos kyi phye ma dang /_de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang /_byang chub 
[\[120b.4\]]sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang /_dar tshon sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o/_/'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal sder dang /_snod spyad dang /_bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[120b.5\]]khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma yang rung lags so/_/'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o/_/gdan dang me tog 
[\[120b.6\]]sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o/_/'bras sA lu'i me tog dang /_yungs kar dang /_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/_/zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par 
[\[120b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/sngags mkhan de yang 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byugs te/_gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/_/zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan+dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_ga bur la sogs pa bsres te/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o/_/nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs gzhag pa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems 
[\[121a.2\]]dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/_/gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas gdugs nyi shu rtsa 
[\[121a.3\]]gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor kyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/_gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/_sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs 
[\[121a.4\]]rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin tu bstan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab nas 
[\[121a.5\]]g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/_thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad sgrib cing mchod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam du 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/_tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus 
[\[121a.6\]]po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/_de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/_lus bstan nas mchi ba'i 
[\[121a.7\]]tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/_dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang zhig smon ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas/_de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_gzungs 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]dang ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang /_gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya dang /_sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang /_'dre gdon thams cad gdul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/de ltar smon pa 
[\[121b.2\]]rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'i/_gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni bal ras sam/_btso ras la ri mo bris te bgyis na'ang rung lags so/_/smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[121b.3\]]gru bzhi pa bgyis la a ga ru bsreg ste/_lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis na/_smon pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te 
[\[121b.4\]]skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o/_/yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas/_lan re zhugs kyi nad du dor ba lan 
[\[121b.5\]]stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dga' bar 
[\[121b.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na shing khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba len brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so/_/'dre gdon
