[\[121b.7\]]gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na gu gul dang /_yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/_/yul phyogs su 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]rims nad byung bar gyur na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/_ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[122a.2\]]yang na chab nyung zad cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/_gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi 
[\[122a.3\]]ba'i dus bgyid par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bram ze tsin ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/_cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas thams cad zhi bar gyur te/_rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po'ang de'i 
[\[122a.4\]]tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/_chom rkun dang /_'khrug pa byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/_rig sngags lan brgya rtsa 
[\[122a.5\]]brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshe rabs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 
[\[122a.6\]]phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/_gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ga ru bsregs te/_rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[122a.7\]]sngon yul bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag cig gnas pa las bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/_lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon pa dang /_khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]ba las khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do/_/de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig dang /_khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[122b.2\]]smras nas/_de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang /_gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/_lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa las/_deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya 
[\[122b.3\]]thub par 'gyur pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shug rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/_khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun la phul bas cho ga 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[122b.4\]]mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/_/sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags te dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal te/_phyag rgya bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon 
[\[122b.5\]]pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so/_/bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe/_sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/_chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal na nges par bde 
[\[122b.6\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/_dge ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/_rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par du 
[\[122b.7\]]'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/_sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]btab par gyur na mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur la/_rgyu dang rkyen des gang zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur bas lha rnams gsal bar mthong zhing longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang 
[\[123a.2\]]ldan pa'i gzugs 'dri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar po khru bcu drug pa'am/_khru nyi shu pa'ang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gser gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/_gdong la mig gsum mchis pa sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil 
[\[123a.3\]]du'ang mig re re bri'o/_/sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mchis te/_sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni snying gar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do/_/sug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i tho ba thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni glegs 
[\[123a.4\]]bam thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni 'khar gsil thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor lo thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni pad+ma kha bye ba thogs so/_/yang 
[\[123a.5\]]gcig gis ni zhags pa thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni lcang ma'i lcug ma thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do/_/yang gcig gis ni bgrang phreng thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni ril ba thogs so/_/yang gcig gis ni zil dngar 
[\[123a.6\]]yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to/_/yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshogs 'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/_/yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so/_/sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 
[\[123a.7\]]po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/_sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang /_phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas/_kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya brkyang ba nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/_so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/_ji skad du 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/_/lag ngar la ni gdub 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan to/_/lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/tshon rtsi de dag gi nang du ko 
[\[123b.2\]]ba'i sbyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/_/kun tu ru'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/gang dag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o/_/gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas ri mo 'dri ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor kun tu 
[\[123b.3\]]tsan+dan dkar po'i chab kyis dogs la byugs te/_dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe/_khrus bgyis nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/_nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/_/chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags 
[\[123b.4\]]nas kyang /_ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa zhig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/_ba dan dang /_me tog dang /_zhal zas dang /_zas dkar gsum dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos chab dang /_
[\[123b.5\]]me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/_rnal 'byor pa dang /_ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams mthol bshags na/_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong 
[\[123b.6\]]lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas/_nyi zla zil gyis mnan te 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang /_tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/_rnal 'byor 
[\[123b.7\]]pa dang /_ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/_/cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]gtogs lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas/_bdud 
[\[124a.2\]]chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/_sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po rabs 
[\[124a.3\]]stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par gyur la/_mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i 
[\[124a.4\]]nang nas mchog tu gyur pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba legs so legs so/_/ngas kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par 
[\[124a.5\]]bya'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod 
[\[124a.6\]]pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[124a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang /_nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'og min gyi lha dang /_dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to/_/'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal 
[\[124b.2\]]chen po myong bar gyur pas/_ku co 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal bar 
[\[124b.3\]]'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyid cing rgya mtsho chen po skams par bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams srung bar bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma 
[\[124b.4\]]rungs pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin 
[\[124b.5\]]par bgyid na/_gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang /_smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[124b.6\]]bgyid do/_/gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/_bdag gis lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis 
[\[124b.7\]]btab ste/_g.yar khams bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o/_/bdag nyid spobs pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/_shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_snying gar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/_
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sug pa lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[125a.2\]]phyag rgya 'dis ni bdag kyang bsrung zhing gzhan yang bsrung bar bgyid do/_/phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/_mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas/_chab gtsang ma'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/_gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam/_thal 
[\[125a.3\]]pa snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/_de nyid mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang /_log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis 
[\[125a.4\]]gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i yal ga dang /_grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/_rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste/_mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so/_/rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/_na maH/_sarba bud+d+ha 
[\[125a.5\]]d+harma/_saM g+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_na mo badzra pA Na ye/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_si bi si bi/_kA ya si bi/_pa la sha pa la ni swA hA/_rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lta bu'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/_/
[\[125a.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang gdugs kyi gung dang gdugs bas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang /_bye brag tu gyur pa 
[\[125a.7\]]ma mchis pas nam du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/_tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan tu 'bral zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]byugs te/_khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/_tshe 'di nyid la yang blo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing /_'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[125b.2\]]gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo /_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i 
[\[125b.3\]]mthe bo lag mthil du bkug ste/_sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/_lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/phyag rgya ni gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas dus gcig gi tshe yang 
[\[125b.4\]]lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje bskyed par gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/_tshe 'das pa'i rjes 
[\[125b.5\]]la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/_gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang /_ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/_gzhan 
[\[125b.6\]]yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/_gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing lus kyi nad thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 
[\[125b.7\]]'gyur lags so/_/gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog pa'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/_ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_chab rdzing du bor nas dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brngos pa'i 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/_ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing bur bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[126a.2\]]kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sor mo bsnol mar btang ste/_g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/_khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/_/cho ga 
[\[126a.3\]]'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/_gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog phor 
[\[126a.4\]]thogs te/_a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/_lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di 
[\[126a.5\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so/_/gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/_pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar 
[\[126a.6\]]bgyis la/_gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na slad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng 
[\[126a.7\]]nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/_sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/_rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang shing kun dang /_yungs kar dang /_shu dag dang /_ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor te bsreg par 
[\[126b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/'di dag sreg pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/_dkyil 'khor ram/_gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/_sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis 
[\[126b.3\]]rig sngags la mchod par bgyis na/_ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag sngags 'dis btab nas thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 
[\[126b.4\]]'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/_/bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du grub par mi 'gyur na/_gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 
[\[126b.5\]]'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i nya chos kyi 'dun sar chos ston pa na/_klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar 
[\[126b.6\]]mthong ba dang /_klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_sems can mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che 
[\[126b.7\]]mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gcig phul ba dang /_bdag gis ni de la yum gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/_/bi ma le ma hA bi ma le u ha le/_ma hA u ha le/_hu ma le/_ma hA hu ma le/_sa hA le/_ma hA sa hA le/_tsi li te swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/_
[\[127a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/_bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi rjes su 'brang ste/_yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig brel 
[\[127a.3\]]zhing phongs par gyur tam/_pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/_chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/_dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[127a.4\]]sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang /_gung mo dang /_mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/_mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe'u chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/_sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[127a.5\]]sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te/_chos ston pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig 'tshal zhing dge ba'i sems ci'ang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang /_de'i tshe byang chub 
[\[127a.6\]]sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/_mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pas bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/_yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa 
[\[127a.7\]]dang /_de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas/_nongs pa 'thol bshags te/_phyag bgyis pa dang /_bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/_de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol mar btang zhing /_g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[127b.2\]]gcig bzlas nas/_cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/_thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyobs pa'i 'khor lo'i 
[\[127b.3\]]phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste/_'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/_lag ngar gyi tshigs dang /_lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o/_/sor 
[\[127b.4\]]mo rnams kyi bar yang tsho na gang tsam mchis par bgyis te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su 'das pa zhes bgyi ste/_'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur 
[\[127b.5\]]pas so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga char bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag go/_/de'i rjes la sug pa 
[\[127b.6\]]lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_sor mo lnga char kha sbub nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o/_/'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs 
[\[127b.7\]]par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/_phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do/_/rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/_sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon sum du bzhugs par yid la bgyis te/_gdugs mtshan gcig la dus drug tu mthol bshags bgyis na/_sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum 
[\[128a.2\]]du 'gyur zhing /_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sngar 
[\[128a.3\]]sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bo khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas 
[\[128a.4\]]pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_oM ku tsi ku tsi ku tsi ku tsa ya ri/_tsa ri tsa ri tsa ri le swA hA/_gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te/_
[\[128a.5\]]sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing snying gar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar gyur na/_sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/_sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa 
[\[128a.6\]]thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong bar mi 'gyur bas gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/_g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[128a.7\]]sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas/_rim gro bgyid cing yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang /_klu dang 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/_sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug nas/_sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying gar bzhag go/_/de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin 
[\[128b.2\]]du bgyis te/_lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas mdzub mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_na mo nI la kaN+Tha/_na ma Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/_na mo Ar+ya sha la swA hA/_e hi e hi swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang phyag 
[\[128b.3\]]rgya 'di len tam 'dzin tam klog gam/_'don par bgyid na/_myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/_sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro/_/dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 
[\[128b.4\]]'gyur/_rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/_nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/_'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye 
[\[128b.5\]]bar mchis nas/_rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/_skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/_sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de/_mdud pa bzhi bcu 
[\[128b.6\]]rtsa dgu tshang bar bgyis nas de'i mgul du btags na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yul gang du ltas ngan dang /_rims nad byung ste/_yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/_rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/_
[\[128b.7\]]pad+ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bsregs na rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/_sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/_sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i 
[\[129a.2\]]steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/_smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[129a.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs pa bgyis pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/_rdul phra rab de re re'ang bskal pa re re 
[\[129a.4\]]mngon par byung bar gyur na/_gang zag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar ltung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na'ang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[129a.5\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad byang 
[\[129a.6\]]bar 'gyur te/_gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/_de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_langs nas 
[\[129a.7\]]'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas/_lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]na/_dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na'ang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi bgyi'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sngar sug pa 
[\[129b.2\]]lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/_sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yan par bsgreng ste/_lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/_lus po che'i 
[\[129b.3\]]sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/_drang srong 'phur te mchi bdag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/_sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/_
[\[129b.4\]]lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas/_mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_oM a ro lika te le/_lo ki bi do ya/_sarba ya dru/_bra maR+d+ha na ka rA ya pu ru swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub 
[\[129b.5\]]sems dpa' de dag dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs 
[\[129b.6\]]pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[129b.7\]{D692}]@#/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_gos tshags 
[\[130a.2\]]bcos nas pus mo sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma du ma chen po'i tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis 
[\[130a.3\]]te/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs 
[\[130a.4\]]'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang /_yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs 
[\[130a.5\]]so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar bkas gnang ba dang /_
[\[130a.6\]]langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar stan la 'dug ste/_sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[130a.7\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsakra brti tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha te/_badzra b+ha ra/_A ka rA ya hU~M swA hA/_'di ni lus kyi sngags lags so/_/oM pad+me/_tsin+tA ma Ni/_ma hA badzra b+ha ra hU~M/_'di ni snying po'i sngags lags so/_/oM b+ha ra te pad+ma hU~M/_'di ni 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]snying gi snying po'i sngags lags so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /_sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[130b.2\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur bdud kyi rgyal po dang /_bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/_bdud kyi rgyal po'i 
[\[130b.3\]]gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/_gnod sbyin dang /_'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste/_sa la 'gyel bar gyur/_sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad kyang phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams thar te/_
[\[130b.4\]]lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe lta rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/_lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 
[\[130b.5\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/_rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can 
[\[130b.6\]]rnams kyi phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 
[\[130b.7\]]'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]bsnyen ma'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/_gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi bskyud par bgyis te/_gdugs dang dus mi 'dam 
[\[131a.2\]]bar gtsang yang rung /_mi gtsang yang rung ste/_g.yar ston du bzlas par gyur na bgyi ba rnams don dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/_/ci yang rung ste/_don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/_rig 
[\[131a.3\]]sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang bskrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'das pa dang /_da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang /_sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so/_/gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod 
[\[131a.4\]]bgyis na mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar bar 'gyur la/_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na/_las ngan pa dang /_gdon bgegs dang /_bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal 
[\[131a.5\]]lags/_gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba'am/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa'am/_bad kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par 
[\[131a.6\]]gyur na thams cad 'byang zhing sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis phog par gyur tam/_lhog pa dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdze nad dam/_phol mig gam/_rlung nad dam/_smyos pa'am/_klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mchu 
[\[131a.7\]]dang /_lce dang /_mid pa dang /_kha dang /_gdong dang /_gtsug dang /_klad rgyas dang /_brang dang /_rtsib logs dang /_snying dang /_lto ba dang /_rked pa dang /_rgyab dang /_rkang pa dang /_lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]par bgyid/_ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid lags so/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_bi nA ya ka dang /_bdud sdig can dang /_'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/mtshon cha dang /_dmag 
[\[131b.2\]]tshogs dang /_chab dang /_zhugs dang /_rlung dang /_char pa dang /_ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dgra dang /_chom rkun dang /_rgyal po ma rungs pa dang /_rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/glo bur du 
[\[131b.3\]]'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/_rtsangs pa dang /_sbrul dang /_sdig pa dang /_srin bu gyi med dang /_rkang mang dang /_gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par 
[\[131b.4\]]mi 'gyur lags so/_/g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/_gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags 
[\[131b.5\]]so/_/gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/_rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig_/ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/_thams cad khyod 
[\[131b.6\]]la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/_mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub sems 
[\[131b.7\]]dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri bo po ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur/_bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur bas rtag par 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]rgyal po dang /_blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/_skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/_bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_skye ba thams 
[\[132a.2\]]cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/_'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/_'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba 
[\[132a.3\]]lags so/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung 
[\[132a.4\]]ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/_thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi nor dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags so/_/de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa'i rin po 
[\[132a.5\]]che rnams so/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /_skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /_byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo 
[\[132a.6\]]dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtag pa gang lags pa'o/_/gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal 
[\[132a.7\]]na/_sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang /_gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung /_mi gtsang yang rung ste/_rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dbang phyug gi ming dang /_yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang /_gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/_gal te rgyal po'am/_rgyal bu'am/_btsun mo'am/_sras sam/_rgyal po'i bu mo'am/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_dmangs rigs sam/_gdol 
[\[132b.2\]]pa'am/_skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/_mu stegs sna tshogs dag la brten cing /_mdza' bar 'tshal na de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe/_bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o/_/gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer 
[\[132b.3\]]zhing rgyal po la brten par 'tshal na/_dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te btsun mo la brten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/_/rgyal bu la brten par 'tshal na lan brgyad 
[\[132b.4\]]brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/_/sras dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po'i bu mo la brten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/bram ze la brten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal rigs la brten par 'tshal na 
[\[132b.5\]]lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/_/dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o/_/gdol ba la ni nyis brgya'o/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o/_/khye'u gzhon nu dang /_bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni lan 
[\[132b.6\]]drug cu'o/_/'di ni brten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/_nor dang /_bran dang /_rta dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so/_/gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring bo na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na yid la bsams pa bzhin du 
[\[132b.7\]]rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so/_/gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas/_de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams 
[\[133a.2\]]stsol bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te sangs rgyas dang /_'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis 
[\[133a.3\]]na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing /_so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsal nas yongs su bsrung bar bgyid de/_zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang po dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang 
[\[133a.4\]]po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar bgyid do/_/bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las 
[\[133a.5\]]thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan 
[\[133a.6\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/_
[\[133a.7\]]gi'u wang dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum dang /_ga pur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_dzA ti pha la dang /_li shi dang /_ka ko la dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pal sngon po dang /_gser gyi gyim bag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/_brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te/_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdugs sam/_gos la bdugs sam/_mig la bskus sam/_dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/_lus la byugs na rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_blon po rnams dang /_bran rnams dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med la 
[\[133b.2\]]sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang /_lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_lus kyi zho sha dang /_nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtong zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/_brjod kyis mi lang lags so/_/ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong 
[\[133b.3\]]bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang /_chab kyis ded 
[\[133b.4\]]pa dang /_zhugs kyis tshig pa dang /_mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_dug dang /_'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/bsam pa thag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags 
[\[133b.5\]]so/_/sman 'dis bdugs pas bab chol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/_'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 
[\[133b.6\]]'khor lo'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 
[\[133b.7\]]'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/_ga pur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum zhib mor btags te/_gi wang dang bsres na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_chab gtsang mas sbyar nas ril bu che chung 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]shing mgo stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/_yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/_gdugs dang /_rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas ril bu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/_ril 
[\[134a.2\]]bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po'am/_b+l+lon po nye phan nam/_skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis bar gyur na bkur sti bgyis nas/_nor dang /_rin po che dag phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/_tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis 
[\[134a.3\]]yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/_sgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/khar sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[134a.4\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkram shing tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 
[\[134a.5\]]'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/_rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing /_yol ba dang /_blar dkar po bres te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang /_
[\[134a.6\]]snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o/_/lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan+dan dkar po bsregs te/_me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags 
[\[134a.7\]]na phyogs gang du mchi yang rung ste/_ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/_don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/_'di ni yid 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 
[\[134b.2\]]gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/_man shi ri ka ku shu dang /_pad+ma le brgan dang /_pad+ma sngon po dang /_rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang /_nya rkun ma nag po'i rus pa dang /_pa 
[\[134b.3\]]blas dang /_ka kun ban s+ya dang /_gi'u wang dang /_gur gum dang /_rgya'i gur gum dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/_brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma srang gcig mchis na gla rtsi dang /_ga pur srang phyed 
[\[134b.4\]]stsal nas zhib tu brdar te/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/_snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas sman de 
[\[134b.5\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas/_khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na mig dang /_klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang /_ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang /_sprin 
[\[134b.6\]]dkar dang /_mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_sprin dmar dang /_long nad dang /_klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so/_/rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gdugs gnyis stsal na lus 
[\[134b.7\]]kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gdugs gsum stsal na smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_lci ba bzhi dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_byad stems thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /_ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[135a.2\]]gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal 
[\[135a.3\]]na rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dag dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_srin po rnams 
[\[135a.4\]]g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' lding dang /_srin po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas/_byad stems dang /_'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur 
[\[135a.5\]]ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang /_'dre srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na an+t+rad nar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal 
[\[135a.6\]]na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas/_de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman 
[\[135a.7\]]zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/_mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]rnams phye ste/_nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na/_klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi 
[\[135b.2\]]lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du yang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi 
[\[135b.3\]]dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur la/_de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de 
[\[135b.4\]]dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[135b.5\]]bgyid do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du stsal na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/_gzugs 
[\[135b.6\]]kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongs su dag 
[\[135b.7\]]pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des/_bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing /_sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/_the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/_'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+dan de'i nor bu'i 'khor lo las mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[136a.2\]]dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo las mig gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/_nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[136a.3\]]kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/_dgra thams cad 'dul ba/_bi nA ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing /_byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/_sbyin sreg hom bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/_dog sa brkos te zhugs thab 
[\[136a.4\]]khru gang gru bzhi pa cig bgyis nas me tog ma len tsa su dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/_a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te/_thab tu bsreg par 
[\[136a.5\]]bgyi zhing sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste/_zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms zhing /_tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so/_/zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par 
[\[136a.6\]]hom gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen po nye phan dang /_skye bo phal pa rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 
[\[136a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_nyi zla'i lha dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur/_lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yangs su skong bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na yungs kar dang /_chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste/_gdugs gsum 
[\[136b.2\]]gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char pa 'bab par 'gyur/_gal te char ches te mi khums na thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/_gnam du gtor na char pa khums par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/_rlung drag po glo 
[\[136b.3\]]bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/_sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/_lus 'di spangs nas 'jig 
[\[136b.4\]]rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[136b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la zhig gis lan cig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 
[\[136b.6\]]'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 
[\[136b.7\]]khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/_/gang la la zhig gis sems 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bskyed de kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yin mod kyi ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/_nga'i tshig 
[\[137a.2\]]dag 'gal bar ma byed cig dang /_nga yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i 
[\[137a.3\]]sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing /_rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos grub stsal bar ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so/_/sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa lags pas/_gang la la zhig 
[\[137a.4\]]gis len cing 'chang ba dang rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/_bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab par bgyid pa lags 
[\[137a.5\]]so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /_'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches bas yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to/_/
[\[137a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/_sbyin sreg hom gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs 
[\[137a.7\]]pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lots+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]{D693}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[137b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_
[\[137b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/_de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang sdig 
[\[137b.4\]]pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[137b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrung ba bgyis pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba bgyis pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bgyis pa dang chad pa spangs pa dang /_mtshon cha spangs pa dang /_dug gzhil bar bgyis pa dang /_gang la la zhig 
[\[137b.6\]]'gal ba bgyid pa de ma mchis te/_de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis ma mthong ste/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[137b.7\]]ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/_bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/_thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin 
[\[138a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste/_de ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gces spras bgyid pa lags so/_/de ltar lags pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[138a.3\]]gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o/_/nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 
[\[138a.4\]]'gyur ba dang /_des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal po'i tshogs rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang /_lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang /_dbyig dug 
[\[138a.5\]]gis mi tshugs pa dang /_rims kyis mi tshugs pa dang /_mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /_chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus 
[\[138a.6\]]bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags so/_/gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 
[\[138a.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/_'di nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]man dA ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/_de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di bzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so/_/bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/_rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes 
[\[138b.2\]]kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so/_/gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang /_gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang /_chab dang /_zhugs dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas dang 
[\[138b.3\]]bskyab pa dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen bgyi'o/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyi ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[138b.4\]]gi snying po 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/_/lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur/_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/_ji skad bshad pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de dag 
[\[138b.5\]]ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bar 'gyur ba lags na/_bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang /_sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi'am bco 
[\[138b.6\]]lnga la smyung ba bgyis na/_de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 'dzin pa ni don mchis te sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so/_/bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid 
[\[138b.7\]]la gnas par 'gyur/_bro nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_sgrib pa thams cad dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba bgyid na de dag gi sug par sangs 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod 
[\[139a.2\]]par nus te/_/kyang snying po 'di gzung zhing rjes su yi rang ba byas kyis rigs kyi bu khyod smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[139a.3\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te snying po 'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byu ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_ar ha ta b+h+yaHsamyak+sa m+bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa 
[\[139a.4\]]rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me/_ku su ma/_ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/_'di'i cho ga ni sgrub mi dgos par las 
[\[139a.5\]]thams cad byed de/_rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_'byung po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'dre dang lus srul po dang /_brjed byed dang /_lba ba dang /_'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_bas lngags la sogs pa 
[\[139a.6\]]dang /_dug dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o/_/lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar bgyi'o/_/byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bru mar ro/_/rna ba bro 'tshal ba la ni ru rta dang 'bru mar ro/_/sna bro 
[\[139a.7\]]'tshal ba la gro ba btags na des zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyis te bklags pas 'grub bo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D694}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mu kha da shai ka bid+yA man+t+ra hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying 
[\[139b.2\]]po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 'od ma'i myu gu'i dkyil 'khor na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_byang chub 
[\[139b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa snyed dang /_
[\[139b.4\]]lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /_sha za dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po dag gis yongs su bskor nas mchod cing rim gror byas/_
[\[139b.5\]]bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas te gsang sngags brjod pa la chos ston par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor te/_bcom ldan 
[\[139b.6\]]'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la rig sngags kyi snying 
[\[139b.7\]]po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa mchis te/_deng bdag gis sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyid pa dang /_bro nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang /_
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag pa dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /_ngan sems can rnams gdul zhing dang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /_mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dag 
[\[140a.2\]]bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang /_'khon dang bcas pa rnams 'dum par bgyi ba dang /_bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams zhi bar bgyi ba dang sems kyi smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas 
[\[140a.3\]]pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa la sogs pa la gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang /_'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yi ger bris nas spel bar bgyid pa de dag 
[\[140a.4\]]la bgegs bgyid pa dang /_bdud kyi bar chad dang /_mtshon cha dang dbyig pa dang dug dang /_byad stems thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba ma lags so/_/bdag gis rig sngags 'di gnas pa'i phyogs su ring yang rung nye yang rung ste/_ci tsam du mtshams bkum pa las 'das 
[\[140a.5\]]nas gnod pa bgyid du mchi ba ma mthong lags te/_sdig pa'i las nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das des dngos po 'di nges par de lta bu lags par rig par bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o/_/rnam par 
[\[140a.6\]]rtog pa ni mi bgyi'o/_/de ltar bgyis na gdon bgegs thams cad thag ring du spong bas nye bar mchi zhing glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/_/rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bsngags pa brjod cing mtshungs par rjes su thugs rangs par 
[\[140a.7\]]mdzad pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing yongs su bsrung ba mdzad pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sngon rol na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma brgya'i spyan thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gtsug tor yon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_bdag de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'di mnos lags te/_rig 
[\[140b.2\]]sngags 'di thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar gyur/_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob par gyur pas rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/_/de lta bas na yongs su dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi 
[\[140b.3\]]bu mo la sogs pa dag gis rig sngags 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don par 'tshal na/_gus pas sems rtse gcig tu dran pas bcangs te/_rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/_rig sngags 'di lan 
[\[140b.4\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la phan yon rnam pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcu gang zhe na/_rtag par lus la bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_nor 
[\[140b.5\]]dang /_rin po che dang gos dang /_zas bas pa ma mchis pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra thams cad thul cing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bkur zhing gsong por smra bar 'gyur ba dang /_dug dang 'dre gdon 
[\[140b.6\]]gyis mi tshugs shing gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mtshon cha dang /_dbyig pa thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dus ma 
[\[140b.7\]]lags par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags so/_/gzhan yang yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ya nga 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/_'di nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol 
[\[141a.2\]]gyi yang ches snga rol na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas man dA ra ba'i dri bsung zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur bas/_sangs rgyas de la rig sngags 'di mnos lags te/_rig sngags 
[\[141a.3\]]'di thob ma thag tu bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil lags so/_/rig sngags 'di klog pa dang /_'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar ba'i chos kyi sgo thob par 'gyur te/_
[\[141a.4\]]de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson ra dam por chud pa dang /_btson char stsal ba dang /_dgum pa la thugs pa dang /_chab dang /_zhugs dang /_rlung dang chom rkun dang /_dug dang byad stems dang mi dang /_mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna 
[\[141a.5\]]tshogs kyi bgegs thams cad las yongs su skyob par bgyid pa lags so/_/bdag ni 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang skyabs dang /_yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su bsrung ba dang /_dbugs 'byin pa dang /_gling dang khang khyim du gyur pa lags 
[\[141a.6\]]so/_/rig sngags 'di'i mthus gnod sbyin dang /_srin po ma rungs pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bsdus shing bzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems bskyed du stsal nas/_de'i rjes la bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 
[\[141a.7\]]bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di'i gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas/_gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam bzlas brjod bgyis pa na yang rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na/_ji 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos par gyur pa lags na/_len pa dang 'dzin pa dang /_ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang 
[\[141b.2\]]ci 'tshal lags/_gang la la zhig gis gdugs mtshan du rig sngags 'di klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'dzin par bgyid na/_bdag gis de dag gi smon pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid lags so/_/gang la la zhig gis zla ba phyed cing tshes bcu 
[\[141b.3\]]bzhi'am bco lnga la smyung ba bgyis te/_sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/_sems rtse gcig tu bdag rjes su dran par bgyis nas rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags 
[\[141b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rig sngags 'di'i dbang gis ming btsun zhing thos par dka' bar 'gyur lags te/_gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i mtshan nas brjod cing yid la bsams pa dang /_gzhan yang 'ga' zhig gis skad 
[\[141b.5\]]cig gcig tsam du bsam pa thag pa nas/_bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par gyur na de gnyis kyi yon tan mnyam zhing mtshungs lags so/_/bdag gi ming nas brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur/_bro nad thams cad dang bral bar 
[\[141b.6\]]'gyur/_sgrib pa thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nongs pa zhu byang bar 'gyur na bdag gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_ci skad bstan pa bzhin du 
[\[141b.7\]]sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags te/_gang zag de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub lag mthil na mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud cing legs par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas/_rig sngags chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas khyod thabs 'di'i dbang gis 
[\[142a.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang /_sgrib pa dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa dang lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes pa las yongs su skyob cing thar bar byas nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa 
[\[142a.3\]]yin te/_rigs kyi bu nga yang rjes su yi rangs nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongs su bzung nas khyod kyis smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i 
[\[142a.4\]]lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rig sngags 'di 'don pa gang lags pa des 'di skad du dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i 
[\[142a.5\]]rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan 
[\[142a.6\]]pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bgyi lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te/_baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me/_ku su ma/_ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti tsi ti/_dz+wa la ma pa na ya/_shud+d+ha tA swA hA/_ma 
[\[142a.7\]]hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di rtsa ba'i rig sngags lags te/_gang la la zhig gis rjes su dran zhing bzlas brjod bgyis na gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus par 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems
