[\[142b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ha ha ha ha/_i li mi li/_tsi li pi li/_khi li hi li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chab dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags 
[\[142b.3\]]lags te/_gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na sngar khrus bgyis te de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste/_lus la gtor nas bsang bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste gzod bgo bar bgyi lags so/_/dkon 
[\[142b.4\]]mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus 
[\[142b.5\]]par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ha ha ha ha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni pog sbos dang /_mar me 
[\[142b.6\]]la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/_dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pog bsregs te mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'di pog spos la lan bdun btab ste/_gdod bsreg par bgyi'o/_/mar me sbar bar 'tshal na yang sngar sngags 'dis 'bru mar la lan bdun btab 
[\[142b.7\]]ste gdod mar me spar bar bgyi lags so/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_si ri si ri/_d+hi ri 
[\[143a.2\]]d+hi ri/_si ri d+hi ri swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni me tog dang /_byug spos dang /_phreng ba la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/_dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas/_me tog dang /_byug spos dang /_phreng bdag gis mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis me tog la 
[\[143a.3\]]lan bdun btab ste/_sku gzugs la gtor bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug spos la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang sngags 'dis phreng ba la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la brgyan par bgyi lags so/_/dkon 
[\[143a.4\]]mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par 
[\[143a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa te sa te/_si ti si ti/_su d+hu su d+hu swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs 
[\[143a.6\]]rgyas la mchod cing dbul ba'i zhal zas la gdab pa'i sngags lags te gang la la zhig zhal zas dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas de'i rjes la gdod mchod par bgyid lags 
[\[143a.7\]]so/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ma si ta si/_tsa le tsa le/_hu ru hu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru swA hA/_
[\[143b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yam shing la gdab pa'i sngags lags te gal te la la zhig gong du bstan pa'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te sngar sngags 'di me tog sha ta'i shing la lan cig gdab par bgyi'o/_/zhugs 'bud par 'tshal na logs shig tu me tog sha ta'i 
[\[143b.3\]]shing blangs nas dum bu sum cur gtubs te/_zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du sbangs nas/_zhag lon par bgyis te gdugs re dum bu re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o/_/de dag thams cad bas par bsregs nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci 
[\[143b.4\]]mchis pa bgyi lags so/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[143b.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li/_bi li ti li/_tsi li hi li swA hA/_bcom 
[\[143b.6\]]ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams dgum pa'i sngags lags te mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'di chab la lan bdun btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o/_/yang na yungs kar ram thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor na sems 
[\[143b.7\]]kyis nye ring ci tsam dgum pa mtshams su gyur na yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal 
[\[144a.2\]]lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi Te bi Te/_ti Te ti Te/_tsi Te tsi Te/_biT+Te biT+Te/_ka tsa ka tsa/_b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_sa b+ha sa b+ha sa b+ha naM swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i sngags lags te/_bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyis 
[\[144a.3\]]lags nas bdag slar rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i tshe sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor na bdag slar mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni dngos grub mngon du ma gyur lags kyis kyang las su bgyi 
[\[144a.4\]]ba rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyis na smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/gang zhig myos nad gdugs re re lan re ldang ba'am/_gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba'am/_gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang 
[\[144a.5\]]ba'am/_gdugs bzhi zhing lan re ldang ba'am/_gdon 'byung pos bgyis pa'am/_mkha' 'gro mas bgyis pa'am/_sha zas bgyis pa'am/_lus srul pos bgyis pa'am/_smyo byed kyis bgyis pa'am/_brjed byed kyis bgyis pa'am/_'dre gdon ma rungs pa 
[\[144a.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bgyis pa yang rung ste/_nad pa de dag la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags lan re bzla zhing re re mdud de brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas 
[\[144a.7\]]nad pa'i mgul pa'am/_dpung pa la btags na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib ba zhu byang zhing bro nad kyang sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te skrangs pa dang /_'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_shu ba dang phol mig dang /_rma 'dzag pa dang /_g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad ma rungs pa rnam 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur tam ral gri dang /_mda' dang /_mdung la sogs pa phog ste smyos par gyur tam/_sbrul dang /_sdig pa dang /_rtsangs pa dang /_bung ba dang /_gdug pa la sogs pas zin par gyur na/_sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas te btab 
[\[144b.2\]]nas sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na/_dog sa ser po'i 'jim pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro 'tshal ba'i dmigs su byugs na sel bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te rlung nad na ba'am phyogs gcig pa langs par gyur tam 
[\[144b.3\]]rna ba 'on pa'am sna 'tshubs pa'am rlung gis zin pa'i nad la sogs pas bro 'tshal bar gyur na/_sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab na nad sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig 
[\[144b.4\]]lags na 'bru mar dang /_chab mar dang gro dang /_ru rta rnams bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus la bskus sam rna ba dang snar blugs sam 'tshal du stsal na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang bro nad gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur na/_
[\[144b.5\]]sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di gdab par bgyi'o/_/yang na bdag nyid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/gal te rig sngags 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/_sngar sra zhing 'phan skyon ma mchis pa'i tsan+dan dkar po las byang chub sems dpa' spyan 
[\[144b.6\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs srid du mtho phyed dang do mchis pa/_sug pa lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma le brgan dang ril ba thogs pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas bgrang phreng thogs shing /_'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag tu ston pa gdong bcu gcig par 
[\[144b.7\]]bgyis te mdun gyi gdong gsum ni byams pa dang snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/g.yon phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni khro bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni mche ba dkar po gyen du 'byung ba'i mtshan can du bgyi'o/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]rgyab kyi gdong gcig ni khro gtum che zhing rab tu dkon pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o/_/spyi bo'i gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal kyi gzugs can du bgyi'o/_/mgo rgyan de dag thams cad kyi nang na yang sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[145a.2\]]dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus ni do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/gzugs bgyis lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te smyung ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par blangs te 
[\[145a.3\]]zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam yang na dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de slan chad gnas dben pa zhig tu stan gtsang ma bting ste byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[145a.4\]]dbang phyug gi gzugs bgyis pa bzhag nas kha nub phyogs su bstan te nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag gis mchod nas a ga ru dang du ru ska 'ba' zhig gis bsreg par bgyi'o/_/rnal 'byor ba de 'bru phye dang 'o ma'i zas 'tshal nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis 
[\[145a.5\]]te gdugs gsum pa la thug pa'i bar du bgyi'o/_/de slan chad mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o/_/rnal 'byor pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste/_'o ma dang zho dang /_'bras chan 'ba' zhig 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/byang 
[\[145a.6\]]chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs de'i mdun du zhugs spar bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te du ru ska'i mar gyi nang du spangs nas gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/_sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing 
[\[145a.7\]]thams cad bas par gyur na de'i tshe sa chen po rnams rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur la de'i dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de yang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas sgra byung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis 'di 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]ltar nan tan brtson 'grus kyis smon pa rnams yongs su gnyer bas bdag gis khyod kyi smon pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/khyod 'di nas nam mkha' la 'phur te 'gro ba'am/_yang na khyod rgyu zhing 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa'am/_yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po 
[\[145b.2\]]byed par 'gyur ba'am/_yang na bdag ci lta ba bzhin du rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid du bya'o zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[145b.3\]]gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/_gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu smyung bar bgyis nas/_su ma na'i me tog stong 
[\[145b.4\]]rtsa brgyad blangs te/_me tog re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste/_thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na de'i tshe gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gcig gi kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra byung bar gyur la/_de'i dbang gis sa chen po yang rab tu g.yo bar gyur 
[\[145b.5\]]pas rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe rang gi sems bde bar bzhag nas skrag cing 'jigs pa mi bskyed par rig sngags dang /_smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba' zhig rjes su dran par bgyis te/_'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[145b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nam zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi smon pa rnams yongs su bskong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na/_
[\[145b.7\]]de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ci ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur te/_smon pa rnams stsol ba'i tshe lha dang klu la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la gza' zhugs pa'i tshe chab 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]mar srang gcig blangs te/_dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du bzhag ste/_sngags 'dis bzlas brjod bgyis na zla ba yang snga ma kho na bzhin du skyabs 'og tu gyur pas de nas blangs te 'tshal na lus kyi bro nad rnams mi 'byang ba gang yang ma mchis 
[\[146a.2\]]lags so/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ldong ros dang gi wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/_gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis sbrus nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/_don rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[146a.3\]]sngar bstan pa bzhin du chab dron po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thams cad dang bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad bsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis g.yul 'phrog par gyur na/_a+yan ci dmar rtsi 'bras bu cig blangs te sngags 
[\[146a.4\]]'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas/_gzugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la byugs te/_dgra'i phyogs su kha bstan na dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang gal te yul phyogs su mi dang phyugs la rims nad byung bar 
[\[146a.5\]]gyur na/_gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du shing shug pa'i zhugs bus la gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te dum bu gcig blangs nas yungs 'bru'i mar gyis bskus te/_sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i 
[\[146a.6\]]bar du bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang skud pa dmar po las mdud pa bdun mdud de mdud pa lan re mdud cing sngags lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_rims nad zhi nas sngags thag kyang dgrol bar 
[\[146a.7\]]'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang blo bur du mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bro 'tshal bar gyur na/_skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te las kyi sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sngags thag de blangs nas yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste snga ma'i 
[\[146b.2\]]gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas/_zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang gang la la zhig bro nad rgyun rims kyis btab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos par ma gyur tam/_'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du 
[\[146b.3\]]zhugs par gyur na/_hun lug thang 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du 'brum bu re re blangs la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad pas pa'i bar du bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa 
[\[146b.4\]]gcig mdud de sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/_mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad rnams 'byang zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs pa rnams 'byer zhing 'gyes 
[\[146b.5\]]par 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang mi mdza' bdag gis glags btsal bar gyur tam/_'thab cing rtsod pa dang /_byad stems kyis gnod pa bgyid par gyur na me tog dang pog spos la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi na ya ka'i gzugs 
[\[146b.6\]]kyi mdun du zhugs sbar nas/_'un te'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/_sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas gzugs de'i g.yon phyogs kyi 
[\[146b.7\]]khro bo'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag bzhi lon te slar bkrol la/_skud pa de blangs te mi mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re nas so so tha dad par sbas nas re re la yang sngags lan re bzla zhing re re nas gtubs te thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/_mi mdza' 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]ba de dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabs su mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs pa'i dngos po grub par 'tshal na/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/_sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa 
[\[147a.2\]]re re mdud nas/_gzhan yang gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du sngags lan bdun gyis btab ste/_byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas bdag nyid kyi lus la btags na smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags 
[\[147a.3\]]so/_/gzhan yang gang la la zhig sgrib pa'i bgegs dang ldan pas/_legs pa'i dngos po rnams phal cher smon pa yid bzhin du grub par ma gyur tam/_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgyu ma mchis par langs par gyur na spos chab kyis gzugs bgyis pa de bkru 
[\[147a.4\]]bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi nA ya ka'i gzugs bkru bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste rang nyid kyi lus la gtor na/_sgrib pa dang bgegs thams cad rang gi ngang gis zhu byang nas/_
[\[147a.5\]]smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras pa dang /_'khor mang po thams cad kyis mthun par skyes bu chen po legs so legs so/_/sems can thams 
[\[147a.6\]]cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di smras pas/_bdag cag kyang rjes su yi rang zhing yongs su 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/_/de nas 'khor mang po thams cad dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 
[\[147a.7\]]phyag byas te gyes par gyur to/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi mkhan po lo ts+tsha ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

[\[147b.1\]{D695}]@#/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis

[\[147b.3\]]bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so//[{D696}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[147b.4\]]dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/_pad+ma dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla

[\[147b.6\]]sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/_ma lha mo drug ma dang /_yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di

[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]bcas par mi skye'o/_/mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nad dang /_gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M zhes brjod pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong

[\[148a.4\]]dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan

[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'dug par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

[\[148b.3\]]gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams rang tshim par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag gi

[\[149a.1\]]kr-iSh+NA dzi na/_dza TA mu ku TA/_a laM kr-i ta/_sha rI ra lam+ba/_pra lam+ba/_bi lam+ba/_ma hA sid+d+ha bad+yI d+ha ra/_ba la ba la ma hA ba la/_ma la ma la ma hA ma la/_tsa la tsa la ma hA tsa la/_kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/_kriSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na pA sha nir+g+hA ta na/_he pad+ma hA sta/_tsa ra tsa ra

[\[149b.1\]{D698}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kA ru Na a na bi laM nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa snying rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems

[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]gsol/_tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/_bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_las sbyang du gsol/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/_pad+ma A sa nA ya swA hA/_shwe tA dz+nyA u pa bI ti ya swA hA/_ki ri ta ni swA hA/_shU la ne swA hA/_

[\[150a.3\]]b+h+yaHswA hA/_bi ti ka b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/_bai d+hi ta ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/_Sh+pha Sh+Na ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/_sa na ni pa ti ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba bud+d+ho swA hA/_sarba b+h+ya ti b+h+yaHswA hA/_b+hu me a na ta r-i Shi tsar+ye b+h+yo b+h+yaHswA hA/_tad+ya thA/_oM tra Ta tra Ta/_tri Ti tri Ti/_tru Tu tru Tu/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_
[\[150a.4\]]'tshe ba thams cad dang /_nad thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_gra sa gra sa/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_na maHAr+yA ba lo ki to shwa ra Adz+nya pa ya ti swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thugs rje chen po snying 
[\[150a.5\]]rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D699}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yas man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la

[\[150a.7\]]gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston 
[\[150b.2\]]par 'tshal te/_gzungs de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to/_/longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 
[\[150b.3\]]'dzin to/_/lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/_/ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/_/sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[150b.4\]]pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[150b.5\]]kyang thob/_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/_phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la 
[\[150b.6\]]sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/_blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/_chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing /_mthong ba 
[\[150b.7\]]dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/_gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgod du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig thang 
[\[151a.2\]]cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smras so/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 
[\[151a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_kha ga me kha ga me/_tsak+Shu kha be/_shro tra kha be/_g+h+rA Na kha be/_dzi hwa kha be/_kA ya kha be/_ma na kha be/_sa ra kha be/_sa ra kha be/_sa ra kha be/_shU na tra kha be/_a na mi ta kha be/_a pra Ni hi ta kha be/_sa mA d+hi kha be pA ra/_mi tA kha be/_bo d+hi 
[\[151a.4\]]kha be/_sa ra sa ra sa ra/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra d+harma a d+hiSh+ti te/_ka la ka la ka la/_sang+g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_na mo dwA na ba ti nAM/_bud+d+ha ko TI nAM/_a d+hiSh+Than+tu man/_tsa ta sra paR+Sha do A yur ba lan tsa da dan+tu/_tad+ya thA/_su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/_ma hA su ra b+hi/_mu ni mu ni/_ma hA 
[\[151a.5\]]mu ni/_ma ti ma ti ma hA ma ti/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sa mr-i dAn+tu mAn/_sa man+ta b+ha dra d+hA ra NI swA hA/_gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po 
[\[151a.6\]]de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/_/gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/_nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[151a.7\]]brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rims nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o/_/so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o/_/rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par 
[\[151b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/klad pa na ba la 'bru mar ro/_/lto na ba la byab bar bgyi'o/_/gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdags so/_/mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byug go/_/nad 
[\[151b.3\]]thams cad la byab par bgyi'o/_/'di ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o/_/ji ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang /_mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /_mig bsku ba dang /_ldong ros la sogs 
[\[151b.4\]]pa sgrub par 'tshal na/_des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te/_bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bres te/_me tog sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang la tsan+dan dang /_a 
[\[151b.5\]]ga ru dang /_kun du ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/_mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/_tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a 
[\[151b.6\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ti li b+ha na d+hA mi/_mi li b+ha na d+hA mi/_tsi li mi li b+han d+hA mi/_sI mi b+han d+hA mi/_bdag gi mtshams las su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/_chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/_
[\[151b.7\]]phyogs bcur mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tsi li tsi li/_mi li mi 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]li/_tsi le li/_e hi b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/_'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/_des bdag dgug par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngos tshes brgyad nas bzung ste nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/_dus 
[\[152a.2\]]gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi dus gsum du khrus bgyi/_dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te/_bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/'on kyang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser 
[\[152a.3\]]gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/_lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs dang ting 
[\[152a.4\]]nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang /_nub phyogs su 'od dpag med dang /_byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs pa phyogs 
[\[152a.5\]]bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rigs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur 
[\[152a.6\]]ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[152a.7\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D700}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_lo ke shwa ra kalpa/_bod skad du/_'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags 
[\[152b.2\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni/_/mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod bya ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyud chen po/_/
[\[152b.3\]]'dod pa'i don kun rab ster ba/_/dang por re zhig rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su hU~M gis dag par byas par nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/_oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM zhes brjod la/_thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par 
[\[152b.4\]]bya'o/_/de'i rjes la/_oM tsit+ta pra ti b+ho d+haM ka ro mi/_de ltar brjod la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/_pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o/_/zla ba'i steng du hrIH'i sngags gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/_sems 
[\[152b.5\]]dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_phyag gnyis pa/_mdog dmar ba/_mchan du ni gos dkar mo de la 'khyud pa/_pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgoms la/_'di brjod par bya ste/_ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni/_/'dod chags skyon 
[\[152b.6\]]gyis mi gos shing /_/de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon/_/khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o/_/dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs 
[\[152b.7\]]brgyad du lha mo rnams bsam mo/_/oM bi lo ki ni/_a ba lo ki ni/_a ba lo kA ya swA hA/_shar gyi 'dab ma la ni rnam par gzigs ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/_/oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re swA hA/_lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/_/o~M b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hU~M/_nub kyi pad+ma la b+hu ri ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/o~M b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tut+ta ma ta hU~M/_byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po 
[\[153a.2\]]bsnams pa'o/_/o~M ma hA shrI ye ma Ni pad+me hU~M/_'di ni pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtshams su btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/_/o~M badzra pad+me shwa ra ma ra pad+me hU~M/_lho phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/_/o~M bi shwa pad+me hU~M/_'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 
[\[153a.3\]]ste/_nub phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma nag po bsnams pa'o/_/o~M bi shwa bag tre hU~M/_'di ni sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/_byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/_/o~M hrIHpad+ma naR+te shwa ra hU~M ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan 
[\[153a.4\]]ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go/_/de ltar gang bsgom pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na dngos grub brtan por 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ster ro/_/sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing /_/gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[153a.5\]]'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing /_/so so rang nyid rjes su sgrub/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid/_/rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no/_/yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'phang ni/_/spyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dang ga pur bcas/_/tsan+dan dmar 
[\[153a.6\]]dang rab sbyar te/_/rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin/_/sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni/_/bcud kyis len ni bde bar yang /_/'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/gzhon zhing nad med dam bde zhing /_/tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang /_/
[\[153a.7\]]skal bzang ye shes bla na med/_/skye ba 'di la 'grub pa'o/_/ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/_/dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang /_/gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa/_/rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang /_/nam mkhar 'gro ba de bzhin no/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug thob 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'gyur zhing /_/ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur/_/de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yi/_/rdo rje dam tshig de yis ni/_/rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog_/'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur/_/o~M hrIHpad+ma narte shwa ra hU~M/_rtsa ba'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub 
[\[153b.2\]]mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na stong bzlas brjod byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/_/yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas brjod byas na/_thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 
[\[153b.3\]]'os su 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang ba dang /_g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying 
[\[153b.4\]]'khrug par byed do/_/stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma grub par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod 
[\[153b.5\]]byas na gnod sbyin mo grub par 'gyur ro/_/khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod byas na lha dang klu dang /_mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag sum cu bzlas brjod byas na bsam 
[\[153b.6\]]pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du 
[\[153b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/stong phrag bdun cu bzlas brjod byas nas gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag brgyad cu bzlas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]byas na rang dga'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/_thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 
[\[154a.2\]]'grub par 'gyur zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o/_/o~M paN+Da ri ba si ni ba ri de hU~M/_'di ni gos dkar mo'i sngags te lan cig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do/_/nub bdun gyi nang 
[\[154a.3\]]rol du rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang /_skye 'gro'i tshogs dang btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na gang 
[\[154a.4\]]yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing /_dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/o~M bi lo ki ni a ba lo kA ya swA hA/_'di'i sbyor ba ni stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na me long dang /_mtheb chen dang /_
[\[154a.5\]]nam mkha' la sogs pa la gsal por pra dbab pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang sngon byung ba dang da ltar dang phyis 'ong ba de ston par byed do/_/yang na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags par byas la/_nub mo nyal ba'i dus so shing 'chos nas mi smra bar nyal na 
[\[154a.6\]]dgos pa gang yin pa rmi lam na ston par byed do/_/de yang 'khrul pa med par ston no/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_mi'am ci'i bu mo dang /_gnod 
[\[154a.7\]]sbyin gyi bu dang /_mi'i bu mo ste/_'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur gum dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_rang byung gi me tog dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsams 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]la/_chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya'o/_/de yang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du ltung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o/_/yang na lha dang /_klu 
[\[154b.2\]]dang lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_blon po dang /_skyes bu'am gang 'dod pa de dmar por rnam par bsams la/_de'i snying gar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bigs 
[\[154b.3\]]bzhin pa dang /_zhags pas ske ba nas bcings la dgug bzhin pa 'dod pas myos par gyur par rab tu gsal por bsam par bya'o/_/bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya'o/_/oM b+hu ri ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hU~M/_'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen dang /_
[\[154b.4\]]rdo rje chu la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la/_de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gling ngam gling gzhan dang /_grong khyer dang grong dang /_yul 'khor gyi rgyal por bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o/_/de yis bdag po nyid du 'gyur zhing longs 
[\[154b.5\]]spyod la longs spyad nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/o~M b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta hU~M/_lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la/_dug dang /_tshwa dang /_ske tshe dang /_khrag dang /_chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang /_dri 
[\[154b.6\]]chen rdo rje chus bsnos la gzugs brnyan byas la mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/_thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste/_dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o/_/zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sems la sdig pa med par 
[\[154b.7\]]gyur na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M ma hA shrI ye ma Ni pad+me hU~M/_lha mo 'di la dri dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas na thams cad du bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/yul chos kyi rtsod pa 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/yang na pad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/o~M badzra pad+me shwa ri ma ra pad+me hU~M/_rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug 
[\[155a.2\]]ma 'di yid kyis bzlas na dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/_gtsug phud mdud na rang bsrung zhing rims dang /_lkog nad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang /_rkun po dang /_seng ge dang /_glang po che dang /_sbrul dang /_
[\[155a.3\]]'ching ba dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_sha za'i nad stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig gi las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon dang /_zad byed dang /_skyug pa dang /_bri bar dka' ba dang /_bsgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par byed 
[\[155a.4\]]do/_/'bum phrag gcig bzlas na lus 'phel zhing skal ba bzang ba dang /_lus gzhon zhing nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do/_/yang na klu thab khung du bris la der dug dang /_ske tshe dang tsha ba'i sbyin sreg bya zhing klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag 
[\[155a.5\]]gcig sbyin sreg byas na char chen po phab nas mu ge med par 'gyur ro/_/o~M bi shwa pad+ma hrIHsna tshogs pad+me 'di ni rmongs pa dang /_rengs pa dang /_mnan pa dang /_phur bus gdab pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang /_phur bu dang /_mig 'phrul dang /_ngo mtshar dang mi mthong 
[\[155a.6\]]bar byed pa dang /_phug tu 'jug pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_lcags sgrog gcod pa dang /_ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang /_rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do/_/lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi 
[\[155a.7\]]dngos grub ster ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o/_/o~M bi shwa pad+me hUM/_sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster ro/_/tshig 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs par byed do/_/rang nyid bsrung ba dang /_gzhan yang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan po yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan don byed do/_/ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems 
[\[155b.2\]]can gyi don la spro zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/_'dir bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed do/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid kyis bsrung ngo zhes thugs 
[\[155b.3\]]kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to/_/sems brtan rtog pa med pa yi/_/blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar/_/de ltar 'dir ni 
[\[155b.4\]]rab sbyar nas/_/de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub/_/ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing /_/kun la longs spyod kun byed ltar/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i snying rjes spyod/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis/_/'dug pa'am ni langs kyang rung /_/'chag pa'am ni gang dang de/_/
[\[155b.5\]]rgod pa'am ni brjod pa'am/_/gang de ji bzhin don bzhin no/_/dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am/_/sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang /_/rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag_/bsod nams chung ba'am 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/_/thams 
[\[155b.6\]]cad mkhas pa nyid dang ni/_/thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang /_/skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/_/yang gsungs pa/_rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi/_/bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min/_/byang chub sems chen la brtson na/_/rnal 'byor dag ni de lta yin/_/khrag 
[\[155b.7\]]chen po dang ga pur bcas/_/tsan+dan dmar dang bsres pa ni/_/tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na/_/kun las mchog gyur bcud len no/_/sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni/_/bcud kyis len ni sla ba ru/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang /_/nad med bde ba bzang po 'thob/_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs/_/sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang /_/gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin 'grub/_/bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing /_/rang nyid so so rjes su 'grub/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[156a.2\]]nyid du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang /_/sangs rgyas kun ni rab grub 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrub pa bshad de/_bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing smyung bar gnas pa'i lha bzos 
[\[156a.3\]]tshon sna ma 'dres par ras gsar pa de yang rang rang gi kun tu khru re'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/_sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/_ze 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog dmar ba 
[\[156a.4\]]mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/_zhal gsum pa/_zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste/_'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/_/g.yas pa gnag pa ste zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/_/g.yon pa dkar ba ste gti mug nyid kyi phyir ro/_/phyag drug pa bya'o/_/g.yon pa'i phyag gcig 
[\[156a.5\]]gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang /_pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o/_/g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang /_me tog gi mda' dang /_lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/_/sems dpa'i skyil 
[\[156a.6\]]mo krung gis gnas pa bya'o/_/shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo/_/pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lha mo sgrol ma ljang gu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang rin po che phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/nub phyogs kyi 'dab 
[\[156a.7\]]ma la b+hu ri ni ser mo ut+pa la sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/_/byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can ni pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/shar gyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]pa'o/_/lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog can dkar mo pad+ma dang shel gyi phreng ba bsnams pa'o/_/nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/byang phyogs kyi mtshams su 
[\[156b.2\]]sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la/_sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang /_sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o/_/de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/_sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams mtshams su'o/_/dzaHhU~M baM hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags kyu dang /_zhags pa dang /_
[\[156b.3\]]lcags sgrog dang /_dril bu rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su'o/_/yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/_ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na skud pa dang /_dbyug pa dang /_rtse gsum dang /_mchog sbyin pa'i phyag can/_g.yon na 
[\[156b.4\]]pad+ma dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_zhags pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/_sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/_ral pa'i cod pan la 'od dpag med bzhengs pa'am skyil krung phyed pas 
[\[156b.5\]]gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o/_/de'i g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa po/_/mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pas gzung ba bya'o/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/_g.yon pa sa la 
[\[156b.6\]]gnas shing zhabs g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng gi gdan stengs su bzhugs pa'o/_/phyag re re na phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkar zhing 
[\[156b.7\]]dmar ba phyag bcu pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/_g.yas na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/_/seng ge dang /_glang po che dang /_me dang /_sbrul gyis 'jigs pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byad can no/_/g.yon na pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis pa 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]steng du po ti can te rkun ma dang /_lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang /_mtsho dang /_thog chen po dang /_sha zas za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad can no/_/gnas de brgyad du sgrub pa po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sngon bzhin du langs 
[\[157a.2\]]pa'am/_'dug pa bsam par bya'o/_/gzhan yang cho ga ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'chang ba/_dbu bcu gsum pa/_spyi bo'i mgo bo ni ljang khu'i rta zhal lo/_/yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal lo/_/phyag brgya pa'i 
[\[157a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi mtshon cha bsnams pa'o/_/yang na zhal brgya pa phyag stong pa yang bya'o/_/kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'am/_bzhengs pa yang bya'o/_/tsam pa ka lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das so/_/thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa 
[\[157a.4\]]po me tog dang /_mchod yon gyi snod dang /_bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na gzung ba bya'o/_/de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan du 'od dpag med pa'am/_chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o/_/'di ni thang sku'i cho ga'o/_/thang sku'i mdun du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pa de bzla zhing bsam gtan yang byas nas/_
[\[157a.5\]]mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/_mchod yon snod dang /_yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i zas dang /_sgron ma'i zas la byas nas mchod yon byin te/_sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba po ni sngags 'di nyid/_/kha 
[\[157a.6\]]cig la yang mi sbyin no/_/blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i/_/sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya/_/mchod rten las byed nyid la ni/_/blo ldan 'bad pas sbyin par bya/_/rang nyid dang ni nor dag gis/_/bla ma la rtag gus par bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la/_/mchog 
[\[157a.7\]]tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul/_/gang dang gang ni btang dka' ba/_/mchog tu gyur bar 'dir ni bsngags/_/chung ma sring mo dang yang ni/_/bu mo dang ni tsha mo dag_/bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya/_/glang chen rta dang shing rta dang /_/phyugs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang /_/yul 'khor rgyal 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]srid ldan pa dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni/_/gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul/_/rdo rje slob dpon dgyes gyur pa/_/thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzam b+ha la dang /_bod kyi 
[\[157b.2\]]lots+tsha ba dge slong pa ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//[ {D701}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pad+ma mu ku Tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[157b.3\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sgo kun nas 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[157b.4\]]nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas reg ma thag tu bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/_'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po 
[\[157b.5\]]phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/_/steng zhal ser ba/_g.yas ljang gu/_g.yon dmar ba/_steng gi gsum nag po/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byi ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te/_'dzum 
[\[157b.6\]]pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang /_/khyad par 
[\[157b.7\]]cho ga bstan par gyis/_/zhes gsol ba btab nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/_sku yi rnam pa 'di lta ste/_/thugs rje dag pas chu shel te/_/mnyam par bzhengs 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]pas 'gro don mdzad/_/chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar/_/ljang gu'i mdog can nag po che/_/ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar/_/drang srong rtag tu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]brgyan/_/zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang /_/khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes/_/bcu 
[\[158a.2\]]pa sems dpa'i rtags can de/_/bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag_/yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng /_/phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa/_/dang po'i phyag ni thal sbyar te/_/g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin/_/g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin/_/g.yas pa mchog sbyin 
[\[158a.3\]]mdzad pa po/_/g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te/_/g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin/_/g.yon pa na ni mda' gzhu ste/_/lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan pa'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/_cod pan gnyis nas 'od zer rab tu 'phros pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[158a.4\]]'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga byung ba 'di lta ste/_rnam par snang mdzad dang /_rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_snang ba mtha' yas dang /_don yod grub pa dang /_mi bskyod pa'o/_/khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che de'i nang du 
[\[158a.5\]]seng ge dang /_rta dang /_rma bya dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_glang po che de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o/_/yang yum ni sku mdog sngon mo ste/_/pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng /_/tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhi mdzes/_/sems dpa'i rgyan du ldan pa yi/_/mnyam pa yi ni skyil 
[\[158a.6\]]krung bcas/_/yab ni sku mdog ser po ste/_/pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng /_/thal sbyar nor bu bgrang phreng 'dzin/_/rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/yang na 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/_/nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni/_/gzhon nu ut+pal mchog 
[\[158a.7\]]sbyin mdzad/_/zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog_/cung zhig khros pa rdo rje can/_/dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste/_/nyi zla'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin/_/drag po gnyis dang hrIHyig las/_/gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs/_/ha ya gri ba khams gsum sdud/_/khro 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]gnyer can gyi phrin las mdzad/_/gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing /_/khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms/_/'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng /_/gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/_/dang por dkon mchog rab dad cing /_/tshad med bzhi ni rab tu rdzogs/_/byang chub 
[\[158b.2\]]yan lag rdzogs pa dang /_/chos dbyings rang bzhin stong nyid do/_/gleng gzhi dang sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par 
[\[158b.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas yang gsungs pa/_o~M hU~M trAM hrIHaH/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/_bai ro tsa nA ya/_byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+had b+h+yaHsamyak+sam bud d+he b+h+yaH/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwa 
[\[158b.4\]]ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te/_baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su ma ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/_sngags 'di 'don par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi 
[\[158b.5\]]bu mos lan cig brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang /_de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las byang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/_/gcan 
[\[158b.6\]]gzan dang /_srin po dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_nad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o/_/o~M a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA r+NAM/_Ad+ya nud pan+na twAta zhes pas gtor ma'i chus [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la mchod par bya ste/_
[\[158b.7\]]o~M AHhU~M zhes pas so/_/de rnams kyi sngags bsdus pa ni/_o~M ma Ni pad+me hU~M zhes pa'o/_/'di ni rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/_de'i phan yon ni 'di'o/_/chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen por mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M na maHsarba thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ga na d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nai 
[\[159a.2\]]wi d+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Dal pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod/_/stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/_/thabs dang shes rab 
[\[159a.3\]]gnyis ldan pa'i/_/hrIHyig dkar po yang dag bzlas/_/sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/_/dang po zhi ba'i las sgrub na/_/yid du 'ong ba'i ljongs dag tu/_/dkar po dang po gsal dus su/_/dri zhim chu yis legs byugs te/_/me 
[\[159a.4\]]tog dkar po bkram byas nas/_/khrus dang kha zas phyogs mthun pa'i/_/bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/_/bum pa dkar po tsan+dan dkar/_/dris bkang shing gos legs par dkri/_/maN+Dal dbus su legs par bzhag_/hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku/_/zhal 
[\[159a.5\]]gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/_/rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams/_/zla ba'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa/_/hrIHlas 'od zer 'phro ba bsgom/_/phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/_/rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/_/hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal ba ni/_/bzlas 
[\[159a.6\]]ba rab tu gsal ba ste/_/gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na/_sA gar/_bai ro tsa na/_byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+had b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo 
[\[159a.7\]]ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_a mi ta b+ha la che ge mo shan+ti d+ku ru swA hA/_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/bru~M/_rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chus/_/gang zhig legs par khrus byed pa/_/dri ma thams cad yongs dag nas/_/'bras bu bde ba 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]de thob 'gyur/_/'jigs pa kun las rab grol te/_/myur du chu skyes thob par 'gyur/_/de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na/_/nags tshal shin tu mthug po ru/_/dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la/_/'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram/_/rgyan rnams yongs su brtags 
[\[159b.2\]]nas ni/_/bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/_/rin chen sna lnga 'bru snar bcas/_/rin chen ga 'ur blugs byas la/_/maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag_/hrIHlas byung ba sems dpa'i sku/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/_/rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma 
[\[159b.3\]]bsnams/_/phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/_/rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/_/mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/_/hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/_bai ro tsa nA ya/_byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha he/_
[\[159b.4\]]samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+had b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_rat+na ku na puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_bang mdzod stong pa'i steng gzhag ste/_/'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[159b.5\]]dbang gi las byed na/_/sdud par byed pa'i chu klung 'gram/_/pa la sha dang a shwat+tha/_/me tog dmar por ril bu byas/_/bse gab dmar po'i nang du gzhug_/me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod/_/hrIHyig las byung sgrol ma ni/_/ljang gu phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/_/phyag 
[\[159b.6\]]stong spyan yang de bzhin te/_/rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/_/mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/_/hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na/_sA ga rA ya/_bai ro tsa nA ya/_byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na maH
[\[159b.7\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+had b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_a mo g+ha b+ha smiM ku ru/_o~M tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+ha smiM ku ru swA hA/_rdzas kyi lde gus lus byugs nas/_/byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]phrin las bya 'dod na/_/dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni/_/ba yi lci bas legs byugs nas/_/me tog sngon po ni ma pa yi/_/spos kyi tshom bu lnga byas dgram/_/byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam/_/gcan gzan steng du chu shel 
[\[160a.2\]]te/_/hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/_/mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/_/zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]pags pa 'dzin pa yi/_/drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can/_/phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa/_/g.yon pa pad steng ral gri can/_/
[\[160a.3\]]g.yas pa ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdung /_/rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon pa thod pa dkar po ste/_/dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang /_/rgyal po chen po'i rol pa ltar/_/cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o/_/phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/_/bskal pa bzang po'i 
[\[160a.4\]]sangs rgyas stong /_/pad+ma'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa'i/_/rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas/_/hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i/_/gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/_bai ro tsa nA ya/_byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga 
[\[160a.5\]]tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+had b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a ka Te/_ni ka Te/_ki Ta ka Te/_ka ro Te ka ro Ta/_bIr+ye swA hA/_o~M karma 
[\[160a.6\]]a mo g+ha/_bi badzra siM ha nA di hU~M phaT/_dri'am byug pa dag la ni/_/btab la lus la byug par bya/_/me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag_/maN+Dal chu yis lus la byug_/nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas nas ni/_/las rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/de nas bzhi ka 
[\[160a.7\]]sgrub 'dod na/_/bkra shis dus gsum rdzogs dus su/_/ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu/_/sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste/_/maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni/_/dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te/_/gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams dgram/_/gtsang ma bram ze 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]byas te gzhag_/khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te/_/hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng /_/chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang /_/'dzum dang zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/_/ljang gu bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ste/_/nag po khros pa dmar ser skra/_/ser po'i zhal ni 'dzum pa ste/_/
[\[160b.2\]]dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]pags pas stod g.yogs shing /_/sna tshogs sham thabs mnabs pa yi/_/zhabs gnyis phyag drug mnyam par bzhengs/_/g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar/_/bar ma pad+ma bgrang phreng 'dzin/_/tha ma mchog sbyin spyi 
[\[160b.3\]]blugs 'dzin/_/bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni/_/la se ma le gI rti ste/_ni rti nang gi lha mo dag_/zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs/_/hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/_/gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHAr+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/_bai ro tsa nA 
[\[160b.4\]]ya/_byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_aR+had b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_
[\[160b.5\]]tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su ma ba re/_i li mi li tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/_bum pa'i chu la legs bsgrubs nas/_/lus la byugs pas grub par 'gyur/_/cho gas bsgrubs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas thabs kyi rim pa ni/_/gro 
[\[160b.6\]]ga'am ras sam shing shun la/_/ra yi 'o mas bris pa yi/_/tshom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la/_/dbus su sku yi sa bon te/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste/_/shar du de yang bri bar bya/_/bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan/_/lho ru de ni yang dag dgod/_/lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i 
[\[160b.7\]]gsum/_/nub tu de ni yang dag dgod/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/e yis rnam par sbyar bas te/_/byang du de ni yang dag dgod/_/dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te/_/shAn+tiM ku ru mtshams su'o/_/swA hA dbus su dgod par bya/_/de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]nas/_/dngul lam dkar po'i ga 'ur gzhug_/thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur/_/yung ba'i chu yis bris pa yi/_/puSh+TiM ku ru mtshams su'o/_/tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing /_/kham phor ser por legs par gzhug_/rgyas pa'i las rnams grub 
[\[161a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/pa la sha yis legs par bris/_/ba shaM ku ru mtshams su dgod/_/kham phor dmar por legs par gzhug_/dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/nim pa'i chu yis legs par bri/_/mA ra ya ni mtshams su dgod/_/lcags sam thod par 
[\[161a.3\]]yang dag gzhug_/phrin las thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing /_/zhi bas de ni me la bsreg_/'bras bu mngar dang bcas pa'i shing /_/rgyas pas de ni me la bsreg_/dbang ni pa la sha yi shing /_/de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur/_/
[\[161a.4\]]nim pa'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i/_/bsregs pas phrin las 'grub par 'gyur/_/'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas las kyi rim pa ni/_/dUr ba'i rtswa dang 'bras kyi 'dab/_/til dang yungs kar ci tse la/_/gsang sngags bzlas nas grub pa ni/_/da li'i 
[\[161a.5\]]shing la legs bsregs nas/_/thams cad rab tu zhi bar nus/_/ku sha star bu shug 'brum dang /_/stag ma'i me tog dmar po la/_/gsang sngags bzlas par rab bya ste/_/tsan+dan shing la legs bsregs nas/_/rgyas par bya ba'i las grub cing /_/nus pa mchog 
[\[161a.6\]]ni thob par 'gyur/_/pa la sha yi shing dag dang /_/khre dang ci tse mon sran la/_/gsang sngags bzlas pa rab bya ste/_/pad+ma ka yi shing la bsreg_/nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/_/gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni/_/bra bo mon 
[\[161a.7\]]sran til nag po/_/gsang sngags rab tu bzlas bya ste/_/kha ti ra yi shing la bsreg_/nus dang ldan de las rnams ni/_/myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/_/pra ha kha tsha'i shing dag la/_/lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang /_/rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas/_/mya ngan 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]'tshang gi shing la bsreg_/nus pa thob nas myur du ni/_/mi rnams thams cad dbang du sdud/_/ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/mu la pa tra'i shing dag la/_/gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/_/a ru ra yi shing la bsreg_/'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa yis/_/
[\[161b.2\]]rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/pa la sha yi shing dag dang /_/ka ra bI ra'i 'bras bu la/_/gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te/_/'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas/_/ral gri'i 'og tu bcug nas ni/_/g.yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur/_/tshe rabs brgya ru 
[\[161b.3\]]lon pa'i rus/_/mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa dag_/gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/_/skyer pa'i me la rab bsregs te/_/lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na/_/glang po dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/_/ba le ta dang ta le sha/_/kha ti ra da d+ha ti ma/_/
[\[161b.4\]]dur khrod shing la legs bsregs nas/_/stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du/_/nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang /_/sman dang rin chen sna tshogs kyis/_/maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te/_/rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/pad+ma chu shel las skyes 
[\[161b.5\]]pa'i/_/chu shel mdog can 'dzum pa can/_/rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bzhugs pa/_/ku sha'i stan bcas shar du 'dug_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis/_/byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bya'o/_/nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang /_/shu ba g.yan pa me 
[\[161b.6\]]dpal dang /_/nad dang gdon ni thams cad bzlog_/mtshams med lnga dang mi dge ba'i/_/'bras bu sdug bsngal nad rnams zlog_/me'i las bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po'i 'jigs pa la/_/maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la/_/
[\[161b.7\]]tsan+dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te/_/mchod yon me tog dkar po dang /_/ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis/_/rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod/_/sdig pa thams cad de mdun du/_/bshags nas myur du skyabs su 'gro/_/gro ga dag gam shing shun la/_/rgyal 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]po dag gi gzugs byas te/_/yig 'bru lnga po btab pa yis/_/tshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing /_/byams pa'i sems kyis chu bo la/_/bskur na rgyal po'i chad las thar/_/o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHaHsho na ha ri ma ka to/_/sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/_gcan gzan 'jigs pa 
[\[162a.2\]]'ong ba'i tshe/_/maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la/_/me tog dkar po rab tu gtor/_/mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod/_/sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro/_/'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga/_/tshon sna lnga yi phur ma lnga/_/byas pa lus la btags pa na/_/gcan 
[\[162a.3\]]gzan 'jigs pa thams cad las/_/myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur/_/o~M AHhU~M trA~M hrIHsho sha na ha ri ha tirma ka ro sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/_chom rkun dag gi 'jigs pa la/_/me tog sngon po rdo rje can/_/mthing nag sa gnon phyag rgya can/_/mchod gnas bdag nyid 
[\[162a.4\]]skyabs su 'gro/_/o~M ak+Sho b+h+yaHta ka ka ra na ga ra kha ti pa swa d+hi tsa kri ta ya ri ka tse tsa tra ti na dur ta na/_sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/_sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la/_/bal po se'u'i lcug ma yis/_/bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan bsgoms te/_/rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms nas/_/
[\[162a.5\]]spyi bor mu tig byi ru dang /_/man shel pad+ma rA ga dang /_/in+d+ra nI la dung g.yas 'khyil/_/gser dang dngul dang dUr ba dang /_/rin chen brgyad dang 'bru snar bcas/_/ku sha gla rtsi tsan+dan dang /_/ba lu skyer pa ut+pa la/_/gur gum dri zhim lus la byug_/oM rat+na saM b+ha ba sa 
[\[162a.6\]]ti bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/_lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs pa la/_/stag dang 'brug gi rus pa dang /_/'khar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang /_/zangs phye ra gan phye ma dang /_/gser gyi phye ma gro bar btums/_/snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te/_/byams pas phyogs 
[\[162a.7\]]mtshams kun tu bstan/_/dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdugs/_/o~M a mr-i ta ba badzra dz+wa la badzra dz+wa la/_/gardza gardza/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra swA hA/_me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni/_/'brug rus sen ta wa sha dang /_/til dang sA lu ci tse dang /_/nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]gyi/_/thang phrom dag la sngags btab ste/_/me yi phyogs su gtor bar bya/_/o~M bai ro tsa na pra b+hA dz+wa la dz+wa la/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra swA hA/_rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgoms te/_/me la gtor nas sa yis gsod/_/chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la/_/mdze can pho mo'i thod 
[\[162b.2\]]par ni/_/ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag_/sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas/_/nang du bcug ste chu bor dor/_/don yod grub pa'i sku ru bsgom/_/o~M a mo g+ha sid d+hi/_o~M ka bai tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra swA hA/_phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/_/thugs rje chen 
[\[162b.3\]]po'i sku mchog ni/_/so sor gsal zhing bsgom par bya/_/so so'i dbu la so sor bsam/_/byams pas kun la rab tu lta/_/'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/'jigs pa kun las yongs su bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//sku gdung me tog dkar 
[\[162b.4\]]pos mchod/_/sa gzhi dri yis chag chag gdab/_/snying po gzugs dang bcas pa 'am/_/khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la/_/legs par mchod cing bstod par bya/_/stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/_/thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar/_/rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan/_/
[\[162b.5\]]byang chub phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs/_/dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste/_/rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no/_/byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni/_/khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan/_/lha yi rol mo char du 'bab/_/chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gter/_/rin chen lnga yi bdag 
[\[162b.6\]]nyid de/_/phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che/_/de yi bsod nams bstan pa ni/_/mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu/_/nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams/_/skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur/_/shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag 
[\[162b.7\]]ni/_/byams dang snying rje can gyis bya/_/bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi/_/'dri mkhan snying rje can gyis bya/_/rang bsam lhag par gnas pa yis/_/mdun du bdar te mchod pa bya/_/tshad dang kha dog yongs dag gsal/_/yid du 'ong ba dag la'o/_/zas dag 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]yid du 'ong ba'am/_/dkar gsum 'bags pa spangs pa yis/_/sha dang sgog pa la phug dang /_/zwa dang chang ni shin tu spang /_/shel phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang /_/bo d+hi tse dang mu tig shis/_/glal dang sbrid pa mi tshig rnams/_/nam yang chod par mi bya'o/_/
[\[163a.2\]]yo byad dang dam tshig la brten pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed na/_/po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la/_/brten nas bdag nyid byams sems ldan/_/mu~M las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni/_/dmar ser po ti ut+pal 'dzin/_/mnyam pa'i 
[\[163a.3\]]skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/bum pa kha dog ser po'i nang /_/rin chen lnga dang 'bru lngar bcas/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su me ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi te dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/_lan 
[\[163a.4\]]bdun yongs su bzlas byas na/_/gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur/_/ras ris mchod rten la brten nas/_/maN+Dal dri zhim me tog dgram/_/dkar gsum mngar gsum dag tu ni/_/'bras dang til dang yungs kar dang /_/pad+ma'i rtsa 
[\[163a.5\]]ba dkar po la/_/ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni/_/hrIHlas byung ba'i sku mdog dkar/_/phyag na pad+ma mchog sbyin mdzad/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_tsa 
[\[163a.6\]]le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su me ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/_ril bu dag la sngags btab ste/_/byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas bza'/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas/_/rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/maN+Dal sngon po 
[\[163a.7\]]legs nas/_/ut+pal sngo dang nim pa dang /_/a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang /_/dri yi chu yis bum pa dgang /_/phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can/_/sku mdog ljang sngon cung zhig khro/_/de ni rdo rje phyag na bsnams/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/_/tad+ya thA/_oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su me ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA/_hU~M skyes phyag na rdo rje yis/_/bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas na/_/zhe sdang rab tu zhi byas nas/_/bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[163b.2\]]dug rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//ras sam gro ga'am shing shun la/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/_/d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa'o/_/srung ba lus la btags byas na/_/nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni/_/
[\[163b.3\]]'jigs pa'i nad dang gdon las thar/_/bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/skud pa dag ni dkar po la/_/mdud pa dag ni rab byas te/_/bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du legs bzlas nas/_/bsrung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na/_/bsrung ba yi 
[\[163b.4\]]ni dam pa 'dis/_/bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o/_/mu tig byi ru rin chen gser/_/ga bur gur gum gla rtsi dang /_/a ga ru dang du ru ska/_/phur ma snying gar gdags par bya/_/tsan+dan gla rtsi gur gum dang /_/gu gul nag po rus pa'i phye/_/ba yi 'o mas lde gu 
[\[163b.5\]]byas/_/gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni/_/gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun la/_/byugs pas de ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/bsrung ba 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//ser ba yongs su bsrung ba ni/_/seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la/_/gzungs 
[\[163b.6\]]sngags bzlas nas dbus su ni/_/hU~M las byung ba'i sku bskyed do/_/phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni/_/shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni/_/sku mdog dkar po me dpung 'bar/_/rdo rje 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad/_/o~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_lho ru gshin 
[\[163b.7\]]rje gshed po ni/_/dmar nag rin chen be con 'dzin/_/o~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/_nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni/_/me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin/_/o~M ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_byang phyogs khro gnyer can gyi sku/_/ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste/_/
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]o~M a mo g+ha kab+h+r-i ku Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/_phyogs bzhi'i phur bu dag la ni/_/bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/_/gcan gzan dri ma yungs kar bsres/_/gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban d+ha ban d+ha/_
[\[164a.2\]]ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/_phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer byung ba 'di lta ste/_dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_nag po dang /_ljang gu dang /_ser po ste/_'od zer de dag gis 'gro 
[\[164a.3\]]ba ris drug po de dag la khyab ste/_dbugs dbyung bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[164a.4\]]mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_
[\[164a.5\]]gya nom snang dang /_'og min la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag gis mchod pa'i sprin gyi char phab nas lha'i bu rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/_spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku/_/phyag stong nyon mongs sgrol ba'i phyag_/spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te/_/'gro don mdzad 
[\[164a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par gyur to/_/de nas lha yi bus gsol pa/_'di yi phan yon ci yin zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig 
[\[164a.7\]]rgyud 'di yid byed na/_/nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni/_/rgyal po gcan gzan 'jigs pa dang /_/'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/mtshams med mi dge'i sdig pa kun/_/rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur/_/dmyal ba ngan 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]song sdug bsngal dang /_/mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te/_/nyan dang 'chang dang bsgom par 'gyur/_/dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu'i/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[164b.2\]]dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud nas legs so legs so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[164b.3\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[164b.4\]{D702}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_siM ha nA da tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug du bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la 
[\[164b.5\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lam rnams ji ltar sbyang /_e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog spyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod de/_/
