[\[164b.6\]]de yis smon lam sbyang ba dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par yid la byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug langs te/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA 
[\[164b.7\]]satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a ka Te/_bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_ka TaM ka Te/_ka ro Te/_ka ro kaM Te/_bI r+yai swA hA/_o~M AHhrIHsiM ha nA da hU~M/_bru~M A~M dzrIM kha~M hU~M/_o~M AHhU~M/_o~M ba li na b+huny+dza dzi ba puSh+pe d+hU pe hU~M/_sarba a mr-i te hU~M/_o~M ba ta li/_ma hA ba ta li/_hU~M 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]hU~M hU~M dzaHswA hA/_o~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/_sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzaM hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M a ta pra ti hU~M phaT/_sri ti ka ra hU~M phaT/_o~M ba ru Na A gats+tsha ya/_Agats+tsha ya/_ma hA nA ga gi sa ti sarbe b+hur phuHphuHphuHswA hA/_o~M b+ha ga ba ti shru ti smr-i ti sa ma ba ti/_sa ra ma ti sid+d+hi swA hA/_o~M 
[\[165a.2\]]AHhrIHhU~M swA hA/_phuHhrIHo~M siM ha nA da hU~M phaT phaT/_nA ga du pa la mA ra ya phaT/_dz+wA la dz+wA la hU~M phaT/_o~M a big+h+nan+ta kr-i ta hU~M/_o~M ag+na ye a ti bya/_a b+hi sa ma ya bi sha/_ma hA shri ye ha bya/_ka bya ma hA ni ya swA yA/_o~M b+ha ba ka ag+na ye/_shAn+tiM ku ru ya swA hA/_AHhrIHsiM ha nA da badzra tsakra brta 
[\[165a.3\]]lo ki ka bru~M bru~M bru~M/_lo kot+ta ra Ni siM ha nA da bru~M bru~M bru~M hU~M na hU~M na/_siM ha nA da bru~M bru~M bru~M hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/_gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni maN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'o/_/gsad pa dang /_phyir ldog pa dang /_dgug pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_zhi ba'i las yin te/_nang par ba'i lci bas lam 
[\[165a.4\]]lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/_mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/_/seng ge'i steng du zla ba la/_/rgyal po rol ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs/_/g.yas na thod mtshan rtse gsum la/_/drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang 
[\[165a.5\]]du bsdus/_/pad+ma'i rtse la thod pa ni/_/'phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da/_/shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas/_/dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la/_/rigs lngas rnam par brgyan pa'o/_/gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang /_/rtse mor 'od dpag med pas brgyan/_/seng ge'i 
[\[165a.6\]]cha las byung ba yin/_/'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis/_/pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan/_/rang lus 'og nas thal mo sbyor/_/sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed/_/rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i/_/thugs ka nas ni sngags 'od 'don/_/spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i sngags/_/
[\[165a.7\]]nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya'o/_/gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin no/_/gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di nyan pa dang /_sems pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_tha na 'di la mos 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa'i bu dang /_tshangs chen rnams kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_kun tu rjes su 'brang bar byed de/_de bas ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[165b.2\]]bu la mas srung ba bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi bar du gcad par mi nus so/_/gang shi 'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can du pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'dir me dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur 
[\[165b.3\]]ro/_/'dir ni mdo tsam smos su zad kyi/_de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed na/_de la lha'i bu dang /_klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis bsrung bar gyis shig 
[\[165b.4\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar byas so/_/de nas gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po la lan du mar bsngags na bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge sgra'i rgyud 
[\[165b.5\]]ces bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pradz+nyA kA ra dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D703}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya sid+ha nA da na ma d+hA ra NI/_
[\[165b.6\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i 
[\[165b.7\]]rtse mo na/_rin po che'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rin po che dang /_mu tig dang /_nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/_'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/_me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]med pa dang /_nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor zhing /_bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dug 
[\[166a.2\]]ste/_'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yul 
[\[166a.3\]]ma ga d+hA na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang btsun mo dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las rgyal po de mdze dang /_phol mig dang /_dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste de ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[166a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid la 'jam dpal khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes bya ba yin la/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba 
[\[166a.5\]]yin pas/_byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkar po cig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/_sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan/_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_ral gri dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pal 
[\[166a.6\]]thogs nas phyin pa la/_rgya mtsho chen po las rgal ba'i dus su seng ge bzhag nas khur res byas shing byon pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkum mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog 
[\[166a.7\]]gi bsam pa la steng 'og bar snang gi klu dang lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/_tri shU la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/_seng ge dkar po la zhon/_mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la bsdigs te/_snying rje'i stobs 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]kyis sems can don byas pas/_/rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus/_/lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las/_/grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'gums par bgyid/_/ces smras te/_lha rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i 
[\[166b.2\]]dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/_lha'i me tog pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul te thod pa bkang ngo /_/de nas bar snang gi lha dang /_klu dang /_dri za dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[166b.3\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/_tri shU la gdengs nas/_snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/_/rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus/_/sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i 
[\[166b.4\]]las/_/grong khyer 'joms zhing sde brgyad 'gums par bgyid/_/ces smras te/_sde brgyad la tri shU la gdengs pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang /_dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga ma dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[166b.5\]]ris dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang /_grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/_seng ge la rin po che'i rgyan phul lo/_/de nas sa'i 'og na 
[\[166b.6\]]gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/_snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/_/rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus/_/klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes na chad pa'i las/_/grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid/_/ces smras te/_rgya mtsho chen po tri shU las 
[\[166b.7\]]dkrugs pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_'od dang ldan pa/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/_klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus te/_dga' ba'i 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]mdangs phyung nas klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal/_bskor ba lan gsum byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/_/khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig_/nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/_/
[\[167a.2\]]ces smras nas tri shU la la lan gsum dkris kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur phuHphuHzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnas so/_/klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas/_bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/_/
[\[167a.3\]]khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o/_/klu rnams thams cad skyabs su zung /_/nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/_/ces smras nas klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la 'khris so/_/klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyid do/_/ci bka' 
[\[167a.4\]]stsal pa nyan no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o/_/snying nad sel ba zhes bya ba'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po de 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge khyod nyid yin no/_/
[\[167a.5\]]de'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog de ni da lta'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no/_/'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sngags brjod par bya'o/_/yid la zung shig_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[167a.6\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa dwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM a ka Te bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_ka TaM ka Te ka ro Te/_tsi ti dz+wa la ka ro ti bI ra ye swA hA/_gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus gsungs la/_da lta rang nyid kyis brjod pa'o/_/'di'i 
[\[167a.7\]]cho ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sku lugs ma'am bris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/_maN+Dal re re la me tog tshom bu lnga lnga bkram ste/_me tog dang /_
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/_maN+Dal re re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/_lci ba lhag ma la bsngags shing nad pa la byugs na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang klu la sogs 
[\[167b.2\]]pa'i dug gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/_'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin no/_/'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal rgyal po chen po'i 
[\[167b.3\]]gnod pa ni gzungs 'dis snying nad 'bar ba las grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal nyon cig_/sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus snying po 'di gsungs so/_/o~M AHhrIHsiM ha nA da hUM phaT/_
[\[167b.4\]]da lta nga nyid kyis brjod de/_rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/srid pa nyam ngar 'gro mi 'gyur/_/lus la mtshon gyis tshugs mi 'gyur/_/dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs shing /_/klu la sogs pas 'tshe mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu 
[\[167b.5\]]dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/_/bud med lus su mi 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/shi nas bde ba can du 'gro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_gser thub 
[\[167b.6\]]dang /_'od srung gis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/_da lta shAkya thub pa ngas kyang brjod pa ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo ha ya grI bA ya/_na mo lo ki shwa rA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M hrIHku lu yu lu nI la kad+Tha/_hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban d+ha ban d+ha/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_hA hA 
[\[167b.7\]]hA hA/_badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hrIHhU~M phaT/_'jam dpal gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid pad+ma ha ya grI ba'i sngags yin te/_lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/_/sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing /_/ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur/_/klu sogs 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]gdon gyis 'tshe mi 'gyur/_/byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no/_/bye ba grangs med mthu las byung /_/de yi yon tan dpag tu med/_/lan cig bklags na sdig pa sel/_/lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan/_/
[\[168a.2\]]gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur/_/'bum phrag bcu yis zhal mthong 'gyur/_/pad+ma can gyi zhing der 'gro/_/'jam dpal mi gzhan dag la ni/_/khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_/rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang /_/klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang /_/klu bram ze'i 
[\[168a.3\]]rigs kyis zin pa dang /_klu gdol pa dang da [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rigs kyis zin pa ni snying mi dga' ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lto rgyab tu na ba dang /_klad kor du na ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_ma zhu ba dang /_sbos pa dang /_zha grum gyis btab pa dang /_sbrum pa lta 
[\[168a.4\]]bur na ba dang /_srog chags su na ba dang /_tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang /_za khu can dang /_lud pa glo can dang /_rus khol du na ba dang /_'phres pa dang /_zha ba dang /_yig mi bde ba dang /_thor pa lta bu'i nad dang /_skran can dang /_dmu chu can dang /_'bras dang /_
[\[168a.5\]]me dpal dang /_lhog pa dang /_gag pa dang /_chu thig can dang /_grang lhang lhang dang /_tsha tsag tsag la sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang /_phol mig dang bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_bdud dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gshin rje dang /_brag srin dang /_sems 'khrug gi 
[\[168a.6\]]gdon dang /_thab gzhob dang /_mtsho sman dang /_klu la sogs pas zin pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_log 'dren dang /_sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang /_nad sna tshogs 'byung ste/_de yang mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyon cig_/snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di/_/dang po thugs rje chen po la/_/gus shing dad pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/snum pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya/_/lci ba drir bcas byugs nas ni/_/tshon 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]rtsi kha dog sna lnga yis/_/dkyil 'khor pad+ma lta bu bri/_/bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang /_/phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag_/gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams/_/seng ldeng phur bu lnga yang dgod/_/dar gyis dkris pa'i mda' bzhi dgod/_/tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[168b.2\]]dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo/_/A hrIHhri pa~M rta~M no~M/_yi ge drug pa'i sngags 
[\[168b.3\]]'di ni/_brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel swA hA/_sangs rgyas mchod la brtson par bya/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_phye ma dang /_rgyan thams cad kyis mchod nas/_seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la/_/tshon 
[\[168b.4\]]skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams bsreg_/rma bya rmag shad lcug ma yis/_/klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed/_/hrIHnA ga le le/_nA ga dum ba le le/_nA ga phuta phuta ha le ha le/_hA la hA la/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_nA ga khrol khrol shig shig swA hA/_klu dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid kyi dug dang /_mthong ba'i dug dang /_
[\[168b.5\]]bcings pa'i dug dang /_kha rlangs kyi dug dang /_reg pa'i dug dang /_dug thams cad phyir phud cig swA hA/_dug 'dir ma 'dug cig_/sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig_/'dzin pa'i gan du song shig_/me'i nang du song shig_/chu'i nang du song shig zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/_'jam dpal 'di dag ni 
[\[168b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/_/hriHbru~M oM hU~M kha~M/_rigs lngas dbang bskur ba'o/_/rdo rje bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/bkra shis lha mo dpal dang ldan/_/bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas/_/dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas/_/bum chu dag pas las sgrib 
[\[168b.7\]]sel/_/lus ngag sems kyi dag pa thob/_/pha rol phyin drug gnas 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas sems can mkhyen par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_/bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi/_/skud pa dkar po sum sgril la/_/bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad byas nas/_/mgul du 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]btags na nad las grol/_/nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/_/gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na/_/nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/chu la gzungs sngags mang bzlas na/_/klu nad khong du sel bar 'gyur/_/lo tog za ba kha bcings na/_/bye ma 
[\[169a.2\]]sa dang thal bas sel/_/ha cang char pa ches pa na/_/lha la phul ba'i rnying pa la/_/kham phor sar pa'i nang du yang /_/me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni/_/bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/_/ser ba drag po 'ong ba na/_/thal chen yungs kar bzlas brjod kyis/_/
[\[169a.3\]]ser ba nya lcibs lcug ma dang /_/lcum po btags te btsugs gyur na/_/ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ba yin/_/lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i/_/gdon ni gnod par gyur pa la/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_/bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/_/sman sbyar chus ni gang ba la/_/bzlas 
[\[169a.4\]]brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/slob ma gos zas dkar por sbyar/_/dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug_/bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya/_/nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/_/klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis/_/glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs 
[\[169a.5\]]pa las/_/gi wang gis ni srung 'khor bri/_/yungs kar dag dang bcas te gdags/_/bus pa gdon dang nad las thar/_/lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/_/thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi grwar/_/bzlas brjod bdun byas mdud pa bor/_/song na bde zhing don yang 'grub/_/
[\[169a.6\]]rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams la/_/chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la/_/bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur/_/mi nad phyugs nad thams cad la/_/yungs kar dang ni bum pa'i chus/_/bkru zhing btags na mi nad zhi/_/a mra ri yi gzungs sel ltar/_/las 
[\[169a.7\]]rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rgyal po 'di'i khong na klu'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste/_'di ni klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na 'di yis klu thams cad la dbang byed pa 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]yin pas 'dis dbyung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po tak+Sha ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po pad+ma la phyag 'tshal 
[\[169b.2\]]lo/_/klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po dungaskyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M ba ru NA ya swA hA/_o~M a nan+ta ya 
[\[169b.3\]]swA hA/_o~M bA su kA ya swA hA/_o~M tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/_o~M kar ko TA ya swA hA/_o~M pad+mA ya swA hA/_o~M ma hA pad+mA ya swA hA/_o~M shar+kha pA lA ya swA hA/_o~M ku li kA ya swA hA/_klu yi gzugs ni mang po yang /_/dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la/_/legs byas kha dog 
[\[169b.4\]]bsgyur byas la/_/me tog spos dang byug pa dang /_/mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog phreng /_/tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya/_/rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang /_/me tog 'bras bu sman gyis mchod/_/rma bya gzungs mo me long gis/_/rgyal 
[\[169b.5\]]po khong gi dug thon cig_/rin chen rmag shad mchod pa'i rten/_/mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs/_/bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes/_/srog chags yid 'ong gzugs kyis mchod/_/zhi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis/_/zin kyang skad cig 
[\[169b.6\]]gcig la thon/_/'jam dpal 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o/_/stobs so byin gyis brlabs so/_/thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi lang yang bdag gis cha shas tsam zhig brjod na/_o~M bcom ldan 
[\[169b.7\]]'das/_bya ba byas shing byed pa byas/_/khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes/_/srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad/_/yang dag bka' las rnam par grol/_/sems dpa' dbang bsgyur thams cad kyi/_/mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa/_/srid las rgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs/_/
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]AHgzhan la phan brtson thugs rje can/_/sems can kun la mchog tu byams/_/khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu/_/mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas/_/hrIH'gro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob/_/dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin/_/mngon shes 
[\[170a.2\]]drug brnyes n+ya gro bu/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes/_/sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra/_/gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshon/_/sku tshad che la 'od zer 'bar/_/rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'phro/_/
[\[170a.3\]]dbu skra thor tshugs gyen la brdzes/_/dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/_/klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/_/rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu dkris/_/rigs gsum mgon po'i byin rlabs 'dzin/_/dug gsum rtsad nas gcod la bstod/_/skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma bsnams/_/
[\[170a.4\]]shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bar/_/nyon mongs dag pa bram ze'i mgo/_/me tog dri zhim tshogs kyis bkang /_/klu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas/_/sbrul gyi tshangs skud mdzes la bstod/_/siM ha/_pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs/_/bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad pa/_/
[\[170a.5\]]seng ge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs/_/'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/_/ba spu nyag ma re re yang /_/sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod/_/tA/_dam chos rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/_/
[\[170a.6\]]lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang /_/'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku mdog ljang /_/gnod pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin/_/ut+pal thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/_/btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed/_/hU~M/_gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed/_/yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bar bskor/_/'dod 
[\[170a.7\]]pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi/_/'jigs pa brgyad po sel ba bstod/_/phaT/_ha ya grI ba khro bo'i sku/_/'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms/_/kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa 'dul/_/klu bdud 'dul mdzad hU~M gis bstod/_nA_/nam mkha' klu rgyal pa ru Na/_/chu lha ston 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa'i zhal mthong zhing /_/bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul/_/sa dang po yi bden pa mthong /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin/_/klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_o~M ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/_ka taM ka ra swA hA/_gang gis bstod 
[\[170b.2\]]cing zlos pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong gi bar dung na song du mi skye'o/_/bud med lus su mi skye'o/_/
[\[170b.3\]]su zhig nang par langs nas chu dri zhim pos khrus byas te/_gtsang sbra la gnas nas/_thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam/_'dri 'am/_'chang ngam/_klog tu 'jug gam kha ton tu bton nas snying po dang gzungs sngags zlos na ni de'i lus la mdze 
[\[170b.4\]]dang /_shu ba dang /_phol mig dang /_'bras dang /_bas ldags dang /_me dpal dang /_g.yan pa dang /_lhog pa dang /_gag pa dang /_spos pa dang /_dmu chu dang /_skem pa dang /_mkhal ma rdol ba dang /_don snod 'dus pa dang /_byad kyi dkyil 'khor la 
[\[170b.5\]]nad sna tshogs 'dus pa dang /_glo ba na ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzungs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/su zhig gam rgyal po chen po 
[\[170b.6\]]des gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po yul 'khor dang bcas pa'am/_gtsug lag 
[\[170b.7\]]khang du glegs bam 'di 'chang na/_dpal nag po chen po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang /_klu chen po brgyad rnams slad bzhin 'brang zhing /_dpag tshad stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gdon ma rungs pa 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]thams cad dang /_log par 'dren pa dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/bsgom nyes pa dang /_bri nyes pa dang /_sngags nor ba dang /_phyag rgya nor ba dang /_bshad nyes pa dang /_mnyan pa nor ba yang gzungs 'di bklags pas dag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[171a.2\]]gzungs 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang /_bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su byas pa de la mtshon dang /_dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_byad dang gshed ma dang /_rims dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi bas mi 
[\[171a.3\]]tshugs so/_/gnod par byed pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /_nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs 
[\[171a.4\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bris ka rang byung gi mchod rten rtsar/_dngos grub brnyes pa'i rje btsun ma rdo rje sems ma dang /_
[\[171a.5\]]sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba 'gar shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D704}]@#/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a ka Te/_bi ka 
[\[171a.6\]]Te/_ni ka Te/_ka taM ka Te/_ka ro Te/_ka ro Ta/_bIr+ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor maN+Dal brgyad byas la maN+Dal re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la/_lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te nad pa la nye bar byugs na nad thams cad zhi bar 
[\[171a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te nyi ma bdun nam/_bcu gsum mam/_nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste/_mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni ma yin no/_/de ltar ma grub na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro/_/seng ge sgra'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]po ngag gi dbang phyug dang /_klogs skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D705}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[171b.2\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/_pho brang ri po Ta la'i rtse mo na/_me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis bkram pa/_'dzam bu na da'i gser 
[\[171b.3\]]gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/_de na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[171b.4\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rim gror byas/_mchod cing bkur stir byas te/_yongs su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 
[\[171b.5\]]'bru bzang po/_yongs su byang ba/_yongs su dag pa/_ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su gsal ba/_tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 
[\[171b.6\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/_kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_bya ba byas shing byed pa byas/_/khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes/_/srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad/_/yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems/_/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/_/klu chen po 
[\[171b.7\]]ni cang shes po/_/sems la dbang sgyur thams cad kyi/_/mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob/_/ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs/_/srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu rgal/_/gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson/_/thugs rje dang ni 'brel pa'i thugs/_/skye dgu kun la rab tu byams/_/
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]dge ba rab brtson byams las byung /_/mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas/_/bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes/_/bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'/_/khams gsum gyi ni gnyen gcig po/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/dri ma gsum ni rab tu 
[\[172a.2\]]spangs/_/rig pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin/_/mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes/_/n+ya gro d+ha ni lta bur zlum/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang /_/sku ni rnam pa kun tu brgyan/_/sku mdog gser gyi kha 
[\[172a.3\]]dog 'dra/_/sku tshad che zhing dkar sham po/_/nA ga ge sar gzhon nu ltar/_/cung zad dmar ba 'dra ba'i mdog_/dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan/_/thor tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs/_/dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/_/'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro/_/'dom gang 
[\[172a.4\]]'od ni rab tu 'bar/_/gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab/_/gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che/_/shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi/_/nyi ma'i gtsug tor dag dang ldan/_/nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yi/_/ser la khas ni sku phyed brgyan/_/sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas/_/pha rol phyin pa 
[\[172a.5\]]bcu rnams spyod/_/tshul khrims ma nyams ral ba med/_/thong ka seng ge 'phyong ba 'dra/_/sku ni 'jam zhing ldem bag can/_/gzigs shing gshegs pas khyu mchog 'dra/_/g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung yang 'dra/_/dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra/_/dpral ba'i dbyibs 
[\[172a.6\]]kyi rgya yang che/_/smin mtshams bar yang yong ma chad/_/spyan ni nor bu rin chen 'bar/_/shangs kyi dbyibs ni cung zad mtho/_/tshems kyi sgros kyis rnam par gnon/_/ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing /_/snyan gyi khung yang rab tu zab/_/mgur yang bum pa'i 
[\[172a.7\]]mgrin pa 'dra/_/dpung ba dag kyang rab tu zlum/_/phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring /_/sen mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar/_/phyag sor rnams kyi bar yang 'brel/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la/_/'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan/_/ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bar mdzes/_/sku mdog 'jam zhing sha yang rgyas/_/gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar zab/_/yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba/_/pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog_/pad+ma dag las kun du skyes/_/pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs/_/
[\[172b.2\]]phyag na pad+ma bzang po bsnams/_/ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams/_/kr-iSh+Na sa ri'i pags pa bsnams/_/dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin/_/bkra shis dag gis gtsang mar 'gyur/_/snga nas gsung zhing gsong por smra/_/bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_/yid bzhin 
[\[172b.3\]]nor bu rin chen ltar/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/_/bzang por snang ba'i ljon shing ltar/_/sems can kun gyi gsos su gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa lags/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin/_/
[\[172b.4\]]ba spu nyag ma re re yang /_/sems can kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur/_/bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad/_/bshol ba med cing nges pa ste/_/rab tu grags pa'i brtson 'grus can/_/'khor ba dag las kun tu rgal/_/dam chos rgyal tshab mnga' gsol ba/_/yid bzhin 
[\[172b.5\]]'khor lo bde bar skor/_/don yod zhags pas nyon mongs 'dren/_/'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms/_/kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel/_/chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las sgrol/_/lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang /_/khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed/_/rgyal 
[\[172b.6\]]ba can ni tshul dang ldan/_/mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan/_/yon tan ldan zhing byams dang ldan/_/shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan/_/tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan/_/don rnams kun ni rig pa po/_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/_/chos rnams thams cad smra ba po/_/
[\[172b.7\]]'jig rten kun gyi ston pa po/_/zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan/_/gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas/_/'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag_/tshangs la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa'i/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la la 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byas pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bskal 
[\[173a.2\]]pa stong gi bar du yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o/_/mnar med par mi ltung ngo /_/su zhig nang par langs nas/_klog gam klog tu 'jug pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa de'i lus la mdze dang shu ba dang glo na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[173a.3\]]lha'i sras po dang 'dra'o/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gar skyes gar gnas kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/sems dpa' bar 
[\[173a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/_/bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas 
[\[173a.5\]]par 'gyur te/_rnam par smin pa 'dra bas na bye brag med do/_/rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[173a.6\]{D706}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka_/bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[173a.7\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/_ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs bkram pa/_'dzam bu chu bo'i gser kha dog bzang po ltar snang ba/_rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/_lha dang /_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas te/_mchod cing rjed nas/_
[\[173b.2\]]yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas tshangs pa la 
[\[173b.3\]]sogs pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das/_dgongs pa mdzad pa/_mdzad rgyu mdzad pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su bsal ba/_yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas/_thugs shin tu rnam 
[\[173b.4\]]par grol ba/_cang mkhyen pa/_glang po che chen po dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/_ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/_srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba/_gzhan la sman pa/_thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/_skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes 
[\[173b.5\]]gshin pa/_bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa/_byams pas zhugs pa/_sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba la mkhas pa/_bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po/_srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pu/_'dod chags mi mnga' ba/_zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/_gti mug mi mnga' ba/_dri ma 
[\[173b.6\]]gsum spangs pa/_rig pa gsum gyi pha rol du gshegs pa/_mngon par shes pa drug brnyes pa/_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/_pags pa srab cing mdog ser ba/_sku ring rgyu 
[\[173b.7\]]bzang zhing dkar ba/_sku shing gi me tog sar pa dang /_dmar ring lta bu'i dbu thor tshugs mnga' ba/_lcang lo 'khyil pa mang pos dbu khebs pa/_'od dpag med kyis 'od zer btang ba/_'bar ba'i 'od 'dom gang gis gser gyi ri bo ltar snyan par grags pa/_gzi brjid 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]rgya che ba/_gzugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/_nor bu rab tu 'bar ba/_mchod phyir thogs sku la se ral du thogs pa/_sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims mnyams pa/_tshul khrims ma zhig pa/_
[\[174a.2\]]seng ge ltar thong ka phel ka che ba/_sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/_gzigs pa dang gshegs thabs khyu mchog gi dbang po 'dra ba/_mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil pa/_dpral ba che zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra la thig le mnga' ba/_phyag pus mor slebs pa/_smin ma bar ma chad pa/_shangs 
[\[174a.3\]]mtho ba/_mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra ba/_phyag sor mo dang tshigs ring ba/_sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog dang 'dra ba/_phyag dra bas 'brel pa/_phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los brgyan pa/_ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra ba/_sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/_tshangs pa ltar dbyangs 
[\[174a.4\]]zab pa/_yid du mchi ba sdug pa/_blta na sdug pa/_nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/_'od pad+ma 'dra ba/_pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/_pad+ma las byung ba/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_phyag na pad+ma mnga' ba/_phyag na ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]nag po'i 
[\[174a.5\]]pags pa mnabs pa/_phyag mkhar bsnams pa/_bgrang ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/_gtsang ba stsangs pa/_gsong por gsung ba/_bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/_blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba/_sems can 
[\[174a.6\]]thams cad mos par mdzad pa/_dga' bar mdzad pa/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/_bde bar gshegs pa'i cha byad mnga' ba/_bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin pa/_spu re re skyes pa/_sems can gyi snying po/_bsod nams 
[\[174a.7\]]mdzad pa/_dge ba mdzad pa/_nges par mdzad pa/_brtson 'grus 'bar ba/_'khor ba las shin tu 'das pa/_dam pa'i chos la rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba/_sgrol ma zhabs drung na gnas pa/_khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/_rgyal ba dang ldan pa/_tshul 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pa/_mthu rtsal che ba/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_byams pa dang ldan pa/_zhi ba dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_skal pa dang ldan pa/_don dang ldan pa/_don rnams thugs su chud pa/_the tsom rnams gcod pa/_chos rnams 
[\[174b.2\]]gsung ba/_'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/_zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa/_sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/_sku nyi ma stong bas lhag par mdzes pa/_tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa 
[\[174b.3\]]lags so/_/gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de la gsang sngags 
[\[174b.4\]]thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/su zhig nang par langs nas 'don tam/_klog gam/_kha ton byed na de'i lus la mdze dang /_rkang shu dang /_lud pa dang /_
[\[174b.5\]]mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[174b.6\]]gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur/_dpa' bar 'gyur/_skad snyan par 'gyur/_skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[174b.7\]]bstod pa sgrub pa 'dis bstod pa byas na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/_rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D707}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ru tsi ra a~M ga yaSh+Thi nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya 
[\[175a.2\]]ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi te a sa~M khe ya/_sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka te dza/_pra b+ha a ba b+ha si ta mUrta ye/_ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la/_a laM ka ra d+ha ri Ne b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/_sarba lo ka a 
[\[175a.3\]]pa ya sha ma nA ya/_bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a biSh+Tha/_sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/_ma hA a lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ra pa ta la bi nA sha ka_/rA ga dwe Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka_/sha sa ka rak+Sha ka_/sarba a pA ya durga ti pra sha ma ka_/sarba satA sa mA 
[\[175a.4\]]shwA sa na ka ra/_sarba A sha ba ri pU ra ka_/sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ha na ka ra/_he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_ba ra ba ra dA ya ka_/pad+ma a lo ka saM b+ha ta/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/dza TA mu ku Ta/_a laM kr-i ta shi rA/_ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/_sha ta badzra bai DUr+ya a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka 
[\[175a.5\]]ma la a laM kr-i ta/_pra b+ha ra Na rA dza na sha ta sa ha sra a b+hi la Shi ta kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa bar/_bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/_bi nA sha ya/_bi nA sha ya/_ma hA yAM tra kle sha ka ba TA/_a ba bad d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa saM sa ra tsa ra ka pra ma thA na/_pu ru Sha pad+ma/_pu ru Sha nA ga_/pu ru Sha sA ga ra/_pu ru 
[\[175a.6\]]Sha siM ha/_baM hi/_bi ra bi ra dza/_su dAn+ta pa ri pri ta/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ma sa ma/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_pra shA sayA pra shA sa yA/_pra d+h+wan sA ya/_pra d+h+wan sA ya/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_bi bi ri bi bi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_mu ru 
[\[175a.7\]]mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_g+ha ya g+ha ya/_g+hA d+ha ya/_g+hA d+ha ya/_ha sa ha sa/_pra ha sa pra ha sa/_nA nA bi/_bi d+ha kle sha bA sa nA/_ha ra ha ra/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_d+hu ru Ti/_d+hu ru Ti/_ma hA maN+Da a laM ka ra Na/_sha ta pra se 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]ka_/a ba bA si ta ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka_/ma hA bo d+hi satwa bar da swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_byang chub sems dpa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dam pa/_rdo rje chen pos bgegs par gsungs pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_sbyin byed 
[\[175b.2\]]ma'i bu dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/_re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chan po mang pos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/_'chang ngam/_'don tam/_klog gam/_mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/_de'i las 
[\[175b.3\]]dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na lag na pad+ma phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gcig pu rab tu dben par 
[\[175b.4\]]'dug ste/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rjes su dran par byas la/_lan bdun brjod na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 
[\[175b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/yid tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang pad+ma'i 
[\[175b.6\]]rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo khyad du 'phags pas bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 
[\[175b.7\]]snang ba yang de la skye bar 'gyur/_dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/_bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur/_sems mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/_tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi 
[\[176a.2\]]sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed par 'dod na/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/_dkyil 'khor de dang bcom ldan 'das la me tog 
[\[176a.3\]]sna tshogs gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_spos kyis bsti stang byas te de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/_des sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa 
[\[176a.4\]]byed pa yang sdig pa byang zhing /_shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_dbang bskur 
[\[176a.5\]]ba'i stobs dang /_sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang /_ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs bsgrub par mdzad do/_/gnam la gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo/_/sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/_lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro/_/'bab chu 
[\[176a.6\]]dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad la lag pas byab cing bzlas brjod byas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i gdong 
[\[176a.7\]]du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyid par 'gyur ro/_/mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na/_dpag tshad tshun chad mtshams gcad pa dang /_bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D708}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin 
[\[176b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen 
[\[176b.3\]]po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'ching ba gcod pa la 
[\[176b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o/_/las kun byed pa dge ba ste/_/'byung po kun gyis 'jigs pa med/_/
[\[176b.5\]]bdud rtsi las ni bdud rtsi 'byung /_/'di ni las kun byed pa yin/_/dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste/_/rtsod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang /_/gzhan dang dgras ni 'khor ba dang /_/rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang /_rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang /_/rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed/_/
[\[176b.6\]]rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel/_/dug dang me ni rengs byed dang /_/rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel/_/chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul/_/rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel/_/'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang /_/chom rkun rab tu ston pa ste/_/
[\[176b.7\]]'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can/_/gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms/_/gang tshe rig sngags 'di bshad pa/_/de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur/_/'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/_/rig sngags rgyal po bla na med/_/'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste/_/'jig 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]rten gsum po kun gyis mchod/_/de nas 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so/_/o~M ta ra ta ra/_tA re tA re/_
[\[177a.2\]]mo ri ke/_tsan+d+ra prab+he/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_sUr+ya kA na te/_he ma pra b+he/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ni/_sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/_tsa ra tsa ra/_pi Sha pra sha ma ni/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skri te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA Shita/_pa ra pa 
[\[177a.3\]]ra/_pi ri pi ri/_pu ru pu ru/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta/_a nu dz+nyA te/_ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU re/_gaM gA na ngI bA lu ko pa mA/_ta thA ga ta b+hA Shi ta/_pri yaM ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri/_pri ti ka ri/_shu b+ha ka ri/_pa bi tra/_maM ga la d+hA ri Ni/_sarba de ba tA/_ad+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba 
[\[177a.4\]]kin nar ad+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_prah+ma b+hA Shi te/_in+d+ra b+hA Shi te/_tsa tur ma hA rA dza b+hA Shi te/_tsan+d+ra sUr+ya b+hA Shi te/_oM ti ri ti ri/_tsan+d+ra kI ra Ne/_ki li ki li/_sarba sha trUM bi nA sha ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams 
[\[177a.5\]]pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[177a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so/_/de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[177a.7\]]rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la yang bsnyad do/_/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser thub 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]dang /_'od srung dang /_shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni bdag srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_gnyi ga srung ba dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang /_
[\[177b.2\]]srog skyong ba dang /_tshe sbyin pa dang /_lag cha rengs par byed pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang /_dgra thams cad zlog pa dang /_'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa dang /_thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/_/
[\[177b.3\]]shud d+hi/_mu ka te pra b+hA swa re shwe te/_paN+Da rA bA si ni/_sarba duSh+Tan dzi b+ha yA mi/_staM b+ha yA mi/_mo ha yA mi/_o~M swA hA/_pa bi tre swA hA/_shwe te swA hA/_shwe te pa ta pa bit+t+re swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re tA ri Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba ka li ka la ha/_bi gra ha bi b+ha ta duHswa p+na b+ha ye b+h+yaHswA hA/_rtag tu le lo med 
[\[177b.4\]]par ni/_/gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa/_/de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang /_/dus kun du ni srung bar byed/_/de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med/_/de ni rtag srung lhan ne 'jug_/ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na/_/gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne bzhin/_/de la gshed byed byad 
[\[177b.5\]]stems dang /_/srul po dag gis mi tshugs te/_/de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur/_/kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel/_/'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde 
[\[177b.6\]]la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D709}]@#/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal/_/rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[177b.7\]]ngo bo gtsug tor te/_/thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang /_/log dad sel ba'i stobs nyid dang /_/gser thub kyi ni bslab pa dang /_/'od srung gi ni yon tan dang /_/shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog_/tad+ya thA/_dza yan+ti/_bi dza yan+ti/_dza ye bi dza yan 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]dzi ti dzi ti/_a pa rA dzi ti/_pa ra sai n+ya pra marda ni ye swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so//[ {D710}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[178a.2\]]rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_dza yA ba hI ni/_dza yod ta ri/_ka la ka la/_ma la ma la/_tsa 
[\[178a.3\]]la tsa la/_k+Shi na k+Shi na sarba karma A bar Na/_ni me sarba A dz+nyA dz+nyA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti sa ha sra brte/_sarba bud d+ha a ba lo ki ti tsak+ShuHshro tra g+h+ra Na dzi hwA kA ya ma no bi dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_phu ru phu ru/_su ru su ru/_phu rA phu rA/_pra phu rA pra phu rA/_sarba bud d+ha ad+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_
[\[178a.4\]]d+harmA d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/_a b+hA ba swA hA/_sarba d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[178a.5\]]bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin dus gsum mtshan 
[\[178a.6\]]dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la yang mi phyed pa'i sems dad pa can du 'gyur te/_de la sogs pa 
[\[178a.7\]]phan yon tshad med pa dag 'byung ngo /_/stong 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D711}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a ba lo ki ni/_ba lo ki ni/_pra b+hA lo ki ni/_dzI ba ha pa ri sho d+ha ni/_d+hi da ni ya ga me/_A shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/_sarba satwA ma no ra the/_kA ya sid+d+he shu tid+hA ra NI smr-i ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/_cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a pa marga'i so shing la lan bdun 
[\[178b.2\]]bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na nyin gcig la sha lo ka brgya brgya lobs so/_/zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sha lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so//[ {D712}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[178b.3\]]po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/_gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor gang la sngags 'di lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sha lo ka brgya lo bas par 'gyur te/_sngon lobs 
[\[178b.4\]]pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/_/sha lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so//[ {D713}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal 
[\[178b.5\]]lo/_/bI re bI re/_ma ti te dze/_te dza ma ti d+hA ra NI/_shru ta d+hA ra NI/_dza yan+ti bi dza yan+ti ma tid+hA ra NI swA hA/_sman bram hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/_'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur 
[\[178b.6\]]ro/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/_bstan bcos kyang rung ste/_thos na nyin zhag gcig la sha lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/_/sha lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D714}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[178b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tri shA tri shu la shA khi/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_Adz+nyA pa ya ti/_ba re na bu ha la/_mr-id d+hA tu swA hA/_cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas/_nang par chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang sha lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/_/yid ches pa'i rtags 
[\[179a.2\]]yod do/_/sha lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D715}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[179a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ka ba tsa kar+Na la la te swA hA/_chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i cho ga la 'phags 
[\[179a.4\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/_dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na/_nyin gcig kyang yi ge sha lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/_/sha lo ka stong 
[\[179a.5\]]lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D716}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[179a.6\]]phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM mu ni kan+te mu ni pra b+ha swa re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas te/_shu dag mthe bong tsam blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas zos na thog ma'i nyin mo yi ge sha lo 
[\[179a.7\]]ka stong bklags pa tsam gyis lobs par 'gyur ro/_/zhag gsum lon pa'i nyin mo sha lo ka sum stong lobs par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sha lo ka sum stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]{D717}]@##/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/_te dzo bid+yA hu ru me ha ra hu ru kr-iSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/_shu dag dkar 
[\[179b.2\]]po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/mi brjed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D718}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_shes rab 
[\[179b.3\]]skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes bya ba ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/_ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad 
[\[179b.4\]]kyis bskor nas mdun du byas te chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la sogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul po/_blo zhan pa/_yid 
[\[179b.5\]]mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_/bshad pa/_hU~M pi tsu pi tsu/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/_me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/_gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'dri 
[\[179b.6\]]ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_chung ngu na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang de'i tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/_/gang gi zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsa bas khyor gang la rig pa 'di lan bdun btab ste nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[179b.7\]]stong stong 'dzin to/_/lan cig 'thungs na lnga brgya 'dzin te nyin gcig bzhin shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du rjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ra sa zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/
[\[180a.2\]{D719}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_s+kha la te s+kha la te ma ni te swA hA/_
[\[180a.3\]]rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_khyor chu la lan gsum bzlas te/_'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang 
[\[180a.4\]]pos bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D720}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[180a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ma ti ba hu l+ye/_ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na daR+sha ne pra dz+nyA p+ta/_gam+b+hi re/_bo d+hi maN+DA nu sa ri Ni/_a bid+d+ha/_ta mon+d+ha/_ka ra bi d+ha ma ni/_dz+wa la 
[\[180a.6\]]dz+wa la/_pradz+nyA bI pe/_me d+hA pa di ni/_sarba a d+hiSh+Thi ta/_su ru su ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_me d+hA A na ya swA hA/_cho ga ni nang par zhing bzlas brjod byas na/_lobs skyen par 'gyur ro/_/sman bram hi snyim par bcug ste dud 
[\[180a.7\]]pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te/_zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]{D721}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na sa twA ba lo ke na bud d+ha k+She tra nir de sha na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu 
[\[180b.2\]]ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal 
[\[180b.3\]]gyi snying po dang /_me tog rgyas pa dang /_lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[180b.4\]]thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang /_skye ba gnyis dang /_skye ba gsum dang /_skye ba bcu dang /_skye ba nyi shu dang /_skye ba sum cu dang /_skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/_thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang /_
[\[180b.5\]]sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_dri med tog dang /_nor dpal dang /_glog gi tog dang /_dri med 'od dang /_tsan+dan dang /_bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[180b.6\]]chen po bdun brgya dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs 
[\[180b.7\]]rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgya stong dang /_gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/_lung bstan pa thob pa/_phyir mi ldog pa dpe med pa dang /_dri med 'od dang /_'od can ma dang /_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]'jigs byed ma dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_'phrog ma dang /_dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi 
[\[181a.2\]]bzang dang /_nor bu bzang po'i bu dang /_gang ba bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[181a.3\]]dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang /_na bza' dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/_ri mor byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod do/_/de nas 
[\[181a.4\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la dmigs pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing /_gzugs 
[\[181a.5\]]thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur nas/_sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to/_/gos 
[\[181a.6\]]med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to/_/smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to/_/lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to/_/sems can gang dag nor 
[\[181a.7\]]dang /_yo byad dang /_longs spyod med pa de dag ni nor dang /_yo byad dang /_longs spyod dag dang ldan par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad la yang bskul nas thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/_sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas sangs 
[\[181b.2\]]rgyas rjes su dran par byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/sems can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/sems 
[\[181b.3\]]can gang dag_/klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za rnams kyi nang na skyes pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang /_lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[181b.4\]]phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/_de dag mun pa 
[\[181b.5\]]chen po de nas yongs su thar bar gyur to/_/sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/_/de nas 'khor 
[\[181b.6\]]'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/_des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing 'dus pa 
[\[181b.7\]]chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung ston pa yang kun tu snang zhing chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje skyed la/_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[182a.2\]]la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can sdig pa byed pa/_dbul ba/_nyam chung ba/_lus mdog ngan pa/_rga ba dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/_longs spyod chung ba lus yongs su ma 
[\[182a.3\]]bsgoms pa/_tshe thung ba/_blo chung ba/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag 'byung ba yod de/_rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig dang /_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems 
[\[182a.4\]]can rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 
[\[182a.5\]]bar dag byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[182a.6\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/_
[\[182a.7\]]dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/_nyam chung ba/_mdog ngan pa/_tshe thung ba/_longs spyod chung ba/_lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung bar mchis te/_de dag ni ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig la gcig 'gum par 'gyur 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]la/_gcig gis gcig gi nor dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing /_gad mo dang /_'jo sgeg dang /_bro gar dang /_rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang /_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes par bgyid 
[\[182b.2\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de dag rgyu de dang gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i 
[\[182b.3\]]slad du bdag de dag gi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i bar dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du/_de 
[\[182b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs par 'tshal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma rtogs pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma gsan pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam nyan par 
[\[182b.5\]]'tshal ba dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[182b.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po lhags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyur cing /_slar mchi par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[182b.7\]]'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs par bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa legs par bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te/_snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[183a.2\]]kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de 
[\[183a.3\]]thos so/_/rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur nas/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/_ngas kyang lung bstan pa thob bo/_/
[\[183a.4\]]rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/_thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod 
[\[183a.5\]]nyid dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/_de'i 
[\[183a.6\]]'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstan pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/_'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_re ba thams cad grub pa dang /_nad rnams dang bral bar yang gyur la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[183a.7\]]rnams yongs su smin pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rnams 'byor ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]'os pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang /_tshe dang kha dog dang /_gzi brjid 
[\[183b.2\]]dang /_mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur te/_nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing /_sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus 
[\[183b.3\]]pa'i sems bskyed de/_chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag byas shing /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes 
[\[183b.4\]]brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang /_legs so zhes bya bar sbyin par byed pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yang yon 
[\[183b.5\]]tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/_blta na sdug pa dang /_nad rnams dang bral ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_blo brtan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_brtan pa dang ldan pa dang /_rgyal po thams cad dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad 
[\[183b.6\]]dang /_rgyal bu thams cad dang /_blon po thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /_phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang yo byad mang por yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag 
[\[183b.7\]]gi kha nas tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mig ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag la lha rnams srung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/phrag dog med pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang 
[\[184a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_
[\[184a.3\]]'chang ba dang /_ming tsam thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan pa yin te/_de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas pa yang yin pas/_de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tsom bskyed par mi bya'o/_/gang 
[\[184a.4\]]dag rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang /_longs spyod med pa dang /_blo med pa dang /_sred pa che ba dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba 
[\[184a.5\]]dang /_rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_klad pa na ba gang yin pa dang /_zan chad pa gang yin pa dang /_gos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang /_reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang 
[\[184a.6\]]yin pa dang /_spyo ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/des kyang 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams la sdig pa mi dge 
[\[184a.7\]]ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o/_/bsal bar bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag dang /_pha ma dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing 
[\[184b.2\]]dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_dmus long du 'gyur ba dang /_bud med kyi dngos por 
[\[184b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na 
[\[184b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_re 
[\[184b.5\]]ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_longs spyod pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bde ba chen por byed pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang /_las thams cad zad par byed pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_rmi 
[\[184b.6\]]lam ngan pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang /_tshe dang /_mdog dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_mthu che bar byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[184b.7\]]thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /_rims dang /_dug dang /_me dang /_chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi dag yod de de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang /_ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[185a.2\]]sku la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te/_legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi de dag gang lags/_
[\[185a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_tad+ya thA/_bud d+he/_su bud d+he/_bud d+ha ma te/_lo ke bi lo ke lo ka_/a ti krAn te/_satwa a ba lo ki ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba A sha pa ri pUr Ne/_d+yu ti na d+ha re/_na ra de ba
