[\[185a.4\]]pU dzi te/_ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na da de/_ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/_sarba lo ka ma su khI b+ha ba tu/_pUrba karma k+ShA pa ya tu/_rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/_sarba ye b+h+yasta thA ga ta/_a d+hiSh+ThA nen swA hA/_kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs 
[\[185a.5\]]shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/ngas kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/_grogs po dag 
[\[185a.6\]]gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te/_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems 
[\[185a.7\]]dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga rgyal dang /_'chab pa dang /_khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /_rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/_gang 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o/_/des na de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob 
[\[185b.2\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang stobs dang /_mdog dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 
[\[185b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[185b.4\]]lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam 'cha' ba mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med 
[\[185b.5\]]bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de bzung lags so/_/bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/_gang gi rna lam du gzungs de grag par gyur tam/_glo bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus 
[\[185b.6\]]la nyam nga ba'am/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/_bro nad dam/_rims sam/_lus bro 'tshal ba'am/_sems gdung ba'am/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa'am/_chab kyis 'jigs pa'am/_mtshon gyis 'jigs pa'am/_dug gis 'jigs pa'am/_dug sbyar 
[\[185b.7\]]mas 'jigs pa'am/_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'byung po'i 'jigs pa'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dgra rnams sam/_mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis tho 'tsham pa'am/_rnam par gtse ba'am/_gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de'i slad 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang /_bdag gis chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /_ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang /_mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang /_'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs 
[\[186a.2\]]su rdzogs par bgyid pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_sarba bo d+hi sa twA nA na/_ar hA tA na/_tad+ya thA/_o~M badzra d+ha ra/_badzra kA ya/_badzra ba la/_badzra te dza/_hU~M hU~M/_badzra pA Ni/_ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA ma pa lA 
[\[186a.3\]]ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma/_sarba byA d+hI na sarba pA bA na nA sha ya/_de hi me/_ya thai ba si ta ma ba ra ma/_ya na ya me ba a b+hi prA ya na yA tsa mi tan ta me ba sa mr-i d+ha tu/_he he/_tu ru tu ru/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha mA bi lam ba/_dar+Sha ya/_badzra kA ya ma/_dar+Sha ya/_badzra kA ya ma/_bud d+ha a 
[\[186a.4\]]d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po thams cad kyang rab tu dngangs so/_/lha thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems can chen por rab tu grub par byed 
[\[186a.5\]]pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[186a.6\]]sa'am/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/_rig sngags 'chang ba nyid dam/_tshe dang /_stobs dang /_mdog dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen par bgyis la dgung zla yar 
[\[186a.7\]]gyi ngo tshes brgyad la tsan+dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gad du dgod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_snying gar sku gdung stsal ba/_sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bgyis la/_gtsang mas bdug spos 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]kyis bdug cing gdugs mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la/_de nas tshes brgyad nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/_bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi/_phyogs bzhir 
[\[186b.2\]]yang ro dang ldan pa dang /_dri dang ldan pa dang /_skyems dang /_'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la rad pa dkar po bgos te/_sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas/_dus gsum du bdug spos dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa yang mchod pa 
[\[186b.3\]]bgyis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /_re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o/_/des na sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_dog sa g.yo ba dang /_'od zer dag kyang 'byung 
[\[186b.4\]]bar 'gyur te/_de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/bro nad ma mchis pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur 
[\[186b.5\]]zhing yon tan stong yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/'gum pa'i tshe na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/bdag mthong bar yang stsal bar bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na 
[\[186b.6\]]rdo rje legs so legs so/_/phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/_'di la som nyi med pa dang /_yid gnyis med pa dang /_the tsom med par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[186b.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[187a.2\]]rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing /_sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste legs par spyod pa'i las 
[\[187a.3\]]byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/_nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/_sdig pa spyod par byed par shes nas sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed 
[\[187a.4\]]cing /_sdig pa thams cad las zlog par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_ser sna dag sel par byed pa dang /_sems can de dag kyang 
[\[187a.5\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing nam du yang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/_yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin 
[\[187a.6\]]gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/_'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung 
[\[187a.7\]]bstan par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyang mi 'tshal lags na de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang /_dka' ba spyod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[187b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang /_mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_lus dang /_sdug pa'i bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_dge 
[\[187b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'di ni/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang 
[\[187b.4\]]yang dag par ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod pa byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par 
[\[187b.5\]]byas shing /_bshad pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi 
[\[187b.6\]]ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /_nyan par byed na de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te/_des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang 
[\[187b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems mang ba dang /_mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa 
[\[188a.2\]]dang /_mtshon cha dang /_spyo ba dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang /_mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing rga ba dang /_na 
[\[188a.3\]]ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung bar 'gyur te/_dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba kho nar mthong zhing /_dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/_dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/_de dag de nas 
[\[188a.4\]]shi 'phos nas kyang /_sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang /_lung bstan pa ma thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_
[\[188a.5\]]gzung ba dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir gzhug pa dang /_dad par yang mi nus la/_chos smra ba de la yang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar yang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod 
[\[188a.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 
[\[188a.7\]]kyang chos smra ba de dang /_chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_ri mor bgyi/_mchod par bgyi zhing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par bgyi/_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bsrung bar bgyi ste/_des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te/_bka' stsal pa/_kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/khyed cag gis 
[\[188b.2\]]de bzhin du gyis shig_/gnod pa byed pa dang /_brnyas pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_mtshon 'byin pa dang /_rgya 'gal bar byed na yang lus dang /_srog la mi lta bar byas la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_yi ger bri bar bya/_yi ger 'drir 
[\[188b.3\]]gzhug par bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/chos smra ba de la yang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror bya'o/_/yul phyogs de dang /_gling de dang /_grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_'khrug pa dag la bsrung bar bya'o/_/
[\[188b.4\]]rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bskal pa grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la/_/phyi ma'i 
[\[188b.5\]]dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar/_/rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig_/yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa/_/de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/_/gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin 
[\[188b.6\]]gos dang rgyan/_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te/_/nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dri byed pa/_/de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te/_/bde bar gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs/_/rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing /_/
[\[188b.7\]]sems gzhan med par bsam gtan dag sgom dang /_/sdug pa'i bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing /_/lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba bas/_/gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/_/mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin byed pa ste/_/de yi 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spangs/_/'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste/_/gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa/_/de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing /_/de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing /_/
[\[189a.2\]]ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan/_/de la nam yang sdig pa yod min zhing /_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong /_/de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba/_/sems gdung lus na ba'am de bzhin du/_/klad pa na bas thams cad zad 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[189a.3\]]de ni nams kyang rnam par ltung mi 'gyur/_/des ni mthong ba'i chos la'ang yon tan kun/_/ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang /_/dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni/_/mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs 
[\[189a.4\]]pa ltar/_/chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te/_/mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing /_/'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis ni/_/bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'drir yang gzhug_/phyi ma'i dus la rga nas gdungs gyur la/_/
[\[189a.5\]]'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g.yen spyo zhing /_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su yongs 'khyam dang /_/za ma ma ning dmad par bya ba dang /_/dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri/_/rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye bar byed/_/phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la/_/khro bas 
[\[189a.6\]]zil non rtag tu ser sna can/_/sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas/_/de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la/_/der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing /_/de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur/_/de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing ston byed pa/_/de dag gis ni 
[\[189a.7\]]rtag tu mchod par bya/_/gang gis de la yongs su spyo ba dang /_/smad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa/_/de ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa yin/_/'dzin la phu dud byas na nga la'ang byas/_/de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang /_/gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'dri zhing klog byed 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]pa/_/de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing /_/tshig 'jam snyan pa'ang rgyun du brjod par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[189b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te/_bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so/_/de mnyan cing bzung 
[\[189b.3\]]la bcangs shing bklags te gzhan dag la yang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir stsal na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_
[\[189b.4\]]des ji ltar bsams pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/_de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 
[\[189b.5\]]'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin 
[\[189b.6\]]gyis shod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_sarba A shA pa ri pU 
[\[189b.7\]]ra kA nA na/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ha ha ha/_ma ma ma/_d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/_shAn te/_pra shAn te/_sarba pA pak+Sha yang ka ri/_a ba lo kA ya/_kA ru Ni ka/_bo d+hi tsit+ta ma ma na si ku ru/_
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bya ba lo kA ya/_mA ma/_sma ra sma ra/_yan twa yA pUrbe/_sat+ya a d+hiSh+ThA naM kr-i te na/_te na sa t+ye na/_ba tsa ne na/_sarba A shA me pa ri bU ra ya/_bud d+ha k+She tra ma pa ri sho d+ha ya/_ma me kash+tsid bi he thaM ka ro tu/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_te dze te 
[\[190a.2\]]dze/_ma hA te dze/_yan ma ma kA ya dush+tsa ri ta ma bA/_wAg dush+tsa ri ta ma bA/_ma no dush+tsa ri tam bA/_dA ri d+r+yam bA/_tad sarbaM k+ShA pa ya/_a lo ka ya/_bi lo ka ya/_ta thA ga ta dar+Sha Nan tsa/_a ha ma d+hikAM k+ShA mi bo d+hi sa t+ya dar+Sha Nam/_d+hu d+hu ma/_da das swa me dar+Sha Na ma/_sarba me 
[\[190a.3\]]ku sha la/_a b+hi bar d+han tu/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma ma satwa/_si d+h+yan tu man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yos shing ga zha'i sgra chen po dang /_lha'i me tog gi 
[\[190a.4\]]char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sems can chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_
[\[190a.5\]]'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/_las thams cad byang bar byed pa dang /_sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par smras so/_/bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/_/bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/
[\[190a.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang /_kho bo yang mngon sum du mthong ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[190a.7\]]chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /_longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la/_bsnyen te gnas/_'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la tshes 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]brgyad nas brtsams te/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang /_me tog dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_bum pa gang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang /_chos smra ba de yang mchod pa byas nas lus legs par khrus byas pa 
[\[190b.2\]]gtsang mas gos dkar bo bgos te/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod nas yi ger bri bar bya'o/_/'dri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas 
[\[190b.3\]]la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang /_gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o/_/tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i 
[\[190b.4\]]bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa yang de bzhin bya'o/_/cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/_brtson 
[\[190b.5\]]'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe de nyid la yang lus bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro/_/des yi ger 'drir bcug nas kyang sku gdung 
[\[190b.6\]]dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar 
[\[190b.7\]]me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/_tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing /_gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba/_bsnyen te gnas pa/_'phags pa yan lag brgyad 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]pa la gnas pa/_grogs po yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa/_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/_dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/me 
[\[191a.2\]]tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me dag kyang phul la/_dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la gtor bar bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje la yang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o/_/phyogs 
[\[191a.3\]]bcur phyag byas la/_nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang /_shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o/_/des 
[\[191a.4\]]na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing sems 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o/_/cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa byas la/_de nas 
[\[191a.5\]]tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la/_bdug spos dang /_tsan+dan dang /_pog dkar po dang /_ga pur dag kyang gzhag_/mar me kha bzhi/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_dar dang /_ba 
[\[191a.6\]]dan sna tshogs dag dang /_gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan dang /_gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang /_gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go/_/sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa 
[\[191a.7\]]brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir dor ro/_/de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la/_re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o/_/de nas gzugs 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas las thams cad dang /_/dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_byang 
[\[191b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/_nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /_tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/_dgra 
[\[191b.3\]]thams cad dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po rnams kyang de la lta 'dod cing gces spras byed par yang 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spangs par yang 'gyur/_nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral 
[\[191b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/brtan pa dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po rno ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_cho ga shes pa dang /_'chi ba'i 
[\[191b.5\]]tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang /_byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar bu 'dod pa dag gam/_'khor 
[\[191b.6\]]los sgyur ba'i rigs chen po'am/_gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang /_gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di 
[\[191b.7\]]dag ni yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs la gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs/_klog par yang rngo mi thogs/_mchod par yang rngo mi thogs/_yi ge bri 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bar yang rngo mi thogs/_yi ger 'drir stsal bar yang rngo mi thogs/_dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/gal te mthong bar gyur na yang nyan par mi 'gyur la/_gal te nyan par gyur na yang de sems rnam par g.yengs pas nyan par 'gyur 
[\[192a.2\]]zhing dad par mi 'gyur/_bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur na yang nyon mongs pa dang /_gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yi ger 'dri'am/_
[\[192a.3\]]yi ger 'drir stsal bar gyur na yang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste/_de ni las de nyams su myong bar bgyid cing the tsom skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/mtshams 
[\[192a.4\]]ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags te/_de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang /_the tsom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[192a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[192a.6\]]de nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos sna tshogs dang /_ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[192a.7\]]gnyis lag gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u shAm bI na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_
[\[192b.2\]]skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_s+yAd 
[\[192b.3\]]ya the da na/_ha ha/_hi hi/_hu hu/_sa ra sa ra/_la hU~M la hU~M/_shIg+h+raM/_ma hA bi d+yA/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skr-i te/_ha sa ha sa kiM tiSh+Tha si/_kiM kiM tiSh+Tha si/_ka na ka bi tsi tra/_A ba ra Na bi b+hU Shi tAM ge/_pa Ta pa Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu 
[\[192b.4\]]ru b+hu ru/_sarba ar+tha na me sA d+ha ya/_tu ru tu ru/_ar+tha na sA d+ha ya/_ar+tha na de hi me/_sarba sa twA nA na sid+d+hi na/_hA hA/_pad+me/_pad+me/_ma hA pad+me/_bi Sha de/_bi Sha de/_ma hA bi Sha de/_b+ha ba b+ha ba/_b+ha bod b+ha bA ya/_ta ma haM g+ho re/_tan me 
[\[192b.5\]]bi d+yA ma pra yo dza nA ya/_sid d+hiM ku ru/_sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang /_nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang /_nor gyi dbang 
[\[192b.6\]]phyug chen po dang /_rgyal srid dang /_rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang /_bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po sar pa kha tshar ma bskum pa skra bsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/_'phags pa 
[\[192b.7\]]yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/_tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo rad pa dkar po 'tshal 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]ba/_rgyan thams cad dang /_me tog phreng dang /_zla gam dang /_se mo dos brgyan pa/_rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yon phyogs su ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/_rad pa 
[\[193a.2\]]dkar po 'tshal ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/_'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/_rad pa 
[\[193a.3\]]dkar po 'tshal ba/_grogs dang ldan pa/_nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/_tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_lag na rdo rje la me tog 
[\[193a.4\]]dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing /_phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan dang /_ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_chan sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me 
[\[193a.5\]]sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing /_re re nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o/_/de nas zla ba nya'i tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i 
[\[193a.6\]]gdugs la yang cho ga 'di nyid dang /_gzhan yang ci 'byor ba dag dang /_bdug spos dang /_ga pur dang /_pog dkar po dang /_tsan+dan dang /_shing mu sa dag kyang dbul/_'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de nas 
[\[193a.7\]]bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /_nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /_lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /_rgyal srid dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang /_rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /_
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]gter lta 'tshal ba dang /_nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi lags so/_/des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser 
[\[193b.2\]]sna yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o/_/mchod rten dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi phyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis 
[\[193b.3\]]kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te bdag gis ma stsal bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gal te sangs rgyas la ma dad par gyur pa dang /_yid gnyis su gyur pa gang 
[\[193b.4\]]lags pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la yang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[193b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di lta bu 'di dag smras shing dam bca' 
[\[193b.6\]]ba yang byas pa ni yang khyod legs so/_/khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod nus par 'gyur gyis khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[193b.7\]]la me tog sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyi zhing re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyis/_
[\[194a.2\]]de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_tad+ya thA/_o~M shang khi ni de bi/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_tiShA d+ha ne/_d+ha na dza ye/_bri bri/_bri d+hi ka ri/_d+h+ri d+h+ri/_d+h+ri ti ka ri/_nA nA bi bi d+ha/_be sha bsta/_A yu d+ha d+hA ri Ni/_yu 
[\[194a.3\]]yu A yuSh+pA la ne/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sma ra bo d+hi tsi ta taM/_mA bi lam ba/_de hi me ba ran/_shaM khi ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na/_de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_gzi brjid 'phel ba dang /_longs 
[\[194a.4\]]spyod 'phel ba dang /_dbang phyug 'phel ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba yang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so/_/sa phyogs gtsang ma'am lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang /_
[\[194a.5\]]pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/_dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /_nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/_dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad 
[\[194a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras 
[\[194a.7\]]so/_/sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang /_chos nyan pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/_dbyig dang /_
[\[194b.2\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rgyal srid dang /_tshe ring bar bgyid pa/_dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/_rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong 
[\[194b.3\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir stsol tam/_mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[194b.4\]]gis de bsrung bar bya/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/_thab mo dang /_'gyed pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'khrug klong dag las rgyal bar bgyi/_tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub 
[\[194b.5\]]par bgyi/_de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_sarba bo d+hi satwA nA na/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/_badzra pA Ni pra b+h+r-i tI nA na/_
[\[194b.6\]]tad+ya thA/_o~M ma hA de bi/_b+hi me b+hI ma ma te/_dza ye dza yA ba he ya sho ba ti/_ya sho dza be/_te dza dza be/_byA ka ra Na prA pa te/_sarba satwa a ba lo ki te/_kri pa te dza pa hu le/_ta thA ga te a nu dz+nyA tam pA la ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/_de hi me ba ran/_
[\[194b.7\]]sid d+hiM ku ru/_de bi ma hA de bi sat+ya ba tsan de bi b+hi ma sat+ya ba tsan pra tiSh+Thi te gu h+ya ni bA si ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'di dag smras lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/_phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /_ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/_ci dang ci 'tshal 
[\[195a.2\]]ba yid la bgyis shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/_re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/_/gang la la bdag rang gis gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar 
[\[195a.3\]]po sar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba'i tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas/_dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa 
[\[195a.4\]]bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/_rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/_rgyan 
[\[195a.5\]]thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ril ba dang /_bgrang phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/_tshes brgyad nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas 
[\[195a.6\]]pa'i gnas su me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing /_phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher 
[\[195a.7\]]bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la/_gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]brgyad bgyi zhing re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi/_dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /_nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /_gter 
[\[195b.2\]]lta 'tshal ba dang /_nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa bzlog pa dang /_bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang /_bu mchis par bgyi ba dang /_nor 'du 
[\[195b.3\]]bar bgyi ba dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang /_gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la the tsom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma 
[\[195b.4\]]gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na yang bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/
[\[195b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni yang khyod legs so/_/
[\[195b.6\]]sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sring mo 
[\[195b.7\]]legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_'don pa dang /_mchid ton du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par 
[\[196a.2\]]'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[196a.3\]]gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa'am/_ma gsan pa'am/_ma dgongs pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_
[\[196a.4\]]yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_'don pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_dbyig dang /_gser 
[\[196a.5\]]dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid 
[\[196a.6\]]mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing /_lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dag las yongs 
[\[196a.7\]]su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid de/_sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par bstan te/_de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar ba kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi rnam 
[\[196b.2\]]grangs 'di dang /_chos smra ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_mchod pa byed pa de dag gi phyir dbyig yungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/_me tog gcig gam/_'bras bu gcig gam/_ba dan nam/_rol mo'i sgra'am/_spos sam/_gos sam/_rgyan gcig tsam 
[\[196b.3\]]zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/_yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_mchod pa byed dam/_yang dag par ston tam/_bsnyen bkur byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang /_gang gis de bzhin 
[\[196b.4\]]gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod par byed/_rjed par byed cing /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis 
[\[196b.5\]]bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_'chag sa dang /_skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/_de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par 
[\[196b.6\]]byed pa bas/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_de bzhin 
[\[196b.7\]]gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la/_sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa yang de lta ma yin no/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]po dang /_blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs par byed pa dang /_rjod par byed pa dang /_don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 
[\[197a.2\]]'du shes bskyed par bya zhing /_de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/_bdag cag don med pa la don du 'du shes pa dang /_mi rtag pa la rtag par 
[\[197a.3\]]'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing /_lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang /_bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[197a.4\]]mdzad pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang 
[\[197a.5\]]dag par bshad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/_der yang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon 
[\[197a.6\]]po chen po dang /_blon po snod du gyur pa mchod pa byed pa/_'dzin par byed pa/_klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_dad par 'gyur/_yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang dang /_shar dang /_nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na/_yang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang /_dad 
[\[197a.7\]]par mi byed pa dang /_yid ches par mi byed pa dang /_mchod par mi byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus zhan pa dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_bu smad dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bzhad gad dang /_'jo sgeg dang /_bro dang /_gar dang /_glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/_yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/_de dag ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi 
[\[197b.2\]]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi thar ba kho nar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las 
[\[197b.3\]]yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bstan par bya yid la yang gzung bar bya'o/_/khrag khrug dang /_'khrug klong dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dag dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba 
[\[197b.4\]]dang /_gnag nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_mi nad dag dang /_nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs dag la yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o/_/rgyal mtshan btsugs la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis 
[\[197b.5\]]mchod cing phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/_der yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su 
[\[197b.6\]]bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing /_/sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni zung shig kun dga' bo/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la/_/gang gis 
[\[197b.7\]]khams gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/_/mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni/_/sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi phod do/_/gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dad byas te/_/tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa/_/de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur/_/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'thor byed cing /_/gos dang phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te/_/ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na/_/bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_/kA ra ShA pa Na'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing /_/byang chub phyir 
[\[198a.2\]]ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na/_/de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la/_/ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du/_/bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na/_/de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod 'gyur/_/de ltas phan yon 'di dag 
[\[198a.3\]]thos nas kyang /_/sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te/_/mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya/_/bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya/_/rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing /_/sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la/_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye 
[\[198a.4\]]ba na/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re/_/'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la/_/yang dang yang du sngam pa 'don byed cing /_/bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su su 'gyur zhes/_/byis pa'i blo can phan tshun rtog ga re/_/gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing /_/sangs 
[\[198a.5\]]rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor 'phrogs pa/_/mi bzad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing /_/phyin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med/_/bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med/_/yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med/_/nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan/_/
[\[198a.6\]]kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi zad/_/ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas/_/de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur bas/_/sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na/_/byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dad mi skyed/_/de phyir rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang /_/dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal 
[\[198a.7\]]pos khor zug dang /_/mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing /_/'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/_ston pa'i 'du 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]shes kyis bcad bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_
[\[198b.2\]]rgyas par mi byed kyang /_des ni khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/_nyan thos nyid ma yin par yang mi 'gyur gyi/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed/_yang dag par ston par mi byed/_yid 
[\[198b.3\]]la mi byed na ni des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/_nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis phu dud byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/_/'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can 
[\[198b.4\]]thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri len ba med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[198b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags dgu khri ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so/_/de nas 
[\[198b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang /_
[\[198b.7\]]'dzin par bgyid pa dang /_ri mor bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/_de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so/_/slad ma'i 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gad dang /_'jo sgeg dang /_gar dang /_bro dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mun pa che ba/_rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes 
[\[199a.2\]]pa/_phrag dog dang /_ser snas yongs su zin cing /_mchod par mi bgyid/_ri mor mi bgyid/_dad par mi bgyid/_glo ba ches par mi bgyid/_'chang bar mi bgyid/_klog par mi bgyid/_nyan par mi bgyid/_nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni ngal ba 'di yid byung bar 
[\[199a.3\]]bgyis shing /_sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_der yang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas 
[\[199a.4\]]yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/_/de lta lags pas na lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid legs par bsdam par bgyi 
[\[199a.5\]]zhing /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la yang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/_sems can thams cad la yang byams pa'i sems dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /_khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags 
[\[199a.6\]]so/_/de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dag dang /_a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra dag dang /_
[\[199a.7\]]lha'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[199b.2\]]de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[199b.3\]]byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub 
[\[199b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang /_dri med 'od dang /_'od can ma dang /_
[\[199b.5\]]'jigs byed ma dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_dung can ma dang /_'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 
[\[199b.6\]]de dag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[199b.7\]]bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/_ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]{D722}]@#/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa 
[\[200a.2\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_'phags pa thugs rje'i 
[\[200a.3\]]dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang /_mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[200a.4\]]'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po 
[\[200a.5\]]dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_mi dge ba'i chos dang /_bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang 
[\[200a.6\]]zhing grol bar gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras 
[\[200a.7\]]gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po 
[\[200b.2\]]dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bgyid pa la mthu 
[\[200b.3\]]chen po thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang /_me dang /_
[\[200b.4\]]chu dang /_rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang /_ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug 
[\[200b.5\]]bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang /_'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen 
[\[200b.6\]]po mdzad par gyur cig_/bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/_sems ma zhum pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing /_sdug 
[\[200b.7\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]pa dang ldan pas/_'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing /_ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig_/ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje 
[\[201a.2\]]dang ro gcig par gyur cig_/ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can 
[\[201a.3\]]thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig_/ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 
[\[201a.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig_/ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 
[\[201a.5\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/_thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig_/ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/_/de snyed 
[\[201a.6\]]bdag ni lus skyes par/_/de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing /_/de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog_/ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/_/ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par/_/de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing /_/ngag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog_/ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/_/de snyed 
[\[201a.7\]]bdag gi yid 'byung ba/_/de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing /_/yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig_/de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/_/thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis pas/_/lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing /_/yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/_/thugs 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/_/rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na/_/thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/_/srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/_/yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/_/srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[201b.2\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsakra brti/_tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha/_dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so/_/oM pad+me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/_snying po'o/_/oM b+ta ra ta pad+me hU~M/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/oM ma Ni badzre Ni hU~M/_/
[\[201b.3\]]bsang ba'i snying po'o/_/sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang /_smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D723}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka nA ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra d+hA ra NI a nu shaM sa sa hi ta sU trAta sa~M gra hi ha/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan 
[\[201b.4\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri bo po Ta la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[201b.5\]]gnas na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/_de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nga la 'di lta bu'i gzungs yod ming ni thugs rje chen po zhes zer 
[\[201b.6\]]sems can kun gyi mi dge ba'i sdig pa shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa bdud dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa 'dod pa thams cad rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das la bshad pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thugs rje 
[\[201b.7\]]chen po'i sgo nas gzungs bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab bo/_/myur bar bshad du gsol/_nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te dge slong ngam/_dge slong 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mos 'don pa dang 'chang bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad kyi ched du thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas thog mar 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis chos 
[\[202a.2\]]rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje 
[\[202a.3\]]chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog_/
[\[202a.4\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du 'dus ma 
[\[202a.5\]]byas kyi khyim phyin shog_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog_/bdag ni ral gri'i ri 'dzeg na/_/ral gri'i ri ni rang snyil shog_/bdag ni chu tshan 'phrad gyur na/_/chu tshan me mur rang zhir shog_/sems can dmyal bar bdag song na/_/sems 
[\[202a.6\]]can dmyal ba rang skams shog_/bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas song na/_/bkres skom dag ni 'grangs par shog_/bdag ni lha min gnas song na/_/ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog_/bdag ni dud 'gro gnas song na/_/rang nyid shes rab che thob shog_/de skad du smon lam btab nas sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming 
[\[202a.7\]]nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan 'don cing /_de nas gzungs 'di lan cig gam lan bdun gyi bar du bton na/_bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong ji snyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]lags so/_/gal te thugs rje chen po 'di 'don cing 'chang na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[202b.2\]]la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ngan song gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing 
[\[202b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad med pa ji snyed thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ci ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na thugs 
[\[202b.4\]]rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/_mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/_/bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus las yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don 
[\[202b.5\]]cing yongs su gzung bas gal te bud med kyi lus las yongs su gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/_/the tsom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na gdon mi za bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de skad 
[\[202b.6\]]ces smras nas 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te/_drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gya nom pa 'di dag smras so/_/snying po ni/_o~M 
[\[202b.7\]]ma Ni pad+me hU~M/_gzungs ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba ban+d+ha na/_ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_sarba pA pa sa mu dra uts+tsho sha Na ka rA ya/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka ra ya/_sarba b+ha ye Shu tra NA ya/_
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]tas+ya na ma skr-itwA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ta ba nI la kaN+Da nA ma hr-i da yaM/_A brta yiSh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na/_shu b+ha tse ta na/_sarba satwA nAM/_pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha ka_/tad+ya thA/_a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/_lo ka ga ti/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/_he bo d+hi satwa/_he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/_he kA ru Ni kA sma ra hr-i 
[\[203a.2\]]da yaM/_e h+ye hi/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka_/ku ru ku ru/_karmaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bid+yAM de hi de hi me/_a raM ga maM ga ma/_bi haM ga ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/_du hu du hu/_bIr yan+te/_ma hA bI ra yan+te/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hA ra NI shwa ra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_bi ma la a ma la/_mAR+ti Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rakr-iSh+Na 
[\[203a.3\]]a dzi na/_dza TA ma ku Ta/_a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_a laM ba/_pra laM ba/_bi laM ba/_ma hA sid+d+ha/_shud+d+ha d+ha ra/_ba la ba la/_ma hA ba la/_ma hA ma la ma hA ma la/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ma hA dz+wa la/_kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/_kriSh+Na pA sha_/nir+g+hA ta na/_he pad+ma hasta/_dza ya ka ra ni shA tsa re shwa ra/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/_
[\[203a.4\]]e h+ye hi bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra da ha nI shwa ra nA rA ya Na pa la rU pa pe Sha d+ha ri/_he nI la kaN+Tha/_he ma hA ha lA ha ra/_bi Sha ni ra dzI ta lo ka s+ya/_rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/_dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha na/_mo ha bi Sha nA sha na/_ni ra mo k+Sha Na/_hu lu hu lu/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_mu hu lu mu hu lu/_hA la hA la/_ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru 
[\[203a.5\]]su ru/_bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bo d+ha yA mi/_ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi bA ma s+thi ta/_sid+ha mu kha/_ha sa ha sa/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_ma hA aT+TAT+Ta ha sa nir nA di ni/_e h+ye hi/_b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/_ban d+ha ban d+ha wa tsaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_bi d+yAM sma ra sma ra twAM/_he b+ha ga bAn/_lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/_ta thA 
[\[203a.6\]]ga tA dA dA hi me dar+sha naM/_pra sA d+ha yA mi swA hA/_sid+d+hA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha yo gI shwa rA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/_bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_sid+ha mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA na ra sid+ha mu khA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra 
[\[203a.7\]]ha stA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na sa ra pa kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/_ma hA kA la mu ku Te d+ha rA ya swA hA/_tsakra u yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_shaM khe shab+da nir nA da na ka rA ya swA hA/_bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/_bA ma skan+d+ha de shas+thi ta kr-iSh+Na a dzi nA ya swA hA/_bA ma ha ste byA g+h+ra tsar ma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/_lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/_ma hA lo ke 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]shwa rA ya swA hA/_sarba sid+d+he shwa rA swA hA/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_ku ru rak+Sha mUrtI nAM swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga wa te Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 
[\[203b.2\]]gzungs 'di bstan zin nas/_gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du/_gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/_shin tu dang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las/_/stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan 
[\[203b.3\]]gtum po dang /_/rtsangs pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang /_/gzungs 'di 'don pa thos nas gnod mi nus/_/gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/_/gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po nya dang ru sbal dag_/gzungs 'di thos 
[\[203b.4\]]nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig g.yul sprad dgra yis bskor ba'am/_/chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'phrog pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/de dag brtse sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thogs pa dang /_/
[\[203b.5\]]lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/rgyal po brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig byad stems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te/_/zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 
[\[203b.6\]]bzlas na/_/dug ni zil dngar zas skom nyid du 'gyur/_/bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe/_/bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/_/klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i 
[\[203b.7\]]dbugs btang bas/_/tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nye tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/_/klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang /_/shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi/_/sems can rnyog pa mi dge spyod pas na/_/byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtses pa'i tshe/_/rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/byad stems gdon de gtong ba'i mi 
[\[204a.2\]]la 'dud/_/sdig 'phel snyigs ma dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe/_/'dod pa'i me mched sems ni rmongs log pas/_/khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas/_/nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/_/gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/_/
[\[204a.3\]]'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/_/bdag gis gzungs 'di mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/_/bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yid mi 'gyur/_/gal te thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas 
[\[204a.4\]]pa las/_de na gnas pa'i sems can de dang de dag gi lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na sdig pa'i las dang /_kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas/_zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas mngal dang /_drod gsher dang /_sgo nga las skyes pa'i 
[\[204a.5\]]lus len par mi 'gyur na/_kha ton du 'don pa dang 'chang ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te gang zag de'i lus dang /_spu dang skra dang /_gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i phyogs su song ba'i sems can 
[\[204a.6\]]gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/_de dag gi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na 'don pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa de 
[\[204a.7\]]dag gis thos pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba mdo las btus pa rdzogs so//_//dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]{D724}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ur+d+ha dza TA ma hA kalpa ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi kur+b+ba Na pa Ta la bi sa rAd b+ha ga ba tA Ar+ya tA rA mU la kalpa nA ma/_bod skad du/_ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byam las 
[\[204b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te/_ngo 
[\[204b.3\]]mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig_/byang 
[\[204b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad nye 
[\[204b.5\]]bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang /_tshe dang /_nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi gzhi/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/_de legs par nyon la 
[\[204b.6\]]legs par yid la gyis shig_/ngas bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so/_/de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[204b.7\]]chen po rnams kyis spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par so sor thob par byed pa/_rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa/_bdud 'dul bar byed pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/_lha 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]dang mi rnams su skye bar byed pa/_sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_dbul ba dang nad kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang 
[\[206a.2\]]sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad don med par gsung bar byed pa ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang /_
[\[206a.3\]]bdag cag dang /_sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba nye bar bzung nas de gsung du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas rnam par dag 
[\[206a.4\]]pa'i yul la 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun du skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
