[\[206a.5\]]'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[206a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na/_bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su zhugs te/_gang du de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon 
[\[206a.7\]]lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyi thabs cig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal to/_/kye rgyal 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun du skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig_/de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzums pa spyan gdangs nas/_'di'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon 
[\[206b.2\]]par phyogs te gnas so/_/de nas kun du skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun du snang bas kun du snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems 
[\[206b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to/_/de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal 
[\[206b.4\]]te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dgongs su gsol bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der 
[\[206b.5\]]song ste bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi khams de dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /_sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog 
[\[206b.6\]]pa dang /_gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang /_bzlas pa dang /_rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[206b.7\]]pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]chung ngam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_reg par gnas sam zhes rmed par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal to/_/
[\[207a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi rigs dang /_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang /_gsang 
[\[207a.3\]]ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /_phyag rgya dang /_ras ris kyi cho ga dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/_rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byam 
[\[207a.4\]]'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa/_mthar thug par zin pa dang /_nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang /_dam tshig rab 'byam gyi le'u dang /_'jig 
[\[207a.5\]]rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pa dang /_spyod pa 
[\[207a.6\]]mthar thug pa gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la'ang /_'di la rjes su yi rang ba kho na'o/_/sems dpa' chen po/_da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig_/shAkya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[207a.7\]]'di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la yang rtsa ba'i rig sngags su 'gyur ba ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai Ar+ya tA rA yai/_bo d+hi satwA yai/_tad+ya thA/_tA re r-i dzu ka d+harma ni t+ya te/_tA re tut+tA re/_shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te/_tA re a na b+hi lA pya/_d+harma nir+ya te/_tut+tA re/_tu re tu re hi ni/_tra sa ni tra sa ni/_o ha ni/_mo ha 
[\[207b.2\]]ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_pra b+he/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he hi li hi li/_tsi li tsi li/_b+he ga sA mi ni/_kuN+Di kuN+Di ma hA kuN+Da/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha na pa ni tA re/_hu ru hu ru/_ku ru ku ru/_a haM yA ya/_tsin+ta yA mi tsin+ta d+ha mi ku ru swA d+hA ya swA hA/_'di ni sems 
[\[207b.3\]]dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs shing /_gsung bar 'gyur ba ste/_khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar 'gyur ro/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par 
[\[207b.4\]]phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/_shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang ba'o/_/'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba yang /_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'di la nye ba'i snying po yang /_
[\[207b.5\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bod+hi satwA nAM/_oM ku ru kul+le swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[207b.6\]]kun du thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs 
[\[207b.7\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun du gang bar gyur to/_/rgyal ba'i sras po legs so legs so/_/gang khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]cad kyis mi nus te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa sa bcu la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[208a.2\]]'das de rnams kyis thabs cig byams pa dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed ma/_
[\[208a.3\]]rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyis sgrub par byed pa dang mthun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci yang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/
[\[208a.4\]]thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun du gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsungs par gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAM/_oM gIH
[\[208a.5\]]'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa las rkyong 
[\[208a.6\]]ba'am/_brkyang pa las skum pa dang se go la gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed 'dzums pa skad cig tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[208a.7\]]gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de steng gi nam mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du 'khod nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po'i kun du snang bas kun du snang bar byas nas 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che 
[\[208b.2\]]du mas rnam par phye ba dang /_rin po che'i gdugs du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab pa dang /_lha'i gos dang /_dar gyi rgyan gyis mdzes par spras pa dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_phreng ba dang /_rin po che 
[\[208b.3\]]g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa/_sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/_lha'i dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma'i char 'bebs par byed pa/_mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[208b.4\]]thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo /_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pa spu zing zhes byed do/_/lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa 
[\[208b.5\]]mthong nas skrag cing /_snying 'dar te 'on te 'byor pa yongs su nyams sam ci zhes phan tshun [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su skad mthon pos smra bar rtsom zhing /_'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su skyobs shig_/shAkya thub pa yongs su 
[\[208b.6\]]skyobs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to/_/ma 'jigs shig_/ma 'jigs shig_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs 
[\[208b.7\]]pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur bar 'dod de/_don chen po spyod pa dang /_rig sngags kyi tshig dang /_chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yang nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 
[\[209a.2\]]bstod do/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la/_/don med thams cad bzlog pa po/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng ge khyod/_/ngan song thams 
[\[209a.3\]]cad 'joms pa po/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/bsod nams dri ni mtha' yas pa/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyod/_/srid gsum 'dam ni rnam sbyong ba/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad+ma khyod/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol 
[\[209a.4\]]byed/_/thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul byed/_/zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po/_/thams cad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa/_/bkra 
[\[209a.5\]]shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs/_/sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal/_/chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/_/spros pa med pa'i rnam pa ni/_/yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[209a.6\]]khyod phyag 'tshal/_/shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun/_/legs par byas shing yang dag thos/_/theg gsum lam dang myang 'das la/_/rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa/_/kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes yi ge'i tshig rab tu 
[\[209a.7\]]smras pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur ba der/_bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[209b.2\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_tshe dpag tu med pa bzhugs te/_de chos ston par mdzad pa ni/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_
[\[209b.3\]]don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/_yang dag par ston par mdzad cing de 'di ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzad do/_/rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi 
[\[209b.4\]]spyod pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang /_lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lam dang /_skyob pa dang /_gnas dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_bde ba dang /_shin tu mthar thug pa dang /_shin tu yongs su 
[\[209b.5\]]mthar gtugs pas sems can thams cad la ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang /_nye ba 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[209b.6\]]gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_ldang ba yang ngam/_bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed de/_'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo /_/gang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma'i dus gang du bcom ldan 
[\[209b.7\]]'das shAkya thub pa'i sku de yang chos ston par mdzad cing rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byang grol dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal ba 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug par 'jug par byed gtan du grub pa dang /_bde ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god par mdzad pa ni 
[\[210a.2\]]ngo mtshar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis/_bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[210a.3\]]pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul du shes par 'dod pa'am/_thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang /_sems pa shes par 'dod pa'am/_mtha' dag nges par ston pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[210a.4\]]phrag rnams kyis kyang brjod par yang ga la nus/_gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa bsdus pa dang /_so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid du blta bar bya ste/_mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong 
[\[210a.5\]]ba dang /_ring por mi thogs par spyod pa smra bar 'dod pa 'am/_yon tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis/_bdag gis ni ma yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[210a.6\]]gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sprul te/_rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta bzhin du bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[210a.7\]]dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar gyi dri ba sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'i don du 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]nye bar tshogs pa rnams la tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_ku ta ra dang /_bi ta ras bsgrubs pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangs su grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[210b.2\]]la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/_sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin rlabs sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad don yang dag par thob par byed pa dang /_rig sngags dang /_
[\[210b.3\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig thams cad dang /_gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_rtog pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /_tshe dang /_nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[210b.4\]]byed pa dang /_sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga'i rgyud dang /_shes pa dang shes bya dus kyi mthar nub pa dang /_rgyal srid dang /_zhing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba mdor bsdus pa las/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad 
[\[210b.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_rang gi yon tan 'byung ba/_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mthar 'jug par byed pa/_sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/_mi snang ba dang nam mkhar 'gro bar byed pa/_rkang pa rab tu brgyus pa/_yid gzhungs par byed 
[\[210b.6\]]pa/_'chugs par byed pa/_sa 'og tu rab tu 'jug par byed pa/_mngon par spyod par byed pa/_don thams cad thob pa/_'bras bu dang bcas pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /_ci bgyi dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po thams cad 
[\[210b.7\]]'gugs par byed pa/_byis pa dang /_rgan po dang /_lang tsho ji ltar gnas bzhin du gnas par byed pa ste/_mdor bsdus na las thams cad byed pa/_yid kyi shing rta thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/_rgyas pa can dang /_zhi ba can gyi las rab tu byed pa/_
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar bar bya bzhin pa/_de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa phal po che rtog pa chen po rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam ngas rjes su gnang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[211a.2\]]gsungs pa/_dag pa'i sems can rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don/_chos kyi mdzod/_skye bo mang po la phan pa'i ched dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du/_lha dang mi rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la ston cig_/de 
[\[211a.3\]]nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun tu skul bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 
[\[211a.4\]]dag pa'i sems can du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi snang bas ji srid 'og min gyi srid pa nas ji srid mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar gyi sems can gang la la sdug bsngal gyis shin tu 
[\[211a.5\]]gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'gro ba rnams zhi ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bskul nas slar yang 'od zer de byang chub sems 
[\[211a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor nub par gyur to/_/'di la gzhan shar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung gi dkyil 
[\[211a.7\]]'khor yang dag par bskul bas bsgrubs pa 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun du gsal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiDUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba'i 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]dpal zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[211b.2\]]pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya'i snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa'i 
[\[211b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sgrol ma'i gru'i tshal na 
[\[211b.4\]]gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par ston pa'i tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam 
[\[211b.5\]]gsungs pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs rnams su/_phyogs bral rnams su zhes pas/_steng dang /_'og dang /_thad ka thams 
[\[211b.6\]]cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su thams cad du yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa nyan thos kyi 
[\[211b.7\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid lta bar 'dod pa/_mchog gi rig pa'i rjes su spyod pa sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]par gyi le'u rab 'byam de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa yang gsal bar byed 'dod pas so sor 'khod par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_lag bzang dang /_rin chen bzang po dang /_brtul zhugs bzang po dang /_spyan 
[\[212a.2\]]bzang po dang /_dga' ba bzang po dang /_chos gos bzang po dang /_dngos grub 'char bzang dang /_thams cad 'phags dang /_chos 'phags dang /_rin chen 'phags dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_lhun po'i dpal dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[212a.3\]]dpal dang /_'od byed dpal dang /_rab snang dpal dang /_snang ba'i dpal dang /_don thams cad kyi dpal dang /_lag na thams cad rin chen dang /_gtsug na nor bu dang /_lag na rin chen dang /_lag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rnam 
[\[212a.4\]]par snang mdzad snying po dang /_rin chen snying po dang /_ye shes snying po dang /_don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying po dang /_chos 'phags snying po dang /_mchod sbyin tog dang /_tog bzang po dang /_mtha' yas tog dang /_'od zer tog dang /_dri med 
[\[212a.5\]]tog dang /_ma lus tog dang /_nam mkha'i tog dang /_rin chen tog dang /_'brug sgra dbyangs dang /_rnga bo che'i nga ro'i rgyal po dang /_mtha' yas gsal ba'i ye shes rgyal po dang /_mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang /_
[\[212a.6\]]rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang /_spyod pa thams cad phul du byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang /_'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_phul du byung ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang /_mi g.yo ba'i rgyal po 
[\[212a.7\]]dang /_nyi ma'i rgyal po dang /_thams cad gsal ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_dngos po med par yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_phyogs lhag pa'i rgyal po dang /_rang 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]gi dngos po med par snang ba dang /_bsod nams snang ba dang /_kun du lta ba'i snang ba dang /_'od dpag med dang /_dpag yod snang ba dang /_spyan bzang snang ba dang /_legs 'byung snang ba dang /_mtha' yas snang ba dang /_mi tshugs snang ba 
[\[212b.2\]]dang /_ma sgyur ba dang /_'og min dang /_dri med dang /_me dang /_snang ba dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bde ba'i mu khyud dang /_mu khyud kyi tog dang /_'dod pa'i lha dang /_lha'i lha dang /_lte ba rgyas pa dang /_'jig 
[\[212b.3\]]rten zhi ba dang /_nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_rnga bo che dang /_grub pa dang /_dkar por grags pa dang /_lha rab tu bzod dka' la gdul dka' ba dang /_gsal dka' ba dang /_ring du song ba dang /_ring por len dang /_ring por gnas dang /_mtho zhing 
[\[212b.4\]]mtho ba'i mun pa dang /_mkha' snang dang /_kun nas snang dang /_snang min dang /_khyu mchog dang /_kun nas snang ldan dang /_nges par mnyam pa dang /_lha chen po dang /_shin tu nges pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_dri ma mthar thug pa dang /_mnyam 
[\[212b.5\]]pa'i mtshan ma bzang po dang /_dkar po dang /_i mi ki mi dang /_tha chung dang /_dka' bas 'tsho ba dang /_bde bar 'tsho ba dang /_legs par skyes pa dang /_du ba'i tog dang /_mchod sbyin tog dang /_dkar po'i tog dang /_tog bzang po dang /_
[\[212b.6\]]dbyig gi tog dang /_nor dgag tu med pa dang /_pha chen po dang /_do shal phyed pa dang /_'jig rten grags pa dang /_kun du grags pa dang /_chen por grags pa dang /_mchog tu grags pa dang /_skyes pa dang /_snang ba dang /_ci bgyi dang /_
[\[212b.7\]]mnyam par byed pa dang /_'jig rten byed pa dang /_snang ba byed pa dang /_nyin mor byed pa dang /_'byung bar byed pa dang /_don thams cad byed pa dang /_grub par byed pa dang /_'od byed pa dang /_kun du gsal bar byed pa dang /_rnga bo che'i dbyangs 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]dang /_sgra dbyangs dang /_dbyangs bzang dang /_mtha' yas dbyangs dang /_tog gi dbyangs dang /_'byung ba'i thub pa dang /_gser thub dang /_log par dad sel dang /_'od srung dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_
[\[213a.2\]]rnam par gzigs dang /_shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mang po rnams kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po kun du snang bar byas nas pad+ma'i gdan la so sor bzhugs par gyur to/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[213a.3\]]tshogs de rnams kyang bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/_phyag na rin chen dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_phyag na bzang po dang /_nam mkha'i phyag dang /_mtha' yas phyag dang /_sa'i phyag dang /_snang ba'i phyag dang /_shin tu dri med dang /_bzang po brtsegs 
[\[213a.4\]]pa dang /_mang po brtsegs pa dang /_nor bu brtsegs pa dang /_rin chen brtsegs pa dang /_e na brtsegs pa dang /_rin chen glang po dang /_kun nas glang po dang /_spos kyi glang po dang /_bzang 'gro dang /_dri ma dang bral bar 'gro ba dang /_'jig 
[\[213a.5\]]rten 'gro ba dang /_mdzes par 'gro ba dang /_mtha' yas 'gro ba dang /_mtha' yas grags pa dang /_legs grags dang /_dri ma dang bral bar grags pa dang /_'gro bar grags pa dang /_dri med grags pa dang /_grags pa'i mgon po dang /_mgon 
[\[213a.6\]]med kyi mgon por gyur pa dang /_'jig rten mgon po dang /_kun nas mgon po dang /_rgyun bshes kyi bu dang /_mtha' yas bshes kyi bu dang /_kun du bshes kyi bu dang /_byams ma'i bu dang /_mig bzang gi bu dang /_phyag 'tshal bshes kyi 
[\[213a.7\]]bu dang /_twa Sha tra'i bu dang /_'bras bshes kyi bu dang /_rin chen bshes kyi bu dang /_skyabs gsum bshes kyi bu dang /_theg gsum bshes kyi bu dang /_mthu bsgyings dang /_shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid 'ong ldan dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]dang /_dngos po med pa'i dbang phyug dang /_kun nas dbang phyug dang /_'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_legs gzigs dbang phyug dang /_rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jig rten 'dren pa dang /_
[\[213b.2\]]mchod pa bzang po dang /_'brug sgra'i dbang phyug dang /_rnga bo che'i dbang phyug dang /_bkod pa'i dbang phyug dang /_bi Sha te swa ra dang /_char bzang po dang /_mchod pa bzang po dang /_grags ldan dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_rab tu skyes pa la gnas pa 
[\[213b.3\]]dang /_zla ba'i dbang phyug dang /_so ba'i zla ba dang /_zla ba nyid dang /_mtha' yas dpal dang /_kun du dpal dang /_'jig rten dpal dang /_nam mkha'i dpal dang /_nam mkha'i kun sdud dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_sa'i dbang phyug 
[\[213b.4\]]dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_sgrib pa med pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_kun du bzang po dang /_bzang skyong dang /_nor bzang dang /_legs par kun sdud dang /_lo thog kun 'gyed pa'i nam mkha' 
[\[213b.5\]]dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_don kun rtogs pa dang /_thams cad 'byung ba dang /_ldog bya min pa dang /_mi ldog pa dang /_ngan song bzod dang /_rnam par sgyur med dang /_bkra shis rnam 'grel dang /_gnad thams cad srung ba zhes 
[\[213b.6\]]bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyod yul du sgrol ma'i gru la bzhugs par gyur to/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[213b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i don mtha' yas pa sgrub pa sems can mtha' yas pa dag gi bsam pa rnam par 'jug par byed pa'i lam la rab tu gnas su 'jug pa'i bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]sngags kyi gzhi rjes su 'dzin par byed pa sman gyi cha byad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams dang /_'dab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nor bu dang /_sngags dang rin po che'i rgyal po dang /_sems 
[\[214a.2\]]can dang /_sems can ma yin pa grangs med pa thams cad kun du 'jug cing sems can gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang /_bsam pa ji lta bas sems can 'dul ba de lta bu'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang /_de dag so so'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 
[\[214a.3\]]'jug pa rnams dang /_rig pa'i rgyal po'i nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos nges par 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_pad+ma dang /_rdo rje dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad la kun du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi rim pa las 'da' bar 
[\[214a.4\]]mi bya bar tshig gi lam la rab tu gnas par byed cing /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par byed pa rnams te/_'di lta ste/_gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang /_gdugs dkar mngon par 'phags pa dang /_lo ma mtha' yas dang /_lo ma 
[\[214a.5\]]brgya pa dang /_gtsug tor rgyal ba dang /_mngon par 'phags pa'i gtsug tor dang /_pad+ma'i 'od zer dang /_gser gyi 'od zer dang /_'od zer dkar po dang /_gtsug tor bkod pa dang /_gser gyi phung po dang /_dkar po'i phung po dang /_gzi 
[\[214a.6\]]brjid phung po dang /_nor bu'i phung po dang /_kun nas phung po dang /_rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang /_'byung ba'i phung po dang /_bden pa'i phung po dang /_dngos po med pa'i phung po dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung po ste/_'di rnams dang /_
[\[214a.7\]]gzhan yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yongs su skong bar byed pa/_skye bo thams cad kyi yid kyi bsam pa rtogs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]phrag gis kyang mi nus pa'i gtsug tor rgyal po nam mkha'i mthar thug pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa'i bdag nyid chen po lta bur ston par 'dod pas mtha' dag rgyas par bshad pa las mdor bsdus nas bstan par bya ste/_rig 
[\[214b.2\]]pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis 'dus pa bshad par bya ba 'di lta ste/_mdzod spu dang /_smin ma dang /_spyan dang /_rdzi ma dang /_snyan dang /_mgrin pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_snying rje dang /_byams pa dang /_brtse ba'i tshim pa dang /_shes rab dang /_
[\[214b.3\]]'od zer dang /_sems dpa' dang /_'od zer dri ma med dang /_chos gos te 'di rnams dang /_gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal po mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas spros pa rnams 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed dang /_
[\[214b.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims cha dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gsal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i maSh+Tha dang /_de bzhin 
[\[214b.5\]]gshegs pa'i gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ste 'di rnams dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[214b.6\]]pa'i sngags gsungs pa rnams te/_rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal mo dang /_ci bgyi dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_pho nya dang /_pho nya mo dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /_sems can dang sems can min pa so sor khyad

[\[219b.1\]]'byin chen po dang /_be'u'i bu dang /_ku ru kul+le dang /_gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri ba dang /_khrag pha rol gyi mthar byed pa dang /_gang gA'i bu dang /_ri'i rna ba can dang /_nye ba'i ze ba dang /_dbyar can dang /_snang ba dang /_mdzes par snang

[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]nye bar phyin te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas gsang sngags spyod pa'i don dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mnyan cing rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pas 'khod par gyur to/_/gang yang lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de rnams kyang 'khor gyi 
[\[224a.2\]]dkyil 'khor chen po der rab tu zhugs shing 'khod par gyur pa 'di lta ste/_b+he raN+Da dang /_b+hu ruN+Da dang /_ma ruN+Da dang /_'od zer dang /_'od zer 'bar ba zhes pa'o/_/gang yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de rnams kyang nam mkha' lding brgya stong phrag du mas 
[\[224a.3\]]yongs su bskor te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa 'di lta ste/_'dab bzang dang /_'dab dkar dang /_klu dang /_'dab 'gro dang /_'dab bzang skyes dang /_yid mgyogs dang /_klu 'joms dang /_rnam 'dud bu dang /_b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang /_dge 
[\[224a.4\]]mtshan dang /_dge mtshan chen po dang /_'dab chags rgyal po ste/_de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus par gyur to/_/gang yang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po mi 'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas bskor ba de rnams kyang 'di lta ste/_ljon pa dang /_nye 
[\[224a.5\]]ba'i ljon pa dang /_legs pa'i ljon pa dang /_mtha' yas ljon pa dang /_'jig rten ljon pa dang /_ljon pa gsal ba dang /_brang rgyas dang /_brang rgyas chen po dang /_yid kyi gzi brjid dang /_gzi brjid chen po dang /_rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_
[\[224a.6\]]rnam par sgrogs pa dang /_dbyangs bzang po dang /_yid 'ong dang /_sems skyed par byed pa dang /_smyo byed dang /_da na d+hA ta dang /_btang snyoms dang /_snying rje dang /_snying rje med pa zhes pa 'di rnams dang /_gzhan yang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po stong 
[\[224a.7\]]phrag gis yongs su bskor ba rnams chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_kun du 'od gsal dang /_rab tu 'od gsal dang /_dga' ba'i 'od dang /_bsod nams 'od dang /_mi 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min dang /_'og bzang dang /_'jig rten mtha' dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa min pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas min pa nyid dang /_gya nom snang dang /_
[\[224b.2\]]shin tu mthong dang /_legs par sprul pa dang /_yongs su sprul pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'thab bral dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_rtag myos dang /_phreng thogs dang /_gzhong thogs dang /_
[\[224b.3\]]pi wang gsum pa dang /_ri la gnas pa dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa la gnas pa dang /_rtse mor gnas pa dang /_lcang lo can na gnas pa dang /_grong na gnas pa dang /_gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang /_nang na gnas pa dang /_bar snang la 
[\[224b.4\]]rgyu ba dang /_sa na gnas pa dang /_shing la gnas pa dang /_khyim na gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab tshim dang /_stobs ldan dang /_thags zangs ris dang /_legs bkra dang /_dge bkra dang /_sgra gcan dang /_lag 
[\[224b.5\]]pa la sogs pa'i lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'gros rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_nor rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_lha dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i lha ma yin de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul 
[\[224b.6\]]lta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/_/gang yang gza' dang /_gza' chen po'i 'jig rten gyi don du spyod pa bar snang la spyod pa la 'di lta ste/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_mig 
[\[224b.7\]]dmar dang /_lhag pa dang /_phur bu dang /_pa sangs dang /_spen pa dang /_sgra gcan dang /_sa 'gul dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_thog gis 'joms pa dang /_skar ma dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_drag po dang /_du ldan dang /_du ba 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]dang /_rdo rje dang /_drang srong dang /_char dang /_nye ba'i char dang /_don nyams dang /_nges par nyams dang /_dgod pa'i mtha' dang /_mASh+Ti dang /_riSh+Ti dang /_dga' ma dang /_'jig rten mtha' dang /_zad pa dang /_
[\[225a.2\]]rnam par ltung byed dang /_mi ltung ba dang /_tog dang /_gla sgang dang /_dus kyi mtha' dang /_dur khrod dang /_bi shI ta dang /_drag po dang /_dkar po dang /_byi bzhin dang /_byi bzhin gyi bu dang /_byams pa dang /_phur bu dang /_phur bu gsum pa dang /_
[\[225a.3\]]lu b+ha dang /_ro tra dang /_brtan pa dang /_nyams byed dang /_stobs ldan dang /_drag po dang /_skya rengs dang /_rnam par dgod pa dang /_'chi ltas min pa dang /_skem byed dang /_sde dang /_nye sde dang /_gzhon nu dang /_rtse byed dang /_dgod byed dang /_
[\[225a.4\]]sems par byed pa dang /_theng po dang /_gzugs ngan zhes pa ste gza' chen po de rnams kyang brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gtsang ma'i gnas der 'khor du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyu skar nam mkha' la 
[\[225a.5\]]'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'di lta ste/_tha skar dang /_bra nye dang /_smin drug dang /_snar ma dang /_mgo dang /_lag dang /_nam so dang /_rgyal dang /_skag dang /_mchu dang /_gre dang /_dbo gnyis dang /_me bzhi 
[\[225a.6\]]dang /_nag pa dang /_sa ri dang /_sa ga dang /_lha mtshams dang /_snron dang /_snrubs dang /_chu stod dang /_chu smad dang /_gro bzhin dang /_mon gru dang /_mon gre dang /_khrums stod dang /_khrums smad dang /_nam gru dang /_lha mo dang /_byi 
[\[225a.7\]]bzhin dang /_slar yang 'byung ba dang /_skar 'od dang /_ad+gi ra sA dang /_rgyu skar ldan ma dang /_nye bar sdu gu dang /_nye ba'i gre dang /_'jig rten rab mchog dang /_rab mchog ldan ma dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_'jig rten mgon po dang /_chang ldan dang /_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]rgyal ba thob pa dang /_nor ldan dang /_lha'i nor zhes pa de ltar rgyu skar rgyal po de rnams rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'khod 
[\[225b.2\]]par gyur to/_/khyim sum cu rtsa drug la 'di lta ste/_lug dang /_glang dang /_'khrig pa dang /_kaR+ka Ta dang /_seng ge dang /_bu mo dang /_srang dang /_sdig pa dang /_gzhu dang /_chu srin dang /_bum pa dang /_nya dang /_spre'u dang /_nye ba'i 
[\[225b.3\]]bum pa dang /_gser bum dang /_ral gri dang /_glang po che dang /_ma he dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_dge mtshan dang /_dri za dang /_'jig rten dgongs pa dang /_rgyal ba'i mchog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_nam mkha' dang /_grib ma dang /_sa gzhi 
[\[225b.4\]]dang /_mun pa dang /_rdul dang /_nye ba'i rdul dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba dang /_thar pa'i byang chub dang /_rang byang chub dang /_nyan thos dang /_dmyal ba'i rigs 'dzin dang /_gzi brjid chen po dang /_gzi brjid chen po ldan pa dang /_
[\[225b.5\]]byol song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_sha za dang /_sha za mo dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad pa dang /_phyogs kyi glang po dang /_steng 'gro dang /_thams cad 'gro dang /_rnam bye dang /_rnal 'byor 'gro dang /_rab tu 
[\[225b.6\]]gnas pa dang /_mchog dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma zhes pa 'di rnams dang /_khyim chen po khyim brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'di rnams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa gang na ba der nye bar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 
[\[225b.7\]]'tshal te rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to/_/gang yang gnod sbyin chen mo gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag bye bas bskor ba 'di lta ste/_mig bzang ma dang /_smin ma bzang mo dang /_skra bzang ma dang /_dbyangs snyan ma dang /_blo gros bzang mo dang /_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]dbyig ldan ma dang /_mig bkra ma dang /_bsam rdzogs ma dang /_gsang ba ma dang /_'og bag ma dang /_'og pag bzang mo dang /_pad+ma'i dus ma dang /_mi 'jigs ma dang /_mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang /_rgyal ma dang /_rnam par 
[\[226a.2\]]rgyal ma dang /_nam gru can ma dang /_skra ldan ma dang /_skra mtha' ma dang /_rlung ma dang /_yid 'phrog ma dang /_yid ldan ma dang /_me tog ldan ma dang /_me tog grong gnas ma dang /_ser skya mo dang /_'phrog ma dang /_dpa' mo ldan ma dang /_

[\[226a.5\]]'di rnams gnod sbyin ma brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to/_/gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor 
[\[226a.6\]]ba de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal te 'dus par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/_rgyan pa mo dang /_phyag dar gyi sha za mo dang /_drag mo sha za mo dang /_ta la la'i sha za mo dang /_'bar ba'i sha za mo dang /_thal ba za ma dang /_sha 
[\[226a.7\]]la za ba mo dang /_'dzin dka' ma dang /_'khrul byed ma dang /_rmongs byed ma dang /_sgrogs byed ma dang /_skyed byed ma dang /_'jig rten mthar gnas ma dang /_thal ba'i mtha' can ma dang /_'thung gcod ldan ma dang /_mang po ma dang /_
