[\[226b.1\]]gdul dka' ma dang /_e la mo dang /_mtshan ma can ma dang /_du ba'i mtha' can ma dang /_du ba ma dang /_du ba bzang mo ma zhes pa sha za mo chen mo 'di rnams sha za mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba rnams kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 
[\[226b.2\]]'khor chen po der rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/gang yang ma mo dang /_ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su spyod cing sems can la rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa gtor ma dang phreng ba nyid sdud par byed pa la 'di lta ste/_tshangs ma dang /_dbang phyug chen mo dang /_khyab 
[\[226b.3\]]'jug ma dang /_gzhon nu ma dang /_rgan byad ma dang /_phag mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_gshin rje ma dang /_me mo dang /_nyi ma'i bu mo dang /_'jig rten bar ma dang /_chu lha mo dang /_dbang ldan mo dang /_rlung lha mo dang /_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang /_
[\[226b.4\]]zhal rgyan pa mo dang /_dge mtshan ma dang /_dge mtshan ma chen mo dang /_srul mo dang /_lus srul mo dang /_skem byed ma zhes pa ma mo chen mo 'di rnams ma mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba de rnams 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[226b.5\]]po der/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu 'don cing 'khod par gyur to/_/de bzhin du mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_sems can dang sems can ma yin pa ji srid dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i 
[\[226b.6\]]bar skabs 'dir thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil du gsal bar gyur to/_/sems can gyi tshogs kyi srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod pa med par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sems 
[\[226b.7\]]can thams cad kyi spyi bo na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs pa yang dag par mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]nas sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal to/_/sems can dag gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig_/de nas byang chub 
[\[227a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang bas/_nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis rgyan bkod pa rdo rje sdug cing sra ba'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/sems dpa' chen po 
[\[227a.3\]]snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de thams cad dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rdo rje'i rang bzhin rgya chen por lhag par gnas par gyur to/_/der gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /_dri za dang /_rlung lha dang /_sha za de rnams dang /_mdor 
[\[227a.4\]]bsdus na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal yas khang de rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bur yang dag par rab tu gnas so/_/'khod par gyur pa rnams phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba med do/_/de nas sems dpa' chen 
[\[227a.5\]]po de 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa la bos par gyur to/_/kye kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig_/
[\[227a.6\]]dbang du gyis shig_/gdug pa rnams thul cig_/zhi ba rnams sad par gyis shig_/ma dad pa rnams dad par gyis shig_/ji srid pa'i rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya chen po de nyid 
[\[227a.7\]]kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chang ba de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la srungs shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_khro bo'i rgyal po chen po bka' mnos nas/_rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs yongs su 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]brtags te sems can thams cad bsrung bar bya ba'i don dang /_brtan par bya ba'i don du bkod pa chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa khro bo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba phyogs bzhi kun nas de ltar steng dang 'og dang thad 
[\[227b.2\]]kar sgra drag po 'don bzhin pas rab tu gnas par gyur to/_/de nas sems can de rnams zhi ba nyid kyi yid dang ldan pas yang dag par 'jug pa'i bka' las mi 'da' bar gyur te/_sgra 'di lta bu'ang thos par gyur to/_/gang dam tshig 'di 'da' bar byed pa 
[\[227b.3\]]'di dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' de rang gi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa 
[\[227b.4\]]chos gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par gyur to/_/gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o/_/chos gnyis po dag la rab tu gnas na 
[\[227b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/_gnyis po dag gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos gsum rnams kyi rang gi gsang sngags kyi spyod 
[\[227b.6\]]pa'i don nges par brtan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_sems can yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang /_rang gi gsang sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do/_/chos bzhi 
[\[227b.7\]]yang dag par ldan na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rang gi gsang sngags rdzogs pa yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /_gzhan gyi gsang sngags nye bar gcod pa min pa nyid dang /_sems can thams 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang /_snying rje chen po sgom pa'i sems te chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/chos lngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 
[\[228a.2\]]yang dag par 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul bsten pa nyid dang /_bas mtha'i dgon pa bsten pa nyid dang /_sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang /_'jig 
[\[228a.3\]]rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/_chos lnga po 'di dag gis sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos drug ni gsang sngags kyi spyod 
[\[228a.4\]]pa'i dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_drug gang zhe na/_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa nye bar gcod pa med pa nyid dang /_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang /_skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid kyis gsang sngags 
[\[228a.5\]]kyi spyod pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi spong ba nyid de/_chos drug po 'di ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi dngos grub la yang dag par kun du 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/chos bdun rnams ni/_rig sngags grub 
[\[228a.6\]]pa'i cho ga dang /_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug par byed pa nyid du 'gyur te/_bdun gang zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul zab mo sgom pa dang /_zlos pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_'dri bar byed pa dang /_byang 
[\[228a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pas dus gsum du ston pa dang /_nges par sdom pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_smra bcad dang /_dka' thub la ma thogs pa dang /_blo gros dang /_dran pa dang /_shes rab dang /_brtan pa dang du 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]len par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo'i tshul la yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul dang /_rang gi gsang sngags dang /_sngags dgug pa dang /_srung ba dang /_bsgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang /_
[\[228b.2\]]snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po yongs su sgom par byed pa las dang /_sems can gyi khams dang /_chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa/_gnyis su 
[\[228b.3\]]med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba las dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa las te chos bdun po 'di rnams ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs 
[\[228b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos brgyad ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyis dngos grub yang dag par 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dad pas ngo mtshar bar sems par 'dod pa nyid dang /_
[\[228b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i 'bras bu rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa the tshom med pa las dang /_phyin ci ma log pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa las bla ma la gus pa las dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang rgyu 
[\[228b.6\]]dang spyod pa nye bar bstan pa mi slu bar 'dzin cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba las dang /_dngos grub kyi zhing gnas dang /_gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang /_ser sna dang /_gnyid dang /_rmugs pa mtha' 
[\[228b.7\]]dag dang bral bar byed pa/_rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang /_mdor bsdus na dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te bgegs thams cad rab tu 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]sel bar byed pa las dang /_byang chub kyi rgyud gnon par byed pa dang /_longs spyod chen po dang /_dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang /_dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa dang /_dge 
[\[229a.2\]]ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste/_chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag mdor na byang chub 
[\[229a.3\]]kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos pa mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la'ang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pas yid sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 
[\[229a.4\]]mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de las gzhan du rtogs par bya ba ma yin no/_/rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no/_/de nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i 
[\[229a.5\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams 'di skad du rjod par byed de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i don 
[\[229a.6\]]bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston cig legs so legs so/_/e ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba legs par gsungs so/_/rgyal po 
[\[229a.7\]]chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang /_g.yul du'ang thog mar glang po che'i steng du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'gyur ba de la bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par bgyi/_phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/_pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi/_glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[229b.2\]]mo'am/_rgyal po chen po'am/_rgyal mo chen mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_srung ba chen po dang longs spyod chen po dang /_tshe ring por 'gyur ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_rtag tu longs 
[\[229b.3\]]spyod 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o/_/de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par bstan pa las/_ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub 
[\[229b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul gyi le'u rab 'byam las/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[229b.5\]]dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/_sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun du lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[229b.6\]]dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'od zer phyung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas nas sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[229b.7\]]chen po kun du snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes dag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/_sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug pa las bya ba'i 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byam gyi spyod pa sgrub pa sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa khyed kyis tshogs gang du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi 
[\[230a.2\]]dngos grub yang dag par thob pa dang ldan pa khyod smros shig smros shig_/gsang ba'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos de skad smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud 
[\[230a.3\]]gsungs pa/_rig sngags thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing /_sor mo'i rtse mo der rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag 
[\[230a.4\]]khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste phyung nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang ba chen pos kun du snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro 
[\[230a.5\]]bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i snying po las thams cad pa/_dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang /_gshegs su gsol ba dang /_zhi ba can dang /_rgyas pa can dang /_mngon spyod can dang /_mi snang ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba 
[\[230a.6\]]dang /_sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang /_rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang /_dgug pa dang /_rnam par sdang ba dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_dri dang phreng ba dang /_mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de/_mdor na ji ltar sbyar ba de 
[\[230a.7\]]bzhin/_de lta de ltar sgrub par byed bzhin pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'o/_/de gang zhe na/_o~M AHhU~M/_'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po las thams cad pa ste dkyil 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'khor thams cad dang /_gsang sngags spyod pa thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[230b.2\]]phyug gis phyag g.yas pa bteg nas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/_gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas 
[\[230b.3\]]shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig_/de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po de bskor nas btang bar gyur to/_/khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[230b.4\]]gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bkug nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dag pa'i sems can la yang dag par bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems 
[\[230b.5\]]can gdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs par gyur nas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems can 
[\[230b.6\]]khyed cag thams cad nyon cig_/gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal pos tshar gcod par 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rig sngags 
[\[230b.7\]]dang /_gsang sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang chen ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'chad par byed do/_/de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zung shig dang /_ngas bshad do/_/
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te/_shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_Ar+ya ta rA yai/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[231a.2\]]r-i dzu ka d+harma nir+yA te/_tA re tut+tA re/_shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te/_tA re a na b+hi lA pya d+harma ni r+yA te tut+tA re tu re hi ni/_drA sa ni/_bi trA sa ni/_o ha ni/_mo ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_pra b+he/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he hi/_hi li hi li/_bi le bi le/_be ga gA mi ni/_kuN+Di ma hA 
[\[231a.3\]]kuN+Di/_d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha na pa ti/_tA re hu ru hu ru/_ku ru ku ru/_a haM/_yAM yAM/_tsin+ta yA mi/_tsin+ta tiM me ku ru swA hA/_grogs po dag 'di ni/_nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags las thams cad byed ma/_srid 
[\[231a.4\]]pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod pa/_ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed ma'o/_/phyag rgya yang 'dir rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes pa rnam par grags pa de la rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro/_/'dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde 
[\[231a.5\]]ba thob par byed pa/_zhi ba thams cad byed pa/_sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_rang nyid nga'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bos nye bar gnas pa 
[\[231a.6\]]bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/_gang dang gang dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad mthar byed pa/_'jigs pa chen po rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa ste/_bzlas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de gang zhe na/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[231a.7\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_phyag rgya yang 'dir ut+pa la zhes kyang rnam par grags pa longs spyod thams cad mngon bar 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa'ang mchog tu dpal dang ldan pa'i 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]dag byed chen po ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maH_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_o~M ku ru kul+le swA hA/_phyag rgya yang 'dir pad+ma'i phreng bzhes rnam par grags par 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o/_/'dir mchog gi snying por gyur 
[\[231b.2\]]pa yang /_na maH_sarba bud+d+hA mAM/_o~M gI/_'di ni snying po'i mchog ste mdor bsdu na bya ba thams cad la yon tan chen po rgyas pa ste/_yon tan mur thug par brjod pa ni dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mi nus so/_/phyag rgya yang 
[\[231b.3\]]'dir brtson 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir spyan drang ba'i rig sngags su gyur pa yang /_na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/_o~M he he b+ha ga ba ti bi shwa rU pi Ni sarba ba la/_b+hA Shi ti/_pra bo d+ha ni A yA ni/_
[\[231b.4\]]b+ha ga ba ti/_krIDa ut+pa la d+hi ni/_ma ma shud+d+hA ya/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_a pra ti ha ta/_shA sa na hU~M/_mA bi lam+ba ku ru ku ru phaT swA hA/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang ba'i rig sngags te/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang 
[\[231b.5\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_sha za 
[\[231b.6\]]dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi yang yin no/_/tsan+dan gyi chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi dang /_de bzhin du steng dang /_'og dang /_thad ka thams cad du gtor bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[231b.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad dang /_bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma dang /_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di yin te/_'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/na maH
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]sarba bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra hi ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_o~M d+hu ru d+hu ru/_d+hu ma bA si ni/_ma mA rtsi Sha hU~M/_tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_gdug pa'i rig sngags te/_tsan+dan dang /_gur gum dang /_ga pur gcig tu byas nas bdug pa dbul bar 
[\[232a.2\]]bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon pa rnams spos kyi bdug pas yid tshim nas khugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dir phyag rgyar gyur pa'ang pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed 
[\[232a.3\]]cing zhi ba ste/_spyan drang ba'i rig sngags la'ang phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po 'di nyid do/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad byon pa la'ang mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/_ga pur dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gur gum 
[\[232a.4\]]chu dang sbyar nas dzA ti'i me tog dang /_mA li ka gsar pa dang /_dbyar gyi me tog dang /_bun nA ka dang /_ba ku li dang /_rgya spos rnams te 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/_dus ji lta ba'i me tog gam/_dri bzang po'i me tog rnams dang bsres nas sngags 'dis 
[\[232a.5\]]mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_he he ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha de ba tA d+hiSh+ThA na/_ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_sarba bud+d+hA/_a nu kaM 
[\[232a.6\]]ba ka_/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/_am+ba ri bi tsA ri Ni swA hA/_phyag rgya 'dir gang ba zhes grags te sems can thams cad kyis rjes su 'jug cing brtan pa'o/_/'dir dri'i rig sngags su gyur pa yang /_na maHsarba bud+hA nAM/_na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a pa b+hA Shi te shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[232a.7\]]gan+d+he gan+d+he h+lA de gan+d+ha ma no ra me pra tits+tsha daM/_gan+d+haM sa ma nA nu tsA ri Ni swA hA/_'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba yang /_lo ma zhes bya ba bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir me tog gi sngags su gyur pa yang /_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a pra ti ha 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]ta shA sa nA nAM/_na maHsaM ku su mi ta radz+nyA s+ya/_ta thA ga tA s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_ku su me ku su me ku su mA d+h+yo ku su mA sUr bA si/_ku su mA ba ti swA hA/_bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/rmad byung bsam mi khyab 
[\[232b.2\]]pa'i sku/_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas nas/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i/_/gtor ma'i rig sngags rab 'chad byed/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_he he b+ha ga ba ti ma hA satwe sarba bud+d+hA a ba lo ki te/_mA bi laM 
[\[232b.3\]]ba i dam pa liM gr-ih+Na pa ya grah+Na pa hU~M hU~M hU~M sarba ra ra phaT phaT swA hA/_lha bshos 'dis dbul bar bya ste/_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mar 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang phyag rgya ni dbyug pa ste/_gdug pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_
[\[232b.4\]]a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_sarba ta mo nyan+d+ha kAr bi t+yaM si tA nA/_na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan+d+ha a ba b+ta sa pri yA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_he he b+ha ga bA na dz+yo te rasmi sha ta sa ha sra/_pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/_bi kur ba bi kur ba ma hA bo d+hi satwA man+ta dz+wo lo d+yo ta mUr+t+ti/_khuR+ha 
[\[232b.5\]]khuR+ha/_a ba lo kI ya/_a ba lo kI ya/_maN+Da la sarba satwA nAM swA hA/_mar me'i rig sngags te/_'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o/_/phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti he ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[232b.6\]]dz+wa la dz+wa la/_dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya hU~M bi bo d+ha ka ha ra kr-iSh+Na piM ga swA hA/_me'i bya ba byed pa'i rig sngags su 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang phyag rgya ni/_kha sbyor zhes par 'jig rten grags/_/sems can kun 'od kyis gsal byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo 
[\[232b.7\]]ldan dang /_/thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni/_gsang chen 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang ba yin te/_bu khyod la phan drag po'i mtha'/_/mi bzad pa yi rigs su grags/_/sngags rnams thams cad gang kho na/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya'o/_/spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa/_/rdo rje 
[\[233a.2\]]pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang /_/de ni nges par gzhig don du/_/rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_o~M ka ra ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_ma ma kAr+yAM dzaM b+ha/_dzaM b+ha sarba sarba da ha da ha/_sarba badzra bi nA sha ka_/mAr+d+ha 
[\[233a.3\]]DA ka dzI ban+tAM ta ka rA ma hA bi tri ta rA pi Ne pa tsa pa tsa sarba duSh+DaM ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI ban+tAM ta ka ra/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_sarba gra hAM/_ShaDa mu kha Tha Da b+hu dza Sha Da tsa ra Na ru dra mA na ya brah+ma t+yaM de ba nA na ya mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba b+hu Sha hrI maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M hU~M hU~M 
[\[233a.4\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lag zhal drug pa zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad rnam par 'joms pa po ste/_'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la 
[\[233a.5\]]gnas pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/_ma rungs pa'i bgegs rnams lta ci smos/_'di bklags pa tsam gyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/'dir phyag rgya yang rigs chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te bgegs rnam par 'jig par 
[\[233a.6\]]byed pa'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi snying po ni/_oM hrIHSh+T-IH_bi kr-i tA na na hU~M sarba sha truM stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/_sngags 'dis dgra thams cad gzer chen po'i nad dang /_yang rims nyin gcig pas zin par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pas/_ji srid snang bar 
[\[233a.7\]]byams pa nyid du mi 'gyur/_yang na snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/_bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya'i/_zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yin no/_/phyag 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]rgya mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o/_/'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa yang /_o~M hrIH/_kA la rU paM hU~M khaM swA hA/_snga ma'i mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o/_/gdug pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/mchog gi snying po sangs rgyas thams 
[\[233b.2\]]cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba ni hU~M 'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste/_phyag rgya mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o/_/phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa 'byung po thams cad dpang du byed pa ste/_mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las 
[\[233b.3\]]thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pas grub pa'i dus su'ang /_khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su gyur pa yang /_na maH_sarba bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_dza ya 
[\[233b.4\]]dza ya/_su dza ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pi ni/_gats+tsha gats+tsha swa b+hA ba nAM/_sarba bud+d+haM swa bi sardzA ya/_sa pa ri bA raM/_swa b+ha bA nAM tsA pra be sha ya/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_sarbAr+tha swa me si d+h+yaM tu/_bi d+h+ya sa dAHma no ra thaM tsa me pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/_'di ni gshegs 
[\[233b.5\]]su gsol ba'i sngags te las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes grags pa ste/_'dis gdan yang sbyin par bya'o/_/yid kyis lan bdun bzlas pas thams cad gshegs su gsol lo/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[233b.6\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang /_sngags rnams nyid la'ang sngags kyi dngos grub dang /_dam tshig dang /_bzlas pa dang /_dus dang /_nges par sdom pa rnams la'ang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i 
[\[233b.7\]]bu rnams la kun du gzigs te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la rang gi rig pa'i tshogs sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs par gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta ga tI nAM o~M ni Ti swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i skra can 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa/_las thams cad pa ste dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po dug gi las thams cad la kun du sbyar ro/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_o~M ni Ti/_'di ni nye bar spyod pa'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i 
[\[234a.2\]]rig pa las thams cad pa ste/_phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes pa gza'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_o~M ni/_rig pa 'di ni sdong bu can zhes bya ba spyod pa'i dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa ste/_phyag rgya ni 
[\[234a.3\]]bzang po'i gdan gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dgug par bya ba la sbyar ro/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a tsin+t+yad+d+hA ta rU pi NAM/_o~M Sh+Tai swA hA/_mkha' 'gro ma kun 'joms pa yi/_/phyag rgya sbubs can yang dag sbyar/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa 
[\[234a.4\]]yi/_/rig sngags thod pa can zhes bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi pad+ma nyid/_/rab bsngags lha yi gzugs can ma/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/_a pra ti ha ta ga ti/_tsA ra NaM/_tad+ya thA/_oM ba ra de sA hA/_phyag rgya ut+pa la nyid ni/_/dpal gyi bdag nyid 
[\[234a.5\]]spyan la sbyar/_/gzugs mang 'chang ba'i lha mo ni/_/myur du longs spyod rab sgrub pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a tsin+t+ya d+d+hU ta rU pi NAM o~M su ri swA hA/_phyag rgya mdung dang yang dag ldan/_/rims rnams thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_
[\[234a.6\]]a tsin+tad+d+hA ta rU pi NAM oM tu re swA hA/_bsam pa'i sgrol ma ldan pa zhes/_/rab bsngags las rnams thams cad pa/_/dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/_/bgegs rnams 'joms byed ma la sbyar/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a tsin+t+yad+d+hU ta rU pi NAM/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[234a.7\]]oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/_rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/_/bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa/_/pad+ma phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a tsin+t+ya d+d+hU ta rU pi NAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM bi shwa/_bi shwa saM b+ha be bi sha rU pi NAM 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ka ha ka ha A bi sha A bi sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/_rig pa brtson 'grus chen mo ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste/_/snying po phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid/_/sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/_/sna tshogs zhes byar yang dag bsgrags/_/
[\[234b.2\]]na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_o~M tsin+t+yad+b+hu ta rU pi NAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M shwe te prA ba su hwA hA/_pad+ma'i gdan gyi rnam par dgod/_/las rnams thams cad byed pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta ga ti prA ti ri NAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M shrIHrig pa 'di 
[\[234b.3\]]ni dpal mo che/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste/_/phyag rgya kha sbyor ldan pa yi/_/rgyal srid chen po rab sbyin byed/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_sarba satwA b+ha ya pra dA yi kA/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a dzi te ku mA ra rU pi NI/_o~M hi a gats+tsha ma ma kar yaM ku 
[\[234b.4\]]ru swA hA/_mi thub ma zhes rnam grags ma/_/gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung ba/_/gang ba'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/_/dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a tsin+t+yad+b+hu ta rU pi NAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM dza ye swA hA/_bi dza ye 
[\[234b.5\]]swA hA/_a dzi te swA hA/_sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba/_/sa rnams mtha' dag yongs rgyu zhing /_/sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa/_/ming po tu bu ru zhes grags/_/'di rnams kyis ni rjes su spyod/_/
[\[234b.6\]]gru yi bzhon pa mnyam zhon nas/_/rgya mtsho la ni nges par gnas/_/khu tshur phyag rgyas rnam par dgod/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_lo kA grA d+hi ba ti nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ku mA ri ma hA ku mA ri krI Da krI 
[\[234b.7\]]Da/_ma hA rAk+Sha si bo d+hi satwA nu dz+nyA ta ma yu rA sa ne pA sha_/par shU pA Ni rak+tAM gI rak+ta gan+d+d+hA nu le pa na pri ye pri ye/_kha kha khA hi khA hi hU~M nri t+ya rak+ta puSh+pA rtsi ta mU r+t+ti sa ma nu sma ra/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/_hu lu hu lu mA bi lam+ba/_sarba karmA Ni me ku ru ku ru/_
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]pi tsi tra rU pa d+hA ri Ni/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_hU~M hU~M sarba bud+d+hA nu dz+nyA te swA hA/_sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pas na/_/sa rnams ma lus kun nas ni/_/rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/_/sems can kun 
[\[235a.2\]]la phan don dang /_/gdug pa'i sems can zlog byed pa/_/bdag gi rig pa rtag tu grags/_/rtag tu srung bar yongs su grags/_/srung ba ltos 'gro de nyid kyi/_/'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshan/_/snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi/_/byang chub 
[\[235a.3\]]sems dpa' de nas gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/byis pa rnams la phan don du/_/gang la sems can spyod gsungs pa/_/'gro ba rnams la rnam spyod ldan/_/phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ldan/_/bdag nyid chen pos sbyar nas 
[\[235a.4\]]ni/_/tshangs pa la sogs 'gugs byed na/_/mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos/_/gzhon nu'i sems su ma lus pa'i/_/rtog pa 'di ni bsdus nas su/_/srin po rnams su grags pa yi/_/rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bstan/_/sems can rjes gzung 'dod 
[\[235a.5\]]pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bshad/_/yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po 'di/_/rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bshad/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/nye bar longs spyod 'gugs pa'i mchog_/phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni/_/rnam bkod 
[\[235a.6\]]las rnams thams cad pa'o/_/o~M hU~M dzaH/_rig sngags 'di ni mdor bsdus nas/_/mi rnams 'bras bu byed pa yin/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_sa man+to t+yo ti ta mUr+t+ti nAM/_a bi kr-i ta gra ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po 'di yang ni/_/phyag rgya dgra sta yang 
[\[235a.7\]]dag ldan/_/de bzhin 'byung po 'gugs par byed/_/de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas/_/thams cad phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa/_/bkod na 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur/_/'byung po rnams ni rnam skrag byed/_/gdug pa zhugs pa rnam par grol/_/'di ni 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i pho nya mo chen mo las thams cad pa ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba rjes su spyod pa las thams cad pa ste bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed do/_/'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa dang /_'gugs par 
[\[235b.2\]]byed pa dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M prah+mA su prah+mA prah+mA/_baR+tsa se shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po 
[\[235b.3\]]ste/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/_/'byung po zhi ba rab tu thob/_/skad cig nyid la bsil bar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya pad+ma yang dag ldan/_/myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur/_/mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams la/_/srid srung gi ni rig byed 
[\[235b.4\]]'dod/_/'di ni mdor bsdus brjod pa ste/_/cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM ga ru Da ba ha na tsakra pA ni tsa tur b+hu dza hU~M hU~M/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_bo d+hi satwa Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_byang 
[\[235b.5\]]chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_/zhi ba'i don ni myur du byed/_/'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig byed/_/khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin/_/phyag rgya 'khor lor yang dag ldan/_/brtan pa'i don ni yang dag byed/_/gang 'di khyab 'jug rgyud du ni/_/
[\[235b.6\]]cho ga rgyas par bstan pa ste/_/sems can kun gyi sgrub byed de/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hu tA d+hi pa ti br-i Sha b+ha/_d+h+wa dze pra laM ba dza Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri NI/_si 
[\[235b.7\]]ta b+hasma d+hu sa ra ta/_mUrti sa aM phaT phaT bo d+hi satwa Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/sngags 'di bdag gis rab tu brjod/_/mdung gi phyag rgya mnyam par ldan/_/'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa/_/'di yang bstan 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa'i cho ga 'di/_/sems can sa stengs gnas pa la/_/sngon ni zhi ba'i rgyud du bstan/_/yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba/_/zhi ba'i rgyud kyis kyang brjod do/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA naM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sha ku ni pa ta ta 
[\[236a.2\]]pak+Shi Na/_sha ka kha kha/_khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M tiSh+Tha bo d+hi satwa Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_sngags 'di brtson 'grus chen po ste/_/nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags/_/gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog_/gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms/_/
[\[236a.3\]]phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/_/phung khrol mi bzad bcas pa 'joms/_/brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug rnams ni/_/gso bar byed par the tshom med/_/gdul bya'i sems can la brtse bas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag bka'/_/nam mkha' lding gi 
[\[236a.4\]]gzugs kyis spyod/_/'dab chags rgyal po 'od chen ldan/_/ji srid nam mkha' lding rgyud du/_/bstan pa'i cho ga rgyas de rnams/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i rgyud/_/bdag gis kyang ni brjod pa yin/_/mkha' lding mngon par brjod rgyud du/_/khro 
[\[236a.5\]]bo'i rgyal po ma bstan na/_/gdengs can dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir/_/'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu/_/ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags/_/de rnams cho ga dper brjod pa/_/gdul bya'i sems can don du ni/_/de lta de ltar rnam par spyod/_/gang 
[\[236a.6\]]yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang /_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang /_/de rnams cho ga rab 'byam 'dir/_/snga ma kho nar gsungs pas yin/_/ji ltar ma ma rnam mang po/_/byis pa 'bad pas srung byed pa/_/de bzhin byis mtha'i blo can la/_/nga ni rig 
[\[236a.7\]]sngags gzugs kyi rgyu/_/stobs bcu ldan pas sngon gsungs pa/_/da lta'ang nga yis bstan pa yin/_/sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa/_/rtogs pas rab gsungs 'od chen po/_/rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs pa/_/stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras kyis gsungs/_/
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rmad byung bsam mi khyab gzugs can/_/spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 
[\[236b.2\]]de la kun du gzigs nas dam tshig thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gang du ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas sems can ma lus pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod pa'i yid/_sems can thams cad la rab tu gnas 
[\[236b.3\]]par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po gnas rnam par bkra ba'i phyag na rin po che'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i rnam 
[\[236b.4\]]par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_sa bcu dang ldan pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang /_dkyil 'khor de bri ba'am 'drir 'jug par 
[\[236b.5\]]mi nus na/_so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i gnas la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[236b.6\]]cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rgyal tshab tu mngon par dbang bskur zhing dam tshig thob pa thams cad dang /_spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /_zag 
[\[236b.7\]]pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to/_/so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de yid kyis dmigs par mi nus na/_bri ba'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/de nas yang byang chub 
[\[237a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag nyon cig_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[237a.3\]]rnams kyis kyang 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na/_sems can rnams dang /_'phags pa gzhan rnams kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag po la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_mi 
[\[237a.4\]]las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung ba ni nges par bstan to/_/mi rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang dag tu sems can rnams yang dag par zhugs nas/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang /_
[\[237a.5\]]sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o/_/de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gang da lta dus la bab par shes 
[\[237a.6\]]na gsungs shig gsungs shig_/shAkya seng+ge 'jig rten mgon/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mi rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing /_/sems can sa stengs khyod dkyil 'khor/_/mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na/_/sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skye/_/mi 
[\[237a.7\]]shes cho ga nyams pa'am/_/dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na/_/tshangs pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang /_/rig sngags dngos grub mi 'gyur ro/_/sngags la mngon par mi brtson dang /_/dam tshig bstan pa mi mthong na/_/rnam par du mar 'bad byas kyang /_/rig pa'i 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]dngos grub mi 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na/_/brgya byin gyis kyang rab 'bad las/_/rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na/_/sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes/_/spyod pa'i las rnams sgrub pa de/_/'jig rten 
[\[237b.2\]]pa dang 'phags pa'i sngags/_/bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rab zhugs las rnams thams cad byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa la/_/de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag_/de nas yang gsang ba 
[\[237b.3\]]pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/_sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab par gyur to/_/kye kye sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs so/_/dang po re zhig cho 'phrul 
[\[237b.4\]]gyi zla phyed dam/_nag pa can nam/_sa gcan gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'i nyi ma dang /_gza' bzang po bltas te/_rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang /_zla ba nya ba'am/_dus gzhan la 
[\[237b.5\]]dbyar gyi zla ba spangs te/_snga dro sa rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/grong khyer chen po la brten pa'am/_gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid gnas par te/_rgya mtshor 'jug pa'am/_chu klung la brten pa'am/_rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye bar grong khyer chen po'i 
[\[237b.6\]]byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring /_ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/_nyi ma bdun nam/_zla phyed du mtha' gcig tu smyung ba'am/_nye bar gnas nas so sor gnas par bya'o/_/gang gnas de rnams su'ang gtsang 
[\[237b.7\]]ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_thal ba dang /_sol ba dang /_phub ma dang /_thod pa dang /_rus pa dang /_rus pa gnas pa dang bral ba/_shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogs su/_srog chags med pa'i chu la/_ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan+dan dang /_
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ga pur dang /_gur gum gyi chus khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa stong phrag brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po yang dag par ldan pas/_sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par 
[\[238a.2\]]gtor zhing steng dang 'og dang thad ka dang phyogs bral rnams su'ang kun nas gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir/_khru bcu drug gam/_khru bcu gnyis sam/_khru brgyad bya ste/_de la chen po ni khru bcu drug go/_/bar ma ni khru bcu gnyis 
[\[238a.3\]]so/_/chung ngu ni khru brgyad do/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'di/_/thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin/_/rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste/_/bar ma longs spyod 'phel bar byed/_/chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshig ni/_/las rnams kun byed zhi 
[\[238a.4\]]pa yin/_/de la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/de la sa'i phyogs der khru gnyis tsam brkos la/_der rdo ba dang /_sol ba dang /_thal ba dang /_rus pa dang /_skra la sogs pa dang /_srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal te 
[\[238a.5\]]mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko bar bya'o/_/gnod pa med pa dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba med pa der 'gyur ro/_/ri'i rtse mo dang /_rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i chu ngogs rnams su'ang gang rab tu 'bad pa chen pos shin tu so sor brtags te shin tu gtsang zhing srog 
[\[238a.6\]]chags med par byas nas bri bar bya'o/_/sa'i phyogs der slar yang srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga bsres pas chu klung gi 'gram gyi sa gtsang ma'am/_grog mkhar gyi sa'am/_gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o/_/bkang nas kyang legs 
[\[238a.7\]]par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams su gdab par bya'o/_/tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su/_nang du'ang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o/_/dbus kyi nang na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig 
[\[238b.2\]]pa'am/_rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/phyag rgya chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid bsrung bar byas te/_bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste/_dkyil 'khor la 
[\[238b.3\]]g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhi'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o/_/de nyid kyi phyi rol du zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas 
[\[238b.4\]]rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/de la 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sngon spyad pa rnams byas te/_rang gi rig pa dang /_sngags dang rgyud la mkhas pa'i mkhan pos sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir theg pa chen po la lhag par mos pas zhag gcig smyung bar gnas 
[\[238b.5\]]pas grogs bzang po dang yang dag par ldan pa/_bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba mthong bas tshon lnga'i phye ma zhib mo 'bar bas legs par sbyang ba byas nas/_rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang snying pos mngon par bsngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab 
[\[238b.6\]]par bya'o/_/pha rol du'ang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sgreng ba dang /_rta babs bzhes brgyan pa dang /_chu shing gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za zhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_dung gi sgra 
[\[238b.7\]]nges par sgrogs pa'i sa'i phyogs su bsgrag par bya'o/_/ngos bzhir rjes su mthun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i sgra'i chos mnyan par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi rnams su theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i glegs bam bklag par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o/_/'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su'o/_/'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyogs su'o/_/'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o/_/de ltar glegs bam klog pa po med na mdo sde bzhi 
[\[239a.2\]]po klog par rtogs pa'i gang zag chos smra ba po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan+dan dang /_ga pur dang /_gur gum rnam par bsres pa'i me tog dkar po dri zhim pa la rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas te/_dkyil 
[\[239a.3\]]'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o/_/mngon par bkram nas phyi rol du byung ste/_zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa gnyis sam/_gsum/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/_gso sbyong nye bar gnas pa bsten pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan 
[\[239a.4\]]de grogs sam/_slob ma des khas blangs pa rab tu gzhug par bya'o/_/gang rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis gtsug tor bcing ba byas nas/_de nas gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i go 'phang rnam par bkra zhing /_'bar la mdzes pa'i zangs kyi 
[\[239a.5\]]phye ma zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing /_chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams 'dir gzhug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las nges par byang chub la gzhol ba yin no/_/sngags sgrub par byed pa lta ci smos/_shAkya'i skyes 
[\[239a.6\]]mchog mya ngan 'das/_/sems can bsod nams chung rnams la/_/'di lta'i longs spyod ga la yod/_/cho ga 'di ni bstan par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ldan/_/skye bo bkren pa gzigs nas ni/_/nyung zhing mdor bsdus dkyil 'khor ni/_/mdor 
[\[239a.7\]]bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/_/'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga pa 'bar bas/_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_nag po dang /_ljang gu'i kha dog tu kha bsgyur la/_sngar bzhag pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te rtsa ba'i rig pas phye ma la phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o/_/gzhan zhi ba sgrub pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol lho shar gyi phyogs su las kyi cho ga mthong bas me thab bya'o/_/khru gnyis 
[\[239b.2\]]kyi tshad la dpangs khru gang tsam kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam par shing pa lA sha'i yam shing rnams kyis me rab tu sbar te/_shing dpal 'bras kyi yam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad la rlan dang bcas pa/_zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa rnams 
[\[239b.3\]]kyis rtsa ba'i snying pos sam/_phyag rgya dang /_rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis me lha spyan drang bar bya'o/_/spyan drangs nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyi rig pa'am/_rtsa ba'i rig pa'i snying pos slar yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 
[\[239b.4\]]'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gtsug tor gtsang zhing yo byad tshogs par byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa'am/_slob ma byed du gzhug go/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[239b.5\]]rnams yid la byas nas sngar brjod pa'i bdug pa'i rig pas bsreg go/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas nas 
[\[239b.6\]]phye ma blangs te/_gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing /_ri mo mkhan mkhas pas rdzogs par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di dag gis dang po kho nar re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rin po che seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas 
[\[239b.7\]]gtsang ma'i gnas na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun du bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun du bris nas rjes su sgrub pa pos bdag nyid srung ba'i cho ga dang /_rig pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gyi phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og tu gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas khrus byas nas me thab dang nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang sbra dang /_srung ba'i cho ga byas te rtsa ba'i rig pas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs 
[\[240a.2\]]stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid du gnas par bya'o/_/yungs kar dkar po la khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te/_mngon 
[\[240a.3\]]par bsngags nas kham phor kha sbyor du gzhag par bya'o/_/bgegs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams du ma dang /_nga ro drag po dang /_rlung dang /_char dang /_yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ongs pa mthong na/_khros pas yungs 
[\[240a.4\]]kar gyi sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas bgegs rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang pa nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am/_nus pa med par 'gyur ba'am/_'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_skad 
[\[240a.5\]]cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rjes su sgrub pa pos de nyid du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pas bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[240a.6\]]thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas gnyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o/_/de rnams kyi'ang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags 
[\[240a.7\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams nas/_g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o/_/de'i yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/_ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba/_dar la dkar po'i na bza' bsnams pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs bla gos 
[\[240b.2\]]bsnams pa/_thal ba nag po'i thig le gsum byas pa'o/_/de bzhin du brtan pa dang /_khro gnyer can ma yang /_rang rang gi gdan la rang rang gi spyod lam du gnas shing nye bar bzhugs pa'ang bya'o/_/de rnams kyi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[240b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ma dang /_gtsug tor rgyal mo'ang bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la/_'di lta ste/_kun du bzang po dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_sgrib 
[\[240b.4\]]pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_ngan song spong dang /_byams pa phyag na rnga yab thogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin pa dang /_dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang /_dri ma med pa'i tog dang /_nor bzang dang /_zla 'od dang /_dri ma med par grags 
[\[240b.5\]]pa dang /_nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_'jig rten 'gro ba dang /_blo gros chen po dang /_mngon par 'dzin pa zhes pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang /_
[\[240b.6\]]rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang /_rig pa'i rgyal mo dang /_pad+ma'i rigs kyi gzugs dang /_phyag rgya rnams lung las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin dang /_gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri'o/_/mtha'i gnas su'ang 
[\[240b.7\]]gru bzhi'i rnam par gnas gzhag par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang /_rig pa'i lha gang gis dran pa yang gnas de rnams su gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas nam 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mkha' dang /_yongs su zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ngo /_/de bzhin du shar du kha bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan dang /_grub pa 
[\[241a.2\]]zhes pa gzhan gnyis kyang kun tu bri'o/_/de rnams kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po 'od srung chen po dang /_ka t+ya na dang gnyis kun du bri'o/_/de rnams kyi'ang gzhogs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs su snang ba rab tu zhi ba'i gzugs rgyan thams cad 
[\[241a.3\]]kyis brgyan pa/_phyag g.yas rnga yab thogs pa/_g.yon pa khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa'o/_/rdo rje khu tshur dang /_rdo rje lcags kyu dang /_rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_dpung bzang dang /_rdo rje sde rnams cha byad ji lta ba dang /_mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs 
[\[241a.4\]]rnams 'joms pa'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_gzugs dang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams ji ltar dran pa bzhin du bri'o/_/de rnams kyi'ang g.yon du gru bzhi'i rnam par rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bri bar bya'o/_/bris 
[\[241a.5\]]nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa de rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de rnams kyi steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma mA ma kI kun du bri ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu zhi ba'i lus so/_/de 
[\[241a.6\]]rnams kyi'ang steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_phyag rgya bcings pa rang rang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su kun du bri ste/_gser mdog dbang po rab tu zhi ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de bzhin 
[\[241a.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la cung zad blta ba sbyin pa rnams 'di lta ste/_gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang /_gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang /_rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang /_rnam par 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_gzi brjid phung po dang /_gtsug tor mthon po zhes pa ste/_gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams kun du bri'o/_/'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/_g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 
[\[241b.2\]]'gro ba zhes bya ba rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/_phyag g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/_bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa kun du bri'o/_/'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon 
[\[241b.3\]]phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba bri bar bya ste/_rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_phyag g.yon dbyug gu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa/_phyag g.yas pas bgrang phreng ba zung nas mchog sbyin pas rab tu 
[\[241b.4\]]sbyin par byed pa/_bzhin cung zad khro gnyer can 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa kun du bri'o/_/seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[241b.5\]]rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ha cang mi skem/_ha cang mi sbom pa'i lus su gnas pa/_rab tu zhi ba'i sku/_gzugs mdzes shing cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin/_phyag g.yon pas ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams pa/_
[\[241b.6\]]byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i cod pan 'chang ba/_mu tig gi phreng pas mchod phyir thogs pa byas pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/_dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs pa/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_pad+ma'i 
[\[241b.7\]]gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/_khro bo'i rgyal por gyur pa/_sgrol mas non pa la gzigs par gyur pa/_dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa/_blta na sdug pa thams cad du srin mo ral pa gcig pa byas pa'i gzugs 'chang ba kun du bri'o/_/de'i 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]g.yas phyogs kyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa bri ste/_rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_bka' so sor bzhes bzhin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen por 
[\[242a.2\]]gyur pa la blta ba kun nas bri'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ste/_'di lta ste/_shin tu dri ma med pa dang /_shin tu dul ba dang /_dag pa dang /_mun pa sel byed 
[\[242a.3\]]dang /_kun du snang ba zhes pa/_de rnams thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na 'dug pa/_rin po che 'bar ba du ma'i rdo'i mthil dang 'dra ba/_kun nas 'bar ba rnam par bkra ba'i me tog rnams kyis gcal du bkram pa/_gzugs mdzes pa kun du 
[\[242a.4\]]bri'o/_/phyi rol gyi khor yug tu gru bzhir rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa rnams par bkra ba'i tshon sna lngas gsal ba/_shin tu drang ba'i mi dma' bas nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o/_/shar gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog gi rgyal po'i 
[\[242a.5\]]dbang po pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shin tu chung tsam du bya ste/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_phyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa/_sku'i gtsug tor la bzhugs pa'o/_/de'i g.yas su gtsug tor 
[\[242a.6\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/g.yon du gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab 
[\[242a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bya ste/_phyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o/_/de'i yang g.yas su 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]lhung bzed dang /_chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas su pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon du gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste kun 
[\[242b.2\]]nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o/_/de'i yang g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa baiDUr+ya sngon po dang /_mar gad dang /_pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/_
[\[242b.3\]]kun nas kun du 'od gsal ba bri'o/_/de'i yang g.yon du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun du bri'o/_/de'i yang g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bri'o/_/de'i yang g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang 
[\[242b.4\]]phreng dang bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o/_/sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar bar bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu phyag rgya chen po dbyug pa can dang /_ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 
[\[242b.5\]]'di dag phan tshun ma 'byar bar kun du bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun du bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de yang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/_zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/_rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir ro/_/
[\[242b.6\]]nang gi dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/_gdong bzhi pa/_gos dkar po bgos pa/_stod g.yogs gos dkar po can/_mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po can/_gser gyi mdog ral 
[\[242b.7\]]pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_g.yon na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa/_phyag na rdo rje'o/_/de'i yang g.yas su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/_lus dar la'i gos bgos pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs can/_bzhin rab tu zhi ba/_ral pa'i cod pan 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]'chang ba/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/_skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/_phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa'o/_/de'i yang g.yas su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_rab tu zhi ba'i lus/_sems bsam 
[\[243a.2\]]gtan la gnas pa dar la'i gos bgos pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs can/_skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/_phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po can no/_/de'i rim pas dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 
[\[243a.3\]]'phrul dbang byed dang /_'thab bral dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin dang /_cha byad dang /_dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin no/_/brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris te/_rtag myos dang /_phreng thogs dang /_
[\[243a.4\]]lag na gzhong thogs dang /_pi wang gnyis pa dang /_sa bla pa'i lha'i bu rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba dang /_cha byad ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs su/_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_gya nom snang dang /_dge 
[\[243a.5\]]chung dang /_bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams cha byad dang /_dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du'ang /_byang gi phyogs su'ang ngo /_/nub kyi phyogs su de rnams kyi 'og tu phreng gnyis la 
[\[243a.6\]]brten nas bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi pha rol tu dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/_phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/byang phyogs su 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su nor sbyin gter dang nye bar gnas pa rgyan 
[\[243a.7\]]thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_cod pan cung zad bcom pa/_gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no/_/de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dag bri'o/_/de bzhin du rim gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]bri ste/_gzhon nu dga' byed phang na 'dug pa/_dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa bri'o/_/lngas rtsen dmar ser 'jigs su rung ba'ang bri ste/_de rnams kyi nye logs su gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du rim gyis nub kyi phyogs su 
[\[243b.2\]]lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang /_klu dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du phreng gnyis pa la brten nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am 
[\[243b.3\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_drang srong dang /_grub pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang /_sman dang /_nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang /_ri bo dang /_chu bo dang /_gling rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]
[\[243b.4\]]bzhin du gtso bor grags pa dang /_mchog tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o/_/lho phyogs su gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/shar gyi phyogs su me lha kun 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_dbyug pa dang /_ril pa 
[\[243b.5\]]spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_gos dkar po bgos pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs can/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/_gser gyi mdog thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/_sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang /_
[\[243b.6\]]mtshon cha dang /_cha byad dang /_dbyibs dang /_kha dog de yang phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bar bya'o/_/thams cad nas 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' zlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/_lag pa g.yas rtse gsum thogs pa'o/_/lha mo dka' 
[\[243b.7\]]zlog ma'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/smin drug gi bu'ang rma bya la zhon pa/_lag na mdung thung thogs pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can/_gdong drug ba lus dmar por snang ba gos ser po bgos shing stod g.yogs gos ser po can/_phyag g.yon 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs pa'o/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du b+h+r-ing gi ri ti shin tu rid pa'i rnams pa dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang /_nag po chen po dang /_ma mo bdun po rgyan dang /_cha byad dang /_
[\[244a.2\]]dbyibs ji lta bzhin du mngon par bri'o/_/nor lha brgyad dang /_drang srong bdun dang /_khyab 'jug phyag bzhi pa/_phyag na 'khor lo dang /_be con dang /_mdung dang /_ral gri thogs pa/_nam mkha' lding gi bzhon pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/gza' 
[\[244a.3\]]brgyad dang /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang /_gang sa stengs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad kyang bri'o/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du/_dkar po dang /_nag po'i tshes bco lnga dang /_khyim bcu gnyis dang /_dus drug dang /_zla ba bcu gnyis dang /_lo tshigs 
[\[244a.4\]]dang /_sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang /_lnga pa ming po chu la gnas pa rnams te/_mdor na/_phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o/_/lha rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du phreng gnyis su bya'o/_/mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang /_dkyil 'khor gsum la brten 
[\[244a.5\]]nas mngon par bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams su'ang gru bzhir rnam par gzhug par bya'o/_/'di rnams bcom ldan 'das so/_/mdor bsdu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[244a.6\]]rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni g.yas su nges par bri bar bya'o/_/rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g.yon du nges par bri bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun du bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[244a.7\]]nur gyur pa nges par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su nges par bri bar bya'o/_/'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/_/dkyil 'khor bar pa la yang /_shar gyi phyogs su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nges par mngon par bri 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su 'od gsal ba'o/_/'og min dang gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no/_/byang gi phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal 
[\[244b.2\]]po dang /_rab 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams 
[\[244b.3\]]su mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang gi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog pa dang bcas pa nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/sgo gnyis pa'i nye logs su gzhon nu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la/_lag na 
[\[244b.4\]]mdung thung thogs pa/_lus dmar por snang ba/_gos ser po'i stod g.yogs bgos pa/_phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o/_/shar gyi phyogs su nam mkha' lding 'dab 
[\[244b.5\]]chags kyi gzugs can dang /_drang srong mArkaN+Da nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su yang ngo /_/lho shar du gzhon nu bzhi dang /_gzhon nu ming po dang lhan cig pa gru'i bzhon pa la kun du gnas pa chu gter chen po la 
[\[244b.6\]]yongs su rgyu bar byed pa/_me lha'i rgyal po'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su lang ka'i grong gi srin po'i bdag po shin tu 'jigs su rung ba ste der shing pi tsu ma rda la brten nas gnas pa dang /_rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya ba gnod 
[\[244b.7\]]sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma phyag rgya rnams su'ang rnam par gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs su klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya ste/_gza'i gtso bo nyi ma yang ngo /_/
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]nub kyi phyogs su thub pa ser skya zhes bya ba drang srong mchog dang /_mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i khyu mchog_/gcer bu'i gzugs su [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o/_/byang nub kyi phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor sbyin dang /_dri 
[\[245a.2\]]za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ste 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o/_/lhag ma ni dbyibs ji ltar kun du gnas pa bzhin du [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin phyag rgya rnams su'ang mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi mngon par bri'o zhes pa phyi rol gyi 
[\[245a.3\]]dkyil 'khor bzhi par ri mo lngas spras pa phyag rgya'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa gru bzhi dang rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhis rnam par brgyan pa/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa 'di lta ste/_'jug pa'i sgor phyag rgyar gyur pa ni ut+pa la 
[\[245a.4\]]sngon po bri'o/_/g.yas dang g.yon du ni pad+ma dang /_rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_dung dang /_mdung rtse gsum dang /_be con dang /_'khor lo dang /_swa sti ka dang /_bum pa dang /_nya dang /_dung dang /_gdub kor dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_
[\[245a.5\]]zhags pa dang /_dril bu dang /_gri dang /_tho ba dang /_gzhu dang /_lcags mda' ste 'di rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug tu grwa bzhir phreng bas khyab par bya'o/_/de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya chen po bzhi gzhag par bya 
[\[245a.6\]]ste/_byang phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa can byas nas rdo rje gnyis ka nas rtse mo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can kun nas 'bar ba can gzhag par bya'o/_/lho'i phyogs su dkyil 
[\[245a.7\]]'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can gzhag par bya'o/_/nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas ut+pa la sngon po rang gi sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/phyogs bral rnams su phyag rgya bzhir 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/nub byang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/lho nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byas nas dbyug pa kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/lho shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can 
[\[245b.2\]]byas nas dgra sta kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/byang shar gyi phyogs su ral gri kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o/_/thams cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang 'og dang thad kar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phye ma nyid kyis bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/_gos 
[\[245b.3\]]dang /_bsil yab dang /_lham kun nas 'bar ba de rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/zhes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas/_/sems can phan don 'dod pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di rnams kyis/_/mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin/_/de nas 
[\[245b.4\]]dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste/_dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_dmangs rigs byang chub tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa/_theg pa gzhan 
[\[245b.5\]]mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sems dpa' chen po dad cing dge ba'i chos can dang /_rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang /_longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang /_longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong 
[\[245b.6\]]dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma sdom pa la gnas pa/_gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang /_phyogs chen po dang /_rigs dang ldan pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis chos spyod 
[\[245b.7\]]pa/_nyin dang mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_skra dri zhim pa dang /_khrus gsum byas pa/_mi smra bar gyur pa/_de'i nyin mo ga bur dang /_gur gum dang /_ma la ya'i tsan+dan dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/_rtag tu nye reg byas pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_bsrung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang /_bden pa dang ldan pa dang /_rgyal bar dgongs pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang yang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o/_/gtsang zhing gtsang sbra 
[\[246a.2\]]byas pa ji srid gcig nas brgyad la sogs pa'i bar rnams te/_gzhan rnams ni ma yin no/_/de rnams kyang phan tshun kun du chags pa/_rgyal rigs spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang /_de rnams kyi bu gzhon nu ma rnams grong pa'i chos ma 
[\[246a.3\]]shes pa ste bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tu sad par byed pa/_gzhon nu'i skye bo dga' bar byed pas so/_/de nas ches thog mar de lta bu'i grong pa'i chos mi shes pa rab tu gzhug par bya/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[246a.4\]]po mngon par 'phel ba dang /_tshe dang nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang longs spyod chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang /_khyad par du'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang ldan pa'i slob 
[\[246a.5\]]dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/_rgyab kyis phyogs pa min par phyi rol du 'byung bar bya ste/_byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/_srog chags med pa/_rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas pa/_phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa'i 
[\[246a.6\]]chus khrus byas nas/_nye reg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas/_me thab tu song nas/_ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byang shar du mngon par phyogs pas ga bur dang gur gum tsan+dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sngar 
[\[246a.7\]]brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang /_gshegs su gsol lo/_/slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/_/zhugs nas bum pa gang ba brgyad gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa shing sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab dang 'bras bus rnam par brgyan pa gser dang dngul dang rin po 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]che dang /_'bru nang du bcug pa/_de lta bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o/_/gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o/_/gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o/_/bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[246b.2\]]cad la'o/_/lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o/_/drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o/_/bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang du gzhag par bya ste/_gcig pa ni sems can thams cad dang 
[\[246b.3\]]thun mong du gyur bar yongs su bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis bdug pa bsreg cing ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags 
[\[246b.4\]]pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_mar me dang /_lha bshos

[\[246b.6\]]lu'i zan zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa/_'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyis mya ngan med pa 'khyil ba dang /_khaN+Da la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o/_/phyi rol gang ba 
[\[246b.7\]]dang /_tsan+dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma/_'o thug btsos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /_'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]la du can dang /_gar+b+hat+k+wA khyad par dang /_sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang /_'byung po'i tshogs dang /_sems can thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sna ma dang /_rgya spos kyi me tog dang /_pun+nA ga la sogs pa 
[\[247a.2\]]rnams sngar nges par bstan pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_'phags pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/_/khyad par du de 
[\[247a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sna ma'i me tog dang /_pad+ma'i rigs la pad+ma dang /_de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ut+pa la dang /_gzhan rnams la tha mal pa'i sngags kyis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ga pur gyi bdug pa'o/_/pad+ma'i rigs la 
[\[247a.4\]]tsan+dan no/_/de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o/_/sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar bya'o/_/'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la/_/mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o/_/'phags pa min pa'i sngags 
[\[247a.5\]]rnams la/_/dri zhim til mar dbul du gzhug_/cho ga'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du ni/_/bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so/_/de bzhin kho nar brjod pa'i dri/_/sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o/_/de bzhin gshegs la gang brjod dang /_/phyag na rdo rjer gang brjod pa/_/rang rang gi ni rgyud 
[\[247a.6\]]rnams su/_/sngags spyod don du sgrub pa pos/_/'dir ni cho ga blta bar bya/_/kun nas rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/zhes pa'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bdug pa la sogs pa dang /_lha bshos rab tu dbul ba rjes 
[\[247a.7\]]su 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/_de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyen pas/_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa thams cad dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_dung gi sgra'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrogs pas/_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_phreng bas 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang /_phyogs bral rnams dang steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang /_sbrang 
[\[247b.2\]]rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa'i 'bras sA lu dang /_thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa'am snying pos stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/sbyin sreg byas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba'i cho ga rnams byas 
[\[247b.3\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_gso sbyong byas pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi lus dngos grub kyi don du phul ba/_sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 
[\[247b.4\]]longs spyod pa thun mong par gyur pa bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa/_dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/_
[\[247b.5\]]mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyang skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos mnyams pa tha ga pas btags ma thag pa/_skra dang bral ba/_rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa/_dri zhim po'i tsan+dan
