[\[247b.6\]]dang /_gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams gdong g.yogs nas thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/_rgyal rigs kyi bu'am/_gzhan yang 
[\[247b.7\]]spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa'ang rab tu gzhug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas pa gdong g.yogs nas dri bzang po'i me tog tsan+dan dang gur gum dag gis rnam par bsres pa byin te/_shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dag gis me tog 'thor du gzhug par bya'o/_/gang du de'i me tog babs pa de la de'i rig pa'i sngags sbyin par bya'o/_/skye ba gzhan rnams su de nyid dang 'di rjes su 'brel pa'o zhes kun du grags pa yin zhing /_de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang byang chub kyi snying 
[\[248a.2\]]po gnon par byed pa dang /_byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o/_/de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang /_longs spyod chen po dang /_rgyal srid chen po dang /_dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag dang /_
[\[248a.3\]]'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o/_/skye ba 'di nyid du/_sgrub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag par spyod pa las/_las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa ji srid du brgyad po rnams de srid de gzhan rnams ni ma yin no/_/zhes 
[\[248a.4\]]so/_/sgrub par 'dod pa gzhan yang ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zad pa'i don du dam tshig tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin na dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring /_ha cang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs 
[\[248a.5\]]kyi cha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing sngags kyis dag par byas nas de nas rgyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba'i dad pa dang /_spro ba chen po dang ldan 
[\[248a.6\]]pa byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba/_theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/_dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed pa/_dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma smad pa/_skye ba 'di nyid la rig pa dang /_sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/_bsam pa bzang zhing /_sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid 
[\[248a.7\]]dang ldan pa/_dge mtshan 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can/_sad pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i don la rnam rtog med cing der gtad pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes so/_/shes rab can dang spyod pa la ma 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]rmongs pa'i khyad par las te/_gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba ma yin no/_/de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsags te/_slob dpon dang mkhan po mnyes par bya'o/_/de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang gdugs dkar po 
[\[248b.2\]]mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang /_rnga yab dkar po g.yob bzhin pa dang /_bkur sti chen pos dung dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang /_rgyal ba'i sgra dang /_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang /_bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad 
[\[248b.3\]]pa rgyal bas gsungs pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang /_bkra shis de byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/_'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 
[\[248b.4\]]sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs 
[\[248b.5\]]par 'dod pa dang /_mdor bsdus nas brjod nas sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar bgyi'o zhes so/_/de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la dang po re zhig rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba byin 
[\[248b.6\]]nas phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rig pa dang /_sngags dag gang gnas pa/_gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya'o/_/bris nas tsan+dan dang gur gum dag gis lag pa dag dang kham phor kha sbyar bkrus nas de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma kham phor kha 
[\[248b.7\]]sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]der ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon par dbang 
[\[249a.2\]]bskur bar bya'o/_/slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes so/_/de nas de la kham phor kha sbyar de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o/_/mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te des bcom ldan 'das rig pa'am sngags bzung ba nyid 
[\[249a.3\]]yin par gyur na bklags pa nyid las kyang las byed do/_/rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrubs pas byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do/_/de nas sngags yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dang po sgrub pa kho nas 
[\[249a.4\]]'grub par byed do/_/zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa las so/_/de kho na sngar bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'bad pa med par ro/_/de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[249a.5\]]gnyis par mngon par dbang bskur ba ni/_dkyil 'khor gnyis par/_dkyil 'khor thams cad la dang /_lha thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar byas na sdig pa thams 
[\[249a.6\]]cad las grol bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_sngags dang /_phyag rgya sgrub pa la yang lhag par 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[249a.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no/_/dkyil 'khor gsum par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba cho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/khyod la sangs rgyas byang chub sems 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang /_dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang /_nye bar ston pa dang /_rgyud dang rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang spyad pa nges par ston pa dang /_rang gi cho ga nges par 
[\[249b.2\]]ston par rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/skye ba 'di nyid dam gang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan rnams su sangs rgyas nyid nges par thob bo/_/de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang sngar nges par bstan pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[249b.3\]]sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin du kho nar mngon par dbang bskur ro/_/de bzhin du yang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams 
[\[249b.4\]]kyis 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /_lus can thams cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgyal ba dang /_khyod sngags rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgrubs shig ces rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis 
[\[249b.5\]]sems can lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul te/_dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs 
[\[249b.6\]]su gsol bar bya'o/_/de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams la bslab par bya zhing /_rnam par sbyar bar bya'o/_/skad cig de nyid la song nas sngar brten par phul ba/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'i chu bum pa gang 
[\[249b.7\]]ba blangs nas/_dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o/_/'di skad brjod par bya ste/_kye byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gang gis 'da' bar byed pa bsod 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gang du'am/_der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas grogs byed pa'i lag par gos 
[\[250a.2\]]dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings pa gzhan gyis sam gos kun du g.yogs te gnas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rigs dman pa rnams kyis me tog gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas grogs byed pa de rnams kyis kyang /_rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 
[\[250a.3\]]khrus bya'o/_/de rnams kyis yang dam tshig tsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa yang grub par 'gyur ro/_/de sngar byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnas su song nas rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyis so/_/der yang me thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do/_/zhi ba dang /_rgyas 
[\[250a.4\]]pa dang /_mngon spyod do/_/zhi ba'i don du pad ma'i rnam pa'o/_/yang na tshim par byed pas dbang du byed pa'ang ngo /_/mngon spyod la zur gsum mo/_/de la me'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad la ku sha dgram par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas shar 
[\[250a.5\]]gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba gzhag par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas me'i bya ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse mor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/_byang gi rtse mor sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du'ang bya ba rnams 
[\[250a.6\]]grogs byed pas gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyis me'i bya ba ku sha rnams kyis so/_/thog mar rtsa ba'i rig pas so/_/thog mar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i don du snying po'i mar gyis so/_/rgyas pa'i don 
[\[250a.7\]]du shing a pA marga gsum gyi sbyin sreg go/_/mngon spyod la ka Ta ke yis so/_/me'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di'ang thams cad du thun mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la yang ngo /_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa rnams su'ang ngo /_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gnas 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]gtsang ma'i gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/_me'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa rnams la/_de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[250b.2\]]sems dpa' rnams dang /_gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i khyad par rnams dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol/_gang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga las 'das par yang rung ste/_gus par byed pa dang /_gzhan yang gang cung zad 
[\[250b.3\]]bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul dang ma bral bar thob par gyur cig_/myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob 
[\[250b.4\]]par gyur cig_/de skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la/_mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/sbyin pa la rab tu chags pa dang /_byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang /_sangs 
[\[250b.5\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang /_mdor na lung dang rig pa dang gsang sngags sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya/_byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 
[\[250b.6\]]'khor gyi slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yon phul nas sam de nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas gats+tsha gats+tsha zhes pa dang /_swA hA zhes pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir 
[\[250b.7\]]rnam par bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bltas pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/zhes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byam gyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas sems dpa' chen po de slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas lha'i bu rnams thams cad la smras par gyur te/_khyed 
[\[251a.2\]]rnams nyon cig_/mchog gi grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga rig pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang /_rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa/_chen po nyid dang /_don chen po byed pa/_phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa/_don thams cad sgrub par byed 
[\[251a.3\]]pa/_mchog tu bkra shis pa thams cad kun nas bkra shis pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa/_las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba/_rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i las chen 
[\[251a.4\]]po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_grogs po dag 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma las chen po thams 
[\[251a.5\]]cad byed pa las phran tshegs thams cad bklags pas grub pa/_mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i rig pa 'di 'ang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang /_sgrub thabs su gyur te/_'phags 
[\[251a.6\]]ma sgrol mas las chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang /_las phran tshegs thams cad la'ang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing /_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga dang sgrub thabs rnams la'ang ngo /_/nyin mtshan gang du 'am der yang rung ste/_gtsang ma'i phyogs su bri bar 
[\[251a.7\]]bya'o/_/bdag nyid nyes pa med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gcig pus dang po re zhig gru bzhi mnyam pa sgo bzhi pa khru bzhi'i tshad dang ldan pa'i dbus pad+ma'i phyag rgya de'i g.yas su ut+pa la sngon po dang /_dbyug pa'i phyag rgya dang /_ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]g.yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang /_gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya dang /_rta mgrin dang dpal chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/shar sgor pad ma/_byang du ut+pa la/_lho ru rdo rje/_nub tu 'jug pa'i rim pa las 'das par/_steng du 'khyil ba'i rnam pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 
[\[251b.2\]]rgya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyi nas me'i bya ba byas nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas mchod pa la sogs pa byas te/_dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/_/de la rgyal srid 'dod pas had+p+ya'i shing du'o/_/longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi lha'o/_/rta 'dod pas rta'i bres su'o/_/
[\[251b.3\]]glang po che 'dod pas glang po che'i bres su'o/_/bu 'dod pas bo de tse'i shing gi drung du'o/_/tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bskyangs pa ru'o/_/klus zin pa la klu shing dang nye ba ru'o/_/mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la lam bzhi mdo ru'o/_/gnod sbyin gyis 
[\[251b.4\]]zin pa la pa Ta'i shing gi drung du'o/_/srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o/_/gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gang du'ang /_de ru yang nyes pa med do/_/grogs po dag mdor bsdu na/_rig pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor dang /_las thams cad pa ste/_las 
[\[251b.5\]]thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/gsang chen 'di dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar bar bya ste dkyil 'khor 'di ni sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'o/_/longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa sgrub pa 
[\[251b.6\]]po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir 'byor pa thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa ste/_mdor na phyi ma'i lus can 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa rab tu grags so/_/de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms 
[\[251b.7\]]par byed cing zhi bar byed/_nad dang dgra 'phrog pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong zhing thos nas de nas cho ga la rab tu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]lung ston par the tshom med do/_/gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams kyang rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ro/_/sa stengs dkyil 'khor smra ba ni/_/zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed/_/bkren pa rnams 
[\[252a.2\]]kyis 'phan pa thob/_/sems can mgon med sdug bsngal can/_/rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya/_/in+d+ra nI la sogs phye mas/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag kun du bri/_/in+d+ra nI la sogs med na/_/sA lu'i phye mas yang dag bri/_/sA lu'i phye ma sogs med na/_/
[\[252a.3\]]so phag phye ma sogs kyis bri/_/so phag phye ma sogs med na/_/bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri/_/de ltar yon tan kun bsdus pa'i/_/sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba/_/'jig rten mgon po'i yang dag bka'/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa yin zhes so/_/
[\[252a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byam gyi le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas sems dpa' chen 
[\[252a.5\]]pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun du gzigs nas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yi rang bar gyur pa/_mchog gi 
[\[252a.6\]]sgrub pa'i cho ga ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs so/_/dang po ra zhig dge ba'i nyi ma la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bal blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas ras bal byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas ras bal de la lhag par gnas par bya ste rtsa ba'i rig pa dpa' bo'i 
[\[252a.7\]]rin gyis nyos pa'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad lhag par gnas par mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]legs par 'tsho zhing bdag gi skye ba 'bras bu yod pa dang /_sngags kyi dngos grub lhag par gnas par mdzod cig_/de'i dus su rnga pa Ta ha dang /_rnga bo che dang /_dung dang /_pi wang dang /_gling bu dang /_'khar rnga dang /_rnga mur dza'i sgra thos par gyur pa'am/_
[\[252b.2\]]rgyal rigs sam/_rgyal rigs mo'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo'am/_mi rnams glo bur du 'di skad ces/_rgyal dang /_grub pa dang /_dngos grub sbyin pa dang /_byin pa dang /_zung shig dang /_dpal dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /_las 
[\[252b.3\]]kyi 'khor lo dang /_mang po zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang dge ba'i spra rab tu 'don pa dang /_dril bu'i sgra byung ba dang /_dga' ba'i sgra yang rung ste/_de rnams rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 
[\[252b.4\]]kyi byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o/_/gzhan du dngos grub 'bras bu med do zhes pas so/_/de'i dus su de rnams ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa'am/_zung shig_/zo shig_/'dzin du chu gcig_/nyams pa rnam par brlag pa/_kyi hud/_ring ba med pa de lta 
[\[252b.5\]]bu la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa dang /_mi dang /_ma he dang /_ce spyang dang /_bong bu dang /_byi la dang /_dud 'gro dman pa rkang gnyis pa/_rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sgra 'don par gyur na/_de la sgrub pa pos mchog gi dngos grub med do zhes shes par bya zhing /_skye 
[\[252b.6\]]ba 'di nyid la kun du brtul bar bya'o/_/slar yang snga ma bzhin du byas nas brtsam par bya ste/_de lta bu lan bdun gyis mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang bdun pa'i las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhes so/_/de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de la srung ba 
[\[252b.7\]]byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug tu bcug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pa'am/_byang du mngon par phyogs par bzhag nas bdag nyid tsA ru'i ston mo bza' zhing gzhon nu ma de la yang tsA ru'i ston mo bzar gzhug par bya'o/_/snga ma kho nar yongs su brtags 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pa'i ku sha'i khres la cho ga de nyid kyis ras bal 'khal du gzhug par bya'o/_/dog pa de 'jam pa dang /_legs par bsgrims pa sngar brlabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te/_gcig dang lnga dang brgyad la sogs pa nas ji srid bcu drug 
[\[253a.2\]]tsam gyi bar du kA ra ShA'i srang grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu mas bya'o/_/de la rab ni bcu drug bya/_/de bzhin 'bring ni brgyad pa ste/_/phran tshegs las rnams bsgrub pa la/_/lnga dang gcig ni tha ma'o/_/sngags rnams kun la sngags rig pas/_/
[\[253a.3\]]ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya/_/de nas brtsams te gang cung zad/_/sdig pa'i las rnams sngon byas pa/_/dog pa la dmigs sems kyis ni/_/de yi skad cig nyid la 'jig_/dog pa 'di ni blangs nas su/_/gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya/_/phyogs su gyur par 
[\[253a.4\]]bzhag byas nas/_/ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdug_/srog chags yan lag min 'byung ba'am/_/gur gum tsan+dan la sogs sam/_/tsam pa ka sogs mA li ka/_/dri zhim me tog rnams kyis bsgos/_/gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhag nas ni/_/srung ba'i cho ga 
[\[253a.5\]]byas nas ni/_/sngags rig las kun shes pa yis/_/shin tu mnyam bzhag bzlas par bya/_/de nas tha ga par song nas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i gla byin te/_/yan lag bral min skems min nyid/_/dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dga'/_/nad kyis gdungs min rgan po 
[\[253a.6\]]min/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde las grol/_/ma ning mtshan gnyis min pa dang /_/de ni dman pa min nyid dang /_/ngan par ltung ba spangs pa ni/_/kun nas mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/rab bsngags blta na sdug pa dang /_/blo yis kun du spyod pa dge/_/'jig rten pa 
[\[253a.7\]]yi 'jug par brten/_/dngos grub 'dod pa de la ni/_/ras mchog 'thag pa byed pa la/_/rab bsngags dge ba'i stobs ldan nam/_/blo ldan bzo ni shin tu mkhas/_/shin tu mkhas par mchog gyur pa'i/_/ras ni 'thag byed mchog gis ni/_/ras kyi rab 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]la bya ba yin/_/'bring la 'bring po sgrub par byed/_/tha mas phran tshegs las rnams ni/_/dman pa nyid ni kun las so/_/bzo bos ji ltar smra ba bzhin/_/de las gru ni ji bzhin sbyin/_/bzo bo yi ni dang po'i ngag_/smras pa de las sngags rig pas/_/myur 
[\[253b.2\]]du rin ni sbyin par gyis/_/dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod/_/don du gnyer ba nyid dang de'i/_/rin gyi dngos po zlog par byed/_/myur du dngos grub byed gang 'di'i/_/ras ni bla na med pa'i mchog_/las rnams shin tu mchod par 'os/_/lha dang mi yi bde nyid 
[\[253b.3\]]dang /_/'byung po kun gyi dpal yin zhes/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la gso sbyong byin nas/_shin tu dag pa'i rgyu skar la'am/_cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la'am/_dkar po'i nyi ma'am/_dkar po'i gza' 
[\[253b.4\]]nges par bltas te dkar po'i zla phyed gzhan la'ang rung ste/_shing sa ha kA ri'i snye ma dang me tog skyes shing shing gi me tog dang yal ga rgyas shing dpyid ka'i dus/_dus kyi mchog der snga dro nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe sngar bstan pa'i rgyu mthun dang bcas pas tha ga pa tsA ru'i bza' 
[\[253b.5\]]ba zos shing gos dkar po gyon pa mgo la gtsug tor bcings nas legs par bkrus pa/_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum dag gang yang rung bas legs par byugs pa/_lus la rjes su byugs pa/_ga pur gyi dris kha bsgos pa/_yid dga' zhing bkres pa 
[\[253b.6\]]dang /_skom pa dang bral bar byas nas/_thags kyi snas la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sa dang /_ba lang gi lci ba dag gis bkrus te gsar pa rnams kyang slar yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o/_/de nas srog chags med pa'i chus bkru bar bya'o/_/tsan+dan 
[\[253b.7\]]dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis mngon par gtor bar bya'o/_/sa'i phyogs gtsang ma ca co dang bral zhing /_ljongs kyi mi dang bral ba rnam par dben pa'i gnas bla gab dang bcas shing gsang bar me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do/_/de nas rjes su 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]sgrub pa pos yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa'i sngags nyid yungs kar dkar po la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams dang /_steng dang 'og dang phyogs bral rnams su gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas tha ga pa la yungs kar 
[\[254a.2\]]gyis yang dag par bsnun nas phyag rgya chen pos gtsug phud lnga pa bcings te/_gtsug tor bcing ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ras rab yin na zheng du khru bzhi/_chur khru brgyad kyi tshad 'di tsam du tha ga pas bran par bya'o/_/'bring por 
[\[254a.3\]]gyur na zheng du khru do chur khru lnga nyid do/_/tha ma ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la chur ni sangs rgyas kyi khru gang nyid do/_/de las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/_'di ni bde bar gshegs 
[\[254a.4\]]pa'i mtho'o zhes bsgrags te tshad 'dis tshad kun du bshad do/_/'di ni phur pa'i dngos grub tu/_/skyes bu mchog gis gsungs pa yin/_/thub pa mi snang gyur 'og tu/_/rgyal srid 'dod la 'bring po ste/_/longs spyod chen po don gnyer ba'i/_/skyes bu lha dang 
[\[254a.5\]]lha min dang /_/gdengs can tha ma grub par bshad/_/'bring la dngos grub 'bring po'o/_/ras 'bring po ni rtag pa ru/_/sems can kun gyi las rnams sgrub/_/phran tshegs las rnams bsgrub bya la/_/ras tha ma ni rtag pa ru/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub 
[\[254a.6\]]par byed/_/rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed/_/ras ris gsum gyis nges bstan pa'i/_/dngos grub dpal don gnyer ba'i mi/_/brgya byin bde sogs bdag po yang /_/cho ga nyams na mi 'grub ste/_/cho ga yang dag 
[\[254a.7\]]ldan gyur na/_/mi yi skye bo phal pa la'ang /_/'bad pa yis ni las rnams kun/_/myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyal dang rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis/_/sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag bshad/_/sems can bkren pa mgon med pa/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gyis gdungs kun gyi dpal/_/byang chub lam du gang 'di ni/_/de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan/_/chos 'di byang chub rgyu yin par/_/sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag bstan pa gang /_/'jig rten dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[254b.2\]]cad dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te/_/'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/_/gang zhig byang chub rgyur 'dod pa/_/de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'gro la mi phan pa/_/gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs/_/byang chub ched du 'jug 
[\[254b.3\]]kun la/_/ras ris thams cad 'grub par gsungs/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi/_/dam tshig 'di ni khyad par du/_/myur du bya ba'i don bsgrub phyir/_/'dir ni mtha' dag thob pa ru/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin/_/de nas rim gyis bzo bo yis/_/
[\[254b.4\]]'bad pas ras ni btag par bya/_/nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad rnams dang /_/bcu drug gnyis ka bzhi dag dang /_/nyin mtshan nyid kyis myur ba ru/_/ras ni 'thag pa rdzogs pa dang /_/bzo bo mchog tu grub pa ni/_/nyin mtshan gyis ni dge ba yin/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa 
[\[254b.5\]]phun sum tshogs/_/bzo bo rtag tu byin brlabs pa/_/thag ring gnas su song nas ni/_/bshang dang gci ba yongs su dor/_/'ongs pa'i gos dang bcas bkral nas/_/gzhan pa'i gos gzhan bgo bya zhing /_/gos dkar 'chang zhing phreng bar ldan/_/yang dang 
[\[254b.6\]]yang du nye reg bya/_/lus la tsan+dan dkar pos byug_/bzo la sogs pa gtsang bar bya/_/rtag tu 'jam zhing legs sbyangs pas/_/slar yang 'bad pas btag par bya/_/de la sogs pa'i rab sbyor ni/_/rgyal ba gzhan gyis gsungs pa'am/_/'bad pas 
[\[254b.7\]]rnam dpyad dang tshul gyis/_/ras ni ma lus btag par bya/_/ras kyi thags ni rdzogs pa dang /_/sngar gyi las kyis legs sprul pa/_/de rnams tshad ldan mnyams pa/_/bya'o bzang po'i nyin zhag la/_/rgyud dang rgyud du mnyam par 'jug_/dkar po'i phyogs 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]kyi mdzes pa la/_/'od ma'i shing ni khru bzhi la/_/ras ni blangs nas de nas 'gro/_/nor ni rgya cher 'god pa yis/_/bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni/_/brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i/_/sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas/_/dri zhim me tog 
[\[255a.2\]]gis mchod de/_/gtsang ba'i phyogs su rnam par dgod/_/'di nyid kyis ni sngags kyis ni/_/srung ba'i cho ga rab tu byed/_/gang zhig ras bal sngon du ni/_/slar yang rnam mang yongs sbyangs pa/_/de nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang /_/ras nyid bsrung bar bya ba'o/_/byang 
[\[255a.3\]]chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che/_/sngags bzlas pa yis gsungs pa yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mang pos dang /_/ngas kyang de ni slar yang ste/_/de nyid gsang sngags thams cad kyis/_/rnam par spyod pa'i sngags kyi gzugs/_/brtson 'grus chen po gzi brjid che/_/
[\[255a.4\]]sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po/_/sna tshogs skyob pa'i rgyu rnams ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/_/'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/sems kyi spyod pa kun du rmongs/_/dad pa med cing phyin ci log_/log pa'i kun spyod la rab brkam/_/sngags 
[\[255a.5\]]rnams sgrub par mi byed pa'i/_/de nyid phyir na slar gsungs pa/_/'khor ba mun pa'i btson rar 'khyams/_/gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing /_/dad ldan ltad mo bkra shis dang /_/sngags rnams kun la rtag tu spyod/_/bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod/_/rtag 
[\[255a.6\]]tu 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_/spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams gang /_/'bad pa med par yang dag 'grub/_/dad pa med pa'i skye bo la/_/dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/_/sa bon tshwa sgor btab pa la/_/myu gu med cing 
[\[255a.7\]]'bras med bzhin/_/dad pa rtag tu chos kyi rtsar/_/don kun gzigs pas gsungs pa yin/_/chos don ngang tshul can de rnams/_/sngags kyis dngos grub rtag tu brjod/_/de nas sgrub pos bzo bo ni/_/ri mo mkhan nam bdag kyang rung /_/ri mo mkhas pas 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]ma 'dres pa'i/_/tshon rtsi kha dog gsal ba dang /_/kha dog can gyi tshon blangs nas/_/ji ltar tha ga pa la ni/_/sngar gyi cho ga de nyid kyis/_/mtshan nyid yang dag ldan pa yis/_/ri mo mkhan la gong bzhin du/_/rgyas pa ru ni bya ba'o/_/ji ltar sngar bzhin tha ga 
[\[255b.2\]]pa'i/_/cho ga de nyid kyis ni de/_/ras la ri mo bri bar bya/_/yang na rang gis ri mo bri/_/ga pur gur gum tsan+dan las/_/so phag tshon la bsgo bar bya/_/bdug pa bsregs shing sngags nyid kyis/_/lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_/nA ga ge sar pun+nA ga/_/ba ku lA 
[\[255b.3\]]dang tsam pa kA/_/bA ri Shi ka d+hA na sku/_/mA li ta yi me tog sogs/_/ras de la ni mngon par gtor/_/shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi/_/khres la nyer 'dug dad pa'i blos/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/sems dpar gyur pas 'di phra mo/_/lag pas 
[\[255b.4\]]blangs nas ma 'khrugs pa'i/_/sems kyis ras la ri mo bri/_/dang po re zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes 
[\[255b.5\]]pa'i sku rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od 'bar ba/_kun nas 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa'i sku/_chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/_rab tu dang ba'i sku/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i sdong po can/_
[\[255b.6\]]'og na klu'i rgyal po sra ba gdan chen po pad+ma'i sdong bu de la 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la lta zhing lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/_dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_lus phyed mi'i rnam pa can gyi dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[255b.7\]]pad+ma'i mtsho de'i khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_cung zad kha bye ba dang rnam par kha bye ba dang /_chu las skyes pa'i bya dang /_nya la sogs pas mngon par khyab pa/_ma lus par bkod pa/_mdzes pa'i rnam par mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu dang /_'dab ma de nyid la rnam par 'phros pa'i pad+ma'i me tog du ma rnams rim gyis mtho ba'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad de/_de rnams la yang pad+ma rnams la bzhugs pa'i byang 
[\[256a.2\]]chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi sku mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ze ba ltar cung zad dkar ba'i gur gum dang /_gser gyi mdog can 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis dbu la rnam par brgyan pa/_phyag 
[\[256a.3\]]na ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/_sku mdzes pa de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba zhi ba'i rnam pa/_bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/_kun nas 'bar bas 'khrigs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas 
[\[256a.4\]]pa'o/_/pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa zla 'od gzhon nu de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/gsum pa la nor [{]bzangs so[,]bzang ngo [}]/_/bzhi pa la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o/_/lnga pa la nam mkha' mdzod do/_/drug pa la sa'i snying po'o/_/bdun pa la 'jam 
[\[256a.5\]]dpal lo/_/brgyad pa la spyan bzang ste/_'di dag thams cad gzhon nu'i cha byad can/_/gzhon nu rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad la/_byams pa ma 
[\[256a.6\]]gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nye logs su 'phags pa byams pa tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/_dbu la ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/_gser mdog ngur smrig dmar po gsol ba/_dar la dmar po'i stod 
[\[256a.7\]]g.yogs byas pa/_tshom bu gsum gyi mtshan ma byas pa/_gzugs mdzes pa dbyig pa dang /_ril ba spyi blugs g.yon gyi phyag tu bkod pa/_kr-iSh+Na sA ra'i pags pa phrag pa g.yon du bgos pa/_phyag g.yas pa bgrang phreng bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/_der gtod pa'i lta ba/_bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can no/_/pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun du bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs kyi mdog sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phyag g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi 
[\[256b.2\]]nor bu rin po che bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams nas mchog sbyin pa/_mdzes pa'i gzugs can de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/gsum pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/_gser gyi rgyan gyis rnam 
[\[256b.3\]]par brgyan pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/_thams cad mkhyen pa dbu la byas pa/_'phags pa 'od dpag med stobs bcu pa/_ral pa'i nang du nye bar bzhugs pa/_gzugs mdzes pa/_phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/_
[\[256b.4\]]phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa/_bsam gtan la dmigs par gyur pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can sku kun nas gsal bar gyur pa'o/_/bzhi pa la 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pas rdo rje bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas nye bar 'gog pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa bsnams 
[\[256b.5\]]nas mchog sbyin pa/_gser mdog rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_mdzes pa'i gzugs can zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/_do shal phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa/_mu tig gi do shal gyi mchod phyir thogs byas pa/_cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/_
[\[256b.6\]]dar srab mo'i sham thabs dang /_dar la dkar po'i bla gos byas pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang kun du bzang po'i sham thabs dang /_bla gos kyang de bzhin no/_/lus kyi rnam pa ni sngar bstan pa ji bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma lnga pa la 
[\[256b.7\]]'phags pa blo gros chen po/_drug pa la zhi ba'i blo gros/_bdun pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'o/_/brgyad pa la ngan song spong ba zhes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams phyag na 'bras bu dang glegs bam bsnams pa/_rnam pa kun du mdzes pa/_dar la'i stod 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]g.yogs can/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i sku ngur smrig dmar po gsol ba/_skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa rin po che'i rdo leb la bzhugs pa zhi ba'i cha byad can/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_
[\[257a.2\]]dri zhim po'i me tog gis gcal du bkram pa la 'di lta ste/_mA la tI dang /_bAr+Shi kA dang /_d+ha nu ska ri kA dang /_pun+nAg dang /_nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras la kun nas gcal du bkram bzhin pas mngon par bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub 
[\[257a.3\]]pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gang yin pa'i steng du rin po che du mas spras pa'i shin tu ring po'i rnam pa'i gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/brag ri'i rgyal po nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i rdo leb kyis bkab pa ri bo'i rnam pa lta bur mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[257a.4\]]der gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/_rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/_kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/_pad+ma rA ga dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_ma ra ka ta la sogs pa dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_rdo'i 
[\[257a.5\]]snying po la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i khyad par rnams kyis kun nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa/_cung zad nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos gos ser po'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/_skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/_chos ston par mdzad 
[\[257a.6\]]bzhin pa/_sham thabs ser po mnabs pa sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis go cha bgos pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku rab tu zhi ba'i gzigs stangs can/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug 
[\[257a.7\]]tor can mngon par bri'o/_/gnyis pa la de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po gser gyi mdog tu mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/nA ga ge sar ches bzang ba dang /_ba ku la la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba mngon par 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal la mngon par gzigs bzhin pa kun nas 'od can rin po che'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba'i mthar thug pa'o/_/gsum pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po mngon par bri bar bya ste pad+ma'i ge sar gyi mdog tu 
[\[257b.2\]]snang ba/_chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa'o/_/bzhi pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/lnga pa la bzod par dka' ba'o/_/drug pa la rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'o/_/bdun pa la sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'o/_/brgyad 
[\[257b.3\]]pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i dbang po'i rgyal ba mngon par bri bar bya ste/_thams cad gser gyi kha dog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rnam pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par mdzad pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi steng 
[\[257b.4\]]du yang bris sku'i zur gnyis ka nas sprin gyi go bar na gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs par byed bzhin pa bri'o/_/bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos 
[\[257b.5\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/_mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang du 'phags pa nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbu'i gnas spangs pa'i steng du mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_gnas brtan 
[\[257b.6\]]shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_rab 'byor dang /_sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_dga' bo dang /_bzang ldan dang /_ka pi na zhes pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis rnams 'di lta ste/_dri ngad can dang /_tsan+dan dang /_nye 
[\[257b.7\]]ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_dkar po dang /_si ka dang /_dbang po dang /_mu khyud dang /_mu khyud bzang po zhes pa'o/_/thams cad mchog tu shin tu mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha lugs/_zhi ba'i bdag nyid/_rab tu dul ba'i rnam pa'o/_/nyan thos chen po rnams thal mo sbyar bar byas 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nges par rtog par byed pa'o/_/steng ngos su'ang gnas gtsang ma'i lha dang /_nye bar gnas pa'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis dar gyi bla re kun nas chur ring zhing shin tu mdzes pa bzung nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[258a.2\]]sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyi steng du 'dzin par byed bzhin pa lha'i phreng ba dang gos 'chang ba'i lha'i bu mngon par bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng ngos su dbu la mu tig gi do shal dang /_rin po che'i skud pa la pad+ma rA 
[\[258a.3\]]ga dang /_in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyus pa'i rin po che'i skud pa'i tshogs de la dar gyi bla re legs par bkod cing khor yug tu'ang mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang ba mdzes par gyur pa mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i gdan gyi 'og tu 
[\[258a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang nye bar klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo'i gzhogs su rin po che'i ri bo/_pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa/_rin po che'i n+yu gu dang /_phug dang /_ri sul dang /_byi ru'i 'khri shing yongs su dkris pa'i rin po che'i shing dang /_drang srong chen 
[\[258a.5\]]po nye bar gnas shing bsten pa'i ri bo/_/de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa drag po chen po'i gzugs can phyag g.yon pas zhags pa bzung nas/_g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa/_bzhin khro gnyer can/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po la blta zhing bka' nod par byed 
[\[258a.6\]]bzhin pa/_gsus pa rlo ba/_skra gyen du brdzes pa/_mig sman nag po sprin dang mtshungs pa/_ag tshom ser skya dang /_skra ring zhing sen mo ring ba/_mig dmar ba/_mgrin pa'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_bgegs thams 
[\[258a.7\]]cad rnam par 'joms pa/_ches mi bzad pa chen po/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen po/_kun nas 'bar ba/_khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa rnams 'di nyid kho nas bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ral pa can de dang de'o/_/ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng du nye bar 'dug pa/_pus mo sa la 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]'dud pa'i lus can lag pa spos phor thogs pa/_cha byad dang /_dbyibs dang /_'jug pa dang spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta bar gyur pa yang dag par bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og g.yas kyi gzhogs su klu'i dbang 
[\[258b.2\]]po'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye logs su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa'i rin po che'i ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po gzhan gsungs pa de bzhin du mngon par bri ste/_khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa phan pa lha'i me tog gcal du bkram pa mngon par bri ste/_ri de ni 
[\[258b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o/_/ri de ni shin tu mtho ba/_pad+ma rA ga'i rdo leb dang /_de nyid kyi myu gu dang /_bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi rtse mo'i rnam par bri bar bya'o/_/de la brten pa'i lha mo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje/_'phags ma sgrol ma 
[\[258b.4\]]lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang /_dar la khra bo'i sham thabs can bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_phyag g.yon na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/_gser mdog can ma/_ha cang mi sbom/_ha cang mi rgan pa/_
[\[258b.5\]]sems bsam gtan la gnas pa/_bka' nod cing 'dug pa/_phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin par 'dod pa/_lus cung zad btud pa/_skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta bar gyur pa/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng 
[\[258b.6\]]bas yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de nyid du'ang rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rtse mo de nyid du'ang /_pun+nA ga'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/_yal ga thams cad la kun nas me tog gis spras shing /_kha bye bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la mngon par bkab pa/_yal ga dud 
[\[258b.7\]]pa de nyid kyis kyang shin tu bkra ba'i byi ru'i myu gu 'brel ba rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs can gyi tshon rtsi 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma'i bzhin kun du snang bar mngon par bri'o/_/lha mo bgegs kun 'joms pa mo/_/'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog_/sgrub pa po ni 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]srung don du/_/mchog sbyin dge ba bri bar bya/_/bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni/_/thugs rje stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/_/'byung po kun gyi dpal yin te/_/mchog sbyin byed ma bri bar bya/_/lha mo las chen byed pa mo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[259a.2\]]dpa' 'od chen po/_/bgegs kun rnam par 'joms don du/_/sgrub pa po ni kun du 'dod/_/mi dbang rnams ni srung don du/_/dpal gyi don du rab tu grags/_/khro rgyal dbang po gang yin te/_/ri yi rtse mor gnas 'dod pa/_/bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i 
[\[259a.3\]]phyir/_/rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis gsungs so/_/drag po chen po brtson 'grus che/_/gtum chen 'od zer chen po ste/_/bstan pa la sdang sems can rnams/_/tshar bcad ched nyid rab tu brtag_/sgrub pa po ni srung don dang /_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms 
[\[259a.4\]]pa dang /_/mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can/_/sngags kyi lha rnams 'gugs par byed/_/shin tu drag po drag gzugs can/_/brtse ba med cing nges par 'gog_/sdig pa drag po spyod pa rnams/_/dbang du ma gyur dbang du byed/_/mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang /_/kun 
[\[259a.5\]]nas sa 'og spyod pa dang /_/thub pa'i bstan pa 'gal byed pa'i/_/gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed/_/ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang /_/grwa bzhi dag tu bri bar bya/_/ras kyi 'og gi mtha' rnams su'ang /_/chu bo rgya cher bya ba yin/_/klu ni gdengs kas mtshan pa 
[\[259a.6\]]can/_/gcig nyid kun du bya ba yin/_/yan lag dkar zhing bzang ba dang /_/lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes/_/rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa/_/mgo bo'i steng du bzhag byas nas/_/gdengs ka bdun pa brtson 'grus che/_/dbang chen ldan pa'i klu de ni/_/ming ni mtha' 
[\[259a.7\]]yas zhes bya yin/_/de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta/_/nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes shing /_/shin tu mdzes shing gzugs mdzes pa/_/rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/'bar ba'i phreng ldan kun du bri/_/klu dbang chen por rnam par grags/_/thub pa'i bstan 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]la rab zhugs pa'i/_/'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/_/bgegs kun rnam par gzhom don du/_/chu bo la brten bri bar bya/_/de la ras kyi cho ga 'di/_/mdor bsdus rgyal bas gsungs pa yin/_/rgyas par de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/kun nas bshad 
[\[259b.2\]]pa sngar gsungs so/_/mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa/_/de yi bsod nams mtha' yas so/_/sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa/_/bskal pa bye ba byas pa gang /_/sa stengs bris sku mthong ba yis/_/de yi skad cig nyid la 'joms/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/tshul 
[\[259b.3\]]khrims 'chal dang smad pa dang /_/sdig pa kun la rab 'jug dang /_/'khor bar yongs su rgyu ba yi/_/'gro ba skye gnas dman pa rnams/_/de rnams ras ris 'dzin mi gzhug_/de rnams ras ris mthong bas ni/_/'bras bu yod par thub dbang gsungs/_/de phyir mthong ba 
[\[259b.4\]]tsam gyis ni/_/skad cig de la sdig pa 'jig_/dag pas 'jug pa nyid dang ni/_/rjes su zlos pa dag 'jug pa/_/sngags mnyan pa la brtson pa yi/_/mi rnams grub thob smos ci dgos/_/bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas kun/_/mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/sa 
[\[259b.5\]]stengs ras ris 'dri ba yi/_/sngags pa bsod nams de thob 'gyur/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma yi/_/tshad du grags pa gang yin pa/_/de yi tshad gyur sangs rgyas dang /_/rgyal sras rang rgyal bse ru dang /_/nyan thos rnams la 'jig rten du/_/slar yang lan mang mchod ston 
[\[259b.6\]]gsol/_/'bras bu thob pa gang yin de'i/_/sngags pa ras ris bris pa dang /_/mthong dang cho ga klog pa dang /_/rjes su yi rang ba nyid dang /_/cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa/_/de yi sngags kyi dngos grub des/_/ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags/_/gang zhig 
[\[259b.7\]]rgyal ba skyes mchog dang /_/de slob bse ru lha rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches/_/gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad ni/_/ras ris 'di yi spyan sngar 'grub/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam gyi bris sku dang po rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[260a.2\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga bar ma yod de/_de ngas bshad par bya yis/_de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig_/bshad par bya'o/_/dang po re zhig sngar bstan pa'i 
[\[260a.3\]]dog pa dang /_sngar brjod pa nyid kyi cho ga dang /_sngar yongs su brtags pa'i bzo bo dang /_sngar gyi tshad bar ma nyid kyis ras shin tu dag pa/_'jam pa/_shin tu sbyangs pa/_kha tshar dang bcas pa/_tshon ma 'dres pa/_skra dang 'dres pa dang bral ba la sogs pa rnams 
[\[260a.4\]]kyis tshad dang gzugs ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin nyid kyis ras ris phyi ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/dang po re zhig gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kun nas mdzes pa'i rnam pa rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu mu tig dkar po'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/_de'i dbus 
[\[260a.5\]]su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_rin po che seng ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa/_chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma'i ge sar 
[\[260a.6\]]du snang ba'am/_gur gum mam/_nyi ma'i kha dog can/_phrag pa g.yon pa'i phyogs su pad+ma bsnams pa/_thal mo sbyar ba byas te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/_bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po/_bde legs 
[\[260a.7\]]dbus ma'i cod pan can/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang /_mgo 'dud pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su phyag na rdo rje pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin pa'o/_/de'i gzhogs su 'phags pa byams pa dang /_kun du bzang po dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_blo gros chen po dang /_zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 
[\[260b.2\]]ste 'di rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya ste/_dang po ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de rnams kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_bzhugs pa phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_chos gos 
[\[260b.3\]]ser po'i bla gos mnabs pa'i sku can/_phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi rna ba 'dzin pa/_cung zad dmar bar snang ba'i ngur smrig gi sham thabs can kun nas snang ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po 
[\[260b.4\]]dang /_rin chen gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_spyan bzang zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags 
[\[260b.5\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/nyan thos chen po brgyad dang /_rang sangs rgyas brgyad sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_'on kyang 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_shA 
[\[260b.6\]]ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab g.yob par byed bzhin du 'khor ba'i lus su mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_rab 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_
[\[260b.7\]]'phrul dga' dang /_dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'od gsal dang /_tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang /_'og min te de lta bu la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar spras pa dgod de/_rang gi gzugs dang cha byad 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags pa'i kun 
[\[261a.2\]]nas rin po che'i ri bo ji srid du ras kyi mtha' mar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_ras kyi mtha'i grwa'i phyogs gcig tu sgrub pa po cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo dang /_mgo bo btud pa/_lag pa spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/rin po che'i ri bo de la 
[\[261a.3\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung dang nye ba 
[\[261a.4\]]der rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa'i lha mo sgrol ma mngon par bri ste sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ras de'i khor yug tu'ang me tog sil ma mngon par gtor te tsam pa ka dang /_ut+pa la sngon po dang /_pad+ma dang /_sau gan+d+hi ka dang /_mA la tI dang /_
[\[261a.5\]]bar+Shi ka dang /_d+hA nuskAr+Shi kA dang /_pun+nA ga dang /_nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis kho ra khor yug tu gcal du bkram par bya'o/_/ras kyi steng /_ras kyi mtha'i grwa gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor bar byed bzhin pa/_gzugs rnam par bkra ba/_bar 
[\[261a.6\]]snang la gnas pa'i char sprin gyi nang na lding ba kha dog dkar por mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/'di ni ras ris 'bring por brjod/_/rtag tu dge legs don 'byung ba/_/sa stengs skye bo mi rnams la/_/dngos grub 'bring po sbyin par byed/_/'khor bar kun du 'khor ba na/_/sdig pa cung zad 
[\[261a.7\]]sngon byas gang /_/'dir ni bris sku mthong ba yis/_/de yis skad cig nyid la 'jig_/sems can rmongs ba mi shes ba/_/de rnams 'gro ba lnga por 'khyams/_/gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/bris sku bar ma mthong ba yang /_/sdig pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/tshul 'chal gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs sngags gsungs pa'ang /_/shin tu myur bar dngos grub ni/_/bzlas pa byas pas thob par 'gyur/_/nad can rnams ni nad las grol/_/bkren pas nor ni rnyed par 
[\[261b.2\]]'gyur/_/bud med rnams ni bu thob 'gyur/_/bris sku bar pa blta ba na/_/mthong ba tsam gyis de yi tshe/_/bsod nams rgyas pa chen po thob/_/nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi/_/bde ba'i skal ba can 'gyur mi/_/de yi skye ba gzhan la yang /_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 
[\[261b.3\]]'gyur/_/bri ba dang ni klog pa dang /_/lha mchod pa dang 'drir 'jug dang /_/de bzhin mthong dang reg nyid kyang /_/sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/'di ltar 'od chen bris sku la/_/don du gnyer dang gsol 'debs pa/_/rjes su yi rang ba las kyang /_/skye ba 'bras 
[\[261b.4\]]bcas myur du thob/_/bskal mchog phye ma rnams kyis kyang /_/skye bos bsod nams gang thob pa/_/tshig tu brjod par mi nus so/_/bris sku mthong ba 'bras bur bcas/_/zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 
[\[261b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam las/_le'u gsum pa yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal pa sems dpa' chen po 
[\[261b.6\]]khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga chung ngu zhes bya ba gzhan gsum pa yang yod de/_/gang 'bad pa med par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/_sngar bstan pa nyid kyi cho ga nyid dang /_bzo bos bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam thad kar dang /_de bzhin kho nar kun nas gru bzhi 
[\[261b.7\]]pa la sngar bzhin du ras ris sngar bstan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i gdan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa byis pa khye'u sngar bzhin du chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun nas 'od zer 'phro bar 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]byed bzhin pa/_mdzes pa'i gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun du bzang po rin po che'i rdo leb la gnas pa phyag na rnga yab thogs pa g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa kha dog bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs 
[\[262a.2\]]so/_/g.yas kyi g.yogs su'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che'i rdo leb la gnas pa phyag na rnga yab thogs shing /_phyag g.yon pad+ma bsnams pa/_kun nas 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du 
[\[262a.3\]]mngon par bri bar bya'o/_/seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu gser gyi ri bo/_/ji srid ras kyi mtha'i bar du 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i 'og tu g.yas kyi gzhogs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir 
[\[262a.4\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de thams cad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_rin 
[\[262a.5\]]po che'i ri'i phug_/sor bcu drug pa'i tshad na bzhugs pa/_khang pa brtsegs pa 'dri ba'i ri bo'i bya skyibs mtho ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ras ris de'i khor yug tu ri bo'i khor yug tu ri bo'i rnam pas yongs su bskor ba mngon par bri'o/_/ras ris de'i steng gi zur du gnas pa'i ri 
[\[262a.6\]]bo'i bya skyibs dang kun tu 'brel bar lding bzhin pa lta bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis su 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ras de la me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa mngon par 'drir gzhug 
[\[262a.7\]]par bya'o/_/ras ris rnam gsum mtshan nyid ni/_/thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las/_/'di ni chung ngu zhes bya ste/_/ras ris phran tshegs las la shis/_/sdig las shin tu mi bzad pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu/_/ras ris mthong bas grol 'gyur te/_/ras 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/skad cig nyid las grol bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu/_/blo ldan sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur byas/_/ras ris tha ma mthong ba yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la/_/mchod byas bsod 
[\[262b.2\]]nams gang yin de/_/ras ris chung ngu mthong ba la/_/mkhas pas de yi bsod nams thob/_/mdzes pa yi ni las rnams dang /_/longs spyod rgyur yang 'di spyod do/_/rig dang gsang sngags ji snyed pa/_/tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang /_/nam mkha' 
[\[262b.3\]]lding gis gang bshad dang /_/chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang /_/nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang /_/lha min dbang po thams cad dang /_/lto 'phye che dang zla ba dang /_/rlung dang gshin rje la sogs dang /_/seng ge 'phrog byed sogs bshad pa'i/_/sngags rnams thams 
[\[262b.4\]]cad 'dir drangs te/_/ras ris spyan sngar 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhi ba can dang de bzhin du/_/rgyas pa can rnams bya ba ste/_/de bzhin 'dir ni mi bzad pa/_/rgyal mchog gis smad spang bar bya/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin 
[\[262b.5\]]tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga bzhi pa ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub 
[\[262b.6\]]pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa ni 
[\[262b.7\]]legs so legs so/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad dpyad pa'i don dang /_phan pa'i phyir dang /_bde ba'i phyir dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse bas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]byed pa'i chos lhag ma dang bcas pa nges par byang chub la rgyun du mchog tu gzhol ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rig pa dang /_sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa bdag gi rig pa gsang chen 'di nyid skye bo thams cad rgyas 
[\[263a.2\]]par byed par 'gyur ba ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'jig rten gyi bla mar mya ngan las 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rigs nub pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyis spangs shing thams cad bor te mun 
[\[263a.3\]]par gyur pa dang /_snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par zhig ste 'phags pa'i lam dang /_rig pa dang /_sngags dang /_sman dang /_nor bu rin po che thams cad dang bral ba/_skye bo legs pas yongs su bzung ba'i snang ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[263a.4\]]le lo can dang /_dran pa nyams pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_mi srun pa dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa sgyu dang g.yo dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa de rnams/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kun du skrag par 'gyur te/_le lo 
[\[263a.5\]]dang /_snyom las la mngon par dga' zhing dad pa med par 'gyur te/_'dod pa tshol zhing gsang sngags tshol bar mi 'gyur te/_log par lta ba la dga' ba rnams kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po la 'jug par 'gyur te/_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa 'byung 
[\[263a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol zhing drag po'i yang drag por 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa de rnams kyi don gyi phyir dang /_dbang du ma gyur pa rnams dbang du gyur par bya ba dang /_dbang du gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa dang /_thabs 
[\[263a.7\]]la mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rig pa dang /_ras ris kyi cho ga da lta gsungs pa'i dus la bab par dgongs na bcom ldan 'das gsung du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga rab 'byam mchog tu 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gsang ba 'dod pa'i don byed pa don chen po rnam par 'byor par gyur pa rig pa bdun cu po thams cad kyi mchog gi snying po/_rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus der 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de yang sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyi thabs la mkhas pas 'khor bar kun du 
[\[263b.2\]]'jug pa rnams skyob pa/_nges par byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar byed pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis gsungs par gyur pa/_'di la rig pa ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA ren+d+ra tA re 
[\[263b.3\]]tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bzhin bzang ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[263b.4\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dbus legs ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tut+ta re tu re swA hA/_
[\[263b.5\]]'phags ma sgrol ma legs spyod ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma mtshan legs ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki 
[\[263b.6\]]te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ta re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma lho chung ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tut+tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol 
[\[263b.7\]]ma legs gnas ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tA yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tut+tA re/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma nye bar 'dud pa zhes bya ba'o/_/zhes pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]chen po mchog gi snying po chen po dang mtshungs pa bya ba thams cad mchog tu grub pa/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas bzhin du skyes pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ba/_'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa/_las thams 
[\[264a.2\]]cad byed pa/_byang chub kyi lam ston pa po/_/pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig pa/_rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba/_shin tu mdzes pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa/_rab tu sbyin pa dang /_bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[264a.3\]]ro/_/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul bsrung ba'i ched du/_mnyam par 'jug cing 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams sbyor ba chung ngu nyid kyis rgyal srid chen po dang /_longs spyod chen po'i dbang phyug gi don de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams shin tu myur bar de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[264a.4\]]su dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi cho ga mdor bsdus par gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang /_snyigs ma lnga'i sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dbang chung bar grags pa/_tshe thung ba/_brtson 'grus zhan pas ras ris kyi cho 
[\[264a.5\]]ga shin tu rgyas pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rab tu brtson par mi nus te/_de rnams kyi don du ches mdor bsdus te gsungs pa ni/_dang po re zhig dpa' bo'i rin gyis dog pa nyos/_srang tshad tsam mam srang phyed tsam/_dkyus su khru gang tsam la zheng du khru phyed 
[\[264a.6\]]tsam pa'i ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pas btag par bya'o/_/yang na slar yang skra dang bral ba'i ras kyi dum bu gsar pa steng 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis sam bzhi'am/_drug gam/_lnga'am/_bcu'am/_brgyad pa'i ras shin tu dkar ba blangs te/_ji ltar 'dod 
[\[264a.7\]]pa bzhin du ri mo mkhan 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dang ga pur dang gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi de rnams dang /_ras tsan+dan dang /_gur gum dang /_ga pur rnams gcig tu byas pas srog chags med pa'i chu rnyog ma med pa dang bsres te/_snod gsar par 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ras sbang du bcug nas nyi ma gsum du legs par mnan la bzhag go/_/gtsang ba'i phyogs su srung ba byas te bdag nyid kyang gtsang mar byas nas/_dkar po'i phyogs kyi nya la ras kyi snod kyi mdun du kha shar du phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_sngags kyi tshig 'di 
[\[264b.2\]]lan stong phrag brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM he he b+ha ga bA na/_ba hu rU pa d+ha ra di bya tsak+Shu Sha/_a ba lo ka ya/_a ba lo ka ya mAM/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ra Na/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_kiny+tsa ra ya si hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la de 
[\[264b.3\]]nyid du nyal bar bya'o/_/rmi lam du grub pa'am/_mi 'grub par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas langs nas grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam mthong na/_ring po mi thogs par/_ras ris bri bar bya'o/_/gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam ma mthong na ras de snod de nas phyung ste nyi ma 
[\[264b.4\]]la bskam par bya'o/_/bskams nas slar yang snod gsar pa gzhan zhig tu legs par sbas la srung ba byas te gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas slar yang mchog gi snying po de rnams las sngags gang yang rung ba gcig bzung nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge drug po rnams las 
[\[264b.5\]]slar yang yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas ches myur bar ras ris 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dang po re zhig ras de blangs nas/_cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/_gzhan yang dkar po'i nyi ma dang /_rgyu skar dge ba dang /_yang dag par ldan pa/_dge ba'i tshes dkar 
[\[264b.6\]]po'i gza'i res kyi nyi ma la shin tu mdzes pa'i dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan mo nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pas ras ris de 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/gtsang ma'i phyogs su ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te 
[\[264b.7\]]dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa byas te/_dbu zur phud can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/_gser gyi mdog can/_dar la sngon po g.yo bzhin pa'i sham thams cad dar la sngon po'i bla 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]gos mnabs pa/_seng ge'i khril skyil thung phyed pas bzhugs te chos 'chad bzhin pa/_zhabs g.yas pa rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/_seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_blta na sdug pa bzhin cung 
[\[265a.2\]]zad 'dzum pa/_sgrub pa po la gzigs par gyur pa bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun du bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/_rnga yab dkar po g.yob bzhin pa/_phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa/_lus thams cad mdzes pa/_
[\[265a.3\]]rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dar la sngon po g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa/_mu tig gi do shal gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/_phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas rnga yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can bsnams nas 
[\[265a.4\]]g.yob par byed bzhin pa zhi ba'i rnam pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa kun du bzang po pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste de dag gnyis ka'ang de ltar mngon par bri'o/_/pad+ma'i sdong bu gcig las 'thon pa'i 
[\[265a.5\]]pad+ma gsum gyi dbu ma rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i ze 'bru la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge'i khri dang rin po che'i zhabs rten no/_/pad+ma gzhan la ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po'o/_/pad+ma gsum pa la ni 'phags pa mthu chen thob bo/_/pad+ma'i sdong bu de ni mdzes pa/_rin 
[\[265a.6\]]po che mar gad kyi rnam pa la pad+ma'i me tog du ma kha bye ba dang /_phyed tsam kha bye ba dang /_me tog kha ma bye ba dang ldan pa/_mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis mtsho chen po las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/_klu'i rgyal 
[\[265a.7\]]po de gnyis kha dog dkar ba/_gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes pa/_lus phyed mi'i lus la sbrul gyi gdengs kas mtshan pa/_phyed sbrul gyi lus can 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa/_phyed chu'i 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]nang du nub pa/_nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/_/mtsho chen po de'i khor yug gi 'og tu ras ris kyi mtha'i grwa g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrub pa po/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog 
[\[265b.2\]]bzhin pa lag na spos phor thogs pa lus dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/_cha byad dang kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bri'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du/_ras kyi mtha' gnyis su lha'i bu phreng ba 'dzin pa gnyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung 
[\[265b.3\]]nas nam mkha' la lding ba/_me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor bar byed bzhin pa/_shin tu mdzes pa dag mngon par bri'o/_/ras ris de'i khor yug tu nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rab tu bkram pa bri bar bya ste/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum 
[\[265b.4\]]lhag par gnas pa'am/_mngon par bri'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang /_'phags pa kun du bzang po dang /_'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/sgrub pa po ji ltar 
[\[265b.5\]]'dod pa'i gzugs gsum po rnams gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya ste ji ltar 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang /_dbyibs ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du'am/_sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o/_/dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[265b.6\]]mtha' gnyis su'ang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_kun du bzang po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/_khru gang tsam la bdag nyid dam/_gzhan gyis sam/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong med 
[\[265b.7\]]pa'am/_dad pa can nam/_gtsang ma'am/_mi gtsang ba'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'ang rung ste/_ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/sgrub pa po bdag nyid ni/_gdon mi za bar sngon spyad pa byas pa/_dad pas byang 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]chub tu sems bskyed pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur bas te/_de ltar na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sdig pa byed pas nam yang ma yin no/_/de ltar dad par gyur pa yis/_/sngags kyi lha rnams bsgrub bya zhing /_/dad pa de yis gsang sngags rgyal/_/
[\[266a.2\]]'grub 'gyur 'dir ni gzhan du min/_/gang phyir dad pa theg pa'i mchog_/gang gis 'dren pa 'gro bar byed/_/dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la/_/dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/_/sa bon me yis tshig pa las/_/myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no/_/dad dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la/_/
[\[266a.3\]]sangs rgyas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/lta rnams kun dang khyad par du/_/gsang sngags rnams ni thams cad ni/_/dad pa med na mi 'grub bo/_/'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang /_/gang yang 'jig rten 'das de bzhin/_/dad dang ldan par brjod pa dang /_/rnyog pa bral 
[\[266a.4\]]bas 'grub par 'gyur/_/yid ni byang chub der son pas/_/de rnams byang chub nges par 'grub/_/gzhan gyis 'grub par ma gsungs te/_/bstan pa 'di las zlog pa yin/_/ras ris chung dang chen po dang /_/bar ma yongs su bsgrags pa yin/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub 
[\[266a.5\]]byed pa/_/de ni rab tu bshad par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi cho ga las ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam lnga pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[266a.6\]]thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_sems can chen po khyod kyis sems can de rnams kyi don gyi phyir bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam bshad pa 'di thabs nyung ngu nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[266a.7\]]te de rnams kyi don gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa thabs yon tan rgyas pa rab tu dbye bas rnam par phye ba las rnam par dbye ba de yang dag par mthun par bshad par bya'i/_de legs par nyon la/_legs par yid la gyis shig sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bshad par bya'o/_/de 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]nas yang byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'byor ba bstan par mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa'i mthu gsal bar mdzad pa legs par gsungs pa ni legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang da 
[\[266b.2\]]lta de'i dus la bab par dgongs nas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo 
[\[266b.3\]]nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod dang /_shel gyi kha dog la sogs pa byung bar gyur to/_/'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[266b.4\]]gnas thams cad spa bkod par mdzad nas/_rgyu skar gyi 'od dang /_ri'i lha'i tshogs kyi 'od dang /_gang du zla ba dang nyi ma 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag gi 'od kyang spa bkod par mdzad nas de rnams mi gsal zhing 'od med par gyur te rnam par snang bar mi 
[\[266b.5\]]'gyur zhing spa bkong bar mdzad de nor bu dang sngags dang sman dang rin po che'i 'od thams cad med par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[266b.6\]]'khor de nyid na 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/_rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 
[\[266b.7\]]'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no/_/de 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyi/_rgyu yod/_rkyen yod do/_/gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las sgrub 
[\[267a.2\]]par byed pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/_chos kyi sprin la brten cing yang dag par rjes su 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_klog par 'gyur ba dang /_dad par 'gyur ba dang /_glegs bam du bri bar byas nas mchod par 
[\[267a.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_tsan+dan dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'am/_sil snyan gyi rnam pa'i khyad par ram/_rol mo sna tshogs dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_tha na rjes su yi rang ba 
[\[267a.4\]]dang ldan pa'i sems rgyun du thob pa'am/_spu zing zhes byed pa skye bar byed par 'gyur ba'am/_rig pa'i mthu dang nus pa thos nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'am/_spyod pa so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba de rnams ngas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[267a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'dzum pa mdzad kyis rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no/_/dang po re zhig dam tshig mthong ba/_sngon spyad pa rnams byas pa/_mngon par dbang 
[\[267a.6\]]bskur thob pas/_rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa'am/_snying po'am/_nye ba'i snying po'am/_gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas yi ge gcig pa'am/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin yang rung ste/_dgon pa chen por song nas lo bdun du bzlas pa bya ste/_
[\[267a.7\]]'bras bu dang /_chu'i bza' ba dang /_rtsa ba dang /_'dab ma bza' zhing /_sngon spyod pa rnams byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub du phyogs par bzhag nas/_bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te/_ku sha'i khres la nye bar 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'dug nas pad+ma dkar po dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis mngon par btags te/_'bum phrag gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos rnams 
[\[267b.2\]]kyi ras ris kyi 'og nas dbul bar bya'o/_/ga bur gyi bdug pa yang ji ltar 'byor pa bsreg go/_/lha'i bu rnams la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i nya'am/_nya so so la mtshan mo phyed kyi dus kyi tshe ras ris kyi spyan 
[\[267b.3\]]sngar me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu byas nas tsan+dan dkar po'i shing gi me sbar te/_gur gum dang ga pur gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs ji ltar 'byor pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/_de nas bsrung ba bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/_ras 
[\[267b.4\]]ris kyi khor yug tu gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'byung ngo /_/de nas sgrub pa po tsan+dan dang /_gur gum gyis btags pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo/_/de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[267b.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal nas sngar sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras mtha'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur bar 'gyur te/_se gol 
[\[267b.6\]]gtogs pa tsam la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang gis rgyal po de bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[267b.7\]]kyang ston par byed pa dang /_bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba med pa dang /_'chi ba med par rol par 'gyur ro/_/bris sku gnas pa de nyid du sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]kyang shes so/_/zhing stong phrag kyang 'da' bar byed do/_/lus stong phrag ston par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang dag par 'byin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/_/nges par byang 
[\[268a.2\]]chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bris sku rab 'byam las/_mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga_/las kyi 
[\[268a.3\]]'bras bu drug pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dug pa'i lha tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig_/las chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i spyod 
[\[268a.4\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi cho ga sgrub pa po srung ba'i don du gsang ba dam pa mchog gi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang gis bzlas na sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro/_/kye kye lha'i tshogs rnams 
[\[268a.5\]]'di ni 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang rig pa 'dis 'gugs shing /_dbang du byed la yang dag par 'dod par 'gyur bar byed na de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[268a.6\]]pa rnams smos ci dgos/_sngags thams cad dang bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa ste/_'di ni brtson 'grus che ba dang /_mthu che ba dang /_gcig tu dpa' ba/_rig pa thams cad gcig kho nar sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bshad pa dang /_gcig kho na rig 
[\[268a.7\]]pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs pa chen po rnams las mchog tu bshad pa ste/_de gang zhe na/_las chen po thams cad byed pa/_don thams cad sgrub pa/_bya ba thams cad byed pa/_sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/_gdug pa'i las rnams dang sdig pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'joms par byed pa/_sngags thams cad so sor rdzogs par byed pa/_dge bar byed pa/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang /_sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa/_thogs pa med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying 
[\[268b.2\]]po yang dag par gyur pa/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_de gang zhe na/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_grogs po dag 'di ni 
[\[268b.3\]]mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las chen po thams cad byed pa/_rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkra shis pa/_rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyis 
[\[268b.4\]]bsgrubs pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag_/rig pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug_/rnam par sdang ba thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid/_skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang /_bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa ste/_mdor na ji lta ji ltar
