[\[268b.5\]]rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar rab tu byed do/_/ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams byed do/_/rig pa bzlas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gos la mngon par bsngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/so shing la mngon par bsngags te zos na so nad sel bar 
[\[268b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/ka ra bI ra dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gi nad la rgyam tsha phye mar byas pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mig bkang na mig nad sel bar byed do/_/rna ba'i nad 
[\[268b.7\]]la glang po che'i rgyab nas 'thon pa 'brug sgrogs pa na 'byung ba'i tshi d+h+ri ka_/ka bu ka'i lo mar btums te me chung ngus btso bar bya'o/_/tshos nas phyir btsos pa byas la chu dro 'jam la rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags te des rna ba dag par 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]byas te skad cig de nyid la nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal 'gags nas gzer bas zil gyis non par gyur na/_a Tarlu Sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na bde blag tu btsa' 
[\[269a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu zug rngus nyams pa'am/_mtshon nang du lus pa la mar rnying pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas blud par bya ba'am/_de'i phyogs su byugs na/_de'i skad cig nyid la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro/_/ma zhu ba dang /_gsud pa dang /_
[\[269a.3\]]tshad pa'i nad la kha ru tsha dang /_rgyam tsha dang /_tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la mngon par bsngags nas zos na/_nad de las grol bar 'gyur te nyi ma de nyid la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gtan nad kyi tshad pa'am/_'phral gyi tshad pa la yang rung ste/_ma tu lung 
[\[269a.4\]]ga'i rtsa ba btags nas srog chags med pa'i chu 'thung du gzhug ste gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur te/_lan bdun bzlas pas sam/_gnyis bzlas pas so/_/bud med mo gsham mi skye ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'dod na a shwagan+d+ha'i rtsa ba'i mar dang lhan cig 
[\[269a.5\]]bskol te ba'i 'o mas bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa lnga yongs su bzlas te/_zla mtshan gyi dus su 'thung du bcug nas khrus byas pa'i mthar skyes pa gzhan spang zhing khyim pa yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs na/_rang gi skyes pa'am/_rang gi bdag po'i bu 
[\[269a.6\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lo gsum mam/_lo lnga rab tu skyes pa'i dus las lhag pa'am/_lo du mar bu ma chags pa'am gzhan gyi sngags dang sman gyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang /_gzhan gyis gdug par byas pa'am/_mngal 'dzin pa mi 'dzin par byas pa'am/_nad 
[\[269a.7\]]kun du langs pa'am/_sbyor ba gzhan kun du spangs pa'am/_nad gzhan gang yang rung ba cung zad kyis yongs su mi 'dzin par byas pa'am/_brtan pa dang /_g.yo ba dang /_bcos ma dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa la sogs pa'i dug la sogs pa rab tu zhugs 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]pa'am/_rtsa ba dang /_sngags dang /_sman dang /_mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba'i sbyor ba byas pa la/_mar rnying pa dang /_rma bya'i mdongs gcig tu byas nas btags la/_sha kha ra dang lhan cig sbyar te/_lan nyi shu rtsa bdun mngon par bsngags nas/_a ru ra tsam 
[\[269b.2\]]bza' bar bya ste/_nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du sha kha ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bskol ba btung bar bya zhing yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzlas so/_/klad pa na ba la bya rog gi gshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te des bya bas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bud med la ches 
[\[269b.3\]]spyad pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams la a lam bu sha'i rtsa ba 'o ma dang lhan cig btags nas ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas nas 'o mas skyo mar sbyar nas btung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du rims nyin bzhi pa dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis 
[\[269b.4\]]pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_rgyun pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_rims drag po la sogs pa rnams la 'o thug mar dang sbyar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thung du bcug na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa la/_
[\[269b.5\]]bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma mo dang /_byis pa dang /_srul po dang /_ro langs dang /_grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa rnams dang /_mi thams cad gdug pa can drag pos 
[\[269b.6\]]mngon par zin pa la bdag nyid kyi lag pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/_zin pa de'i mgo bo la reg na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung ngo /_/gnyis bzlas pas grogs po srung ngo /_/gsum bzlas pas khyim srung 
[\[269b.7\]]ngo /_/bzhi bzlas pas grong srung ngo /_/lnga bzlas pas grong gi spyod yul du gyur pa srung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ji srid stong phrag gi bar du bzlas pas dmag gi tshogs srung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di rnams sam gzhan yang las phra mo rnams ma bsgrubs 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]par yang byed do/_/de nas sgrub par 'dod na phra mo'i las rnams mi bya bar mtha' gcig tu song nas dben pa'i phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung 'bab pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang /_gang gA'i klung gi ngogs dang /_gzhan yang chu klung chen po'i 
[\[270a.2\]]ngogs la brten nas/_phyogs gtsang ma phyag dar byas nas khrus lan gsum bya zhing /_gos lan gsum brjes te/_smra ba bcad/_slong mo'i kha zas za zhing /_lo ma dang /_nas zan dang /_'o ma dang 'bras bu za zhing 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/
[\[270a.3\]]grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na/_de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste phyogs de nyid du ras ris thu bo der bzhag la/_ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas gser dngul gyi rang bzhin nam/_zangs dang sa'i rang bzhin gyi mar me'i snod/_tu ruSh+ka'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am/_
[\[270a.4\]]dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am/_ba'i mar gyis bkang ba'i mar me'i snod du ras gsar pa dum bur byas pa'i mar me 'bum phrag gcig ras ris la dbul bar bya'o/_/de'i khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnams phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od zer rnams byung 
[\[270a.5\]]ma thag tu ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bar 'gyur ro/_/steng gi bar snang la rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs shing legs so zhes pa yang thos te/_de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du sgrub pa po sngar bris par ras ris la brten pa la mchod yon phul nas bskor 
[\[270a.6\]]ba byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas bzung ba tsam gyis mar me 'dzin pa de rnams thams cad kyi lhan cig tu 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang brgyar yang 'gro bar byed do/_/lha'i sil snyan dang 
[\[270a.7\]]so sor yang dag par ldan pa dang /_sgra snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing gar byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin ma de rnams kyis 'khor yug tu kun tu khyab par snang ba sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por dbang skur bar byed do/_/mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyis lhan cig 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]rga ba med cing 'chi ba med par rol par byed do/_/bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang /_lha'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa dang /_rnam par bkra ba'i gos kyis brgyan pa/_de rnams dbang du byas nas mngag gzhug par 'gyur te/_de rnams dang lhan cig spyod 
[\[270b.2\]]par gyur te lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur zhing ring du 'tsho zhing grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'gro 
[\[270b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis kyang grangs su mi 'gro na de las gzhan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/_mthar yang 'dis sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/_/las sgrub 
[\[270b.4\]]pa'i thabs gzhan yang yod de/_ches dka' thub byas pa/_de nas mtha' gcig tu song nas lhag par gnas te 'du 'dzi med cing 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i dgon pa chen por zhugs nas/_gnas gang na pad+ma'i mtsho chen po dang /_chu dang bcas pa/_ri bo gcig la 
[\[270b.5\]]brten pa'i ri bo de'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/_rig pa rnams kyi dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas de rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du/_'o ma'am nas zan dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu bza' zhing 'o ma las byung ba zos te rig pa 'bum phrag bcur bzlas 
[\[270b.6\]]pa bya'o/_/bzlas pa'i mthar yang sngar bstan pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis ras ris kyi thu bo bzhag nas/_pad+ma'i me tog la tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis btags te seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar nas sngar yongs su btags pa'i pad+mas stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis 
[\[270b.7\]]sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ste/_des sgrub pa po kun du snang bar byas nas spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro/_/reg ma thag tu sgrub pa po mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]sems dpa'i sa thob bo/_/lha'i gzugs kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu ste/_bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug 'da' bar byed do/_/de rnams kyi mthu yang yang dag par 
[\[271a.2\]]rjes su mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug mnyes par byed do/_/de rnams kyang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bas mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar yang byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i 
[\[271a.3\]]bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid byang chub tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa 
[\[271a.4\]]gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga las/_las mchog sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang sgrub pa'i las mchog gsungs te/_rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la 
[\[271a.5\]]rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags yongs su bzung nas gang gA'i klung du zhugs nas gru'i bzhon pa la rab tu gnas te/_gang gA'i dbus su 'o ma dang chu btung zhing /_stong phrag sum cur ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyin zhag gi bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas bzlas pa'i mthar klu thams 
[\[271a.6\]]cad mthong ngo /_/de nas sgrub pa brtsams te gru'i dbus de nyid du me thab pad+ma'i rnam pa bya'o/_/de nas nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras ris la mchod pa chen po bya'o/_/ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag ste bdag nyid shar du mngon par 
[\[271a.7\]]phyogs te ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/_nA ga ge sar gyi me tog re re la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar te/_tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum bsres pa'i nA ga ge sar gyi me tog rnams kyis stong phrag bcu'i bar ji srid par sbyin sreg 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]bya'o/_/gzhan klu rnams mthong ba na nye bar bcings pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas rnams rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya'o/_/gang las sbyin sreg gi mthar klu'i bzhon pa dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/klu'i dbang po rgyal 
[\[271b.2\]]po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas so/_/bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/rang dbang du spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba la thogs pa med do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste/_de'i spyi bo la reg 
[\[271b.3\]]par mdzad do/_/reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/nges par sangs rgyas nyid du lhag par 'gro bar byed do/_/gzhan yang mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni sngar bzhin du gang gA'i klung du zhugs nas bil ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi 
[\[271b.4\]]shing gcig nyid kyis gru'i bzhon pa byas nas shin tu brtan pa legs par byas pa der mngon par 'dzegs nas bil ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi skya ba des gru de'i rjes su sgrub pa po ches mkhas shing gsal ba nyid kyis g.yab par bya ste/_gang gA'i klung chen po yongs su mi dor bar 
[\[271b.5\]]kun nas thad ka'am rgyun [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]g.yab par bya'o/_/de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzung nas sam/_snying po'am/_nye ba'i snying po'am/_yi ge gcig pa'am/_khro bo'am/_pho nya'am/_ring du rjes su 'brang ba'am/_gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas ras ris 
[\[271b.6\]]kyi thu bo de nyid du/_zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas bdag nyid dang po zhal shar du phyogs la/_phyis ni ji ltar 'dod par bya'o/_/'o ma dang /_nas zan dang /_'bras bu bza' ba'am/_chu'am/_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu bza' zhing /_smra ba bcad de/_dus 
[\[271b.7\]]gsum du khrus bya zhing /_gos lan gsum brjes te/_shin tu dkar ba'i las kun du spyod cing shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pas dang po re zhig ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bzhin du sngar cho ga mthong bas rig pa 'bum phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas gal te rtsa 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]ba'i rig par 'gyur ro/_/de nas stong phrag drug cu bzlas pa'i mthar gru rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus te sngar gnas de nyid du gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na/_'jigs 
[\[272a.2\]]par mi bya zhing /_bzlog par mi bya'o/_/sgrub pa po'i dbang las ma gtogs par bzlog par nus pa yang ma yin no/_/de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par byed do/_/lam thung na lta ci smos/_der zhugs nas chu'i steng du 
[\[272a.3\]]sgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o/_/de nas me thab sngar gyi rnam pa'am rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod du seng ldeng gi me sbar la nA ga ge sar gyi ze 'bru dang /_me tog tsan+dan dkar po dang /_ga pur dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs ches nyung ba'am/_ches mang ba'i tshad kyang 
[\[272a.4\]]rung ste/_sngar bzhin du rtsa ba'i rig pas 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sbyin sreg byed pa na/_lang ka'i grong na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams hA hA zhes sgrogs pa dang /_klu'i grong longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnam pa sna 
[\[272a.5\]]tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/_ches zhi ba dang /_ches khro ba rnams langs te klu dang srin po rnams kyang 'di skad ces smra'o/_/khyed bzhengs shig bzhengs shig_/bdag cag gi rje bo mdzod cig ces so/_/de bzhin du lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang lha dang /_lto 
[\[272a.6\]]'phye chen po dang /_grub pa dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed mod kyi ldang bar mi bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags bzla zhing lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya'o/_/de nas rnam par byol zhing phan tshun rab tu 'bros la 
[\[272a.7\]]'jigs par byed do/_/de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru des sgrub pa po de khyer nas skad cig la 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du'ang 'gro zhing 'ong bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems shes par 'gyur ro/_/mngon 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]par shes pa lnga dang /_rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad dang /_srin po thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin thams cad dang /_lha thams cad dang /_
[\[272b.2\]]lha ma yin thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te/_bka' bzhin byed pa la bzhag nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'di'i sngags grub pa de rnams kyang 'di la 
[\[272b.3\]]byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rjes su 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las kyi cho ga mchog sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni bil ba'i shing la gru bo che'i bzhon pa byed du gzhug ste/_shing gcig gi bzhon 
[\[272b.4\]]pa'am/_bsdus pa'ang rung ste gnas chen po bya'o/_/gang gA'i dbus kyi gling der gnas pa'i gru'i bzhon par skyes bu brgya nyi shu lag na sgron me thogs pa rnams gru'i bzhon pa la 'dzegs te gos dkar po gyon zhing srung ba byas pa ras ris kyi thu bo sngar gyi cho gas kun du bzhag 
[\[272b.5\]]pa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma rnams dang gur gum dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_ga pur bsres pa dang /_seng ldeng gi sreg blugs stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar 
[\[272b.6\]]gru de skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do/_/mthong ba tsam las thob par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang yun ring du 'tsho 
[\[272b.7\]]zhing bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/_/mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i rig pa 'dzin pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/lhan cig spyod pa de rnams dang /_thabs cig tu ji ltar 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu zhing /_rang dgar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par dgyes par 'gyur ro/_/mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang las kyi 
[\[273a.2\]]cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par gyur pa ni/_chu klung 'gram mam rgya mtsho'i ngogs/_/de bzhin kha ba can gyi rir/_/ri yi rgyal po 'bigs byed de/_/der ni las mchog bsgrub par bya/_/sa h+ye ma la ya nyid dang /_/ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang dang /_/bya rgod phung po'i ri rgyal du/_/las kyi 
[\[273a.3\]]mchog ni bsgrub par bya/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni/_/shing sogs me tog ldan pa ste/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/_/phyogs 'di rnams su bsgrub par bya/_/rnam par dben pa'i phyogs gtsang ma/_/bas mtha'i grong gi chos bzhi la/_/mi smra reg pa 
[\[273a.4\]]spangs nas ni/_/rtag tu gci ba bya ba yin/_/lus la lha gnas bshang ba dang /_/brtul zhugs can dag gtsang sbra bya/_/reg na gzhon sha can rnams 'dod/_/srog chags spangs pa'i sa rnams ni/_/gsum po tshul bzhin blangs nas ni/_/rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o/_/de 
[\[273a.5\]]bzhin gnyis ka'i mthar lag pa/_/sngags pas rtag tu sa dag ni/_/sngar bstan pa dag blangs nas ni/_/zlos bos rtag tu rkang pa nyid/_/g.yas dang de las gzhan pa ni/_/phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas/_/'bad pas rkang pa bkru bar bya/_/rgya cher sngar ni brjod pa bzhin/_/
[\[273a.6\]]sngags zlos po yi gtsang sbra yang /_/dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra ste/_/rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/_/rgyud rnams kun du mthong ngo zhes/_/mnga' bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/de nas zlos pos nye reg bya/_/sdom brtson dngos 
[\[273a.7\]]grub las la dga'/_/sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis/_/yid kyi nang gi dag pa yin/_/gtsang sbra rnam pa lnga ru brjod/_/sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du/_/lus kyi gtsang sbra de bzhin du/_/ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags/_/bzhi pa bden pa'i gtsang sbra ste/_/chu ni 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]lnga par brjod par bya/_/bden pa'i chos ni khro ba thul/_/rgyud shes bstan bcos mthong ba dang /_/phra mo'i de nyid don la mkhas/_/sngags shes las la grags pa dang /_/rgyu yis nang la mkhas pa ste/_/de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/_/bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i/_/
[\[273b.2\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i tshig ni smra mi bya/_/bden pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/_/ma rungs rab tu ma rungs nyid/_/rnam par sdang dang 'khrugs bcas dang /_/rtsub cing gnad ni 'gems pa dang /_/bden pa'i chos ni rnam par nyams/_/sems can gzhan la gdung bar byed/_/phra ma 
[\[273b.3\]]nyon mongs can sems dang /_/chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang /_/de bzhin 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/_/rtag tu khrims 'chal chos min spyod/_/sngags zlos pa yis spang bar bya/_/de bzhin nyid du grong gi chos/_/khro ba brnab sems 'byung ba yi/_/'jig rten pha rol 
[\[273b.4\]]'jigs pa rnams/_/blo ldan rang rgyal bse ru dang /_/slar yang rtag tu nyon mongs dang /_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad/_/de bzhin rtag tu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba/_/'jig rten dngos grub 'dod don gnyer/_/sa stengs [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra nye bar smra/_/mi bzad dmyal ba chen por ltung /_/
[\[273b.5\]]sngon gyis nyes pa las de bzhin/_/dga' bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/_/rtag tu slar yang der gnas so/_/rtag tu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smras nyer 'tsho ba/_/mi bzad ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur/_/thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang /_/yang sos ral gri lo ma dang /_/de bzhin shal ma la yi 
[\[273b.6\]]nags/_/der ni bskal pa mang por gnas/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i skye bo ni/_/gsang sngags log par smra ba dang /_/rmongs pas log par brjod pa yi/_/'byung po rnams la slu byed pa/_/de la grub pa ga la yod/_/de phyir rmongs pa las 'di yis/_/sngags kyi dngos grub 
[\[273b.7\]]ma mthong nas/_/sngags pa'i dngos grub med do zhes/_/'di skad du ni tshig smra ba/_/gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa ni/_/sa stengs 'dir ni rab spangs pa/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po yis/_/de yis grub par ga la 'gyur/_/de phyir 'di ni mi bzad pa'i/_/'jigs 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]chen mnar med 'tshed par 'gyur/_/yang sos dang ni thig nag dang /_/rab tu tsha bar 'tshed pa dang /_/sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa/_/spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya/_/'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan/_/dri med chu ni rab bsngags pa/_/sngags rig pas ni 
[\[274a.2\]]sngags bsnyen bya/_/yul gzhan rnams su bsgrags mi bya/_/lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dam/_/brtan pa'i mtshan ma gcig pa dang /_/rtags gcig de bzhin bas mtha' ru/_/sngags rig sngags ni bsnyen pa bya/_/bdag dang grogs rnams bsrung byas nas/_/sngar 
[\[274a.3\]]spyad gsang sngags ldan pa dang /_/sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya/_/dgon pa che mchog shing chen dang /_/me tog 'bras bu la sogs 'byung /_/ri yi rtse dang khung bu dang /_/chu yi gnas ni gtsang mar bcas/_/'bab chu che 'gram yid 'ong bar/_/sngags rig pas 
[\[274a.4\]]ni sngags bsnyen bya/_/sngags shes nas ni nges rtogs byed/_/shar phyogs su yang chu klung che/_/lu hi ta 'gram dge ba dang /_/de bzhin kA ma ru pa'i yul/_/grong mchog 'phel bar byed pa dang /_/dma' ba gang du 'di 'gro mchog_/'dug pa dang ni chu klung mchog_/gnas 
[\[274a.5\]]der rtag tu zlos pa dang /_/gtsang ma blo gros ldan pas bsten/_/sngon du bsnyen pa'ang der gyis shig_/gang gA'i sgo ru las rnams kun/_/de bzhin rtag tu gang gA dang /_/dug can pa ni phrad pa ru/_/rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang /_/gtsang ma'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya/_/dur 
[\[274a.6\]]khrod che dang gzhan nyid ni/_/zlos pos der ni rtag tu bzlas/_/dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni/_/srog chags rnams kyis spangs pa ru/_/de nyid phyir ni shin tu ni/_/mnyam gzhag sngags kyis bzlas pa bya/_/der ni 'jig rten bsam pa yi/_/bsod nams min pa cung zad 
[\[274a.7\]]mthong /_/'on kyang sngags kyis nyer bstan pas/_/cung zad dus su 'dug par bya/_/de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya/_/zla ba gzas zin dus der ni/_/dus ma bab na'ang dus cung zad/_/der 'dug bya yi gzhan du min/_/gzhan du sngags rig ci nus pas/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]de nas myur du 'gro bar bya/_/bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi/_/sa stengs rnams su kun du 'dug_/'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni/_/lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams/_/mu stegs can gzhan gnas rnams ni/_/sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spangs/_/sngags shes 
[\[274b.2\]]der ni mi bsdad do/_/skyes mchog blo gros rgyu ngan pa/_/rgyal ba mchog gis gang bzhugs dang /_/rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' skal ba che/_/rgyal mchog sras po nyan thos rnams/_/de rnams kun bzhugs sa stengs kyi/_/yul rnams kun 
[\[274b.3\]]du sngags shes pas/_/'bad pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/_/mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags ni/_/gnas de ru ni bzlas par bya/_/gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'di rnams su/_/gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang /_/las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs 
[\[274b.4\]]rnams/_/'di rnams rnyed par ma gyur na/_/gang yang rung ba'i gnas der ni/_/gtsang mas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/_/dad cing mos pas sgrub thabs kyi/_/cho ga mchog gi las brtsam mo/_/dang po re zhig_/bris sku'i thu bo zhal nub tu bstan nas bzhag ste/_bdag 
[\[274b.5\]]nyid shar du mngon par phyogs la grog mkhar gyi sa'am/_gang gA'i klung gi 'gram gyi sa blangs nas pu shel tse dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum dang /_ga pur rnams bsres la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/_de bris sku'i spyan sngar bzhag nas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha 
[\[274b.6\]]gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung bas 'khor lo'i rnam pa byas nas bris sku'i spyan sngar lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/_lag pa g.yon pas ni rma bya'o/_/dkar po'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan phyed na bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs pa'i dri dang ji srid 
[\[274b.7\]]nam langs pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe de rma bya'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo yang 'bar ro/_/bdag nyid lha'i phreng ba dang gos 'chang zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang /_nyi ma 'char ka 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te ras ris la bskor ba byas la ras ris blangs nas rma bya'i gdan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'da' bar byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du 
[\[275a.2\]]mas yongs su bskor ba'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing /_rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa med par 'gro'o/_/lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[275a.3\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/_/mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dbyig pa dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_mchod phyir thogs dang /_ldong 
[\[275a.4\]]ros dang /_gi wang dang /_ral gri dang /_lcags mda' dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_sa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang /_rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang ba bzhi pa dang /_bya dang /_bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang /_
[\[275a.5\]]stag dang /_gzig la sogs pa rnams grog mkhar gyi sa dri zhim po'i dri zhim bsres pa las byas pa'am/_stan dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_gdugs dkar po dang /_cod pan dang /_rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang /_rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang /_rab tu byung 
[\[275a.6\]]ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang phreng dang /_/mchil lham dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khab dang /_gri la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am/_gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags 
[\[275a.7\]]las byas pa'am/_grog mkhar gyi sa'am/_chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par bsang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba'i sngags sam/_yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/_sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]par bsngags pa byas nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rig pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang /_ji ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po yongs su bskyab par byas pa/_shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang rgyud shes pa/_
[\[275b.2\]]sngar bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar bzhin du'o/_/bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bor ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar bstan pa'i mtshon cha dang yo byad dang sems can gyi khyad par rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar 
[\[275b.3\]]byas la/_yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung blangs te mtshan mo ji srid du bzlas pa byas na nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe bar skabs 'dir bris sku la 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po kun du mthong ngo /_/gal te sgrub pa po bzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur na/_de la 
[\[275b.4\]]zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram/_mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs pa'am/_bcangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing /_lha'i lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa 'od 
[\[275b.5\]]zer chen po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa glog ltar gsal ba'i sku/_rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag_/ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na spyod pa/_
[\[275b.6\]]sngar yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon pa gang gis grub pa de nyid mthu chen por 'gyur te/_de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang /_de nyid 'di'i grogs po ste/_gzhan gyi sngags kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa/_
[\[275b.7\]]byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_phan par 'dod pa rtag tu rjes su bcings pa/_de nyid 'di'i mtshon cha dang /_rgyan dang /_rin po che'i bye brag dang /_stan dang /_mal cha dang /_sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro/_/mthu chen po dang brtson 'grus chen po dang /_lus chen por 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor byugs nas ji srid byang chub snying 
[\[276a.2\]]bo rjes su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de/_stobs bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /_'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag 
[\[276a.3\]]pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_sa thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/stobs bcu dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro/_/mdor bsdus nas las mchog thams cad dang /_gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan sngar 
[\[276a.4\]]mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las mchog gzhan nyid bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyid dang /_lus 'di nyid 
[\[276a.5\]]kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su kun du 'gro ba nyid dang /_stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_chos bstan pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 
[\[276a.6\]]gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun du gnon cing rjes su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis 
[\[276a.7\]]rab tu zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_sngags kyi spyod 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/_rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/_sngags 
[\[276b.2\]]kyi mthu rab 'byam dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar 'dug nas 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi cho ga dang /_rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste/_mdor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsungs pa'i las rnams kyis 
[\[276b.3\]]kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/_myur du de rnams kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol 
[\[276b.4\]]ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/_ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/_sems 
[\[276b.5\]]dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga bar ma'i las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bar ma yod do/_/de mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yis/_legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[276b.6\]]dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/_sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas 
[\[276b.7\]]gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/dang po re zhig 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang /_gtsang sbra'i kun du spyod pa dang /_nges par sdom pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_bsam gtan dang /_cho ga dang /_gang du rab tu gnas pa ste/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 
[\[277a.2\]]'bras bu dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/_de ngas bshad kyis sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/dang po re zhig rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /_tshul khrims yang 
[\[277a.3\]]dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te/_dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/_sngar nges par bstan pa gsal ba/_yid gzhungs 
[\[277a.4\]]pa dang ldan pa/_slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob pa/_khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/_mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_chos dang ldan pa/_bden par smra ba/_spro ba che ba/_byas pa gzo ba/_brtan pa/_sems bzang pa/_ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa/_rnyed 
[\[277a.5\]]pa dang /_bkur sti thams cad la 'dod pa med pa/_tshangs par spyod pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_rnyed pa tsam gyis sam longs spyod rgyur ram/_rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra na/_shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang /_rnyed pa dang /_rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos/_dam 
[\[277a.6\]]bcas pa brtan pa dang /_'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang /_sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /_sngar spyad pa byas pa khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa dang /_sngags rjes su zlos pa dang /_rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du 
[\[277a.7\]]yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten shes pa/_yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa/_'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa/_legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/_chags pa med pa/_dpa' ba/_brtson 'grus brtan pa/_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]nad med pa ste/_nad gang gis las su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang /_rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa/_yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/_sgrub pa po yang de dang 'dra ba'am/_yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs 
[\[277b.2\]]pa'o/_/de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang sngags dang bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug 
[\[277b.3\]]par 'tshal na bdag cag la rjes su brtse ba'i don dang /_phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol/_de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas gzhug par bya zhing sngar bzhin du 
[\[277b.4\]]mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang sngags byin la rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o/_/gsang chen dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rgyud dang /_sngags dang las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas yongs su brtags te/_bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang sngags la sogs 
[\[277b.5\]]pa dang /_las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o/_/gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrags so/_/de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa'am bdag nyid dang longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[277b.6\]]de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o/_/ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa po des rig pa dang sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/_sngar 
[\[277b.7\]]bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang /_gshegs su gsol ba dang /_mar me dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gdan phul ba thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas pa bya'o/_/de la thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus 
[\[278a.2\]]tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por bshad do/_/nyi ma gung ni nyi ma shar ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga shes pas gung gi thun mtshams su shes par bya'o/_/nub pa'i dus su yang lhag ma bzhi cha tsam 
[\[278a.3\]]thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o/_/slob dpon mkhas pa bshes gnyen can/_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan/_/chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang /_/kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa ni/_/sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan/_/bya ba kun 
[\[278a.4\]]la blo gros byang /_/phra zhing mkhas la tshad shes pa/_/chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin/_/spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan/_/'jig rten chos la ltos pa med/_/thub pa mchog gi chos la dad/_/'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang /_/bzlas pa bya zhing rnam dben byas/_/sngon 
[\[278a.5\]]du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags shes/_/de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong /_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang sngags dang /_/'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes/_/srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa/_/gtsang sbra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/_/
[\[278a.6\]]sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni/_/kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang /_/gsang sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yin/_/gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson/_/rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang /_/'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid/_/sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang /_/phra 
[\[278a.7\]]mo tsam la'ang de bzhin no/_/gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med/_/yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang /_/stobs bcu pas bshad sngags gang dang /_/de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang /_/'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la'ang /_/de la rtag tu 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]ngal bar byas/_/gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa/_/nad med nus pa med min pa/_/rga dang nad ni rnam par spangs/_/de bzhin bshes gnyen can sngags grub/_/kun nas myur du byed pa dang /_/mtha' yi ring min zhing de bzhin/_/tshangs par spyod cing shes 
[\[278b.2\]]rab che/_/khyad par du ni shes pa dang /_/gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang /_/dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang /_/de 'dir byang chub pha rol son/_/srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson/_/de bzhin nyid du rig sngags bya/_/mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang /_/
[\[278b.3\]]'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa/_/dpal nyid dang ni rab tu ldan/_/sbyin dang 'byung po phan la dga'/_/de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la/_/rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya/_/des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi/_/sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed/_/de nyid 
[\[278b.4\]]kyis ni dbang bskur gyis/_/'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur/_/dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang /_/thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod/_/de yi gsung ni mi 'gom pa/_/slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin/_/ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi/_/longs spyod de 
[\[278b.5\]]la dbul bar bya/_/nyung ngu tsam mam mang yang rung /_/gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /_/lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir/_/pha la nor ni ster ba ltar/_/de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas/_/slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya/_/mtha' yi dbang phyug dngos grub 
[\[278b.6\]]thob/_/tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang /_/rgyas pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur/_/slob mas bla ma de mchod na/_/de yi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/lam dang cho ga nyer mthong dang /_/bsnyen pa las kyang brten pa las/_/de bzhin ri mor byas 
[\[278b.7\]]mchod las/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur/_/de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang /_/lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur/_/bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na/_/bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yis/_/'di dag thams cad brtan par 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]'gyur/_/sgrub pos sngon dang thog mar ni/_/dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya/_/dman nam de dag mnyam yang rung /_/gal te ches mchog gyur pa yang /_/rmongs pa'am lhag par khro ba yis/_/rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya/_/des kyang 
[\[279a.2\]]rgyud 'dir de la ni/_/man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya/_/gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin/_/'dis ni ser sna byas pa min/_/sngar bstan slob ma de la ni/_/man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya/_/gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin/_/lus can zhen pa 'phel byed 
[\[279a.3\]]pa'i/_/mig ni gang la yod gyur pa/_/de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o/_/slob dpon nam ni slob ma'i rgyur/_/phan tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa/_/gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong ba/_/'jam po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste/_/de la sngags ni sbyin par bya/_/slob dpon de bzhin 
[\[279a.4\]]slob ma ni/_/slob ma bla mar mthong ba la/_/rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba'am/_/gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor/_/de la rtag tu lam nyid dang /_/sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya/_/gnyis kas pha dang bur shes pas/_/sngags ni 'bras bcas 
[\[279a.5\]]rjes 'jug pa/_/brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob/_/rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni/_/rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/_/bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams/_/sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chad 'gyur/_/de med mgon med de rnams la/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i 
[\[279a.6\]]sngags rnams sbyin/_/sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang /_/thams cad la ni khyad par du/_/sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags/_/tha ma mchog dang bar ma la/_/dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o/_/yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la/_/rjes su gzung 
[\[279a.7\]]ba'i rgyun bya'o/_/'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi/_/'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya/_/de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags/_/slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya/_/de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan pas/_/lam nyid yin no gzhan du min/_/dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la/_/
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]pha ni pha rol song ba na/_/pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te/_/de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro/_/de nas 'dir ni song nas ni/_/mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/_/slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing /_/smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas/_/de ltar 
[\[279b.2\]]bstan pa nyid du 'gyur/_/ji lta'i lam la rab 'jug pa/_/de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa/_/khang stong dang ni dgon pa che/_/ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs/_/gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen/_/rnam dben skye bo spangs pa bsten/_/lha khang dang ni shing 
[\[279b.3\]]drung dang /_/mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang /_/rgya mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang /_/chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i/_/yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba/_/'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du/_/mnyam 
[\[279b.4\]]par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya/_/grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/_/sngags don nges pa'i rtog ge pa/_/ltas ni rnam pa de nyid shes/_/dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba/_/snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can/_/dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs 
[\[279b.5\]]ldan/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni/_/rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/_/bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis/_/'bad pa med par nyid kyis ni/_/las rnams rgyal ba 'grub par 'gyur/_/tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni/_/'bab 
[\[279b.6\]]chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i/_/srog chags med cing dri ma med/_/chu de nyid la khrus byas nas/_/sa dang ba byung phye ma yis/_/sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya/_/de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i/_/chu nyid shin tu dri med la/_/zlos po brtson pas 
[\[279b.7\]]khrus bya'o/_/ha cang yun ring khrus mi bya/_/de nas langs la lag pa dag_/sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya/_/bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya/_/yang der so shing kun du spyad/_/so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya/_/de nas 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]skyob la phyag byas shing /_/'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas/_/sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya/_/bya ba sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis/_/yang dang yang du yang dag bstod/_/de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis/_/ston pa skyob la mchod yon 
[\[280a.2\]]dbul/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas/_/de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams/_/'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi/_/spyan snga nyid du sdig pa bshags/_/bdag nyid dag kyang phul byas nas/_/ras ris spyan sngar 'khod par bya/_/ku sha'i khres 
[\[280a.3\]]la nye bar 'dug_/sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni/_/mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te/_/der ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni/_/rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya/_/de tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so/_/cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing /_/ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin 
[\[280a.4\]]no/_/bar ma bar ma'i las dag la/_/brtul zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya/_/ha cang mthon po spang bar bya/_/gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min/_/bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la/_/rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs/_/ha cang mtho 
[\[280a.5\]]min dma' ba min/_/bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs/_/gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing /_/gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang /_/bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas/_/
[\[280a.6\]]sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du/_/bzlas pas rab tu 'byor bar 'gyur/_/sngags ni legs par thos pa 'ga'/_/dngos grub 'bring po 'dod pa nyid/_/sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya/_/de phyir skye bo dang bral bar/_/sngags kyi de nyid don legs 
[\[280a.7\]]thos/_/tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par/_/zlos pa pos ni sngags bzlas bya/_/mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang /_/de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi/_/skya rengs dmar po'i dus tsam ste/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na/_/thun ni dang por re bzhin 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]du/_/thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so/_/dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te/_/bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin/_/de nas nyi ma phyed nub na/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa de tshe btang /_/sngags zlos bor ba de yi tshe/_/mchod yon phul nas gshegs 
[\[280b.2\]]su gsol/_/brtul zhugs can gyis rnam gzhan spang /_/de tshe bor ba'i gdugs lhag na/_/thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya/_/shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/_/dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang /_/sa bcu pa yi glegs bam ni/_/mchod dang klog pa 
[\[280b.3\]]rtag tu'o/_/de nas dus la bab gyur na/_/rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang /_/thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas/_/de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing /_/de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan/_/dus su za zhing dbang po thul/_/sgrub po chos dang ldan pa 
[\[280b.4\]]dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad brtson/_/grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na/_/mi smra gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/_/sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i/_/khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug_/zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu/_/tshos par grub pa 
[\[280b.5\]]gtsang mar 'dod/_/yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs/_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad/_/de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni/_/bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang /_/dper na brtson pas go bgos te/_/nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug_/rtag tu dgra ni 
[\[280b.6\]]'joms par byed/_/dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa/_/de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho/_/rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na/_/de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi/_/gzugs sgra mthong na mi dge ba/_/'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir/_/
[\[280b.7\]]mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya/_/lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi/_/bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang /_/smad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni/_/srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas/_/lus kyi mi rtag sdug bsngal ba/_/mi gtsang dri mi zhim 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]par bsgom/_/gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi/_/'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor/_/las kyi srad bus brgyus pa ni/_/yun ring dus su mya ngan byed/_/mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni/_/dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu can no/_/gang du 
[\[281a.2\]]blo ni phyin ci log_/chags pas skye bo phongs par 'gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis/_/rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa/_/ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni/_/'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed/_/rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa/_/'dzin pa'i kun 
[\[281a.3\]]du spyod pa spyod/_/gang du sems can mi dge dga'/_/lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed/_/zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin/_/srid pa'i mtsho chung 'byung ba rnams/_/'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i/_/sdug bsngal chu bos kun du g.yengs/_/de bzhin bud med sdug 
[\[281a.4\]]bsngal gyi/_/rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang /_/thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i/_/mtsho chen 'di dag bskam par dka'/_/bud med sems 
[\[281a.5\]]kyis bslus pa yi/_/sems can gnas gang bying ba de/_/dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten lha ma yin/_/de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten nyid/_/lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya/_/rtag tu kun nas yongs su 'khor/_/bud med 
[\[281a.6\]]chags pas bslus pa ni/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi/_/'dam rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur/_/bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi/_/ro la chags pa'i ce spyang bzhin/_/gang la sems can rtag dga' ba/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par 
[\[281a.7\]]byed/_/dkar po chos la nges par nyams/_/sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu gnas/_/srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid/_/thams cad zlog par byed pa yin/_/sngags zlos pa la dga' zhing brtson/_/dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan/_/gzi 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa/_/de rnams la ni sdug bsngal med/_/yang dag sdom dang tshags bden shes/_/bla ma lha ma mchod pa byed/_/ma dang pha la gus pa rnams/_/gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang /_/
[\[281b.2\]]gzhan gyi don la rjes su bsnyen/_/bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs/_/de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang /_/blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin/_/'khor ba las ni mi 'da' ba/_/rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa/_/de la dngos grub yod pa min/_/
[\[281b.3\]]de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin/_/'gro ba 'bring yang yod ma yin/_/dngos grub chung ngu'ang yod ma yin/_/'dir ni zlos po khrims 'chal na/_/tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis/_/sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan to/_/mya ngan 'das grong 'gro 
[\[281b.4\]]ba yi/_/lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral/_/'dir ni byis pa smad pa la/_/sngags grub pa ni ga la yod/_/skye bo tshul 'chal 'di la ni/_/de la bde 'gro'ang yong ma yin/_/bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med/_/de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i 
[\[281b.5\]]sngags/_/grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/_/ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni/_/gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni/_/sngon po nyid du mi 'gyur zhing /_/myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur/_/de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa ni/_/tshul khrims 'chal zhing sdig pa'i las/_/
[\[281b.6\]]rtag tu slar yang bud med chags/_/mi dge'i grogs dang phrad pa la/_/sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub/_/de bas gang tshe zlos pa po/_/bde bar gshegs pas spangs pa yi/_/bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de/_/gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste/_/
[\[281b.7\]]byis pa bud med la rmongs pa/_/gzhan gyis grub par ma bstan no/_/de nas dang por blo ldan pa/_/gtsang zhing 'du 'dzi med la dga'/_/rigs ldan brtan zhing dpa' ba dang /_/sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'/_/chos dang chos min rnams 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]dpyod shes/_/de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dka'/_/de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni/_/grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas/_/sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu/_/mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba/_/
[\[282a.2\]]bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni/_/phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru/_/de nas slar yang gnas de ru/_/srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis/_/dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te/_/gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyis/_/rked pa man chad dril phyis bya/_/kun du 
[\[282a.3\]]g.yas pa slar byin nas/_/lag pas yis bkru bar bya/_/sngar bzhag pa yi dag pa dang /_/gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du/_/bza' zhing dag chus gtsang sbrar byas/_/ser skya'i ba las byung ba yi/_/ba yi lci ba ser po dag_/gtsang zhing dri med snod blang la/_/srog chags med pa'i chus 
[\[282a.4\]]sbyar te/_/dang por ston pa thub pa yi/_/mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/_/khyad par khru gang tsam du 'o/_/gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la/_/gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la/_/gang zhig sngags pa zlos pa po/_/slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin/_/bzhi 
[\[282a.5\]]pa sems can thams cad kyi/_/nye bar longs spyod don du grags/_/g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni/_/dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa'o/_/gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/
[\[282a.6\]]gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras/_/dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni/_/kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o/_/khru gang ngam ni khru phyed rung /_/nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o/_/zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs/_/sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin/_/de nas 
[\[282a.7\]]sngags pa thub pa langs/_/lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni/_/gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg bya/_/dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi/_/dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni/_/'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du blang /_/mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu'am/_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]chu mig chu bo la gnas pa/_/gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi/_/sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus/_/sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya/_/gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang /_/de nas kha la reg bya zhing /_/de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun/_/
[\[282b.2\]]mig dang sna yi bu ga dang /_/spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya/_/dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun/_/cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs/_/zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni/_/bsod snyoms snod ni blangs nas su/_/chu 
[\[282b.3\]]yi nang du 'gro bar bya/_/gang du chu bo rab gnas pa/_/de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang /_/chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs/_/mi yi 'jig rten rjes gzung rgyur/_/de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya/_/de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[282b.4\]]chen pos 'di gsungs so/_/mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya bas/_/sngon ni de tshe sa stengs der/_/sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir/_/'byung po rnams la legs don du/_/sngags ni rab tu gsungs pa yin/_/sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[282b.5\]]kun/_/dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba/_/mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams/_/'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin/_/'byung po rnams la legs pa nyid/_/slar yang kun du bsten pa rnams/_/'byung po kun gyi zas don du/_/gsang sngags 'di 
[\[282b.6\]]ni mchog tu gsungs/_/nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi/_/byang sems la bsten thams cad dang /_/nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis/_/nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing /_/bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang /_/gang yang sems 
[\[282b.7\]]can skom pa dang /_/sdug bsngal thams cad zhi don dang /_/'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis/_/'od srung 'od ni chen po la/_/thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs/_/nyon mongs rnams ni yid mgu nas/_/khyab bdag de la gsol ba 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]'debs/_/chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/_/chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol/_/dam tshig mchog la nyer gnas pa'i/_/sems can rnams la rjes brtser mdzod/_/de skad gsol nas thub pa yis/_/sngags mchog rgyas par 
[\[283a.2\]]gsung bar byed/_/ka la ping ka sgra dbyangs dang /_/rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra/_/tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang /_/tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis/_/gang yang cung zad 'dir 'ongs pa/_/rkang med pa dang rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_/rkang gnyis pa dang 
[\[283a.3\]]rkang bzhi pa/_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig_/mdor na sems can don kun du/_/bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/sems can la sogs 'dir lhags pa/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/_/
[\[283a.4\]]'byor pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig_/na maH_sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ga ga ne/_ga ga na/_gany+dzo A na ya/_sarba la hu la hu/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_A kar+Sha Ne/_mA bi lam+ba/_ya the pi taM saM pA dA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 
[\[283a.5\]]'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas/_cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir nam mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis 
[\[283a.6\]]yongs su gang bar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i don du blang bar bkru bar bya/_/
[\[283a.7\]]slar yang de nas langs nas ni/_/gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro/_/gang su sngon ni yang dag bsten/_/gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya/_/song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru/_/lhung bzed de ni gzhag par bya/_/de nas myur du nye reg bya/_/de bzhin 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]slar yang lhung bzed blang /_/lhung bzed sa la lo ma 'am/_/dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang /_/zangs sam shing shun dag kyang rung /_/ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul/_/ston la lha bshos phul nas ni/_/slar yang rig sngags rgyal la'o/_/'gron 
[\[283b.2\]]po gcig ni 'ongs gyur dang /_/sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin/_/bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du/_/kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid/_/ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya/_/sngags shes 'dir ni gdung mi bya/_/kun nas rig pa ldan par bya/_/lto ba'i tshad tsam 
[\[283b.3\]]bzhag nas ni/_/gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o/_/bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis/_/sngags don sgrub par mi nus te/_/ha cang nyung dang mang zos na/_/sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so/_/de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis/_/sems can zas kyis gnas so zhes/_/
[\[283b.4\]]lus can kun la gsungs pa yin/_/gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang /_/lha dang lha min dri za dang /_/klu dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci/_/srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sha za dang /_/'byung po skar ma gza' dag ni/_/gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa/_/de ni 'ga' yang yod 
[\[283b.5\]]ma yin/_/rtag tu kha zas rags pa ni/_/kham gyi zas zhes grags pa'o/_/sems can phra mo'i zas can spang /_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni/_/bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni/_/gzugs ni spyod cing g.yo ba ste/_/gzugs med nyid kyi lha 
[\[283b.6\]]rnams kyang /_/ting 'dzin 'bras bu za ba'o/_/srid pa bar ma'i sems can yang /_/dri za bar ni rab tu grags/_/de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams/_/zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za/_/'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi/_/kham gyi zas ni za bar byed/_/
[\[283b.7\]]de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/_/sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes/_/chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin/_/gang de rnams ni rab tu grags/_/zlos po rtag tu brtson pa ni/_/zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya/_/gang phyir rig pa bsnyen pa ni/_/zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas/_/
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang /_/dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la/_/de yis dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/_/dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyur/_/shing rta yun ring gnas don du/_/shing rta'i mig ni sku bar byed/_/de 
[\[284a.2\]]bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas/_/zas ni gnas pa'i ched du spyad/_/lus ni gso ba'i don du ni/_/zlos po rtag tu gso bar bya/_/sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i don phyir dang /_/byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir/_/zas thams cad dang /_/ji ltar mngon par/_
[\[284a.3\]]sred pa'i bza' ba de/_de rnams su char 'bab par gyur to/_/ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang /_skom pa rnams kyis btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba yang 
[\[284a.4\]]yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /_skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing tshim 
[\[284a.5\]]pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs 
[\[284a.6\]]su bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang /_khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir gsungs 
[\[284a.7\]]pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o/_/gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spro na ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa bya/_/de nas dkar gsum bza' ba'am/_'o ma btung 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]ba'o/_/ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang lha bshos rgya chen po byas nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng 
[\[284b.2\]]ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyis me sbar nas u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am/_/dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sprin nag po chen po dang /_rlung 
[\[284b.3\]]gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya/_langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing /_/dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o/_/
[\[284b.4\]]de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/_bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun du snang bar byed bzhin pa/_sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste/_kye kye sems dpa' chen po longs shig_/
[\[284b.5\]]grub pa yin no/_/zhes so/_/de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo/_/de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab 
[\[284b.6\]]tu ster bar byed do/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun du sbyin par byed do/_/de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[284b.7\]]thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i rtse mo'am/_mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/_/der bdag nyid dam/_grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog_/zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu 
[\[285a.2\]]rtsa gcig tu/_rtsa ba'i rig pa'am snying po'am nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du'am yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong 
[\[285a.3\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byed do/_/nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/_mi snang ba'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/_tshe ring ba nyid dam/_rgyal srid chen po dang /_longs 
[\[285a.4\]]spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam/_rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/_mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do/_/gang blangs kyang rung ste/_de mthun par gnang bar 
[\[285a.5\]]byed cing /_grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob bo/_/sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa'am/_mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad do/_/las kyi nyes pa rab tu spags pa yang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do/_/zhes bcom 
[\[285a.6\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so/_/las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni/_/dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam/_gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/_chu klung ngam/_chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal 
[\[285a.7\]]nub tu phyogs par gzhag la/_bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs bas gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_rgyas par gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o/_/bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_dong ka'i me 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]tog tsan+dan dkar po dang bsres pa'am gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do/_/ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do/_/ras ris kun nas 
[\[285b.2\]]'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do/_/ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do/_/ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid do/_/ras ris 
[\[285b.3\]]kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang /_stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do/_/de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil 
[\[285b.4\]]ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang /_cho ga de nyid kyis yo byad kyi rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya'i gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor na nan 
[\[285b.5\]]tan nges par sgrub par byed de/_rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang /_nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do/_/sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang /_/cho ga bshad pa la sems pa/_/sngags pa de tshe 
[\[285b.6\]]de phyogs su/_/gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni/_/zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang /_/dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te/_/sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro/_/mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni/_/brtul 
[\[285b.7\]]zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyin/_/dud 'gro rnams la mthun byin nas/_/'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed/_/lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni/_/sgum med zas dang dri bral gang /_/lhung bzed lhag mar thub pas gsungs/_/gang du slong ba'i snod du ni/_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]de ru zan ni mi bza' ste/_/der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang /_/rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya/_/pad 'dab kyis kyang ma yin te/_/ut+pa la las byung bas sam/_/dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste/_/sngags pas der ni mi bza'o/_/gang 
[\[286a.2\]]yang sngags pas ku mu da/_/sla k+Sha u dum bA ra las byung /_/pa Ti'i 'dab ma dang yang ni/_/tsher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung /_/a mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min/_/de bzhin sA Ta la las byung /_/sA la'i 'dab ma shi ri Sha/_/byang chub shing las byung ba dang /_/
[\[286a.3\]]gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/_/shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi/_/shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya/_/shing de yi ni yal ga dang /_/nA ga ge sar shing la'ang min/_/gang du nam yang bza' mi bya/_/mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang /_/thub pa'i lo ma'i 
[\[286a.4\]]spyil po ni/_/rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya/_/sngags pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/_/zas ni lo ma de rnams las/_/gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'/_/sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang /_/de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung /_/shel dang 
[\[286a.5\]]rdo ba las byung ba/_/de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni/_/rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'/_/lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste/_/de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min/_/stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang /_/rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang /_/de bzhin 
[\[286a.6\]]gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso/_/lo ma gzhan dang lha bshos 'byung /_/zlos pos de rnams spang bar bya/_/yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom/_/sna tshogs bza' ba snum khur dang /_/de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams/_/sngags pas 'bad pas 
[\[286a.7\]]blang bar bya/_/rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang /_/de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog_/dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi/_/lha bshos thams cad nyid kyang ni/_/zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya/_/chung ngu tsam yang lus can la/_/sngags rnams 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]de yis mi 'grub ste/_/kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang /_/rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos/_/rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can/_/lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa/_/de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub/_/gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims ldan/_/snying rje 
[\[286b.2\]]snying rje'i las can dang /_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba/_/rig sngags kun du sgrub par byed/_/sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas/_/zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya/_/gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i/_/zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/_/rang 
[\[286b.3\]]la byin pas kha zas ni/_/cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya/_/sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni/_/de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas/_/zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni/_/bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can/_/thub pa 
[\[286b.4\]]rnams kyis legs par bsngags/_/sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la/_/mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis/_/bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o/_/de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed/_/sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed/_/de nas zlos pos nye reg 
[\[286b.5\]]bya/_/de tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya/_/de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du/_/lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas/_/'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir/_/de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis/_/lus kun nye reg byas nas su/_/thub pas sngags 
[\[286b.6\]]'di brjod par bya/_/na maH_sarba bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra hi ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM sarba kilbi Sha/_nA sha ni/_nA sha ya/_sarba duSh+Ta pra yuk+taM/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M dzaHswA hA/_sngags 'dis bslab pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na 
[\[286b.7\]]sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/_/zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byugs nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o/_/ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam thun gcig la'o/_/de nas 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ras ris dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/_dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_'phags ma zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'phags pas bcu pa 
[\[287a.2\]]dang /_'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang /_'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang /_'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o/_/nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o/_/de nas yongs su zhi nas 
[\[287a.3\]]ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam mtsho phran chen por 'jug pas song nas/_srog chags med pa'i chu blangs te lan bdun mngon par 
[\[287a.4\]]bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chu la gdab bo/_/gang zhe na/_na maH_sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ya hU~M/_na dI ba ra d+ha ri Ne/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/_'dis srung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba 
[\[287a.5\]]dang /_grogs rnams dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_kha bcing ba dang /_gdug pa dang /_rab tu gdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang /_bgegs bcing ba la yang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams 
[\[287a.6\]]cad yongs su 'chags pa dang /_bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang /_khrus kyi dus thams cad dang /_gdug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom pa dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad byed do/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[287a.7\]]gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/_/las rnams thams cad du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]chus khrus byas te/_thams cad du las thams cad la srog chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o/_/de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang /_yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o/_/chu'i nang du mchil ma dang /_
[\[287b.2\]]bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/rtse bar yang mi bya'o/_/snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste/_bdag med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /_sdug bsngal nye 
[\[287b.3\]]bar 'gags pa dang /_tshor bas mngon par non pa dang /_chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang /_gcod pa dang /_ltung 
[\[287b.4\]]ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang skyob pa med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_shin 
[\[287b.5\]]tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa'am/_lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar bya'o/_/dang por re zhig pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa pad+ma chen po'i lo mas 
[\[287b.6\]]nye bar mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang /_rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang /_shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o/_/
[\[287b.7\]]de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o/_/de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/_chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog tu snang ba kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa tshad chen po nam mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/_skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/_g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs 
[\[288a.2\]]ba/_rnga yab bsnams pa/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grwa na 'khod de/_lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o/_/g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[288a.3\]]brgyad la/_'phags pa byams pa dang /_kun du bzang po dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_'phags pa 'jam dpal dang /_'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang /_nor bzang zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di 
[\[288a.4\]]rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste/_tsan+dan dang /_spos ngad ldan dang /_tog dang /_tog dkar dang /_'dod pa dang /_nye ba'i 'dod pa dang /_mu khyud dang /_mu khyud brgyad do/_/de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste 'phags pa 
[\[288a.5\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang /_pi lin da'i bu dang /_'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang /_'phags pa 'od srung chen po dang /_'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar 
[\[288a.6\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de 
[\[288a.7\]]bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]chen po dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po dang /_d+hA nu skA ri ka dang /_par+Shi ka dang in+t+ra ba ra'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing /_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang 
[\[288b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams dang /_lha dang mi'i mar me mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[288b.3\]]du gtor ma dang /_bdug pa dang /_lha bshos dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin pas bdag nyid dang 
[\[288b.4\]]phyogs thams cad kyang kun du snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o/_/sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu/_tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo/_/nges par byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams/_/
[\[288b.5\]]'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/_/'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang /_/sngags pa rnams la phan don dang /_/de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso/_/sngags pa kun la phan don du/_/sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so/_/de nas 
[\[288b.6\]]thub mchog bdun pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya/_/thub pas dang por gsungs pa yin/_/gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang /_/gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/_/dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste/_/bar ma la ni de 
[\[288b.7\]]bzhin gzhan/_/chung ngu la ni phran tshegs 'grub/_/thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs/_/de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni/_/thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste/_/thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o/_/de las gzhan yang mkhas pas ni/_/
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya/_/bsam gtan de la rab gnas na/_/sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad/_/zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni/_/sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas/_/ji ltar bde bar gshegs 
[\[289a.2\]]su gsol/_/chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni/_/de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/_/gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par/_/cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar/_/de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas/_/sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin/_/rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa/_/der ni sngags 
[\[289a.3\]]kyis gshegs su gsol/_/de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/_/grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas/_/dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes/_/cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud/_/rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis/_/gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas/_/rang sngags 
[\[289a.4\]]sngags kyis mgon po dang /_/nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod/_/de nas gsang sngags zlos pa pos/_/stan de las ni slar langs nas/_/thag ring gnas su song nas ni/_/phyi rol rlung 
[\[289a.5\]]gi rnam par spangs/_/snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor/_/bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no/_/nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing /_/mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o/_/sngags zlos pos ni nam yang der/_/don rnams bsam par mi bya'o/_/der ni rang las byed gsungs 
[\[289a.6\]]pa'i/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o/_/rab sngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi/_/de tshe sa stengs nyer 'dug ste/_/dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya/_/gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya/_/sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis/_/'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas/_/rab tu 
[\[289a.7\]]'dzag pa bdun blangs nas/_/bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste/_/gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag_/mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni/_/snabs la'ang gnyis de de bzhin no/_/de nas 'bad pas nye reg bya/_/gnas la ring du song ba'i sar/_/de bzhin sgra tsam 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]song nas ni/_/lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru/_/de nas gzhan gyi ci 'dod bzhin/_/lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu/_/chu dang g.yang sa med pa dang /_/de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang /_/chu klung spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs/_/'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par/_/
[\[289b.2\]]gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_/bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang /_/rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas/_/sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar bya/_/zlos po dus ni shes byas nas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min/_/de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste/_/bas mthar de 
[\[289b.3\]]bzhin bshang ba dang /_/gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni/_/de ru lus ni ci bde bar/_/gnyis ka'ang gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang /_/skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar/_/gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin kho nar thams cad du/_/ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang /_/bas 
[\[289b.4\]]mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba/_/de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi/_/gdug pa'i sems can rnam bral bar/_/gsang sngags rgyal po thams cad sgrub/_/rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul/_/skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/_/ma dang pha la gus pa dang /_/gnyis 
[\[289b.5\]]skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru/_/lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/gnas der yin gyis gzhan du min/_/nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_/ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa/_/sin d+hu na ra ma da bak+She/_/zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram/_/kA be rI dang 
[\[289b.6\]]dbyangs can nyid/_/chu klung chen po shI ta nyid/_/'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par/_/stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad/_/stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i zhing /_/byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang /_/kha che dang ni rgya yul dang /_/bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang /_/
[\[289b.7\]]rgya nag che dang li yul nyid/_/de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing /_/byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi/_/gang yang ri dang chu bo dang /_/bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod/_/nas dang gro ni za ba'o/_/gang du sems can snying rje ldan/_/de ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur/_/dpal 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]gyi ri bo brag ri che/_/lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi/_/dpal ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni/_/sa stengs rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'dzin/_/der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/_/myur du las dang las rnams so/_/rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che/_/chos 
[\[290a.2\]]kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang /_/gang du thub gtso zhi bar gshegs/_/der yang dngos grub blta bar bya/_/lha las babs pa'i mchod rten ni/_/sa pak+She dang cho 'phrul che/_/ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang /_/lum+bi'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der/_/gsang sngags 
[\[290a.3\]]rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i/_/bya rgod phung po'i ri der dang /_/de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal/_/me tog zhes bya'i grong mchog dang /_/de bzhin rtag tu kA sha'i grong /_/bcom brlag ka n+ya kub dzi dang /_/sa stengs
