[\[290a.4\]]grong ni 'phags rgyal dang /_/mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can/_/rtag tu sa stengs mi thi la/_/grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams/_/gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung /_/rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu/_/de rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub/_/'di rnams 
[\[290a.5\]]las gzhan yul rnams ni/_/grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang /_/gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni/_/'o ma'am 'bab chu la brten pa/_/der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing /_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur/_/gnas ni bla gab med pa dang /_/rtag tu khang pa 
[\[290a.6\]]stong pa ru/_/sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o/_/sngags rnams rjes mthun las rnams ni/_/sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su/_/sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya/_/bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson/_/sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms/_/tshul khrims 
[\[290a.7\]]spyod cing shin tu brtan/_/'byung po kun la phan par dga'/_/sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa/_/brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas/_/gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can/_/kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang /_/der ni bskal pa chen por gnas/_/dam tshig snang ba 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]bral ba'i phyir/_/dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru/_/byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed/_/dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang /_/mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang /_/ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am/_/rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can/_/rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa/_/mi 
[\[290b.2\]]bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing /_/log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin/_/dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang /_/log par lta ba smad pa yin/_/de phyir rtag tu dad gyur nas/_/gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten/_/bden par smra zhing chos shes pa/_/
[\[290b.3\]]sems can rnams la rtag tu phan/_/sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed/_/de yi dngos grub nges par 'gyur/_/mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis/_/las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed/_/las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed/_/rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis/_/bya ba'i 
[\[290b.4\]]las dang yang dag ldan/_/de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur/_/bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir/_/las ni rnam pa sna tshogs bya/_/bya ba'i don du bya min gang /_/bya ba'i las la sbyar bar bya/_/'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi/_/bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya/_/bya ba las dang 'bras 
[\[290b.5\]]bu nyid/_/bya ba las 'bras rtag tu'o/_/'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing /_/'bras bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras/_/'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid/_/thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas/_/rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste/_/yang dag sbyor dang bral 
[\[290b.6\]]ba yang /_/bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub po/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par ni/_/de la grub pa yod ma yin/_/grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang /_/grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin/_/sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa/_/sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu/_/byed par 'dod 
[\[290b.7\]]pa de las te/_/'dod pa'i las ni byang bar 'gyur/_/las min las ni thams cad la/_/las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i/_/las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya/_/brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi/_/las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o/_/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bya ba ma brtsams sngags rnams ni/_/lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur/_/sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi/_/thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa/_/gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag sdom/_/sgrub po sngags ni kun 
[\[291a.2\]]shes shing /_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig_/sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/_/lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa/_/sngags kun nyid ni sgrub par byed/_/rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni ring por mi thogs par/_/mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba 
[\[291a.3\]]yin/_/'byung po thams cad zhi don du/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags/_/gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni/_/mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi/_/de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam/_/chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed/_/de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen 
[\[291a.4\]]ni/_/dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu/_/'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob/_/sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa/_/sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin/_/tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams/_/'di rnams mdor 
[\[291a.5\]]bsdus thob pa yin/_/dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa/_/rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin/_/gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa/_/dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang /_/de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso/_/tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te/_/lha min lha yi 'jig rten 
[\[291a.6\]]gyi/_/de bzhin de rnams bdag po ni/_/sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/_/gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan/_/tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'/_/sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin/_/de nas 
[\[291a.7\]]sngags pas sngags bzlas bya/_/sngags pa 'byor ba 'dod pa yis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te/_/de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang /_/tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin/_/tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba yin/_/bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid/_/mchog nyid 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]kyis ni ldang ba nyid/_/zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed/_/sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing /_/ji srid dus su brtag par bya/_/bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na/_/der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin/_/de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed/_/de la rtag tu 
[\[291b.2\]]bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do/_/sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par gnas pa de/_de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas/_slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa 
[\[291b.3\]]zad pa'i don dang /_las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du mchog dang /_bar ma dang tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed cing /_skye ba brgyud pa rnams su gang bar byas/_sdig pa de thams cad 'jig 
[\[291b.4\]]par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas/_lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang /_yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po 
[\[291b.5\]]nyid dang /_rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/_ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 
[\[291b.6\]]'byam ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub 
[\[291b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig_/khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/_sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang /_gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga_/rgyud thams cad 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la/_legs par yid la zung shig bshad par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[292a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka' 
[\[292a.3\]]stsal du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o nyon cig_/gang 
[\[292a.4\]]gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/_sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na/_dang po re zhig_/sngags su 'gyur ba ni/_na maHsarba bud+hA nAM/_a tsin+t+ya d+d+hU ta/_rU pi nAM/_a tsin+t+yad+d+hu ta/_rU pi nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ku ru ku ru sarba aR+tha sA d+hA ya/_sarba duSh+Ta 
[\[292a.5\]]bi mo ha ni/_ga ga nA ba laM be/_bi sho d+hA ya swA hA/_rig pa 'dis bgrang phreng thams cad la las bya'o/_/sbyang ba dang /_dbugs pa dang /_blang ba dang /_rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o/_/dang po bgrang phreng shing la ni/_lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du/_/de yis 
[\[292a.6\]]mngon par bsngags byas nas/_/brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung ba bya/_/mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas/_/der ni rmi lam brtag par bya/_/mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa/_/mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs/_/sngags pa la ni des smras pa/_/
[\[292a.7\]]bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin long /_/sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni/_/shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed/_/mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che/_/rmi lam du yang ma mthong na/_/sngags pas shing de bor bar bya/_/de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis/_/dang po ru drAk+Sha 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]yin te/_/de las gzhan pa dbang po'i shing /_/bo de tse ni 'dod pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi/_/shing la 'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i/_/grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya/_/grogs po med par gyur na ni/_/rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya/_/steng 
[\[292b.2\]]gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su/_/'dzegs nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can/_/de la rtag tu bag yod pas/_/steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs/_/steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya/_/steng gi mchog gi dngos grub tu/_/gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/_/
[\[292b.3\]]bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste/_/tha ma la ni 'og ma'o/_/srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i/_/'bras bu de rnams yang dag blang /_/nub kyi yal ga las thob pa/_/rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya/_/byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs/_/lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs 
[\[292b.4\]]par byed/_/dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni/_/kun gyi don du zhi phyir ro/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed dang /_/mi'am ci dang srin po rnams/_/'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed/_/'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni/_/ma lus spyod 
[\[292b.5\]]pa byed pa'o/_/shar gyi phyogs su yal ga dang /_/der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams/_/de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na/_/tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu/_/rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras/_/rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/_/gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi/_/yal 
[\[292b.6\]]ga lo mar rab ldan pa/_/sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/_/de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang /_/lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la/_/'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod/_/phyogs der gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi/_/srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi/_/bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu/_/
[\[292b.7\]]de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spangs/_/'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas/_/'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/_/lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi/_/sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro/_/de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni/_/blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa/_/'og tu 'gro 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]ba'i 'khri shing la/_/de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro/_/de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i/_/bde nyid zlos pos der 'gyur ro/_/lha min bu mos yang dag ldan/_/de ni bskal par gnas par byed/_/bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas/_/de nas zlos pos bzlas pa 
[\[293a.2\]]bya/_/lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni/_/de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/_/de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni/_/gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni/_/de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya/_/bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya/_/brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang /_/de nas kun tu yang 
[\[293a.3\]]dag sbyang /_/der ni phreng ba dbugs par grags/_/gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni/_/lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/_/sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya/_/rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni/_/brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa/_/de nas de ni dag par 'dod/_/
[\[293a.4\]]pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas/_/bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu yi/_/sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi/_/brtul zhugs can gyis phreng thag bya/_/sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu/_/'bras bu phra mo zlum por bcas/_/rtag tu srogs chags bu ga med/_/yan lag 
[\[293a.5\]]ma nyams ma smad pa/_/mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang /_/bu ga med cing gas pa med/_/ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa/_/de bzhin ru drAk+Sha dang ni/_/bo de tse dang in+t+ra k+Sha/_/'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes/_/'bras bu dam pa'am gang gi tshe/_/sngags pa mchog 
[\[293a.6\]]tu brtson pa yis/_/'bad pas bgrang phreng brgyu bar bya/_/gser ram yang na dngul dag gam/_/nor bu shel las byung ba dang /_/mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra/_/byi ru yis kyang bya ba ste/_/phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya/_/gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i/_/bgrang phreng bzang 
[\[293a.7\]]po bya ba dang /_/sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi/_/ril bus bgrang phreng can dag ni/_/mnyam par bzhag ste srad bu brgyu/_/gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam/_/'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis/_/ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang /_/zlos pos 'bad de bya ba 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]yin/_/brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga/_/lnga bcu 'di dag bar ma yin/_/sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis/_/'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya/_/stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba/_phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin/_/phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhi ni/_/sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya/_/
[\[293b.2\]]de nas brgyus te sngags rnams ni/_/phyi mo gsum mam gnyis nyid dang /_/rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang /_/de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang /_/de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang /_/phreng ba kun nas brgyu bar bya/_/de nas mtha' ru yang mig bya/_/de la rim gyis dgod 
[\[293b.3\]]par bya/_/'bad pas mdzes par dkri ba bya/_/sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni/_/yongs su gsal bar byas de nas/_/dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin/_/sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin/_/yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yin/_/mu tig do shal rnams 
[\[293b.4\]]mtshungs shing /_/mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa'o/_/de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar/_/dri ma med la khrus byas nas/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin khrus byas te/_/chu yi gnas la ldang bar bya/_/de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya/_/bgrang phreng srad bu blangs nas ni/_/ba yi rnam lngas 
[\[293b.5\]]rab tu bkru/_/sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas/_/gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis/_/rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang /_/rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang /_/tsan+dan dkar po gur gum dang /_/'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya/_/de bzhin gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ji lta'i 
[\[293b.6\]]gnas su song nas ni/_/gang du ras ris bar pa ni/_/rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin du/_/sa stengs rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can/_/mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod/_/de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni/_/de 
[\[293b.7\]]tshe de yi spyan snga ru/_/dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad/_/son pa'am brgya yang gcig tu ni/_/brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas/_/nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas gyur nas/_/bdun pa'i thub la phreng ba dbul/_/snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba/_/tshad nyid de dang 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]mnyam par bya/_/de nas phreng la yongs su bzlas/_/mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de/_/ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la/_/sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/_/rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba/_/dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni/_/rmi lam nges par bstan pa 
[\[294a.2\]]yin/_/dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya/_/sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams/_/gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na/_/sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub/_/nges par de yi cho ga bya/_/dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi/_/gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong /_/
[\[294a.3\]]gal te rmi lam de mthong na/_/phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du/_/sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po/_/de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa 
[\[294a.4\]]ba'i rtog pa las/_ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bgrang phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems 
[\[294a.5\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /_sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de/_me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las 
[\[294a.6\]]gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/_rig pa'i sngags kyi tshogs gsang chen ni/_tad+ya thA/_o~M tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga le/_hi rak+Sha di hi da dA dI pA ya hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni 
[\[294a.7\]]mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/_'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o/_/dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas/_mar gyi sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste me lha spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te/_zhi ba 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]can dang /_rgyas pa can dang /_drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan med shing zhi don du/_/khyad par brlan dang bcas pa nyid/_/mtho gang 'am ni khru gang tsam/_/sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi/_/snam pa'i rnam pa rab tu shes/_/
[\[294b.2\]]cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin/_/bu ga med cing ser ga med/_/de bzhin ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra/_/ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam/_/kha dog nag po spang bar bya/_/srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang /_/bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin/_/gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa/_/tha ma'i 
[\[294b.3\]]chos kyang spangs pa'o/_/de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang yin/_/de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya/_/ma rul yon po min nyid dang /_/shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya/_/de nas me thab byas nas ni/_/kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru/_/'og nyid du ni 'bad pas brko/_/khru bzhi pa yi tshad dang 
[\[294b.4\]]ni/_/khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang /_/de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa/_/rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang /_/bye mas leg par sbyar ba de/_/de nas pad 'dra'i kha khyer ni/_/kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o/_/yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa/_/'dab ma gsum du 
[\[294b.5\]]bya ba'o/_/zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/_/'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin/_/mngon spyod la ni sa dbus su/_/rdo rje bya zhing rtse gnyis su/_/rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin/_/me thab rgya la khru gnyis re/_/gtsang ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar/_/chu klung 'gram du de bzhin 
[\[294b.6\]]spyad/_/bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang /_/dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru/_/sbyin sreg legs par brtsam par bya/_/de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang /_/rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang /_/de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che/_/gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni/_/gang 
[\[294b.7\]]zag mchog gis gsungs pa dang /_/sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la/_/de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin/_/khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi/_/ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug nas/_/der ni sngags shes khyad par du/_/sbyin sreg gi ni las bya'o/_/gnas de nyid 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]du rab gnas pas/_/myur du dngos grub the tshom med/_/shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas/_/zhi ba can dang rgyas pa bya/_/lho ru drag po'i lam rnams te/_/de ni sngags pas spang bar bya/_/shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste/_/rgyas pa can yang byang du 
[\[295a.2\]]phyogs/_/de yis sngags ni dus rtag tu/_/rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya/_/bil ba arga slak+Sha dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya/_/mngon spyod shing ni skam po dang /_/tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams/_/de dag thams cad spang bya ste/_/thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag_/
[\[295a.3\]]zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/_/rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis/_/de bzhin drag las la shing skam/_/tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams/_/yam shing de rnams med na ni/_/shing la de rnams su rtag bya/_/rtse mo gnyis su brtag pa bya/_/sngo dang snum dang 'dra ba dang /_/rma bya'i 
[\[295a.4\]]mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa'i/_/rnam pa de lta'i ku sha yis/_/kho ra yug tu ku sha ni/_/rtag tu dgram par bya ba ni/_/zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/_/mar gad dang ni mtshungs pas so/_/de bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rtsis/_/sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste/_/'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis 
[\[295a.5\]]bkag_/dri med chu ni dag pa la/_/rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi/_/de nas kun nas bsang gtor bya/_/g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te/_/brtson pas me ni sbar bar bya/_/cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/_/gtsang ma'i rtswa yi rtsa ba yis/_/sgron me tshad dang ldan byas nas/_/de 
[\[295a.6\]]nas khu tshur brtsams byas nas/_/'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya/_/kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste/_/rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min/_/sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang /_/gos gzhan gyis kyang lag pa yi/_/rlung gi nye bar gzhom pa la/_/mngon par dga' bas ma yin no/_/
[\[295a.7\]]gtsang ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos/_/nor bus kyang ni rlung yab bya/_/rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis/_/me ni mnyam par byas pa la/_/sngags shes pas ni me sbar bya'o/_/sbyin sreg don du mnyam gzhag pas/_/de nas g.yas pa min pa yis/_/der ni bsang gtor byas 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]nas ni/_/der ni ba yi mar gyis ni/_/sreg blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya/_/de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste/_/sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang /_/rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la/_/de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o/_/de tshe me yi snying po yi/_/sngags ni lan brgya bzlas pa yis/_/brtson 
[\[295b.2\]]ldan dri zhim me tog gis/_/rtag tu me ni spyan drang bya/_/sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas/_/gnas la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas/_/sngags des dbul zhing gzhan gyis min/_/zho dang mar du bsres pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni/_/de las lan 
[\[295b.3\]]gsum sbyin sreg bya/_/rgyas pa'i don du sngags dang las/_/kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba yis/_/'khrugs pa der ni nges sbyar bya/_/skom pa tshim par bsam par bya/_/zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa can/_/de la gsang sngags rig pa yis/_/lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba'o/_/
[\[295b.4\]]mngon spyod las la thun mong pa'i/_/nges par 'byung ba'i lha rnams las/_/gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya/_/rim pa ji bzhin me thab 'dir/_/ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang /_/mar la lan bdun yongs bzlas pas/_/de tshe spyan drang rnam pa der/_/ji ltar slar 
[\[295b.5\]]yang spyan drangs pa/_/lhag par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas/_/yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam bstan pa/_/de bzhin du ni zho bsres pas/_/stong ngam 'bum gyi tshad dang ni/_/brgya dang brgyad du'ang rtag par bya/_/de bzhin 
[\[295b.6\]]sngags pas rig pa bzung /_/lan re bzlas shing me la dor/_/'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba dang /_/de bzhin me lce gcig gyur pa/_/zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/_/du ba med la'ang rgyas pa can/_/du bcas drag po'i las rnams ni/_/rgyal bas smad cing spangs pa yin/_/me 
[\[295b.7\]]ni kha dog ldan gyur na/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar/_/zhi ba can la kha dog dkar/_/rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags/_/gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed/_/de la sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin rtag tu kha dog dkar/_/rgyas pa can gyis dngos 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]grub 'dod/_/nag po du ba'i kha dog dang /_/ser skya yang ni sdig pa can/_/kha dog rnam gsum rab bsgyur bas/_/dngos grub rnam gsum 'di dag yin/_/gzhan pa'i kha dog sprin mdog gam/_/slar yang brtan pa'i sa stengs der/_/sngags pa de la 
[\[296a.2\]]dngos grub med/_/de lta'i kha dog 'dra ba'am/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog can/_/me ni 'bar ba de mthong na/_/slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya/_/phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba yin/_/gal te sngags ni grub gyur na/_/las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/_/slar yang sbyin sreg 
[\[296a.3\]]la rab 'jug_/gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid la ni/_/me yi sngags ni brjod par bya/_/sngar ni rab tu brtags pas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni gshegs su gsol/_/spyan drang ba yi las rnams ni/_/de nyid du ni las rnams kyang /_/de nyid kyis ni bya ba yin/_/me yi spyod pa de 
[\[296a.4\]]bzhin gzugs/_/ras ris kyi ni spyan sngar brtsam/_/der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur bar/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams ni/_/thams cad de nyid du bya'o/_/gzhan pa'i las ni bya ba ste/_/sdig pa'i las ni khyad par du/_/
[\[296a.5\]]gang du rgyal mchog gis smod dang /_/'jig rten 'gal dang smad rnams so/_/ldang dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang /_/de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni/_/'jig rten lha nyid ldan pa 'grub/_/rtag tu ras ris la brtson shes/_/sbyin 
[\[296a.6\]]sreg las la mkhas pa ni/_/sa yi 'og gi bdag po'am/_/yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur/_/sa bla'i lha dang gnod sbyin nyid/_/rtag tu gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs/_/rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni/_/yul dang yang na grong nyid dam/_/rig pa 'dzin dang lha 
[\[296a.7\]]min nyid/_/sems can thams cad dbang du byed/_/'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed/_/sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid che/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/sa bcu la ni yang dag brten/_/sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na/_/sa stengs mi 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]rnams smos ci dgos/_/sde dpon bdag po de bzhin du/_/khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_/'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed/_/de bzhin nyid du mi bdag nyid/_/'byung po thams cad dbang don dang /_/yang na sa stengs rgyal po mnyam/_/de bzhin rtag tu las 
[\[296b.2\]]kun la/_/thams cad sbyin sreg gis ni bya/_/kun nas kun tu brtson ldan pas/_/las kun yang dag bsten par bya/_/de ched nges par bsgrub par bya/_/dpal don las ni mchog yin te/_/bar ma nyid kyang sgrub par byed/_/yang na chung ngu nyid kyang ngo /_/de bzhin du 
[\[296b.3\]]ni rdzas rnams kun/_/de bzhin slar yang 'grub par gsungs/_/sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/_/'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub mthong /_/phyag rgya bcing dang rig pa nyid/_/las rnams kun la rtag tu bya/_/sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/_/bdag nyid 
[\[296b.4\]]srung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas sngags 'di bklag par bya/_/'di ni rtag tu las rnams la/_/bdun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ga tA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M dz+wA la tiSh+tha hU~M/_ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA/_/
[\[296b.5\]]sngags kyi rab sbyor 'di yis ni/_/slar yang shing la bzlas bya ba/_/gnyis bzlas pa'am bdun bzlas pa/_/sngags rig des mer sbyin sreg bya/_/me tog bdug pa dri dag gam/_/mdor na thams cad nyid kyang ni/_/gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chu rnams kyis/_/'di 
[\[296b.6\]]nyid kyis ni bsang gtor bya/_/de nas las rnams thams cad ni/_/rgyu 'dis cho ga brtsam par bya/_/las rnams dag ni thams cad la/_/snga ma'i rab sbyor nyid kyis bya/_/sngar gyi skra can ma bcings nas/_/phyag rgya chen mor grags ldan ma/_/bsrung ba byas par 
[\[296b.7\]]gyur de nas/_/zlos pos rig pa gcig gis ni/_/las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya/_/dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis/_/gal te dge mtshan mthong gyur pa/_/rtag tu dge ba'i sgra grags na/_/de la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]stsol 'gyur/_/dang po las la rab sbyor dang /_/sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug pas/_/'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid/_/dngos grub de la brjod par bya/_/rgyal ba'i sgra 'am pa Ta ha/_/rnga bo che yi sgra grags na/_/brtson ldan kun 'gro'i dngos grub ste/_/
[\[297a.2\]]sbyin sreg las la yang dag brten/_/gzhan yang dge mtshan dpal dang ni/_/'dab chags sgra ni bzang po dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dbyangs sam/_/rgyal bas bsngags shing rab bsngags pa/_/bkra shis bzang po yid 'ong dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dang ni/_/gdugs 
[\[297a.3\]]dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /_/bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang /_/mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu/_/kha dog rnam pa du ma dang /_/rab sngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i/_/dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma/_/mthong nas de rnams blta ba la/_/
[\[297a.4\]]gsang sngags spyod tshul sna tshogs 'grub/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/_bgrang phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa 
[\[297a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po khyod 
[\[297a.6\]]kyi rig pa'i gsang chen yod do/_/sngags thams cad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dam tshig shes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/_chos kyi sprin la mthun par rab tu zhugs pa/_nam mkha'i rang bzhin/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[297a.7\]]pa'i sngags kyi mnga' bdag ches gtso bor gyur pa sems dpa' chen po dper na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo/_/ches gtso bor gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang nas skyes bu'i khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing /_gtso bo dam pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa rnams kyis sngar gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi mchog 
[\[297b.2\]]gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod cing rab tu bsngags la/_sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin pa/_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/_re ba thams cad 
[\[297b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/_/bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/_/gang 'di/_phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang 
[\[297b.4\]]ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun du snang zhing sems can thams cad kyi yid kyang tshim par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i lus can blta 
[\[297b.5\]]bar mi nus pa'i sems can kun gang gis kyang mi thub pa/_'od chen po yang dag par byung ba/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can/_'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa 
[\[297b.6\]]zhes bya bar gyur to/_/byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil kun du snang bar byas te/_rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/_rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas mdun du bdar nas mchod bzhin pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma/_rig 
[\[297b.7\]]pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags bzhin pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' sgyur bzhin pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la bzhugs pa rnams kyi rim gro byed bzhin pa'i blo gros chen po/_nam mkha'i dkyil 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]thams cad kyi lha'i rin po ches nye bar mdzes pa dang /_nor bu rin po che'i don du byas pas thams cad bkang ste/_mdzes pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'od gsal ba/_sprul pa po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'byin bzhin pa/_yi 
[\[298a.2\]]ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don bzhin pa/_'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'phro bzhin pa bar snang gi phyogs su gnas par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la nye bar phyogs nas lta bar byed bzhin pa/_de thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la kun 
[\[298a.3\]]tu lta zhing snang bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/_b+h+ru~M bka' stsal pa tsam nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du rnam par 'gyur ba 
[\[298a.4\]]drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/sems can gang la la bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skyes pa med par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang sdig pa 
[\[298a.5\]]thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir dang /_rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad yang dag par srung ba'i phyir dang /_dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang /_bsam gyis mi 
[\[298a.6\]]khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba kun du bstan pa'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' 
[\[298a.7\]]chen po gang la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sgrub par 'dod na de'i don gyi phyir cho ga 'dir 'gyur ro/_/dang po re zhig ma brtags pa dang /_mi smra ba dang /_mi za bar brjod pa'i mthu dang /_sngags kyis 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pas 'byung po thams cad la rab tu brtse bas gzhan 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]sdug na bdag sdug par legs par mthong bar byed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dbang po rnams legs par bzung ste rnam par g.yeng ba dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_nga rgyal dang /_ser sna lag pa la 'jug pa/_rab tu dgag pa'i don du rdzas yongs su 'jal ba dang /_lha gzhan la phyag 
[\[298b.2\]]mi byed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la dang ba shin tu mngon du gyur pa'i dad pa'i nor gyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la mngon par dang ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid dang /_legs par brtson pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_mdor na byang 
[\[298b.3\]]chub chen por smon lam btab pa/_rgyun du sgrub par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de la dang po re zhig bris sku'i cho gar 'gyur te rgyal po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba/_ma nyams pa'i ras lhag ma min pa/_kha dog can la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir gzhug 
[\[298b.4\]]par bya ste/_gser ltar ser ba'i gzugs brnyan chos ston par byed bzhin pa seng ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa lus thams cad kun nas 'bar ba'i do shal can bya'o/_/steng du ri'i rtse mor glog dang sprin dang bcas pa'o/_/'og 
[\[298b.5\]]tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor 'od zer las byung bzhin pa bya'o/_/sgrub pa po yang gnas dang cha byad dang /_dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin dang /_lag na spos phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa/_ras ris rnam pa de lta bur 
[\[298b.6\]]bris la sgrub pa po yang dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/_skye bo dang bral ba'i dben par rgyun chen por ras ris bzhugs su gsol la rnam pa thams cad du lus dang ngag dang /_sems yongs su skyo ba med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[298b.7\]]mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/_zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/_/lo ma dang /_zan dang /_'o ma dang /_slong mo'i bsod snyoms kyi bza' ba dang /_chu dang /_phye'i bza' ba'am/_'o ma dang nas zan bza' bar bya'o/_/a 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang /_sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i/_dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman srang gcig blangs nas bram 
[\[299a.2\]]ze'i bu mos ba byung lnga kha byang du bltas pa 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o/_/ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas la pad+ma'i 'dab mas bkab la skam du gzhug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga bzhin du me sbar nas stong phrag rdzogs par sbyin sreg bya ste/_de nas ring 
[\[299a.3\]]bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po rgya chen por byas te/_phyogs brgyad du pa lA sha'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa'i rnam par 'dren pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas phyogs bzhi rnams su dkyil 'khor byas 
[\[299a.4\]]nas phyogs skyong ba rnams bzhag ste/_dkyil 'khor gnyis par rab tu sad par byed pa lag tu yungs kar thogs pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gsum par legs par grogs bzang po'am/_grogs med kyang rung ste/_sngags kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas bsrung ba bya ste/_kha shar 
[\[299a.5\]]du phyogs pas nye bar 'dug la ku sha bting zhing bkram nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyi steng nas dang /_bzhis 'og nas g.yogs te/_lag pas mnan la ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dang po dngos grub 
[\[299a.6\]]ni 'dis rgyal ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyan te/_gang mthong ba dang /_gang rnams mthong ba de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa'i dngos grub ni glang po che dgu'i stobs dang /_rlung ltar mgyogs pa dang /_lo lnga brgyar 'tsho ba dang /_glang po che bcu 'phrogs pa dang /_rig pa 
[\[299a.7\]]'dzin pa thams cad kyi zil gyis gnon pa ma yin pa dang 'bar zhing 'char ba'i nyi ma dang 'dra ba/_lus rin po ches brgyan pa/_bar gyi bskal par gnas shing gzhan 'dren par byed pa/_rig pa 'dzin pa zil gyis mi non pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/_gsar du 'gro bzhin pa/_rlung 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]gi lam bdun du rnam par rgyu bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i mig sman bsten pa dang /_ldong ros lag pa yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/_/de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas/_sor bcu drug pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i rnam pa bya'o/_/zlum skor du khru gang tsam 
[\[299b.2\]]gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas/_de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rdo rje de nyid la nges par sems pas lta bzhin pa dang ldan pas rdo rje blangs te/_dur khrod du 'gro bar bya'o/_/
[\[299b.3\]]shar du rgyun 'bab pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun bya'o/_/chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ba byung lngas zlum skor bya'o/_/zlum skor byas nas khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas dur khrod du/_ras ris de'i 
[\[299b.4\]]drung du rdo rje bzhag ste/_de'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan la ji srid du gong bu'i 'og gi khung bur ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas khrus byas nas de nyid du lag pas rdo rje blangs nas rab tu 'jug go/_/bslangs pa'i bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gtor 
[\[299b.5\]]mas nye bar mchod de/_khrus byas nas rdo rje de nyid la dur khrod kyi thal ba ji srid sbags par so sor gzhag go/_/cho ga 'dis dur khrod kyi sha la bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar mtshan mo gsum du cho ga bzhin du gtor ma'i mchod pa dbul bar byas nas bdag nyid dam/_grogs bzang po 
[\[299b.6\]]la bsrung ba byas te/_lag pa gnyis kyis mnan te ji srid du dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/dngos grub dang po la gang bltas pa dang gang gis mthong ba de rnams rab tu dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa ras ris kyi sa'i rdul phyis pa tsam gyis mi 
[\[299b.7\]]snang ba dang /_glang po che stong phrag dgu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /_rlung ltar mgyogs pa dang /_skal ba drug 'phrog pa dang /_'dod pas 'gro ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_rnam par snang bar byed pa dang /_mthu chen por 'gyur ro/_/gsum pa la ni nyi ma 'char ka dang 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]mtshungs pa dang /_lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing 'khor los sgyur ba yang 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i lag par rnam par rgyu ste/_de bzhin du pad+ma dang dgra sta lag pa'i cho gas yang ngo /_/de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na sngon du bsnyen pa byas te lor skyes pa'i 
[\[300a.2\]]sdigs mdzub kyi sor mo blangs nas sngar gyi cho gas mchod rten byas te dur khrod du mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas kha shar du phyogs pas rab tu zhugs la de srid du sor mo nges par rig bya ston pas mnan nas rdo rje las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/nyin mo nam mkha'i rlung la 
[\[300a.3\]]bsrung ba bya zhing /_mtshan mo gnyid mi log par tho rangs ji srid du sor mo rnams dgug par bya'o/_/bkug pa'i gnas der mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa/_/ba dang be'u rgyud mtshungs pa/_grags pa dang ldan pa'i 'o ma blangs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tsan+dan gyi 
[\[300a.4\]]maN+Dal dang /_mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas sa'i snod du 'o ma blug par bya zhing /_thal bas kyang dkyil 'khor bcings la tho rangs khrus byas nas sngar 'di nyid kyis nges par bsrubs pa'i mar sar blangs 
[\[300a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas ma reg pa zos nas mthong ba zhes bya ste/_'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/grol bar 'dod na gnas la phan pa'i dri thams cad la sogs pa la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos te mtshan mo 
[\[300a.6\]]gsum du smyung bar gnas par byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/_mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas rang nyid sngags zlos shing brtag par bya'o/_/de nas gzugs brnyan byas nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[300a.7\]]sngar ji srid du rang gi rig pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas phye mar byas nas phye ma des kun du reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma la gzugs brnyan byas te/_bdug pa'i kham phor brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang la rjes su sems 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]pa de dbang du byed do/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis a pA marga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/nor 'dod na ba lang gi gnas su song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis lag pas ma bzos pa'i mchod rten byas la cho ga bzhin du mchod nas gu 
[\[300b.2\]]gul bsregs te stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o/_/ba lang stong ngam nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang /_sbrang rtsi la sogs bsreg cing stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o/_/grong bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas 
[\[300b.3\]]nas tsan+dan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma'i gdan dang lha bshos stong phrag brgya dbul te yul gyi dpon po thob par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya dbul te/_gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid 
[\[300b.4\]]kyis nA ga ge sar gyi me tog stong phrag brgyar dbul bar bya ste/_ras bcos bu'i gos stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du me tog thams cad 'dod pa'i cho ga thams cad dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs nas zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te ming med 
[\[300b.5\]]kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum skor byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na/_dang po gos bdun dang /_mdor na rigs dang bcas pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten byas nas shing ad+hi ba la dza la zho dang 
[\[300b.6\]]sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gang ston pa'i bu mo des sbyin par byed do/_/mi sbyin na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sA la'i rgyab nas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la yungs mar gyis 'di bkang nas lcags kyi thur mas phug ste tsha ba'i til 
[\[300b.7\]]mar gyis byugs te dur khrod du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/lus gcig pa'i bud med dam/_dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa la rje rigs dang /_rgyal rigs ma'o/_/gsum pa la dge slong dang /_bram ze ma'o/_/zhes te mdor na ma bsgrubs par 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]yang las byed par 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas khyad par du byas nas gang mthong ba dang /_gang rnams mthong ba de thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mig sman gyis so/_/tho rangs langs nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags 
[\[301a.2\]]pa'i chus bde bar khrus byas na gang la bltas pa de sbyin par byed cing de 'bangs su yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du til mar so la ma reg par bza' bas 'dod pas khyer ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thungs na don du ma gnyer bar yang bza' ba rnyed do/_/rgyal 
[\[301a.3\]]po'i khab tu zhugs nas chos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu yongs su bzlas nas lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa bya'o/_/rgyab tu mi lta bar song na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun gyi nang du song bas kun du 'phrog par bya ba nyid la bzlas 
[\[301a.4\]]pas gtsang bar byed do/_/gcod pa dang /_'bugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams so/_/sA lu'i 'bru dang /_ka ra bIr dkar po dang /_don grub dang /_/kA ba rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na steng du 
[\[301a.5\]]langs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/rims gzhom par 'dod na gi ri kad+na ka ra'i me tog la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na nyi ma bdun gyis sha za'i rims nyams par byed do/_/seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/
[\[301a.6\]]thal ba la lan bdun bzlas pas pha rol gyi sngags rnams 'ching bar byed do/_/chu la lan cig bzlas pas grol lo/_/de lta bu la sogs pa'i las rnams so/_/de nas yang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang 
[\[301a.7\]]chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa zhes bya ba yod do/_/de ni rigs kyi bdag po/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sgrub thabs kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]sgrol ma'i gsang chen du gyur pa sgrub pa pos gdon mi za ba kho nar dran par bya ba ste/_de sems dpa' chen po khyod la bshad do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa'i don du rigs 
[\[301b.2\]]kyi bdag po gsung du gsol/_'dod pa phun sum tshogs byed pa/_/bcom ldan rdul mun rnam par grol/_/chags pas mngon par zhi ba dang /_/byang chub nges 'byin sdig pa las/_/kun du gzigs pa'i zla ba la/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/srid pa'i sa 
[\[301b.3\]]bon rnam 'joms par/_/phyag 'tshal mchod de khyod la brten/_/bshad bya gal te 'byung bar byed/_/slar yang srid par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tad+ya thA/_shwe te shwe teM ge shwe b+hu dze shwe ta/_mA l+ye rA laM kr-i te/_dza ye bi dza ye a dzi te a pa rA dzi te swA hA/_dran pa nyid las/_
[\[301b.4\]]'di'i sngags kyi dngos grub myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di'i sngags ni tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos gtsang mar gyur pa lan bdun byas chu bor zhugs shing thal mo sbyar te yongs su bzlas nas shar du mngon par phyogs pas 
[\[301b.5\]]gtor bar bya'o/_/bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo /_/snying khar mthe bong byin nas lan cig bzlas na lha rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyag rgya yang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[301b.6\]]bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo /_/snying khar mthe bong byin nas lan cig bzlas na lha rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyag rgya yang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[301b.7\]]'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/_ma nyams pa'i ras skra dang bral ba 'bras bu can nam/_ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug pa/_stag gi pags 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]pa'i sham thabs can ral pa gyen du brdzes pa de yang rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/_phyag na bya ma bum thogs pa'am/_pad+ma dkar po'i 'dab ma bsnams pa/_g.yon gyi gzhogs su lha mo 'phags ma dkar mo chen mo seng ge'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/_phyag pad+ma dang /_mchog 
[\[302a.2\]]sbyin ma dang /_sgrub pa po ni sngon bzhin no/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing bris sku'i spyan sngar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/_/dri zhim po'i me tog lag pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_mar gyi mar me dang /_a ga ru dang /_tu ruSh+ka'i bdug spos dang /_gtor ma yang rig 
[\[302a.3\]]pa 'dzin pas de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo bud+d+hA s+ya/_na mo d+harmA s+ya/_na maH_saM g+ha s+ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo Ar+yA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_su ru me su ru ma/_ku ru ku ru/_su ru me karma sA d+hA ya/_bud+d+ha sad+ye na/_
[\[302a.4\]]d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na/_A gats+tsha shIg+h+rAM de ba dat+te swA hA/_spyan drang ba'i rig pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_da me da se swA hA/_dri'i rig pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hu hu hu ra hu ma hA me de swa re swA hA/_/me tog gi rig pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_me g+ha bi hra te swA hA/_bdug pa'i rig pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_tu tu tu tu tu ru 
[\[302a.5\]]ma hA tu ru Ne swA hA/_gtor ma'i rig pa'o/_/'di rnams nyid dang mar me bdun gyi phreng ba gnas pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag bdun de srid par ro/_/rang nyid 'gul ba 
[\[302a.6\]]dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis bil ba'i yam shing gis stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de yang dag par rdzogs par byed do/_/gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du 
[\[302a.7\]]nye bar gnod pa med pa/_skye bo dang bral bar bye ma la mchod rten byas nas dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa phul te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o/_/nyi ma so so re re zhing mchod rten bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las le'u rab 'byam bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis gzigs 
[\[302b.2\]]nas/_yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[302b.3\]]tad+ya thA/_bi ma le bi ma le/_bi pu la pra b+he/_bi pu la pri ye/_bi pu la ma ti/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_twa me/_ba ru sAM/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_gardza gardza/_ha na ha na/_bi pu la ma ti/_hr-i da ya/_ma nu sma ra/_bud+d+ha sat+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na/_bo d+hi satwA sat+ye na/_bi pu 
[\[302b.4\]]la ma ti sat+ye na/_badzra pA Ni sat+ye na/_sat+ya bA ti sat+ye na/_le le le le/_o~M o~M o~M/_b+hu ba b+hu ba b+hu ba/_ga ga ga_/ma tha ma tha ma tha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_a ba lo ki te/_mu tse swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 
[\[302b.5\]]'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/_bklags pas grub pa/_bdag srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_grong srung ba dang /_ri'i 'jigs pa dang /_gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_sha za'i 'jigs pa dang /_mdor bsdu na 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[302b.6\]]bklags pa tsam gyis sel bar byed do/_/'di las gzhan yang sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_da de shAn+te/_pra san+na tsi te swA hA/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/
[\[302b.7\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shwe te sa ma ye t+ye thA/_bi shud+d+ha bsti swA hA/_gos bgos pa'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_mu ne mu ne/_shAn+te bi shud+d+he ga ga na ta le pu gan+d+he gan+d+ha/_u da ka ba liM tsa ha ra ha ra ka ra ka ra bi b+hu swA hA/_me tog dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me thams cad la sngags 'dis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas 
[\[303a.2\]]lan cig bzlas sam dbul bar bya'o/_/sa'i gong bu dkar pos rtag tu bdag nyid gtsang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la gur gum gyi chu dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ga pur gyi dri dang /_tu ruSh+ka la sogs pa dang /_a ga ru'i bdug pa dang /_bal+li ka'am/_tsam pa ka'i 
[\[303a.3\]]me tog gi phreng ba dang /_'o ma sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gro bar bya ste/_zan gyi gtor ma dang /_ba'i mar gyi mar me rnams so/_/de nas 'di'i ras ris 'byung ste/_'dod pa'i skra dang bral ba kha tshar ma bcad pa ji ltar rnyed par gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras 
[\[303a.4\]]gzigs dbang phyug gur gum gyis bri bar bya'o/_/chu las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i gdan dang phyag na pad+ma dang pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan par byas pa/_gos dkar po can mchod phyir thogs pa/_phyag mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa/_ral pa gyen du brdzes pa de lta bur bri bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[303a.5\]]ldan 'das sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris zhal shar du mngon par phyogs par bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o/_/bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa na me sbar nas sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas dus gsum du sbyin sreg ji srid 'bum rdzogs kyi bar du byas na 
[\[303a.6\]]gang mngon par 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na gur gum dang /_tsan+dan dang /_me tog brgya pa dang /_'bras yos rnams gcig tu byas nas mar dang sbrang rtsis btags nas thun gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sbyin sreg mtha'i nyi ma la mthong 
[\[303a.7\]]ba stsol bar byed do/_/mtshan ma 'di rnams kyang stsol te gtsug pud gyen du brdzes par 'gyur ro/_/skyon med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_phreng ba 'bar ba'i ras ris rab tu sbyin pa'am smra bar byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pas yid kyis bzlas pa bya/_nam mkhar lha'i ngag thos na 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]grub pa yin no/_/de nas rgyal srid slar rnyed na chos kyis byed du gzhug go/_/slar yang de nyid ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya bzhin pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs par gyur to/_/na 
[\[303b.2\]]mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo bud+d+ha a b+hiShe ka s+ya pra dz+wa li ta dI p+ta ne pra/_b+hu dzA ya pra dz+wa li taM/_dIp+ta ha pu ka maN+Da lA ya/_tad+ya thA/_hr-i da ya mA brta yi Sh+ya mi g+hu Ta/_ban d+ha d+huM d+haM d+haM d+haM d+haM/_tsa ra tsa ra ba ra ya 
[\[303b.3\]]shasma/_o~M ka raM pra ta/_bid+yA te dza ya ma hA/_bid+yA ya ya swa yaska pra baR+ta ya ha ra Ne ra Ne ra ka ru Ne/_mu ni mu ni/_bi mu ni/_shAn+ta tsin+ta swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po thogs pa med pa bzlas pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo 
[\[303b.4\]]dang rtsod pa la sogs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i rgyal po ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sgrub pa brtsams te khrus gsum byas te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/ji srid zla ba nya'i bar 
[\[303b.5\]]du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas dpag tu med par bzlas par bya'o/_/las phran tshegs rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di rnams ni 'di'i 'khor du gyur pa'i sngags te/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[303b.6\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bi b+hu ri bi b+hu ri/_b+hu mi/_A kA ma b+hu mi A kA ma b+hu mi A kA ma tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha bi dza ya/_brta/_sha sha sha sha sha sha/_tha tha tha tha tha tha tha tha/_a kan+tha/_ak+n+d+ha/_pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_ras ris rab tu gnas par byed pa'i sngags 
[\[303b.7\]]so/_/dang por ri mo mkhan gyi las dang 'og tu ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te/_ma 'dres pa'i kha dog gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhabs gcig gnas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/me tog sna ma'i phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can me tog gi phreng ba'i 'od kyis brgyan pa dbyug 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]pa dang /_ril pa spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa phrag par g.yang gzhi nag po kun du 'phyang bar bya'o/_/g.yas pas dbugs 'byin par byed pa lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas de'i spyan sngar dge slong gi tshogs la ston mo bya'o/_/yon yang ci 'byor pa dbul 
[\[304a.2\]]lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dza la d+ha ra/_bi muk+ta ya thA ya swA hA/_nye bar byugs pa'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[304a.3\]]satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sugan+d+ha/_bi muk+ta bi dza ya swA hA/_dri'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_su ma na shri ye/_sa saM dar+sha na so so ma na/_so so ma na swA hA/_me tog gi 
[\[304a.4\]]sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+hu mra brtsa si ra ra ra ra/_la lA ya/_mu ne swA hA/_bdug pa'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na maHpri 
[\[304a.5\]]yaM ka ra/_pri ti bi dza ye/_o~M dza ye bi dza ye saM kalpa swAhA/_gtor ma'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na maHshu tsi ni/_ma ti bi ma li/_bi shud+d+ha ga ti swA hA/_nye reg gi sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[304a.6\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na maHtad+ya thA/_shwe te paN+Da bA si ni rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_'dis thams cad du bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+ha ra d+ha ri sh+tsit+te/_dza ba ri shu pa ci 
[\[304a.7\]]ba ti swA hA/_'dis sa blang bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na ma/_dza li dza li/_tsa lA ra le/_ba ba re/_ra ra re swA hA/_sngags 'dis khrus bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_na maHshu lam+bi/_bas+t+raM ta d+hA rA ri pha ba ne swA hA/_gos kyi sngags te 'di gos la yongs su bzlas te bgo bar bya zhing /_de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la'ang dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma 
[\[304b.2\]]hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_na ma u ts+tshuSh+ma pa ra ma/_da sha/_sho d+ha na/_sho d+ha ya swA hA/_gci ba dang /_bshang ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_mi gtsang ba thams cad 'dis yongs su phyis na gtsang mar 'gyur ro/_/gtsang sbra'i sngags so/_/rgya spos zho'am srang gnyis/_tsan+dan 
[\[304b.3\]]gnyis/_'dab ma can gyi rum ru gnyis/_gur gum gnyis/_dri 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/_/ga pur dang /_tsan+dan gyi bdug pa'o/_/'di lta bu'i cho gas ji skad gsungs pa'i gnas su ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhugs su gsol nas/_khrus 
[\[304b.4\]]gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes nas rtag tu gso sbyong la gnas pas 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar pad+ma dkar po re bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du yongs su dor zhing dbul bar bya ste nyi ma gsum la stong phrag brgyad du'o/_/de nas mtshan mo gsum du 
[\[304b.5\]]smyung bar gnas te mtshan thog thag mi smra bar pad+ma mar la btags pa rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ni rig pa 'dzin pa rab tu grol ba rnam pa gsum du rgyu bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grub par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 
[\[304b.6\]]'dzin par 'dod na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin 'dod na lha ma yin du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal srid 'dod na thams cad pa'i rgyal srid chen por 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa 
[\[304b.7\]]yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par skye'o/_/rkang pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po de nyid sgom 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsung bar gyur to/_/de la 'di rnams sngags kyi tshig chen por 'gyur te/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba dzi ya shrI gar+b+ha s+ya/_
[\[305a.2\]]samyak+saM bud+d+he s+ya/_na mo ma he shwa re swa/_bo d+hi satwa s+ya/_na maH_I sha pra b+ha s+ya/_bo d+hi satwa s+ya/_na maHA kA sha gar+b+ha s+ya/_bo d+hi satwa s+ya/_na mo badzra ma te s+ya/_bo d+hi satwa s+ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_
[\[305a.3\]]tad+ya thA/_b+ha ga ba te hr-i da ya/_mA bA ha yi Sh+yA mi/_o~M ta ra ta ra/_o~M o~M o~M o~M b+hu ba a b+ha ya a b+ha ya ba ra de u tsuSh+ma ti u tsuSh+ma ti/_su khA ba ti/_su khA ba ti/_ra ra ra ra la la la la tsu luSh+ka kha ga_/kha ga_/A gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga ba te ma ma ba raM/_
[\[305a.4\]]dA s+ya si/_a b+ha swa ra/_ma prA p+ta bi pu la ma ti sa mA d+hi bi dza te swA hA/_'jug pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bklags pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ba ste 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba dang /_zhing thams cad du las rnams byed do/_/de nas 'di'i ras ris 
[\[305a.5\]]kyi cho gar 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun nas dkar ba sngar gsungs pa'i ras ris kyi mtshan nyid kyi rin po che'i pad+ma la gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/_gtsug pud grol ba/_phyag na ril ba spyi blugs bsnams 
[\[305a.6\]]pa'o/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa dag tu ji ltar rigs pa bzhin te g.yon gyi gzhogs su gzhon nu dkar po phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa/_'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 
[\[305a.7\]]'das ma dpal chen mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/_pad+ma la nye bar 'dug pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bzhi'i gzhong pa phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/nam mkha' la 'od gsal gyi byang chub sems dpa' dkar po 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]me tog gi phreng ba yongs su thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa sngar bzhin no/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris byas nas sngar gsungs pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/_'o ma dang

[\[305b.3\]]ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na maH_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_ag+ni dzu lu dzu lu hu/_ra ma me swA hA/_dri'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[305b.4\]]na maH_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_d+hu ba sid+d+hi brah+ma te dzo swA hA/_me tog gi sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na maH_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_bi pu la te dza prah+ma shwa ra swA hA/_bdug

[\[305b.6\]]ga pur cha mnyam pa'i dri'i phreng ba dang /_ka ra bI ra dmar po'i me tog dang /_sna ma'i me tog lag pa dang /_dpal btags pa dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_sha l+ya kI dang /_bu ram sbyar ba'i bdug pa dang /_dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang /_ba'i mar gyi mar me ste de lta bur byas nas 
[\[305b.7\]]'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ka ra bI ra'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa rnams kyis stong phrag brgyad dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya ste/_de lta bu'i nyi ma gsum du bya'o/_/de nas nyi ma 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]gsum pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ji skad brjod pa'i cho gas bcu gnyis yongs su 'gyur ba'i kham phor zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_'o thug kham phor bcu ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/_srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ma byung gi 
[\[306a.2\]]bar de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /_'brug dang rnga bo che rnams kyang sgra sgrogs pa dang /_ras ris 'gul ba dang /_mar me'i rtse mo 'phel lo/_/de nas grub pa yin te sa thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gang mngon par 'dod kyang 
[\[306a.3\]]rung ste thams cad thob par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i rtsa ba'i rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[306a.4\]]po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can rjes su gzung ba'i ched du slar yang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po de nyid sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por skye bo dbul po rjes su gzung ba'i ched du dkar mo chen mo'i rig pa bka' stsal to/_/
[\[306a.5\]]de la 'di rnams ni don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams su 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_kr-iSh+Na dzi naM ba ra d+ha ra/_ka ma lA ya/_tIk+ShaM pad+ma a sa na s+thaM a b+ha ya prad/_
[\[306a.6\]]ma gra ha taM/_b+hA Sha swadz+dza Ta ma ku Ta d+ha ri/_Nau pad+ma baR+Na Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ri ma haM sa ra NaM pra pad+ya/_tad+ya thA/_shwe te bi dza ye shwe ta bas+t+ra/_shwe ta b+hu dze/_shwe ta pad+ma a laM kIrta dza ye bi dza ye/_a b+ha ye shwe taM aM shu ma b+ha ya pra te shwe taM tsa ga ga na shud+d+haM shwe taM bid+yA/_sa ma pra 
[\[306a.7\]]sa ma pra b+he shwe te b+h+yaH/_b+ha ba s+ya/_shaklAM shu raM b+ha bAn+ta re paN+Da ra/_pa Ta pa TA ya ra ra ra ra ra ya bi dza ye swA hA/_pa ri klI ba le ba re ba rA ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa'i dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo ste las thams cad byed ma/_dbul ba dang /_nad rab tu 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]zhi bar byed ma/_don thams cad sgrub par byed ma/_don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed ma ste/_gang 'di rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pas rtag tu dran par byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo yongs su skyob par byed par 
[\[306b.2\]]'gyur zhing skye bo thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di yi cho ga ni sngar brjod pa'i cho gas khru bcu pa'i ras byed du bcug nas kha tshar bcad pa la tsan+dan gyi khu bas mnan par bya'o/_/kha dog ma 'dres pas dri'i khu bas gnur bas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o/_/ston 
[\[306b.3\]]ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa/_phyag g.yas kyis pad+ma bsnams pa/_ral pa gyen du brdzes pa pad+ma'i gdan gos dkar po phreng ba dkar po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_pad+ma'i phreng ba bcu drug rnams kyis brgyan pa/_thams cad dkar po rnams kyis thams 
[\[306b.4\]]cad dkar po'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug 'og tu bri bar bya'o/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po rnams phyogs 'khor rnams su'o/_/sa'i lha mo 'di bri bar bya ste/_phyag g.yas kyis tsaM gau Ta ka thogs pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi gtsug gi 
[\[306b.5\]]cha la de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i phal po che g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa g.yon pas chos gos bsnams pa/_gser mdog phyag nas 'od zer 'phro bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba
