[\[306b.7\]]ya/_tad+ya thA/_swe te swe te swe te swe ta b+hu dze pa rA kra me bi dza ya bi tse d+hu te swA hA/_dri dkar po'i chus dkyil 'khor nye bar byug par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya ab lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA swa hA ya/_
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]swe ta gan+d+ha bi shud+d+ha ya/_su gan+d+hA ya swA hA/_dri'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA swe tA ya/_dz+yo ti sma/_tI dz+ye ti pa ra swA hA/_me tog gi rig pa'o/_/na mo 
[\[307a.2\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA swe tA ya/_swe ta pa rA ya/_d+hu pa pa rA ya swA hA/_dkar po bsres pa dang lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa 
[\[307a.3\]]rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA swe tA ya/_ba la bIR+Ya pra ba ra ba ra shuk+l+laM shuk+l+lod na ba ra pri yA ya/_ba ra ba ra ba ra ba ra shukle shuklA shukle swA hA/_gtor ma'i sngags te lhag ma rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis dbul bar bya'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa 
[\[307a.4\]]dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba nyid dkar po'i rnam pa zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la btags pa rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du til mar la stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg dang rig pa 'dzin pa gos dkar po bgos te tsA 
[\[307a.5\]]ru'i ston mo bza' zhing mchod phyir thogs dkar po 'chang ba ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas sbyin sreg la sogs pa bya'o/_/mchod pa chen po byas nas nyin mtshan du gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i bar 
[\[307a.6\]]du bzlas pa bya'o/_/lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra dbyangs thogs pa dang /_sa rab tu g.yo ba dang /_nam mkha' la me tog gi char dang /_ras ris las kyang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'byon te dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_
[\[307a.7\]]dud 'gro rnams skad cig de la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung bar 'gyur te ci 'dod pa de rnams sbyin par byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa de nyid dam/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam/_rgyal srid chen por 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]lus yongs su rje ba nyid dam/_sa 'og tu 'jug pa nyid dam/_mig sman dang /_ldong ros dang /_gi wang ngam/_thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/_mngon par shes pa lnga yang rung ste gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa 
[\[307b.2\]]ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/_dkar mo chen mo'i rtog pa yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sems can thams 
[\[307b.3\]]cad la kun du gzigs par byas nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rjes su son pa po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bka' stsal to/_/de la 'di rnams ni grub pa'i sngags kyi cho ga rnams so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA 
[\[307b.4\]]ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_bi muk+ti tse ta pA ya/_bi dza ya/_pa rA kra ma ya/_a pra ti ha ta/_glI yA ya/_a pa ri mi ta/_d+har+m+ma de sha ha nA ya/_duHkha bi sho d+ha nA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA 
[\[307b.5\]]ya/_ar+t+ta pa ri dra na hr-i da ya mA d+ha yi Sh+ya mi mi ti/_tad+ya thA/_la be A laM be lam+ba pra muk+ta lam+ba s+thi re/_lam+ba bi d+yA ya te/_na maHkA ru ni/_kA ru Ne/_kA ru Na ya ti/_bo mu ne ku ru NAn+d+ha hr-i da ye kA ru Nan+h+ra na ma stu te/_shAn+ta muk+te tsa/_shA ne ka ya bi bo/_/sta ta shAn+ta pra b+hA 
[\[307b.6\]]te/_ni t+yaM ba ga ba t+ya/_na ma stu te/_su ru su ru/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na ma ma ba raM dI s+ya si/_duHkhi tA nA ma sa ra dri Ni ka raM swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa sems can thams cad mi 'gro bar byed pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dran pa tsam gyis phyi 
[\[307b.7\]]bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa/_nyam thag pa rnams yongs su skyob par byed pa/_ngan 'gro rnam par zlog par byed pa bklags pas grub pa/_mdor na 'jigs pa thams cad la dran pa tsam gyis 'di'i grogs brgyad srung ba la sbyor ba/_rig pa'i rgyal po 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]'di rjod par byed pa dang /_sgrub par byed pa dang /_yongs su 'jug par byed pa de nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dbul por gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu gang la la byang chub tu sems bskyed de klog par byed bzlas par byed/_sgrub par byed 
[\[308a.2\]]sems la rjes su chags par byed pa yang de shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon pa bri bar bya ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 
[\[308a.3\]]gyis brgyan pa/_spyan gsum pa/_zla ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sku/_'jigs pa brgyad po thams cad skyob pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/_mchod phyir thogs dkar po can bri bar bya'o/_/sgrub pa po sngar bzhin du'o/_/rnam pa 'di lta 
[\[308a.4\]]bu'i ras ris bris nas mchod pa chen po bya ste/_'di nyid kyis dri dang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_gtor ma cho gas dbul lo/_/gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di dus ma yin par gzhol long la gnas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste 
[\[308a.5\]]byams pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su son pas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de thams cad dang /_las phran tshegs la sogs pa byed do/_/chus dug 'joms par byed do/_/ku shas byabs pas 
[\[308a.6\]]rims nyin gcig pa'am/_nyin gnyis pa'am nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/sngags bzlas pa nyid me tog la yongs su bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mdor na bya bas pas nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/'di'i sgrub 
[\[308a.7\]]thabs su gyur pa ni ras ris sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum bzlas so/_/mthar mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas par gnas pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma dbul te/_gtor ma ni dkar gsum du 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]cho ga byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste srod nas brtsams nas/_ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan mar gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/ras ris rab tu 'gul ba dang /_mar me'i rtse mo 'phel na thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[308b.2\]]ma grub na yul rnyed do/_/mi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sbyin no/_/bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/_/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed do/_/yang na dran pas 'gro bar byed do/_/bcom 
[\[308b.3\]]ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal por sems can thams cad rjes su son par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[308b.4\]]po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bcom ldan 'das ma'i yang rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bka' stsal to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[308b.5\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_pra dz+wa li ta ha sta ka maN+Da lu pri yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_su ra s+ya a mr-i ta a pra ti ha tai/_be be tsa tsa re tsar+tha re be be ru ru be ru ru d+h+we the the/_sa ra d+h+we/_sa ra sa ra d+h+wi/_gu gu me g+ha 
[\[308b.6\]]ne g+ha na g+ha ne/_a pra ti ha ste bud+d+ha sa t+yaM d+ha r+m+ma sa t+yaM saM g+ha sa t+yaM u pa ri sat+ye na b+ha ga bA na sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_pad+ma gar+b+ha swA hA/_pad+ma su baR+Na ti swA hA/_pad+ma dza swA hA/_pad+ma pri yA ya swA hA/_pad+ma su tri tiSh+Tha ta tsa ra NA ya swA hA/_sarba b+ha ya da da swA hA/_Ar+ya a 
[\[308b.7\]]mi tA b+ha sa mA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas du mas rjes su gnang ba gser bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa bklags pas grub pa gnod sbyin thams cad las 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]grol bar byed cing 'pho bar byed pa/_bzlas pa tsam gyis nad sel bar byed pa'o/_/de nas 'di'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba ral pa gyen du brdzes 
[\[309a.2\]]ba/_phyag g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_pad+ma'i phreng bas so sor brgyan pa ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa/_gos dkar po can/_bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa/_zhabs gnyis pad+ma la gnas pa'o/_/sgrub pa po yang spos phor lag na thogs pa ste 
[\[309a.3\]]sngar bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i ras ris kyi cho ga byas nas sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lngar bzlas par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA saswA ya/_dza le dza le da/_shu tsi durba tse a pra de 
[\[309a.4\]]shu tsi ni pra b+hu te swA hA/_/nye bar byug pa'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_pad+ma gar+b+he/_su gan+d+ha ya/_mu ru su ru swA hA/_dri'i sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[309a.5\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_b+hu baHb+hur+b+hu ba/_bid+yA tsan+d+ra tsa le tsa le swA hA/_me tog gi sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_pad+ma shri ye bar ba ri le swA hA/_bdug pa'i sngags 
[\[309a.6\]]so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mr-i te a mr-i te ga hwa re su mu khe swA hA/_gtor ma'i sngags so/_/de ltar snga ma bzhin du byas te/_a ga ru'i sbyin sreg gis gang 'dod pa de rnyed do/_/tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg 
[\[309a.7\]]gis 'gugs so/_/sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho gas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par byas te ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]du'o/_/mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas par rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram mam/_chu gling du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa'i cho ga bya ste/_srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/ras ris rab tu 'gul 
[\[309b.2\]]ba'am/_mar me'i rtse mo mngon par 'phel lam/_nam mkha' la me tog gi char 'bab bam/_'brug gi sgra thos pa'ang rung ste ras ris 'gul bas ni rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/_/mar me 'phel na grong gi rje bor 'gyur ro/_/me tog babs na yul gyi bdag por 
[\[309b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/'brug gi sgras grong bcu drug so sor rnyed do/_/ma grub na las dang yo byad thams cad yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs 
[\[309b.4\]]pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/_
[\[309b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mthu yang dag par bstan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yid la byas nas bka' stsal pa/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[309b.6\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa TA sa Ta sa ra sa rA Ni shud+d+ha bi tri mu khe bi dza ye swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po ste/_gang la klog par byed 
[\[309b.7\]]zlos par byed pa des sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di rtag tu bzlas pas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis su skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/dus thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang thun 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]mtshams gsum dran par 'gyur ro/_/de'i nad thams cad dang sha za la sogs pa rnams dang /_srin po lus la 'pho bar mi 'gyur te bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu yang de ltar 'gyur ro/_/'di'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni ma nyams pa'i ras sngar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[310a.2\]]dang ldan pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun nas bri bar bya'o/_/ral pa gyen du brdzes pa dkar po phyag na pad+ma ste g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa g.yon pa'i phyag gis pad+ma bsnams pa de'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o/_/gser 
[\[310a.3\]]mdog mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o/_/'di lta ste pad+ma'i bla ma dang /_yon tan bla ma dang /_ye shes dbang phyug dang /_rtag par sgra dbyangs dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_
[\[310a.4\]]shAkya thub pa dang /_'od dpag med dang /_mi 'khrugs pa ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di rnams kun nas bri bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas sngar gsungs pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o/_/'di nyid kyis dri dang me 
[\[310a.5\]]tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/_/gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mig sman nam/_ldong ros sam/_gi wang yang rung ste stong du bzlas pa'i ras 
[\[310a.6\]]ris kyi spyan sngar a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste srod nas brtsams te ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bar byed bzhin pas ni thig le byas na thams 
[\[310a.7\]]cad dbang du byed do/_/du ba 'thul bzhin pas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]'dzin las nges par skyes pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom bzhin pas 
[\[310b.2\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na 
[\[310b.3\]]mo na maHsarba bo d+hi satwA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_maN+Da bi shA la kIrti sarba bid+yA swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa/_lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/_
[\[310b.4\]]sangs rgyas du mas rjes su gnang ba/_byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par skyed par byed pa 'di bsgrub par bya'o/_/dbul po gang la la bsgrub par bya ba ras ris zla ba'i nang du de'i 'byor pa rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dbul po thob pa gang la la rig pa 
[\[310b.5\]]'di don chen po sbyin pas mchod pa bya bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi rnam par 'byor pa sgrub par byed pa'i las so/_/de nas sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngar brjod pa'i ras ris bri bar bya'o/_/dgu pa nas brtsams te dkar po'i 
[\[310b.6\]]zla ba nya la yongs su rdzogs par byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'o/_/'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa gnyis pa steng du'o/_/rang gzhogs su shAkya thub pa yang ngo /_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su 
[\[310b.7\]]dpal chen mo bri bar bya'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su rdo rje sde bri bar bya'o/_/sku mdog dkar po ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang /_chu snod bsnams pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog go/_/'phags 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]pa 'od dpag med la bar+Sha'i me tog gi phreng ba'o/_/shAkya thub pa la sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba'o/_/dpal chen mo la nA ga ge sar gyi me tog gi phreng ba'o/_/rdo rje sde la me tog dkar po'i phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dri zhim 
[\[311a.2\]]po rnams ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya'o/_/sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya la ras ris la me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa chen po byas nas ku sha'i 
[\[311a.3\]]khres la nye bar 'dug ste 'di nyid kyis gang byed pa de thams cad la gcig tu dpa' bas bya'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang ji srid phreng ba thams cad rab tu g.yo ba'i mtshan ma 'byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/dngos grub kyi mtshan 
[\[311a.4\]]nyid gang gi tshe/_mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang thams cad du ras ris kyi spyan sngar til gyis mngon par btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag drug byas na rgyal srid rnyed do/_/yul gyi longs spyod 'dod na 
[\[311a.5\]]ras ris kyi spyan sngar yungs kar dang til dang tse ka ta'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum byas na yul rnyed do/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar dang sbrang rtsi btags pa'i gur gum dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_na le sham dang /_ru rta rnams 
[\[311a.6\]]'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid chen po rnyed do/_/ma grub na yul rnyed de nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[311a.7\]]rgyal po lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so//_//
